item.title: Christina Aguilera as you've never seen her before: Dirrty singer removes ALL makeup and hair extensions for 'liberating' Paper cover
item.description: Christina Aguilera has always gone heavy on the makeup during her 20 year career in show business. But for the May cover of Paper magazine , the Genie In A Bottle hitmaker had on not one bit of paint.
item.content:encoded:
Christina Aguilera has always gone heavy on the makeup during her 20 year career in show business.

But for the May cover of Paper magazine, the Genie In A Bottle hitmaker had on not one bit of paint as she was seen in extreme closeup.

The siren, 37, was almost unrecognizable as she held a manicured hand up to her naked lips, flashing not a diamond ring but a band that said MOM on it. 

Is that really you? Glam queen Christina Aguilera was unrecognizable for the cover of Paper magazine as she went without makeup

 Touched: The cover line read Transformation and it's a good guess the inside photos by Zoey Grossman are more of the same

She loves to go overboard: The star seen here with fake eyelashes, purple lips and pink hair for Drage Race

The cover line read Transformation and inside the photos by Zoey Grossman showed more of the same, though in some frames she was heavily made up.

In the makeup-free shots, Aguilera interestingly has freckles which fans have not seen before as they are always covered up. 

The Stripped hitmaker also had her blonde hair worn naturally in one set up as little wisps surrounded her face.

'I've always been someone that obviously loves to experiment, loves theatrics, loves to create a storyline and play a character in a video or through stage,' the Dirrty singer told the magazine.

Clear skin: 'I've always been someone that obviously loves to experiment, loves theatrics, loves to create a storyline and play a character in a video or through stage,' she told the magazine

In profile: 'I'm a performer, that's who I am by nature. But I'm at the place, even musically, where it's a liberating feeling to be able to strip it all back and appreciate who you are and your raw beauty,' the looker added

'I'm a performer, that's who I am by nature. But I'm at the place, even musically, where it's a liberating feeling to be able to strip it all back and appreciate who you are and your raw beauty,' remarked the Lotus singer.

But she says she will be back to her heavily painted look very soon as she still loves makeup.

'I mean, I'm a girl that likes a beat face, let's not get it twisted,' she explained with a laugh. 

Plaid about you: Here the blonde bombshell held up her hands as she wore a Burberry top

In another set up, the Lady Marmalade singer had her hair in a short style with very short bangs, and again she had no makeup on.

The Beautiful singer's skin looked flawless.

Another setup saw her with curly short hair as she modeled a Burberry plaid shirt that fell off her shoulders.

Wet moment: And then there were plenty of shots where she was fully made up, but her makeup was messy as if she had been partying

Not shy: She also wore a see-through plastic raincoat that showed off her figure

A little disturbing: The performer had on red eye makeup and red lipstick with false eyelashes washing down her face

And then there were plenty of shots where she was fully made up, but her makeup was messy as if she had been partying or crying or both.

A dramatic set of pictures saw her with red eye makeup and red lipstick on as false eyelashes washed down her face.

The cover girl also wore a see-through plastic raincoat that showed off her figure.

Also in her interview, the Grammy favorite talked about growing up with abuse.

Two sides to Christina: Here the star licks a mirror making it appear as if she is kissing herself

Before the big kiss: Aguilera touched her lips as she wore a white jacket with buttons

The skinny sunglasses look: The on-trend musician rocket slender frames as she wore a plastic outfit and black/blue lipstick

'I watched my mom have to be submissive, watch her Ps and Qs or she's gonna get beat up,' said the star.

'You can either be, unfortunately, so damaged by it that you take a turn for the worse, or you can feel empowered by it and make choices to never go down that route.'

It taught her to understand that some women cannot get out. 'I hate when people say, "Why doesn't she just leave?" There's psychological damage and mental abuse that comes with being in a situation like that. A lot of people don't have the ability to vocalize it themselves or have the know-how to get out.'

They eyes have it: The Back To Basics singer had heavy purple eye shadow on here but very little lipstick

The beauty came to mega fame in the 1990s with pop rock hits. But she got her start in the Mickey Mouse Club alongside Britney Spears and Justin Timberlake.

After a comeback with The Voice, she has since taken things slower as she welcomed her second child Summer Rain, three (she already has Max Liron, 10), but was recently a guest judge on RuPaul's Drag Race.

And this year she has two movies coming out: Zoe, in which she plays a robots, and  Melissa McCarthy's comedy Life of the Party, in which she plays herself.

She said her dream would be to work with Will Ferrell.

Not what fans would expect: Heavy fake eyelashes on both her top and bottom lashes looked very 1960s as she made the most of a Fendi top

A new look for an icon: And these earrings that put a new twist on basic hoops added a ton of flair to her Twiggy look
item.dc:abstract: Christina Aguilera has always gone heavy on the makeup during her 20 year career in show business. But for the May cover of Paper magazine , the Genie In A Bottle hitmaker had on not one bit of paint as she was seen in extreme closeup. The siren, 37, was unrecognizable as she held a manicured hand up to her naked lips, flashing not a diamond ring but a band that said MOM on it.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker
item.mi:shortTitle: Christina Aguilera is unrecognizable with no makeup on

item.title: Anastacia suffers a disastrous wardrobe malfunction when her tiny dress reveals all during clumsy lift as she returns to the dance floor for the Italy's Strictly Come Dancing
item.description: The I'm Outta Love singer's attempt appeared to go less than smoothly, with her suffering a disastrous wardrobe malfunction during a particularly clumsy lift.
item.content:encoded:
She had an emotional exit from Strictly Come Dancing two years ago.

But Anastacia had a somewhat unsuccessful return to the floor as she took part in Italy's version of the hit show over the weekend in a Dancer for a Night segment, which sees celebrities compete for scores as a special one-off appearance.

Unfortunately, the I'm Outta Love singer's attempt appeared to go less than smoothly, with her suffering a disastrous wardrobe malfunction during a particularly clumsy lift.

Red alert! Anastacia returned to the dancefloor, taking part in Italy's version of Strictly over the weekend two years on from her UK appearance, but suffered a wardrobe malfunction

The musician, 49, was dressed in a tiny red and gold flapper dress for her salsa routine with show pro Maykel Fonts.

While she looked incredible in the minuscule costume, the flimsy fabric did little to conceal her modesty during one particularly daring lift.

As Maykel lifted the singer up and attempted to twirl her round, Anastacia flashed a little more than intended as her dress rode up to reveal her flesh-coloured tights and underwear.

For one night only: The I'm Outta Love singer took part in the 'Dancer for a night' segment, which sees celebrities compete for the judges scores as a special one-off appearance

Oops! Anastacia, 49, was dressed in a tiny red and gold flapper dress for her salsa routine with show pro Maykel Fonts, which did little to conceal her modesty 

The star put her all into the performance though, looking exhausted as she finished up the routine to applause. 

Anastacia gave a clue as to the daring nature of the routine as she shared a look at rehearsals on her Instagram page earlier in the week with the caption: 'Holy s**t this dance is fast.'

After her live performance, the singer was full of gratitude for her pro partner, writing on Instagram:

'Thank you @maykel_fonts all your hard work and a fun exciting routine. When learning to dance it takes a patient, kind, enthusiastic teacher.'

Giving it her all! While she looked incredibly in the minuscule costume, the flimsy fabric was not the best choice for the energetic salsa

Her leading man: As Maykel lifted the singer up and attempted to twirl her round, Anastacia flashed a little more than intended

'I felt you truly love helping others learn to dance. I wish the best for you and until we meet again my friend #italy #dance #salsa #record #time.'

The US musician was paired with Brendan Cole for the 2016 series of the UK's Strictly Come Dancing, where she was the sixth celeb to be voted off. 

Anastacia's appearance on the show was an emotional rollercoaster, after revealing she was taking part to boost her body confidence following two battles with breast cancer.

Cheeky! The fiery singer looked in her element as she got flirty with her hunky dance partner

Speedy! Anastacia gave a clue as to the daring nature of the routine as she shared a look at rehearsals on her Insta page earlier in the week with the caption: 'Holy s**t this dance is fast'

Not the best dress: After her live performance, the singer was full of gratitude for her pro partner, writing on Instagram: 'Thank you @maykel_fonts for a fun exciting routine'

Here we go again: The US musician was paired with Brendan Cole for the 2016 series of the UK's Strictly Come Dancing, where she was the sixth celeb to be voted off

In Week One, she was controversially pulled from the Dance-Off when she ripped her mastectomy scar tissue during rehearsals.

She struggled through her Saturday night performance, but said that a repeat performance would be too risky on the Sunday night, leading producers to pull the Dance-Off for the first time in the show's history.

The elimination therefore came down to the public vote and saw the couple with the lowest votes, Melvin Odoom and Janette Manrara, exit the competition. 

Round two: The star seemed to have the time of her life for her one-off appearance in Italy 

Come here you! The US star and her pro partner shared a warm embrace after their routine

Excited: Anastacia literally danced her way onto the stage, looking keen to get started

Wow factor: The star teamed her skimpy dress with gold strappy heels and glam curly locks
item.dc:abstract: She had an emotional exit from Strictly Come Dancing two years ago. But Anastacia had a somewhat unsuccessful return to the floor as she took part in Italy's version of the hit show over the weekend in a Dancer for a Night segment, which sees celebrities compete for scores as a special one-off appearance. Unfortunately, the I'm Outta Love singer's attempt appeared to go less than smoothly, with her suffering a disastrous wardrobe malfunction during a particularly clumsy lift.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Crawley
item.mi:shortTitle: Anastacia suffers a wardrobe malfunction on Dancing With The Stars

item.title: 'The sexy one': Kelly Ripa's husband Mark Consuelos admires her rock hard bikini body on romantic beach escape
item.description: They've been married almost 22 years and it's safe to say they've still got that spark. Sharing a snap Kelly in her bikini, Consuelos, 46, wrote: 'Sultry Sundays with the sexy one are my fave...'
item.content:encoded:
They've been married almost 22 years and it's safe to say they've still got that spark.

Mark Consuelos showed his appreciation for wife Kelly Ripa, 47, in Instagram photos shared from the couple's tropical vacation over the weekend.

Sharing a snap of the Live with Kelly host showing off her incredible bikini body Consuelos, 46, wrote: 'Sultry Sundays with the sexy one are my fave...'

'The sexy one': Kelly Ripa's husband Mark Consuelos shared a sexy photo of the TV host on their tropical vacation

Kelly looked incredible in a nude patterned bikini and a stylish floppy sun hat and shades as she waded through crystal clear waters.

In another image the blonde beauty showed off her ripped abs as she reclined on a sun lounger next to her handsome partner. 

Kelly was equally enamored with her husband as she shared sexy snaps of the buff father-of-three, she wrote the caption '#daddy'.

Another shot showed the actor emerging from the water as she took a photo from above on a deck.

Ripped: The 47-year-old Live with Kelly host looked incredible in a nude patterned bikini

Daddy: Kelly was equally appreciative of her husband of almost 22 years

Ab fab: The actor showed off his buff body in some orange red shorts

She captioned it: 'Comin up for air #nofilter,'

The duo later snuggled up for a sunset selfie with Kelly going makeup free.

Kelly and Mark married in 1996 and have three children, 

They share three children Michael, 20, Lola, 16, and Joaquin, 15. 

Earlier this month Kelly defended her husband from an Internet troll who made fun of his height.

Longtime loves: The couple looked happier than ever as they snuggled up for a selfie

Hunky hubs! Kelly shared a snap of her 46-year-old husband enjoying a swim

The user had commented under a photo of the couple, writing: 'Too bad he's short when he tries to look taller. It looks funny. Just be who you are.'

He's tall where it counts, babe,' Kelly replied.

Talking to Wendy Williams Kelly said: 'I love a clapback, 

'I love a troll but I love to troll a troll. Like, if you're gonna troll me, then I'm gonna troll back. And that, we can all agree, that is the way God intended.'

Shady lady: The couple posed alongside a pal for more beach time

item.title: Beyonce shocks shoppers as she fills up her trolley at discount store Target on a day out with daughter Blue Ivy... despite being worth $500 million
item.description: Despite her mass fortune, Beyonce proved she's still got an eye for a bargain as she was spotted wheeling her trolley around discount store Target in Los Angeles over the weekend.
item.content:encoded:
With an estimated net worth of $500 million, it's fair to say she's not short of cash. 

But, despite her mass fortune, Beyonce proved she's still got an eye for a bargain as she was spotted wheeling her trolley around discount store Target in Los Angeles over the weekend.

Joined by her daughter Blue Ivy, six, the singing sensation left unsuspecting shoppers in a state of shock when they noticed the mega-star perusing the shop with a trolley jam-packed with goods. 

Despite her $500 million fortune, Beyonce proved she's still got an eye for a bargain as she was spotted wheeling her trolley around discount store Target in Los Angeles over the weekend

Despite her very casual outing, the beauty still ensured she was the most stylish shopper of them all as she strolled around the store in a polka dot, cold-shoulder blouse, mom jeans and fluffy burgundy heels. 

Seemingly attempting to keep a low-profile, the star partly concealed her face beneath a pair of over-sized shades - though it seemed her sunglasses weren't fooling anyone as fans quickly snapped pictures of the star on their phones. 

'Bro im so freaking sad right now :((( my sister ran into beyonce at target up in LA,' one of her admirers bemoaned on Twitter.   

Joined by her daughter Blue Ivy, six, the star left unsuspecting shoppers in a state of shock when they noticed the mega-star perusing the shop with a trolley jam-packed with goods

'It’s not everyday you see @beyonce at target,' another shocked onlooker tweeted. 

Of course, it isn't the first time the superstar has been spotted splashing the cash at the budget store, as she was pictured perusing the aisles once again in December, when she was seemingly on the lookout for some Christmas bargains. 

The mother-of-three - whose husband Jay-Z has an estimated net worth of $900 million - was again in the company of her adorable daughter, though she was also joined by her mother Tina Knowles.

The humble outing came just over a week after Blue proved she knows a thing or two about the art world as she bid on very expensive pieces during the live auction for the second annual Wearable Art Gala at WACO Theatre Center in Los Angeles.

Not short of cash! Beyonce's husband Jay-Z has an estimated net worth of $900 million

Crazy in Love with those bargains! Beyonce was pictured perusing the aisles of Target once again in December, when she was seemingly on the lookout for some Christmas bargains

Girls' day out! Beyonce was again in the company of her adorable daughter, though she was also joined by her mother Tina Knowles 

The youngster was clearly having a great time in the front row of the show, waving around a bid card and bidding $19,000 on one piece.   

'Blue is out there bidding,' celebrity auctioneer Star Jones said with enthusiasm. 'You gonna do 19?' 

Holding a bidding card, Blue seemed overcome with joy as her parents laughed alongside the excited little girl. 

'Her mother and father have been talking about how you gather art and that is a big deal for African Americans,' Jones said. 

Bidding big! The humble shop came just over a week after Blue Ivy bid $19,000 on a piece of art at the second annual Wearable Art Gala at WACO Theatre Center
item.dc:abstract: With an estimated net worth of $500 million, it's fair to say she's not short of cash. But, despite her mass fortune, Beyonce proved she's still got an eye for a bargain as she was spotted wheeling her trolley around discount store Target in Los Angeles over the weekend. Joined by her daughter Blue Ivy, six, the singing sensation left unsuspecting shoppers in a state of shock when they noticed the mega-star perusing the shop with a trolley jam-packed with goods.

item.title: She has a new beau! Angelina Jolie is 'seeing a handsome, older-looking real estate agent'... and her ex Brad Pitt has been 'quietly dating too'
item.description: Angelina Jolie seems to have a new distraction in her life. The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress has been dating a real estate agent, according to a Monday report from ET.
item.content:encoded:
Angelina Jolie seems to have a new distraction in her life.

The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress has been dating a real estate agent, according to a Monday report from Entertainment Tonight.

It was added that her ex Brad Pitt - who she has yet to finalize her divorce from after a 2016 split - is also quietly dating around, but no hints were given to who the lucky ladies are.

New man in her life: Angelina Jolie has been dating a real estate agent, according to a Monday report from Entertainment Tonight. Seen in January

'Yes she is seeing someone,' a source told the site.

Jolie's real estate agent has been described as 'handsome' and 'older looking.' And it was also noted that he 'isn't a celebrity or high profile in any way.'

That rules out the men on Million Dollar Listing. 

It is likely that he is based in Los Angeles as that is where she spends most of her time to tend to the six children she shares with Pitt - Maddox, 16, Zahara, 13, Pax, 14, Shiloh, 11, and nine-year-old twins Knox and Vivienne.

On his own path: The source says that Pitt has also moved on, and any possibility of him getting back together with Jolie is highly unlikely. 'People talk about them reuniting, but it will never happen,' the source added; seen in January

The insider also noted that the relationship is 'not serious,' but 'just having another adult to spend time with has been helpful.' 

The ex files: The humanitarian is still in the process of finalizing her divorce from Brad Pitt; seen in 2015

Friends also like to see her happy for a change because 'Angie was in a very bad place after [her] split [from Brad].' 

The source says that Pitt has also moved on, and any possibility of him getting back together with Jolie is highly unlikely.

'People talk about them reuniting, but it will never happen,' the source added.

'Things between Brad and Angie really ended poorly, and while they've attempted therapy with the [six] children [they share], they can barely be in the same room together.' 

As far as Brad - who was married to Jennifer Aniston and was engaged to Gwyneth Paltrow, he is not dating any famous women.

'He's very private about who he’s seeing, but he does continue to casually date. The women he sees are not in the public eye,' it was noted.

"He has made changes in his life since the split. When they first split, he spent a lot of time at home and was often very down about what was going on. He was a homebody for many months, but in the last month or two, he’s been going out more. He enjoys going out to eat with close friends.'

He is seeing new ladies: 'He's very private about who he’s seeing, but he does continue to casually date. The women he sees are not in the public eye,' it was noted; with Jolie in 2014

 Despite this, another source close to the situation has insisted that Brad isn't looking to settle down again anytime soon.

The insider shared: "He is in no way ready to get serious with anyone. 'He invites his dates over to his house and never takes women out in public. While it's been a year and a half [after their split], it still feels too soon to him.'

Brad is focused on the welfare of his six children rather than his dating life for the time being.

The source added: 'Dating hasn't been a priority because Brad wants to spend more time with the children. He has been working on himself. Brad has been spending a lot of time learning to play guitar and hanging with musician friends." 

The clan: She tends to the six children she shares with Pitt - Maddox, 16, Zahara, 13, Pax, 14, Shiloh, 11, and nine-year-old twins Knox and Vivienne; seen in January

In the meantime, Jolie has been seen out often with her kids. On Monday the Mr And Mrs Smith actress was seen snacking on a salty pretzel as she spent quality time with two of her six kids, daughters Vivienne and Zahara, who opted for frozen desserts, on trendy Melrose Avenue in Los Angeles.   

He is used to being with famous women like Jennifer Aniston, seen here in 2004

And last week the Gia star gave a candid interview to InStyle.

She said the older she gets, the more she sees the resemblance between herself and her late mother, Marcheline Bertrand.

'I look in the mirror and I see that I look like my mother, and that warms me,' she told the website. 'I also see myself aging, and I love it because it means I'm alive—I'm living and getting older.

'Don't love having a random dark spot from a pregnancy, sure. I see my flaws. But what I see that I like isn't about a structure or an appearance. It's more that I see my family in my face. I see my age.'

Things have certainly changed for Angelina, who admitted to rebelliously using a sharpie to dye her hair as a teenager.

'I was a bit of a tomboy. And then I was a bit of a punk. Nowadays it's very popular to dye your hair blue, for example. In my day you bleached it and used a Sharpie.'

As a girl, Angelina says she was never one to play with makeup.

Flawless: The Maleficent actress is also the face of Guerlain; she donates her paycheck to charity as she is a humanitarian

But now, she enjoys watching her adopted daughter Zahara, 13, do just that with her friends.

'I buy a lot, especially for Z [Zahara]. She went through a period of trying different things, but she's pretty natural. I remember she had a girlfriend over one night, and they said they were going to do dress-up and did I have any makeup?'

'I gave them my makeup, but I wear one color red, and I have black eyeliner and mascara—I have the most boring makeup kit. And my daughter and I are different shades of brown. I now have a backup kit in case anybody wants to play 

In a series of black-and-white images accompanying the interview, Angelina dazzled with her trademark bold red lipstick as she showcased her many tattoos in a sleeveless white ensemble.

The humanitarian, who works with the UN, is still in the process of finalizing her divorce from Pitt.

The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress has been dating a real estate agent, according to a Monday report from Entertainment Tonight . It was added that her ex Brad Pitt - who she has yet to finalize her divorce from after a 2016 split - is also quietly dating around, but no hints were given to who the lucky ladies are.

item.title: Kim Kardashian, 37, looks suspiciously flawless in new swimsuit photos after THAT epic Photoshop fail
item.description: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star came off more like an exotic brunette model than the TV personality her fans know so well as she modeled a black bathing suit.
item.content:encoded:
Kim Kardashian posted an image to Twitter on Monday where she looked nearly unrecognizable.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star came off more like an exotic brunette model than the TV personality her fans know so well as she modeled a black bathing suit. And her followers were not having any of it.

The looker, 37, was posing with her makeup artist Mario Dedivanovic as she plugged their new collaboration on KKW X MARIO eye shadows and lipstick.

Is that you Kimmy? Kim Kardashian posted an image to Twitter on Monday where she looked nearly unrecognizable

New and improved: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star came off more like an exotic brunette model than the TV personality her fans know so well as she modeled a bathing suit

The looker was posing with her makeup artist Mario Dedivanovic as she plugged their new collaboration on KKW X MARIO

This comes after the siren, 37, was criticized over the weekend for having an Instagram image so heavily Photoshopped that a car appeared to be squeezed together to look like a toy in a slender parking spit.

In the new images, Kim looks touched up to perfection on all levels.

Her hair looks very different - she suddenly has reddish highlights over her raven locks, and is fuller on top.

The beauty's face also looks distorted with her features more even than ever. Her eyes are bigger and the space from her eyes to her lips seems longer.

Her note: The star's caption read, '10 years ago when we met I never dreamed we would be launching our own products together! I'm so proud of this collection of our favorite eye shadows and lips! Stay tuned... KKW X MARIO'

And her neck appears stretched so it's longer, leaner. Plus, she overall looks tanner.

While Kim has an enviable figure thanks to daily workouts and the Atkins Diet, she looks even more slender here with a tiny waistline and slimmer arms.

Stars very often rely on Photoshop for advertisements because even though customers don't want to admit it, they want stars to look as good as can be - often beyond realistic expectations - to buy the product.

Having fun: One tweeted changed the photo to give Kim a very small head, and did the same with Mario

The feedback: Gail Gisehaltz said, 'That doesn't look entirely like Kim.' Myleeeza added, 'B*** when were these pics taken???? You look 27!!!!' while Emma The Wicked Witch Of Canada added, 'Neither of them look a day over 30 I am shoooook.' Coffee! then commented: 'Hot. Airbrushed, but hot!'

Kim no doubt feels the pressure to look her very best to sell her makeup line. And the pressure must be intense as her half-sister Kylie Jenner, 20, has made a fortune from her makeup line.

But fans were not pleased. One tweeted changed the photo to give Kim a very small head, and did the same with Mario. 

Gail Gisehaltz said, 'That doesn't look entirely like Kim.' Myleeeza added, 'B*** when were these pics taken???? You look 27!!!!' while Emma The Wicked Witch Of Canada added, 'Neither of them look a day over 30 I am shoooook.' Coffee! then commented: 'Hot. Airbrushed, but hot!'

And the timing is terrible as this weekend Kim was slammed for her Photoshop fail. The image was posted to Instagram on Saturday.  

Photo tricks! Kim suffered a Photoshop fail, on an image she posted to Instagram on Saturday which squashed a car in the background and bent the curb

As it was: The 37-year-old reality television star was mocked by followers, after changes were made to the original snap

What happened? Fans were quick to point out the errors

Fail! They replied pointing out the issue

Edited! Kim had cleared engaged in some photo fakery

Slimmed down: One follower pointed out the strange looking car in her version of the picture

The mother-of-three appeared to have lengthened her figure and slimmed her thighs, which affected the background.  She was wearing neoprene cycling shorts and flip-flops, teamed with a cropped top.  And oversized orange hoodie completed her outfit, and she added giant shades. 

Kim captioned: 'So ready to March today! ‪@AMarch4OurLives @EveryTown.'  

Eagle eyed fans were quick to point out the glaring errors in the picture. 

One said: 'The car in the back lol.' 

'Just me or did anyone else see the squashed car in the back. #photoshopped. Caught you,' another wrote. 

And then there is this: There was an uproar when this image surfaced of Kim's bottom looking unflattering, but she later said it was Photoshopped to look ugly. The photo agency said that was not true. Taken in April 2017

Another added: 'Thought that was a spaceship in the back.' 

Others were not fans of her wardrobe choices, with one writing: 'I love you... but it looks like you were in a hurry and left the house in your moms old blazer, some pedicure flip flops that were left by the front door, and your higher power Spanx. March right back in that closet girl and get yourself dressed.' 

It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal.

She had a piece of her arm missing from a snap she posted with BFF Jonathan Cheban. 

Given the elbow: It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal, she had part of her arm missing here in 2014

The looker, 37, was posing with her makeup artist Mario Dedivanovic as she plugged their new collaboration on KKW X MARIO eye shadows and lipstick.

item.title: 'How big are yours?' Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield can't hide their shock as women with supersize breasts appear on This Morning
item.description: As This Morning presenters Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield are used to interviewing everyone from the prime minister to reality stars.
item.content:encoded:
As This Morning presenters, Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield are used to interviewing everyone from the prime minister to reality stars.

But the daytime TV pros were almost lost for words during Monday's show when Dolly, Mary and Lily appeared to talk about their supersize breast augmentation surgeries.

Phil and Holly couldn't hide their shock as the trio explained that they want to go even bigger.

Shock: Holly Willoughby was lost for words during Monday's show when Dolly, Mary and Lily appeared to talk about their supersize breast augmentation surgeries.

This Morning's guests revealed they have breasts between sizes 34M and 34OO after the use of 'expanders' which allows saline to be pumped into the boob without the use of surgery.

Holly didn't know where to look during the interview, admitting: 'I was worried I would look down automatically, and I don't want to do that because I think it's a bit rude but it's hard.'

'How do you imagine I feel?!' quipped Phil. During the chat with labour and delivery nurse Lily who has the biggest breasts ever, Phil explained that 'as a gentleman, I feel like I shouldn't ever ask this but tell me, how big are yours?' 

Record breaking: During the chat with labour and delivery nurse Lily who has the biggest breasts ever, Phil explained that 'as a gentleman, I feel like I shouldn't ever ask this but tell me, how big are yours?'

Awkward: Holly didn't know where to look during the interview, admitting: 'I was worried I would look down automatically, and I don't want to do that because I think it's a bit rude'

Holly was keen to know if the trio ever experienced backache while Phil was incredulous when Lily revealed her job as a nurse, asking:  

'On the labour ward, do you ever think it's walking around with two babies in front of you, its like a cradle.'

'No I feel comfortable with them,' insisted Lily before explaining it was possible for her to have a reduction if she wanted in the future.

Assets: Holly was keen to know if the trio ever experienced backache

Probing questions: Phil was incredulous when Lily revealed her job as a nurse, asking: 'On the labour ward, do you ever think it's walking around with two babies in front of you'

Want to go bigger: This Morning's guests revealed they have breasts between sizes 34M and 34OO after the use of 'expanders'

Viewers could barely contain themselves as the segment aired, taking to Twitter to marvel at Phil and Holly's professionalism.

'@Schofe is a legend! How the hell he kept eye contact with them women without looking down is a skill #ThisMorning,' tweeted one fan.  

'I'm just waiting for holly and Phil to start laughing uncontrollably in fact I'm hoping for it lol #thismorning,' agreed another.   

Fan reaction: Viewers could barely contain themselves as the segment aired, taking to Twitter to marvel at Phil and Holly's professionalism

Earlier in the show Holly became tearful during an emotional segment on male suicide.

The presenter was moved by a video montage which saw male celebrities including Peter Andre and Professor Green discuss their mental health issues.

Holly and co-presenter Phil introduced the video as part of the Project 84 campaign, which highlights the tragic statistic  that 84 men a week commit suicide.

Emotional: Earlier in the show Holly became tearful during an emotional segment on male suicide

Speaking out: The presenter was moved by a video montage which saw male celebrities including Peter Andre and Professor Green discuss their mental health issues

Lending their voices: Holly and co-presenter Phil introduced the video as part of the Project 84 campaign, which highlights the tragic statistic that 84 men a week commit suicide

This Morning invited Peter Andre, James Arthur and Professor Green to reveal their experiences with mental health, with This Morning regular Peter explaining:

'I was in a psychiatric hospital for two weeks in New York, I had 20 panic attacks a day.'

Singer James Arthur told viewers: 'I felt I had to be the best X Factor winner there ever was. The pressure was mounting on top of me.'

Professor Green said: 'I hadn't spoken to my dad in five years. I reached out to him just before Christmas. I talked about how I felt. I lost my temper, I couldn't respond rationally anymore.' 

Chic: Holly was dressed in a smart dusky pink coat as she headed outside for the segment on male suicide during Monday's show

Best foot forward: The presenter added cute heart-print heels to her Monday outfit

Holly was noticeably emotional at the end of the segment, choking up as she read out the next link.  

This Morning has partnered with male suicide prevention charity CALM for Project 84, which aims to start the conversation about men's mental health.

As a poignant reminder of the 84 lives tragically lost to suicide each week in the UK, Holly and Phillip unveiled 84 individual sculptures - each representing a real man who took his own life.

12 of the sculptures are positioned on the roof of the This Morning Studio and the remaining 72 are standing on the roof of the ITV Studios Tower, in a powerful art installation by US street artist Mark Jenkins.  

Campaign: This Morning has partnered with male suicide prevention charity CALM for Project 84, which aims to start the conversation about men's mental health

Powerful: As a poignant reminder of the 84 lives lost to suicide each week in the UK, Holly and Phillip unveiled 84 individual sculptures - each representing a real man who took his own life

Unveiling: 12 of the sculptures are positioned on the roof of the This Morning Studio and the remaining 72 are standing on the roof of the ITV Studios Tower

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Heidi Klum the cougar strikes again! Supermodel, 44, confirms romance with rocker Tom Kaulitz, 28, with a romantic kiss
item.description: The mother-of-four, who is currently filming America's Got Talent, recently split from from Vito Schnabel, 31.
item.content:encoded:
Heidi Klum and Tokio Hotel guitarist Tom Kaulitz aren't hiding their love anymore.

The 44-year-old model and her new 28-year-old beau were seen packing on the PDA while Heidi was filming America's Got Talent on Sunday afternoon. 

The two cuddled up as Klum enjoyed a break with her crew.

Lip-locked! Heidi Klum and 28-year-old Tokio Hotel guitarist Tom Kaulitz aren't hiding their love anymore. The 44-year-old model and her new beau were seen packing on the PDA while Heidi was filming America's Got Talent on Sunday afternoon

No shame! The new couple were seen making out in front of Heidi's AGT crew

All smiles! The two couldn't keep their hands off each other 

Tom and Heidi were last spotted on March 14 leaving Delilah in West Hollywood. 

While there were no public displays of affection that night, the duo were seen hopping into the same vehicle. 

Up until 2017, the supermodel was linked to art curator Vito Schnabel. 

Honeymoon phase: Tom and Heidi were last spotted on March 14 leaving Delilah in West Hollywood. While there were no public displays of affection that night, the duo were seen hopping into the same vehicle

Red hot! Klum was dressed in sequin red shorts and a suit jacket for AGT on Sunday afternoon

Dressed in sequin red shorts and a suit jacket for AGT, Heidi crouched down to rest her aching feet that were in sky-high heels. 

As a sign of affection, Heidi sweetly grabbed the calf of her new man who was wearing a pair of cropped sweatpants, a green tee, and unlaced white tennis shoes. 

Tom is well known for his rocker look that includes a ponytail and gauged ears.

Taken! Just weeks ago, Klum told Ellen DeGeneres that she was 'very single and ready to mingle,' after dating Vito for three years. But that was obviously short lived

Confirmed! This is the first time that the couple have been romantic in public with one another

Taking a load off: As a sign of affection, Heidi sweetly grabbed the calf of her new man who was wearing a pair of cropped sweatpants, a green tee, and unlaced white tennis shoes

Beats to his own drum: Tom is well known for his rocker look that includes a ponytail and gauged ears

Just weeks ago, Klum told Ellen DeGeneres that she was 'very single and ready to mingle,' after dating Vito for three years. 

But that was obviously short lived. 

The Germany native is the mother to four children; Helene (who goes by the name Leni), 13, Henry, 12, Johan, 11, and Lou, eight. 

She shares her little ones with ex-husband Seal, 55, whom she was with from 2005 until 2014. 

Moving on: The mother-of-four recently split from from Vito Schnabel, 31. She shares her little ones with ex-husband Seal, 55, whom she was with from 2005 until 2014

item.title: Real Housewives Of Orange County star Brooks Ayers gets married in Indiana... after split from Vicki Gunvalson following FAKE cancer scandal
item.description: Brooks Ayers a married man. The former Real Housewives Of Orange County star has wed Christy Lindeman and the two live in Indianapolis, Indiana.
item.content:encoded:
Brooks Ayers a married man.

The former Real Housewives Of Orange County star has wed Christy Lindeman and the two are living happily with their dogs in Indianapolis, Indiana.

While on the Bravo TV series he dated series regular Vicki Gunvalson, 55, who he had a rocky romance with for nearly five years, and got into trouble for lying about his health.

Cute couple: Brooks Ayers a married man. The former Real Housewives Of Orange County star has wed Christy Lindeman of Indianapolis, Indiana

A good catch: Ayers' wife looked lovely in a plunging lace dress with a satin belt

Brooks and Vicki split in August 2015 after years of quarreling. 

On Sunday Tamara Tattles reported that Brooks and Christy had wed, though they did not give an exact date for their ceremony.

They shared a photo from the church with Brooks in a dark suit and his wife in a white sleeveless V-neck lace dress holding a bouquet of pink-and-white roses. 

They have been together since January, it was claimed.

She has two children and both love dogs and football, according to his Facebook page. 

They love the same things: Here the couple is seen at a basketball game in a snap shared by Brooks on Twitter 

The way they were: Brooks and Vicki split in August 2015. Seen here in 2012 in Hollywood

Uh-oh: Ayers was accused of lying about his health condition while on the Bravo show

He works as a medical sales representative and she is a sales director for a tire company.  

Ayers was accused of lying about his health condition while on the Bravo show.

After being confronted about falsifying information about his cancer, he admitted to fabricating medical documents about a non-Hodgkin lymphoma diagnosis to Us Weekly in March 2016. 

They just could not make it work: Brooks and Vicki were together for almost five years

Gunvalson denied involvement in his claims he had cancer.

It seemed that Ayers having cancer helped ratings for the show and made viewers more interested in him and Vicki. There were even accusations that Brooks knew lying about his health would give him more time on the show.

Now Gunvalson is dating Steve Lodge, who is a retired homicide detective. They have been together since April 2016. 

And it looks like the insurance salesperson may marry him. 

“I’m so ready for marriage, I’m a marriage girl,' she told Us Weekly in December.  

Their TV show: Vicki with her co-stars of Real Housewives Of Orange County

item.title: No baby proofing here! New mom Kylie Jenner opens doors to her opulent living room featuring signed Basquiat print, $25k side table and roaring open fire
item.description: She might be just 20 years old, but Kylie Jenner knows exactly what she likes.
item.content:encoded:
She might be just 20 years old, but Kylie Jenner knows exactly what she likes.

And the new mother showed her stylish take on interior designer, as she gave fans a peek inside her newly decorated living room on Monday.

While the room was far from child-friendly - featuring a sharp-edged glass coffee table and an unprotected open roaring fire -  it was certainly impressive.

No baby proofing here! New mom Kylie Jenner opens doors to her opulent living room featuring signed Basquiat print, $25k side table and roaring open fire

Above the fireplace hung a signed Basquiat print of his artwork Hollywood Africans In front Of The Chinese Theater With Footprints Of Movie Stars.

Similar prints from the limited edition 1983 run of 60 are currently on sale for between $50,000 to $75,000.

The New Yorker son of Haiitain immigrants, Basquiat's work hangs in the world's top galleries, including Los Angeles' The Broad Musuem, where Kylie's sisters Kim and Kourtney Kardashian have both previously been pictured.

To the side of the fire under a round mirror stands a gold occasional table dripping with metallic bulges.

This piece is the Melting Brass Hallway Table by Zhipeng Tan, which retails for $25,000.

Watch out Stormi! The reality star will have to be careful to ensure her baby stays safe once she starts crawling

The room is furnished with soft white couches and carpeted in the same color, while a glass coffee table inlaid with floating pieces of gold leaf forms the centrepiece to the room.

On top sits a Taschen coffee table book by the photographer Bettina Rheims, which retails for $70. 

After buying her first property at just 17 - a $2.7million starter home in the same gated Calabasas community where Kim and Kourtney live, she conducted extensive renovations.

She sold this for $3.15million in July last year after moving to nearby Hidden Hills, to be close to her mother, Kris Jenner.

In May 2016 she had bought the first of her Hidden Hills properties, spending $6million on a 7,000-square-foot house, which she later put back on the market.

That August, she acquired her second mansion located right next door to the first for $4.5million, which in August last year she later sold for $5.4 million.

Room for Stormi? Yet while the room looks stylish and inviting, it surely won't be long before Kylie needs to babyproof 

Following the unbelievable success of her lucrative cosmetic business, her current main residence is a 13,200 square foot property which has eight bedrooms and 11 bathrooms.

She purchased the mansion in October 2016 for $12million.

This home is a long way from Kylie's first pad - where she allowed BFF Jordyn Woods's aspiring artist brother to graffiti an entire wall, and had rooms for her wigs and shoes.

Perhaps the mother-of-one has been taking advice from big sister Kourtney, whose passions include interior design.

Yet while the room looks stylish and inviting, it surely won't be long before Kylie needs to babyproof.

The make-up business owner welcomed her first child seven weeks ago, and Stormi Webster is quickly growing.  

The teenage years: After buying her first property at just 17 - a $2.7million starter home in the same gated Calabasas community where Kim and Kourtney live, she conducted extensive renovations; she is seen here in her old shoe closet

The first sitting room: Kylie's taste has evolved since she decorated this room two years ago

And the new mother showed her stylish take on interior designer, as she gave fans a peek inside her newly decorated living room on Monday. While the room was far from child-friendly - featuring a sharp-edged glass coffee table and an unprotected open roaring fire - it was certainly impressive.

item.title: 'Bikini life in paradise': Brooke Shields, 52, stuns in a two-piece black swimsuit while enjoying tropical vacation
item.description: Brooke Shields is 'in vacation mode.' The 52-year-old actress shared some envy-worthy snaps of her tropical getaway, flaunting her sensational body in a black-and-white bikini.
item.content:encoded:
Brooke Shields has ditched her famous Calvins and is now 'in vacation mode.'

On Sunday, the 52-year-old actress shared some envy-worthy snaps of her tropical getaway, flaunting her sensational body in a black-and-white bikini.

In the photos, the mother-of-two put her best assets on display, posing on a set of wooden stairs that led to the picturesque beach.

Scroll down for video  

'Bikini life': Brooke Shields, 52, stuns in a two-piece black swimsuit as she poses on a set of wooden stairs during a tropical getaway 

She captioned the set of pictures: 'Bikini life in paradise,' accompanied by a palm tree emoji. 

The two-time Golden Globe nominee went au naturel, showing off her flawless skin and fresh vacation tan. 

She kept her accessories to a minimum, wearing a few bracelets around her wrist and she let her long brown hair down naturally. 

In an interview with Health magazine, the Vogue cover girl shared that she's learned to love her body, saying: 'I was always considered the athletic one, and that translated into big. I was the big one. Thankfully, so many more body types are accepted these days.' 

Au naturel: The mother-of-two looked relaxed and showed off her best assets in a set of Instagram photos 

She added that she often works out with a personal trainer and loves moves like, 'hanging upside down in inversion boots, doing hamstring pulls and sit-ups. I'm amazed at how great it feels on my back.'

Brooke also spilled that she lets herself indulge in her favorites treats, like ice cream or wine, every once in awhile so that she sets herself up for 'success.' And all her efforts seem to have paid off.  

In another snap posted on Thursday, the brunette beauty took a dip in a pool as she looked out on the ocean to appreciate the spectacular view.

The model and actress seems to be enjoying her break from reality, captioning the photo: 'Out of office and into vacation mode.' 

'Vacation mode': The model and actress enjoyed the stunning view as she took a quick dip in a pool 

In a fun video posted on Saturday, Brooke is seen enjoying an 'afternoon joyride' as the 6ft stunner jet skis on the pristine ocean water.

The Blue Lagoon actress was ready for the adventure, wearing a light blue printed rash guard under a dark blue life jacket.  

And it seems the vacation came at just the right time. The star has had an incredibly busy schedule lately - juggling four TV and film projects in the last year.   

Guest star: The busy entrepreneur recently reprised her stint as 'renowned actress and supermodel' River Fields on the CW's Jane the Virgin 

The author of six books recently reprised her guest stint as 'renowned actress and supermodel' River Fields in the March 16 episode of The CW's Jane the Virgin. 

The star is also the voice of 'a very bad dog' on the Adult Swim cartoon Mr. Pickles. The show's third season premiered on Cartoon Network last month. 

And even though she has an impressive 96 credits on her IMDB, the veteran actress still has to practice for upcoming gigs.

In a candid photo shared last week, Brooke was seen reading over a green script and 'running lines,' for an upcoming project.

'Running lines': Brooke, who has an impressive 96 credits on her IMDB, shared a photo last week of her reading over a script for one her upcoming projects

item.title: A booty-full job! Emily Ratajkowski has new husband Sebastian Bear-McClard apply finishing touches to her posterior before a photoshoot
item.description: The comfort between Emily Ratajkowski and her new husband Sebastian Bear McClard was evident in a racy Instagram post on Sunday in which the producer applied makeup to Emily's pert posterior.
item.content:encoded:
They've been married for only one month.

But the comfort between model Emily Ratajkowski and her new husband Sebastian Bear McClard was evident  in the Gone Girl actress' Instagram post on Sunday, in which Sebastian applied makeup to his wife's perky posterior.

The 26-year-old model and her 30-year-old producer husband were poolside for the racy swimwear shoot.

Someone's gotta do it: The comfort between model Emity Ratajkowski and her new husband Sebastian Bear McClard was evident in the Gone Girl actress' Instagram post on Sunday

In the saucy snap, the star of the forthcoming film I Feel Pretty wears only a skimpy pair of green bikini bottoms.

Her assets are only covered by a couple of tactfully placed hands. 

She pokes her pert buns out and looks over her shoulder as the Good Time producer applies makeup to his 5ft7 wife's backside.

Ratajkowski has captioned the post: 'Mr. Last Looks'.

Loved-up: The 26-year-old model and her 30-year-old producer husband have been married for a little over a month. They're seen here in early March 2018

On Wednesday, the star of the Blurred Lines video wore only a hat in another pulse racing photoshoot, again shared to her Instagram account.

The nude model once more covered her chest with her hand as she pouted at the camera, evidently held by her husband.

She had captioned the post: 'Posing for my husband like'. 

Sun's out buns out: On Wednesday, the star of the Blurred Lines video wore only a hat in another pulse racing photoshoot, shared to her Instagram account

item.title: Happy in Hawaii! Ben Affleck beams at Lindsay Shookus during break from new movie… one week after cozy meet up with ex Jennifer Garner at church
item.description: Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago. But it looks as if the Oscar-winning Argo star is still going strong with the SNL producer Lindsay.
item.content:encoded:
Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago in Los Angeles.

But it looks as if the Oscar-winning Argo star - who recently showed off his large dragon tattoo on his back -  is still going strong with his New York-based love Lindsay Shookus.

On Sunday the lovebirds looked to be happier than ever as they held hands in Honolulu, Hawaii, after a breakfast date.

Still happy: Ben Affleck holds hands with his girlfriend Lindsay Shookus after a breakfast date in Honolulu, Hawaii on Sunday

Ben has been working on the Netflix show Triple Frontier with Charlie Hunnam and Oscar Isaac in Hawaii and it appears Lindsay was there to support him.

The Batman v Superman star, who wore a green shirt and grey shorts, was seen beaming at his blonde love interest who was clad in black-and-blue workout clothes.

They held hands and laughed as they made their way out of the casual restaurant.

There was no sign of the three kids he has with Garner: Violet, 12, Seraphina, nine, and Samuel, six.

In step: The Batman star, who wore a green shirt and grey shorts, was seen beaming at his blonde lady love who clad in black-and-blue workout clothes

UsWeekly recently claimed that the Massachusetts native 'loves and adores'  Shookus. 

But their relationship could ultimately be unrealistic as she lives in New York City, where she works as a producer at Saturday Night Live and raises a daughter (the father is ex Kevin Miller), and Ben  lives in Los Angeles, where he raises three kids with Garner.

Ben and Lindsay have been flying across the country regularly to keep their love alive. 

As far as his time with Garner a week ago, the exes looked like they were getting along well as they seemingly touched heads while tending to son Samuel.

She loves to support her man: Ben has been working on a Netflix show in Hawaii and it appears Lindsay was there to visit him. In his hand was takeout from the diner

The exes, who split nearly three years ago, mingled easily while holding red cups and looking at each other face to face.

If there was any animosity over past mistakes, it didn't seem to show. They also seemed to be happy talking to their friends and the three children.

Earlier, she looked like the ideal wife as she walked into church.

Not only did the 45-year-old appear incredibly fit in her chic outfit, but she also carried a basket of baked goods for her church friends.   

The photo that had everyone confused: Garner and Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago in Los Angeles. They are looking down at son Samuel

Later Ben, 45, was seen walking to the church alone. Affleck wore a red shirt with blue New England Patriots Starter jacket and blue jeans and grey shoes for his casual Sunday attire.

This sighting comes days after an UsWeekly source claimed she and Ben may still be dragging their feet on finalizing their divorce because the Good Will Hunting actor has told friends that he would like to get back together with the beautiful brunette.

'He had at one point been telling friends he wanted his ex back,' a source told the magazine, even though he has been dating Shookus, 37. 

Doing what she loves: The mother of three has been sharing her recipes on Instagram

The Alias vet often shoots her photos inside her Pacific Palisades mansion

But then another source told UsWeekly he has not been looking back: 'When they filed and decided they were moving on, that was it.'

Also in the new article it was claimed that there was a chance they could have gotten back together in 2017.

'When Ben was in rehab, Jennifer was there every day, visiting,' said the insider. 

'They did family counseling to work on their relationship. Things looked positive. Jennifer was very caring, very present. They both wanted it to work.' 

There is also the issue of Ben and Jen's divorce. They have been working with a private mediator for years.

She  sure has a sense of humor: The Catch And Release star put on her band uniform to perform Happy Birthday as her pal Reese Witherspoon turned 42 last week

But they have still not sorted it all out, which suggests they are stalling in case they could reconcile.  

Two-time Academy Award winner Ben married 13 Going On 30 star Jennifer in 2005. 

He has also dated Gwyneth Paltrow and Jennifer Lopez. 

Triple Frontier also stars Pedro Pascal, Garrett Hedlund and Adria Arjona. Filming began on Monday.
item.dc:abstract: Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago in Los Angeles. But it looks as if the Oscar-winning Argo star - who recently showed off his large dragon tattoo on his back - is still going strong with his New York based love Lindsay Shookus. On Monday the lovebirds looked to be happier than ever as they held hands in Honolulu, Hawaii, after a breakfast date.

item.title: Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas cavort in the ocean as they take their children on spring break
item.description: Titling her picture 'Family' with a heart emoji, the collage featured shots of the couple and their children, 14-year-old Carys and 17-year-old Dylan.
item.content:encoded:
It's two decades since they first fell for one another.

But Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas are clearly still very much in love.

The couple just spent an early spring break in the Dominican Republic, with Catherine sharing pictures from their trip.

Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas cavort in the ocean as they take their children on spring break in Dominican Republic

Vacation time: The couple just spent an early spring break in the Dominican Republic, with Catherine sharing pictures from their trip

Titling her picture 'Family' with a heart emoji, the collage featured a shot of Catherine and Michael embracing in the ocean.

Another shot showed their children, 14-year-old Carys and 17-year-old Dylan, taking a dip.

Dylan also featured in a black and white image, sleeping on a boat, while Carys posed on a bench.

The Douglas kids: Another shot showed their children, 14-year-old Carys and 17-year-old Dylan, taking a dip

Documenting her holiday in the Caribbean nation's picturesque Punta Cana, the Welsh actress has shared the highlights of the trip with her Instagram followers.

The stunning island is known for its 32 kilometre stretch of beaches and luxurious, all-inclusive resorts. 

And Catherine, 48, certainly looks at ease amidst the luxurious surroundings. 

Nap time: Dylan also featured in a black and white image, sleeping on a boat

Catherine recently filmed the movie Cocaine Godmother - and credited the flick with reinvigorating her passion for her profession.

She said: 'I just loved turning up to work every day. And I have to say, that's not necessarily always the case. For a few years there, I lost my mojo in what this was about.

'I love being a mother, I love being a wife. I have a very nice career behind me. If I'm out and in it, I like to be really knee deep in it and invest the time, the energy and creativity and enjoy it.

'I wasn't seeing any scripts that would even come close to me feeling like that.'

Homeward bound: Catherine returned to New York as the trip came to an end on Sunday

Catherine also admitted to having a lot of 'insecurities' but she tries to teach her daughter to be strong and confident.

She told OK! magazine: 'I try to instil in my daughter, and in myself, a sense of strength and power, you stick by your word.

'But of course there are vulnerabilities. There are insecurities like every woman. I'm a working mother, I have all those insecurities.

'And I think that coming from where I came from in Wales, it takes a certain kind of resilience to be able to take the knocks and keep battling through.'

Two decades together: The couple met in 1998 and married two years later

Both of Catherine and 73-year-old Michael's children are keen to follow in their footsteps and the actress is proud they want to study their craft and follow their passion, rather than just be famous.

She said: 'They go to a very liberal arts school - they go off to summer camp or theatre camp.

'What I love more than anything is that they want to learn and they love the craft.

'They don't want to be famous.'
item.dc:abstract: It's two decades since they first fell for one another. But Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas are clearly still very much in love. The couple just spent an early spring break in the Dominican Republic, with Catherine sharing pictures from their trip.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas cavort in the ocean

item.title: Stranger Things couple Natalia Dyer and Charlie Heaton pose separately on the red carpet at PaleyFest following split rumors
item.description: Dyer, who plays Nancy Wheeler on the show, wore a Delpozo dress with a white top with straps and a plunging top, with a seafoam green dress and off-white Christian Louboutin heels.
item.content:encoded:
They're one of young Hollywood's most adorable pairings - but have recently been hit with breakup rumors.

And curiously Charlie Heaton and Natalia Dyer decided to pose for photos separately at Sunday's PaleyFest event in Hollywood before sitting down to discuss their hit show Stranger Things. 

Dyer, who plays Nancy Wheeler on the show, wore a Delpozo dress with a white top with straps and a plunging front with a seafoam green skirt, and off-white Christian Louboutin heels. 

Scroll down for video 

On or off?: Stranger Things' Natalia Dyer and Charlie Heaton posed separately on the red carpet before the PaleyFest event on Sunday amid split rumors

Perfect pairing: Dyer, 21, and Heaton, 24, sat down for a chat about Netflix hit Stranger Things 

The 21-year-old Nashville native had her dark locks pulled back, with wisps of hair protruding and a light layer of makeup. 

Heaton, 24, wore a dark seaweed green suit with an untucked black button-down shirt, black boots with blue laces, and a watch.

The English actor, who plays Jonathan Byers on the show, had his dark locks parted in the middle.

The outing came after a source told Life & Style earlier this month: 'Charlie broke it off with Natalia. She’s heartbroken. She doesn’t know what went wrong.' 

But confusing matters even more the duo were spotted looking pretty happy and posing together at a Dior event on March 15 shortly after split reports emerged. 

Dyer recently revealed that she and her beau keep things light on the set of the show, as do most of her co-stars.

Professionals: The duo looked relaxed as they discussed the show despite it being reported earlier this month that they'd split 

Keeping it light: Dyer said she and Heaton 'goof off a lot' on the set of the show during filming

Winning formula: Dyer said that her character, Nancy Wheeler, and Heaton's Jonathan Byers, have a complementary effect on one another 

'He’s great. It’s a lot of fun, we goof off a lot,' she told US. 'The whole cast does. We’re all very close so we always have a great time on and off [set] ... sometimes it’s even hard to stop laughing, stop goofing off. It’s been really lovely!'

She said that the chemistry between her character and Heaton's is of the 'push-pull' variety, and that 'there’s some tension there,' as she thinks 'they probably fight a lot.'

She continued, 'They’ve both had this shared trauma. They’ve both gone through this experience together and I think that brings people closer.'

She said that the characters have had a complementary effect on each other since the show's inception.

'I think also what was kind of cool about Jonathan and Nancy, especially in season one, was that they brought out qualities in each other that maybe weren’t there without the other,' she said.

Lovebirds: The Netflix co-stars have been romantically linked since last year 

Ensemble: Actor Wil Wheaton moderated the panel, which included (L-R) Shawn Levy, Winona Ryder, Sean Astin, Paul Reiser, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Browmn, Caleb McLaughlin, Sadie Sink, Dyer and Heaton

item.title: Antonio Banderas is joined by stunning daughter Stella for Holy Week celebrations in his hometown of Malaga
item.description: The actor, 57, showcased his freshly-shaved head as he and the stunning 21-year-old watched the lavish affair from the balcony of a boutique hotel.
item.content:encoded:
He returns to his Spanish hometown of Malaga every year for the city's annual Holy Week.

And Antonio Banderas ensured the celebrations were a family affair on Monday, as he was joined by his daughter Stella for the famous Semana Santa.

The actor, 57, showcased his freshly-shaved head as he and his 21-year-old watched the religious affair from the balcony of a boutique hotel.

Family affair: Antonio Banderas was joined by his daughter Stella for the famous Semana Santa in Malaga on Monday

The actor, who had participated in the Palm Sunday service the previous evening, cut a more casual figure in an Aviation-style bomber jacket as he watched proceedings from the Larios hotel. 

While he layered a shirt and tie underneath, it was his freshly-shaven head that caught the most attention - having undergone a dramatic makeover for his upcoming role as Pablo Picasso.

Clearly relaxed during the annual celebrations, Antonio was joined by his daughter Stella - who was casually chic in high-rise jeans and an embroidered floral cardigan.

Casual: The actor cut a low-key figure in an Aviation-style bomber jacket as he watched proceedings from the Larios hotel

Catching up: Clearly relaxed during the annual celebrations, Antonio was joined by his daughter Stella, 21, and one of her friends

Stunning: Stella was casually chic in high-rise jeans and an embroidered floral cardigan, and opted to forgo make-up 

Having a ball: The trio were seen happily chatting together as they watched the famous service from their hotel room

Leaving her hair in loose, tousled waves and sporting minimal make-up, the beauty proved her naturally clear and glowing complexion as she chatted to her father during the exciting event. 

The actor returns to his hometown of Málaga each year for the religious Easter Weekend. 

Twenty-four hours earlier he was seen participating in the Palm Sunday service,as part of his role as a penitent in the Lagrimas y Favores (Tears and Favours) brotherhood.

Capturing the moment: The group were later seen snapping photos as the service proceeded

Iconic: Numerous guests were spotted on the hotel balcony, with the Semana Santa the city's most famous annual celebration

The Mask of Zorro actor donned white robes, a black hood and an ornate necklace as he rang a large silver bell and called out to the congregation inside a church. 

Antonio has been joined for the celebrations by his daughter and girlfriend Nicole Kimpel, 37.

The pair have been dating since 2014, following the end of his 19-year marriage to Melanie Griffith.   

Doing his bit: He has already been seen participating in the Palm Sunday service, as part of his role as a penitent in the Lagrimas y Favores (Tears and Favours) brotherhood

Antonio was worlds away from his usual self with his freshly-shaved head and eyebrows, which mark part of his metamorphosis into Pablo Picasso for the second series of Genius.

The artist's story follows the first hit season, which starred Geoffrey Rush as Nobel Prize winning scientist Albert Einstein.

The show earned National Geographic its best ratings ever, with 45million viewers tuning in globally, and the second series is set to premiere on April 24. 

Main man: Antonio was worlds away from his usual self with his freshly-shaved head and eyebrows, which mark part of his metamorphosis into Pablo Picasso for TV series Genius

item.title: When in Rio! Victoria's Secret model Izabel Goulart strips down to a sexy string bikini as she sunbathes in Brazil during a quick spring break
item.description: Izabel Goulart has become one of the top models in the business because she has incredible curves that make lingerie and bikinis look exceptional.
item.content:encoded:
Izabel Goulart has become one of the top models in the business because she has incredible curves that make lingerie and bikinis look exceptional.

And on Sunday the bombshell proved that she is only getting better in her thirties as she showed off her nearly six-foot frame in a black two piece while walking on the Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro, a massive seaside city in Brazil.

The Victoria's Secret vet, 33, showed off her cover girl smile as she let her hair down while getting her feet wet with friends. 

Scroll down for video 

Lovely lady: Stunning model Izabel Goulart modeled a sexy black string bikini as she walked on the Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on Sunday 

All the right curves: The bombshell proved that she is only getting better in her thirties as she showed off her nearly six-foot frame as she enjoyed the massive seaside city in Brazil

Izabel, who dates Kevin Trapp, wore a black bikini that had a triangle top and string bottoms that were tied on the sides and also showed off plenty of backside.

The catwalk princess also wore gold-rimmed sunglasses with yellow tinted lenses and had on small pieces of gold jewelry.

Her body looked very toned with lean legs and arms and her abs were shows. 

The star, who was born in Brazil, was discovered at age 14 and started modeling soon after in Sao Paulo. 

A 10: Izabel, who dates Kevin Trapp, wore a black bikini that had a triangle top and string bottoms that were tied on the sides and also showed off plenty of backside

Le look de IG: The catwalk princess also wore gold-rimmed sunglasses with yellow tinted lenses and had on small pieces of gold jewelry. Her body looked very toned with lean legs and arms and her abs were shows

A body to be proud of: The brunette looker made an impression in Europe at the fashion shows for Alberta Ferretti, Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Givenchy, Oscar de la Renta, Valentino, Chanel, and Dolce And Gabbana. In 2005, Goulart appeared on the covers of the April edition of Marie Claire France and, in December, Vogue Brazil

More background: In 2008, she replaced fellow Victoria's Secret Angel Alessandra Ambrosio as the face of A/X Armani Exchange. She also graced the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2011

Here the Elle model is seen running up the shore

The brunette looker - who is of Italian and Portuguese descent - made an impression in Europe at the fashion shows for Alberta Ferretti, Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Givenchy, Oscar de la Renta, Valentino, Chanel, and Dolce And Gabbana. 

In 2005, Goulart appeared on the covers of the April edition of Marie Claire France and, in December, Vogue Brazil.

In 2005, she entered the fold of Victoria's Secret, walking in their famed fashion show and starred in every show until 2016. 

In 2008, she replaced fellow Victoria's Secret Angel Alessandra Ambrosio as the face of A/X Armani Exchange. 

She also graced the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2011.

Her other big covers have been for Vogue, GQ, Marie Claire, Glamour and Elle.  

Izabel doesn't only model; she has also acted in movies as she appeared opposite The Rock, Alexandra Daddario, Kelly Rohrbach and Zac Efron in Baywatch.

Izabel told HeyUGuys of her reaction when she discovered she had bagged the role: 'I had so [many] butterflies in my stomach.

'All I wanted to do wanted to scream out loud, but I couldn't, because I was right about 10 to 15 minutes away from hitting a runway.'

She said she had to channel her joyous adrenaline amid receiving the great news, adding: 'It was very special - I walked that runway feeling very good.' 

Snack time: The stunning brunette stopped by a snack shop on the sand

Time to wash off the sand: After a day on the sand, she took some time to clean herself in an outdoor shower

All done: The looker appeared to be alone during her beach day as there was no sign of her beau Trapp

Posing with a fan? Here the Entourage actress was arm-in-arm with a handsome twentysomething man with several tattoos

Fresh drnk: Izabel enjoyed a fresh drink on the sand

item.title: 'This is it': Joanna Krupa flashes her massive diamond ring on coffee run before sharing cute snap with new fiance Douglas Nunes
item.description: Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken. The wedding news comes just eight months after splitting from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45.
item.content:encoded:
Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken.

The 38-year-old model flashed her massive diamond ring while out for coffee in Tampa on Monday. 

Krupa announced her engagement to boyfriend Douglas Nunes just a day ago.

Peace and love! Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken. The 38-year-old model flashed her massive diamond ring while out for coffee in Tampa on Monday

Going to the chapel! Krupa announced her engagement to Douglas Nunes just a day ago

Later the same day Joanna posted a cute snap of the couple on Instagram, the first following her engagement news.

'This is it,' she captioned the photo of her kissing Nunes.

The silver-haired fox is the COO of 451 Media Group, but very little else is known about him.

The wedding news comes just eight months after her split from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45.

If fans weren't already reeling over her speedy engagement, they certainly are now after Joanna posted a curious photo of her bloated belly on Instagram leading some to believe she also has baby news. 

'OMG someone ate too much,' she captioned the image. 

Her happy engagement news was revealed on Sunday when Joanna posted a snap of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with Nunes.

On Monday afternoon, Joanna posted the first photo with her fiance on Instagram. 'This is it,' she said as she kissed on Nunes who keeps his social media accounts private 

Model status: Krupa stepped out in a pair of skin-tight jeans, black booties, and a tank top 

She captioned the image: 'Just another weekend in the Krupa-Nunes household.' 

Confirming the news to MailOnline, a spokesperson said: 'Yes they are engaged - that's all for now.' 

Last October, Joanna hinted that she was single when she spoke to US Weekly and admitted she was focusing on her work.

She said at the time: ‘Honestly, right now I’m trying to focus on work. I just feel like men in Hollywood are looking for a trophy wife.

Baby news? If fans weren't already reeling over her speedy engagement, they certainly are now after Joanna posted a curious photo of her bloated belly on Instagram

Moving on: The wedding news comes just eight months after splitting from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45 

'It’s really hard to get to know somebody. If prince charming comes along, great, but I just feel like it’s really tough in LA.’ 

Just following her divorce from Romain, the Poland native decided to freeze her eggs. 

'You never know what life will bring,' she told Life & Style Magazine. 'What if that moment comes when you can’t have kids? Thank goodness I froze my eggs.' 

The playboy vet also told the magazine that ideally she'd like to have a boy and a girl. 

Just following her divorce from Romain, the Poland native decided to freeze her eggs. 'You never know what life will bring,' she told Life & Style Magazine . 'What if that moment comes when you can’t have kids?' She also admitted to wanting a boy and a girl...ideally

item.title: 'Please slow down stay with me forever!' Kim Zolciak shares heartfelt messages as daughter Ariana, 16, goes to prom with her boyfriend Collin
item.description: The 39-year-old reality television starlet shared a series of photos and sweet messages to her little girl who was dressed to the nines in a gorgeous floral Sherri Hill gown.
item.content:encoded:
She's the doting mother to six children.

But Kim Zolciak was overcome with emotion as she sent her 16-year-old daughter off to prom on Saturday night in Atlanta, Georgia.

The 39-year-old reality television starlet shared a series of photos and sweet messages to her little girl who was dressed to the nines in a gorgeous floral Sherri Hill gown.

Scroll down for video 

Growing up! Kim Zolciak was overcome with emotion as she sent her 16-year-old daughter off to prom on Saturday night in Atlanta, Georgia

'Where does the time go? My sweet Ariana Biermann heading to her boyfriends prom! Of course I cried I'm so proud of you,' Kim shared in a lengthy post.

Ariana rocked a beautiful high-low strapless gown covered in massive red roses and bright green leaves as she walked down the stairs to her adoring family. 

Boyfriend Collin Lipman matched his leading lady wearing a black suit with a bright red bow tie.

Beautiful: The 39-year-old reality television starlet shared a series of photos and sweet messages to her little girl who was dressed to the nines in a gorgeous floral Sherri Hill gown

Young love: Ariana rocked a beautiful high-low strapless gown covered in massive red roses and bright green leaves as she walked down the stairs to her adoring family

'There are no words describe how proud of you we truly are,' Kim continued. 'You are balanced, kind, sweet, giving and patient! Please slow down stay with me forever!' 

She ended the long caption with a heartfelt shout out to the dress designer, Sherri Hill. 

'Year after Year! You have kept my girls looking flawless always,' the Don't Be Tardy star proclaimed.

Kim's husband and Ariana's adopted father Kroy Biermann made sure to get in on photos of the pair as they posed outside of the family's home. 

Snap! Kim's husband and Ariana's adopted father Kroy Biermann made sure to get in on photos of the pair as they posed outside of the family's home

The adorable young couple have shown up on each other's Instagram accounts dating back to October 2017. 

Her mother rose to fame as an original cast member on the Real Housewives of Atlanta before breaking off into her own show. 

Kim married former professional football player Kroy during a star-studded backyard wedding in November 2011.

Kroy adopted Ariana and her sister Brielle after marrying their mother. The pair also share sons Kroy Jr., six, Kash, five, and twins Kaia and Kane, four. 

Cuties: The adorable young couple have shown up on each other's Instagram accounts dating back to October 2017
