item.title: Heavily pregnant Miranda Kerr cradles her prominent baby bump as she steps out in a fun and flirty floral minidress for lunch with pals
item.description: The 34-year-old Australian model, married to Snapchat co-founder Evan Spiegel, looked radiant as she stepped out to dine with pals in Hollywood on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
She's excitedly preparing for the birth of her first baby with billionaire husband Evan Speigel, giving her seven-year-old son Flynn a younger sibling.

And Miranda Kerr looked radiant as she stepped out for lunch with pals in Hollywood on Sunday, showing off her prominent baby bump in a black floral minidress.

The 34-year-old Australian model wore a black coat over her daringly short number, which she teamed with a pair of box fresh white tennis shoes.

Baby! Heavily pregnant Miranda Kerr stepped out for lunch with pals in Hollywood on Sunday

Shielding her eyes from the Southern California sunshine with a pair of oversized cat eye sunglasses, the brunette beauty wore her brunette locks in shoulder-length curls, while she highlighted her natural good locks with a smudge of red lipstick.

The stunning beauty kept her accessories minimal, sporting a delicate pendant, while her a glittering diamond sparkler was worn on her ring finger.  

Miranda recently explained that her son Flynn, whom she shares with her ex-husband Orlando Bloom, was so eager to have a little brother or sister that he demanded to know if mother was pregnant only a day after she got married to Evan.

Bump: The 34-year-old model displays her prominent baby bump in a black floral minidress

Describing the situation last month on Jimmy Kimmel Live!, Miranda recalled: 'Evan and I had been together for a while, and [Flynn] was like, "When are we going to have a baby brother or sister?" We were like, "We've got to get married first."'

'The day after the wedding, he comes running in, and he's like, "Mommy, is it in there?" I was like, "Honey, give it a minute!"' 

Miranda and Snapchat co-founder Evan made their debut as a couple in June 2015 after first meeting at a Louis Vuitton dinner in New York City in 2014.

Black and white: The Australian beauty wore a black coat over her daringly short number, which she teamed with a pair of box fresh white tennis shoes

The couple tied the knot in an intimate backyard ceremony at Evan's home in the Brentwood area of Los Angeles in May 2017, in front of just 45 family and friends.

Despite their divorce, Miranda has maintained a friendly relationship with British actor Orlando, who is in an on-off romance with Katy Perry. 

The former flames were married in a romantic ceremony in July 2010, but announced that they were going their separate ways in 2013. 

Happily married: Miranda and Evan Spiegel tied the knot in an intimate backyard ceremony in May 2017, in front of just 45 family and friends. Pictured in November 2016

item.title: 'Today is our wedding day!' The View's Star Jones weds Ricardo Lugo on Bahamas cruise ship one day after celebrating 56th birthday on board
item.description: Star shared several snaps to her Instagram, first of her lavish birthday party on Saturday, then her on board bachelorette party along with her pet pooch Pinky Michelle Jones.
item.content:encoded:
Star Jones is one happy lady.

The former star of TV's The View not only celebrated her 56th birthday on Saturday on board a cruise ship; she also got hitched Sunday.

Star exchanged vows with fiance Ricardo Lugo in front of family and friends as they sailed in The Bahamas on the Royal Caribbean's Anthem Of The Seas.

Scroll down for video 

Seafaring nuptials: Star Jones tied the knot with fiance Ricardo Lugo on board a Royal Caribbean cruise ship in The Bahamas on Sunday. She posted this snap to her Instagram

Star shared several snaps to her Instagram, first of her lavish birthday party on Saturday, then her on board bachelorette party along with her pet pooch Pinky Michelle Jones.

She also added a shot of herself and her new husband silhouetted against the sunset sky.

She wrote in the caption:  'Yesterday was my birthday...and today is our wedding day at sea! Our #AnthemToLove has officially begun on the #AnthemOfTheSeas!'

Celebrating: The former panelist on The View also shared snaps of her bachelorette party posing with her beloved dog Pinky Michelle Jones and a glass of champagne

Blowing out candles: She also posted to Instagram a montage of photos taken at her 56th birthday party on Saturday, also on board the ship

The couple, who've been dating for several years, got engaged last summer.

Lugo is an assistant state attorney who works for State Attorney Kim Foxx in Illinois, according to the Chicago Tribune. 

Guests at the nuptials included Beyonce's mom Tina Knowles-Lawson who shared a snap of some of the female guests to Instagram with the caption: 'With all my beautiful fly girls on the seas❤️ here to celebrate the love and Union of Star Jones and Ricardo.'

'Fly girls': Guests at the nuptials included Beyonce's mom Tina Knowles-Lawson who shared this snap of some of the female guests

Husband number 2: Ricardo, pictured with Star in New York this past October, is an attorney

Star was previously married from 2004 to 2008 to Al Reynolds, a former investment banker.

The TV personality is best known for her stint on ABC's The View where she was one of the original panelists alongside Barbara Walters and Whoopi Goldberg.

She appeared on the daytime show from 1997 to 2006.

In 2011 she was cast in the fourth installment of The Celebrity Apprentice, placing fifth in the reality competition.

In November 2017, her ex-husband Reynolds came out as bisexual. 

The first husband: Star wed Al Reynolds, an investment banker, in 2004. They divorced in 2008. They're pictured at Diddy's Real White Party in The Hamptons in 2007
item.dc:abstract: Star Jones is one happy lady. The former star of TV's The View not only celebrated her 56th birthday on Saturday on board a cruise ship; she also got hitched Sunday. Star exchanged vows with fiance Ricardo Lugo in front of family and friends as they sailed in The Bahamas on the Royal Caribbean's Anthem Of The Seas.

item.title: Real Housewives Of Atlanta: Kenya Moore gets surprised by new husband Marc Daly who makes show debut
item.description: Marc Daly finally made an appearance on The Real Housewives Of Atlanta on Sunday night, but not all of the women were impressed.
item.content:encoded:
Kenya Moore's husband Marc Daly finally made an appearance on The Real Housewives Of Atlanta on Sunday night, but not all of the women were impressed.

Shereé Whitfield still wasn't convinced they were actually married, and was very disparaging about his nose piercing

'I haven't really seen a man with a nose ring since Tupac,' scoffed the 48-year-old, who has been 'dating' an incarcerated man.

Surprise appearance: Kenya Moore while hosting the premiere of her PSA was surprised by her new husband Marc Daly on Sunday's episode of The Real Housewives Of Atlanta

'Shereé slow your roll, my man has always been real, just like my hair, and so are his checks, can I say the same for your man?' smiled Kenya,  47, in a side confessional.

Marc, who owns a restaurant in Brooklyn, appeared as a surprise at the screening of Kenya's PSA about domestic violence.

Kenya had suffered in an abusive relationship when she was 16-years-old.

Previously she discussed why her husband couldn't be there on her big night.

Nose ring: Marc sported a small nose ring as he showed up to support his wife

Recent jewelry: The restaurant owner told Sheree Whitfield that he got the ring two years ago

Good one: Sheree said that she hasn't seen a man with a nose ring since the late rapper Tupac Shakur

'He's working and he was just like, ''I can't, but I send you my love'',' she explained to the suspicious RHOA women.

'He can't even get on a plane by himself. I need to book his ticket, I need to pick out his clothes,' Kenya told the ladies.

'Girl, that man has been flying without you his whole life,' Porsha Williams responded with a smirk.

Travel arrangements: Kenya earlier spoke how she makes the travel arrangements for Marc

Catching up: NeNe Leakes continued reaching out to Porsha Williams at the event

'He has, but guess what? He is married now, so guess who he likes to take care of him?' Kenya replied.

As Kenya was giving her speech Marc walked into the room.

'My knight in shining armor,' she beamed.

Shining armor: Marc after surprising Kenya stood to the side as she spoke

'I don't know if he's her real husband, but he's real,' said Shereé bitterly.

'I think he wanted to make a grand entrance and that he did,' said Kenya, a 46-year-old former beauty queen.

'He's kind of sexy, she has got a fine husband,' remarked Cynthia Bailey.

Fine husband: Cynthia Bailey approved of Kenya's husband mark

'I'm happy for Kenya that Marc is here,' said NeNe Leakes graciously.

Cynthia cried while watching her PSA as her mother discussed the violence she had experienced.

'I'm so proud of my mom for speaking up,' said the 51-year-old beauty.

Getting emotional: The PSA about domestic violence featured Cynthia's mother and her daughter cried while watching it

Powerful message: NeNe and Kenya also took part in the PSA

Earlier in the show Shereé was shown working on her 'château'.

She decided it must have a 'theater, sauna and a man cave/game room' for her jailed boyfriend Tyrone Gilliams.

'I am committed to you for life,' he told Shereé on the phone, while she fantasized about a 'destination wedding' whenever he gets out of prison.

Behind bars: Sheree talked to her incarcerated boyfriend Tyrone Gilliams who vowed that he was committed to her for life

'I don't know what the realistic release date is for Tyrone, but it better be this year,' she huffed.

Shereé later talked about her convict boyfriend with her 'very responsible' daughter Kaleigh.

'You're going to date a man from jail?' asked Kaleigh incredulously.

Candid conversation: The reality star later talked to her daughter Kaleigh about her jailed boyfriend

'Something's not right, there are a lot of fish in the sea and you go for the jailbait?' sighed the sensible teenager.

'He's a good guy,' Shereé assured her.

The show opened with Porsha, who was roller skating with her 'friend' Rickey Smiley.

Roller skating: Porsha opened the episode roller skating with Rickey Smiley

'I didn't even have time to get my nails done, I'm looking ratchet as hell,' she confessed before taking a tumble.

'Gotta make sure that a** is ok,' he said, while leaning over to kiss it.

'You've got to give it mouth-to-mouth,' she giggled.

Good times: Ricky and Porsha joked after she took a tumble

Rickey suggested going back to his apartment to 'practice' Porsha's dating skills, but she refused.

Cynthia met with Kenya to throw shade over Kim Zolciak-Biermann about 'roach gate'.

'You can take Kim and her family out of the trailer park, but you cannot take the trailer park out of Kim and her family,' announced Kenya.

Roach gate: Kenya continued to insult Kim Zolciak-Biermann after learning of 'roach gate'

Kandi Burruss told her husband Todd about her issues with NeNe, who had cried on social media after getting heckled during her comedy show.

'I feel like I am a part of her pain,' fretted Kandi.

'Why can't we forgive NeNe and let this blow over?' she asked.

Friendship fractured: Kandi Burruss talked to her husband Todd about her fractured relationship with NeNe

NeNe played pool with her 18-year-old son Brentt.

'You have to have a career, having a job sucks,' she told the teen, who wants to be a comedian.

'I am going to mentor him…and we are just going to leave Uber and Lyft alone,' said NeNe, who had fallen into controversy for making a joke about rapes in Uber cars.

Teenage son: Brentt, 18, told his mother NeNe that he was done with school after graduating from high school

Career plan: NeNe pledged to help Brentt with a career in comedy

Meanwhile, Cynthia talked to her 18-year-old daughter Noelle Robinson about her boyfriend Will Jones.

'I would totally love to meet him,' said Noelle.

The RHOA returns next week with the season 10 finale on Bravo.

Mother and daughter: Cynthia talked to her daughter Noelle about meeting her new boyfriend Will Jones

Shereé Whitfield still wasn't convinced they were actually married, and was very disparaging about his nose piercing 'I haven't really seen a man with a nose ring since Tupac,' scoffed the 48-year-old, who has been 'dating' an incarcerated man.

item.title: Tallulah Willis sets pulses racing with her toned figure as she sunbathes completely NAKED in sizzling Instagram snap
item.description: The 24-year-old certainly caught the attention of her followers by posing posed completely naked - with nothing but her arms and legs concealing her modesty - as she relaxed in the garden.
item.content:encoded:
She is known for showing off her impressive figure in an array of swimwear to her 184,000 followers. 

But Tallulah Willis went one step further on Monday, as she stripped herself of all clothing for another sizzling snap on Instagram.

The 24-year-old certainly caught the attention of her followers by posing posed completely naked - with nothing but her arms and legs concealing her modesty - as she relaxed with a pet pooch in the garden.

In the nude: Tallulah Willis posed completely naked for her Instagram followers on Monday

The star was the picture of confidence as she posed - with only her arm covering her bare chest, to show off her enviably toned figure to all. 

While she ensured to achieve an all-over tan by going naked in the sunshine, the brunette did protect herself from the heat in a beige cap and oversized sunglasses, tipped sexily to the edge of her nose. 

Posing on a sun lounger beside her dog in the garden, Tallulah shared the snap without a caption, to let her figure and bold display do the talking.  

Girls' getaway: Tallulah appeared to be chilling at home in the snap - following a sun-soaked getaway to Turks & Caicos with her sister Scout

Tallulah appeared to be chilling at home in the photo - following a sun-soaked getaway to Turks & Caicos with her sister Scout.

The daughter of Hollywood actors Bruce Willis and Demi Moore looked sensational in a pastel blue bikini as she showcased her rippling abs in another Instagram snap. 

The model worked her best angles for the camera as her tanned skin glowed against the idyllic location. 

Girls just want to have sun! The model, 24, looked to be having the time of her life as she soaked up the sun in a sizzling pink swimsuit on Sunday

Tallulah shielded her eyes from the dazzling sunlight in a pair of classic wide-brimmed shades as she tied back her orange-tinged locks up into a messy bun. 

Going fresh-faced for the beach day, the starlet left her quirky accessories at home and opted for just one shimmering ring.

Older sister Scout, 26, got in on the swimsuit action as she slipped into a hot pink two-piece.   

Leaving very little to the imagination, the Idaho-born beauty hitched up her racy bikini bottoms high on her waist to give the best view of her eye-popping derriere and washboard abs.

Scout's dark chestnut tresses fell past her shoulders in a tousled straight style as the artist posed up a storm for the tantalizing pic.   

Famous offspring: Tallulah is the youngest daughter of Demi Moore [pictured] and her ex-husband Bruce Willis

'Pls pretend to b annoyed by these' Tallulah jokingly captioned as the pair worked their best model pose. 

Scout and Tallulah escaped to the exotic destination for a balmy getaway with friends last week and made sure to share their enviable getaway on social media. 

On Sunday, Talullah looked to be having the time of her life as she shared yet another sizzling swimwear snap on Sunday, taken as the model enjoyed a day topping up her tan in the sun-soaked location.

The natural beauty looked incredible once again in a plunging pink swimsuit as she basked in the rays of the sunlight.

Flashing a hint of sideboob, the fashionista looked the picture of confidence as she pulled a playful pose and clutched on a can of coke.

Letting her natural beauty shine through, Tallulah kept her skin free of make-up and allowed her quirky orange locks to fall around her face in easy waves.  

Proud mama: Hollywood actress Demi Moore, 55, has an incredibly close relationship with all three of her daughters

Tallulah captioned the snap: 'Thank god she finally got over her shyness,'which saw her pulling a rather flamboyant pose.

The star has previously spoken candidly about her path to sobriety and the merciless bullying she was subjected to as a teenager. 

'I had people when I was 13 telling me how ugly I was, and how could two beautiful actors create such hideous troll children?' she told Katie Couric in 2014 after her stint in rehab.  

'So many people are telling me, "You inspired me,"' she said. 'I guess I didn’t understand that this is such a communal fault line, that is running through every individual on this planet that whether it’s hidden or not hidden, that we all feel this certain sense of insecurity.' 

Last July, the model shared an honest message about how far she has come.

Honest: Tallulah has admitted battling addiction and an eating disorder in the past and shared a candid message alongside this picture last July

Posting an old picture of herself looking dangerously thin and with a cigarette hanging from her mouth, she wrote: '3 years ago I was a malnourished string bean with aches that echoed throughout my soul. 

'However the internal cries to tend my most blistered and deep wounds repeatedly fell on deaf ears. I did not value myself, my life or my body and as such I was constantly punishing for not being enough. 

She continued: 'Self annihilation fueled with medicating left me a shell, and the world on mute. I was hoisted from my hole, (one so deep I was certain we were nearing the Earths magma core) on the backs of powerful human beings that I will forever be indebted too, and on that day my life was gifted back to me. 

'I love the girl in this picture, I cry for her and I mourn her lost years. She is inside of me always and I must never let her slip too far.

'I don't push any agenda, I can only speak for my path and staying sober has been far and beyond the most important thing I've done in my wee 23 years.' 

 Tight knit: Tallulah (L)  Demi Moore and Scout LaRue (R) remain tight knit along with other sister Rumer

item.title: Busty Iskra Lawrence showcases her incredible curves and perky posterior in emerald green bikini during Miami breakaway
item.description: The striking British model highlighted her enviable curves in the skimpy two-piece as she luxuriated by her abode's dock.
item.content:encoded:
She's an advocate for body confidence and regularly takes to social media to share her empowered message to her plethora of followers.

And Iskra Lawrence, 27, was back to her figure-flaunting ways as she slipped into an eye-catching green bikini while holidaying in Miami Beach, Florida on Monday.

The striking British model highlighted her enviable curves in the skimpy two-piece as she luxuriated by her abode's dock.

Green with envy: Iskra Lawrence, 27, was back to her figure-flaunting ways as she slipped into an eye-catching green bikini while holidaying in Miami Beach, Florida on Monday

The blonde bombshell donned a pair of high-thigh cut bikini bottoms which highlighted her perky derriere and slender pins while she chatted with friends by the water.

Complementing her barely-there two-piece, Iskra left her golden locks loose in a half up, half down style which showcased her large gold hoop earrings.

She continued to accessorise her waterside ensemble with a matching gold necklace while playing football and showcasing a few stretches.  

Her sensational appearance comes after Iskra recently revealed that her own journey of self love was quite the tumultuous affair.

Figure-flaunting: The striking British model highlighted her enviable curves in the skimpy two-piece as she luxuriated by her abode's dock

Cheeky: The blonde bombshell donned a pair of high-thigh cut bikini bottoms which highlighted her perky derriere and slender pins 

Iskra, who is a size 14, also discussed being dropped from her agency after she was deemed'too big' led to her starving herself, as well as a serious case of body dysmorphia.

The beauty also confessed that the 'lack of nourishment' she was giving her body - a result of a number of fad diets - led to 'awful concentration and blurry eyesight.' 

 However, the blonde bombshell has detailed her journey to finally feel confident in her body as she opened up to Fabulous Digital. 

'It’s really detrimental to your mental and physical health doing any kind of extreme fad diet and abusing your body with exercise,' she claimed of trying to fit to modelling industry standards after her 36 inch hips were deemed not ideal at 16.     

Having fun: She continued to accessorise her waterside ensemble with a matching gold necklace while playing football and showcasing a few stretches

Iskra went on to overhaul her health and fitness regime to harmful effects: 'I started to control everything that I ate and became obsessed with calories and measuring myself' she revealed before adding: 'That led to body dysmorphia.'

Iskra, who is now mostly based Stateside due to her fledgling work load, revealed that she received the help she needed from her 'wonderful parents' - who helped her realise 'all the time she wasted trying to fit into something that she wasn't' and ushered her into the world of plus-size modelling. 

The career change completely changed her life and relationship with her body as she realised: 'I wanted to look after myself because I deserved better, that really became the catalyst for change. I changed that narrative in my life - and it didn’t happen overnight.'

Mane attraction: Complementing her barely-there two-piece, Iskra left her golden locks loose in a half up, half down style which showcased her large gold hoop earrings

And Iskra's self confidence is evident for all to see and on Tuesday she chose to flaunt her sensational hourglass physique as she stripped down to a tropical print bikini for a sexy Instagram snap.

Iskra is well-known in the industry for being an advocate of body confidence and embracing your body, whatever its size.

She has also refused to label herself as a plus-size model throughout her career, and has protested against the lack of diversity on the London Fashion Week catwalk.  

Honest: Iskra, who is a size 14, also discussed being dropped from her agency after she was deemed'too big' led to her starving herself, as well as a serious case of body dysmorphia
item.dc:abstract: She's an advocate for body confidence and regularly takes to social media to share her empowered message. And Iskra Lawrence, 27, was back to her figure-flaunting ways as she slipped into an eye-catching green bikini while holidaying in Miami Beach, Florida on Monday.
item.dc:creator: Lisa Mcloughlin
item.mi:shortTitle: Busty Iskra Lawrence showcases her incredible curves in Miami

item.title: Russell Crowe, 53, looks almost unrecognisable with a bushy grey beard and unruly hair as he reunites with his glamorous ex-wife Danielle for their son's basketball game
item.description: The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out
item.content:encoded:
As an actor, he is a master of disguise.

And Russell Crowe was hardly recognisable as he attended his son's basketball game with his ex-wife Danielle Spencer in Malabar, Sydney on Thursday.

The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out.

Russell Crowe, 53, looked almost unrecognisable with a bushy grey beard and unruly hair as he reunited with his glamorous ex-wife Danielle for their son's sports game in Sydney on Thursday

Looking very different from his early 2000s heyday, Russell shared a tender moment with his son at the sports game.

The Australian actor swapped his signature Hollywood style for a bushy grey beard and sunglasses as he blended in with the crowds.

He was also seen enjoying a friendly conversation with his ex-wife Danielle.

Later on, the L.A. Confidential star appeared rather windswept as he climbed into his luxury vehicle and drove away. 

Friendly exes: The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out

Family man: Looking very different from his early 2000s heyday, Russell shared a tender moment with his son at the sports game

Whoosh! The L.A. Confidential star appeared rather windswept as he climbed into his vehicle

Russell and Danielle - who share two children, Tennyson and Charles - reportedly finalised their divorce in the middle of last year.

The Sunday Telegraph claimed that Danielle walked away from the marriage with '$20million in the bank' and ownership of their $11million Rose Bay mansion.

The former couple had bought the Eastern Suburbs property in 2011, just months before separating after nine years of marriage.

Is that you? The Australian actor swapped his signature Hollywood style for a bushy grey beard

Still close: He was also seen sharing a friendly conversation with his ex-wife Danielle Spencer

Going solo: Russell and Danielle - who share two children, Tennyson and Charles - reportedly finalised their divorce in the middle of last year

Reports: The Sunday Telegraph claimed that Danielle walked away from the marriage with '$20million in the bank' and ownership of their $11million Rose Bay mansion

Russell is holding a 'divorce auction' next month, selling some of his most cherished possessions and Hollywood memorabilia.

The sale at Sotheby's will feature 223 items, including a chariot from the film Gladiator, and is listed as 'The Art of Divorce'.

Watches, art and jewellery belonging to his ex-wife will also be included in the sale on April 7th - the couple's wedding anniversary and Russell's 54th birthday.

Going, going, gone! Russell is holding a 'divorce auction' next month, selling some of his most cherished possessions and Hollywood memorabilia

Moving on: The sale at Sotheby's will feature 223 items, including a chariot from the film Gladiator, and is listed as 'The Art of Divorce'

Important date: Watches, art and jewellery belonging to his ex-wife will also be included in the sale on April 7th - the couple's wedding anniversary and Russell's 54th birthday
item.dc:abstract: As an actor, he is a master of disguise. And Russell Crowe (left) was hardly recognisable as he attended his son's basketball game with his ex-wife Danielle Spencer (right, with Russell) in Malabar, Sydney on Thursday. The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out. The Australian actor swapped his signature Hollywood style for a bushy grey beard and sunglasses as he blended in with the crowds. Looking very different from his early 2000s heyday, Russell also shared a tender moment with his son (inset) at the family sports game. Later, he enjoyed a friendly conversation with Danielle, who is the mother of his two children, before driving away in his luxury car.

item.title: Start your engines! Danica Patrick celebrates 36th birthday as she cuddles up to new beau Aaron Rodgers
item.description: Danica took to Instagram to share photos of the festivities on Monday as she was pictured close to the hunky 34-year-old ex-boyfriend of Olivia Munn.
item.content:encoded:
As if autoracing wasn't already enough of an adrenaline rush, Danica Patrick has found a new way to get her heart racing.

The professional race car driver celebrated her 36th birthday with new boyfriend Aaron Rodgers.

Danica took to Instagram to share photos of the festivities on Monday as she was pictured close to the hunky 34-year-old ex-boyfriend of Olivia Munn.  

Start your engines! Danica Patrick took to Instagram to share photos of her 36th birthday festivities on Monday

Getting close: The 36-year-old professional athlete was s of the festivities pictured close to the hunky 34-year-old ex-boyfriend of Olivia Munn

The birthday was unicorn-themed as she wore a cute birthday crown featuring flowers and a white horn.

She even blew out the candles on a fun two-tiered cake featuring a golden horn and multi-colored hair with horse ears.

She looked stylish as always in a sleeveless white top, black miniskirt, and light brown suede thigh-high boots.

Majestic: The birthday was unicorn-themed as she wore a cute birthday crown featuring flowers and a white horn

Golden: Big shiny balloons indicated what year she was celebrating 

Her brunette tresses were worn down flowing over her shoulders as she flaunted her natural beauty with minimal make-up.

Aaron - who is the star quarterback of the Green Bay Packers -  looked cool in a light grey sweater with dark grey pants. 

Aaron and Danica's relationship is very new.

According to TMZ, The couple have only been dating since December, almost immediately after Danica's break-up with fellow race car driver Ricky Stenhouse Jr.

The former duo previously dated for five years.

Fun times: Aaron and Danica's relationship is very new as they have been reportedly dating since December 

Prior to settling down with Danica, the NFL star dated actress Olivia Munn, 37, from 2014 until last April.

Last summer, the athlete opened up to ESPN about the break-up and said that fame was a big reason why he and Munn didn't make it together.

He told ESPN: 'When you are living out a relationship in the public eye, it's definitely ... it's difficult.

'It has some extra constraints, because you have other opinions about your relationship, how it affects your work and, you know, just some inappropriate connections.'

Exes: Prior to dating the race car driver, Rodgers dated Olivia Munn from 2014 until April 2017
item.dc:abstract: As if autoracing wasn't already enough of an adrenaline rush, Danica Patrick has found a new way to get her heart racing. The professional race car driver celebrated her 36th birthday with new boyfriend Aaron Rodgers. Danica took to Instagram to share photos of the festivities on Monday as she was pictured close to the hunky 34-year-old ex-boyfriend of Olivia Munn.

item.title: 'What Photoshop fail?' Kim Kardashian defiantly reposts THAT squashy car photo... and blames a fan on the edit
item.description: You might think she is so used to looking at mirrors, she could never be caught out by one. But that is exactly what caused Kim's latest Photoshop fail, or so she claimed on Monday
item.content:encoded:
You might think she is so used to looking at mirrors, she could never be caught out by one.

But that is exactly what caused Kim Kardashian's latest Photoshop fail, or so she claimed on Monday.

The 37-year-old drew the scorn of many when she posted a photo on Instagram on Saturday, that was so heavily edited a car in the background had almost been crushed out of existence.

'What Photoshop fail?' Kim Kardashian defiantly reposted  THAT squashy car photo on Monday ... and blamed a fan on the edit

However on Monday the reality star defiantly reposted the image once again, with an explanation as to what had happened.

The KUWTK star gave her explanation to subscribers to her website in a post entitled 'What Photoshop fail?'.

'I’m seeing online and on news media outlets that I suffered a "Photoshop fail",' she scoffed. 'So ridiculous!'

'I reposted a picture on Instagram that a fan had already posted—I only added a filter to it.

Exhibit A: The 37-year-old claimed one of her fans had posted a mirror image pic, and that her crime was a cropping one

'It looks like the fan mirrored the photo, which is the reason the car looks like that.'

Indeed the mom-of-three posted what appeared to be the original pic, which was a mirror image duplicate.

Kim's digital crime was in fact a cropping one, as she failed to notice she had included some of the mirrored photo too, creating the bizarre 'crushed car' illusion that set the comments alight.

Out and about: Meanwhile husband Kanye West was spotted leaving Nobu in  Malibu with a pal

Chatty: The duo were in the midst of an animated conversation

'So, this is actually really funny to me!' she chortled in conclusion. 'Who would even Photoshop a car to look like that?! LOL'

Despite the innocent explanation, Kim still felt it necessary to switch off comments under her original post on Instagram. 

It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal.

She had a piece of her arm missing from a snap she posted with BFF Jonathan Cheban. 

Given the elbow: It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal, she had part of her arm missing in this pic she posted with BFF Jonathan Cheban

But that is exactly what caused Kim Kardashian's latest Photoshop fail, or so she claimed on Monday. The 37-year-old drew the scorn of many when she posted a photo on Instagram on Saturday, that was so heavily edited a car in the background had almost been crushed out of existence.
item.dc:creator: Shyam Dodge
item.mi:shortTitle: Kim Kardashian defiantly reposts THAT squashy car photo

item.title: PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Move over Barbarella! Blac Chyna shows off her bombshell curves in cut-out bikini and sparkly boots for futuristic photoshoot
item.description: Looking like a comic-book heroine Chyna, 29, also added a personal touch by rocking a sleek pink bobbed wig as she posed near some boulders in Topanga Canyon.
item.content:encoded:
She's been keeping her figure in check with grueling workouts after a little nip and tuck in 2017.

And clearly proud of the fruits of her labor Blac Chyna posed for a futuristic photo shoot outside of Los Angeles on Monday in just a two-piece and thigh-high boots.

Looking like comic-book heroine Barbarella Chyna, 29, it was a sexy look for the former E! star and she also added a personal touch in a sleek pink bobbed wig.

Babe-arella! Blac Chyna showed off her figure during a sexy photo shoot just outside of Los Angeles on Monday 

Chyna's white bikini featured a halterneck style top with cut-out detail under the bust and high-cut briefs.

Some sparkly silver slouchy boots added extra space age chic. 

The mother-of-two flaunted her flat tummy and generous booty in the outfit while posing in front of some boulders in Topanga Canyon. 

Before facing cameras the former Rob & Chyna star wore a black Versace robe and fluffy slippers. 

Curves on show: Chyna's white bikini featured a halterneck style top with cut-out detail under the bust and high-cut briefs

Sitting pretty: The mother-of-two showed off her toned tummy in the sexy two piece

Hands on: Chyna, 29, had an assistant help to oil her up for the shoot

Last year Chyna - born Angela Renée White - revealed in court documents that she had cosmetic procedures 'including a breast and butt reduction as well as liposuction around her belly button'. 

During their very public breakup in July 2017 Rob had angrily outed his ex on social media claiming he paid $100,000 so Chyna could get her post-baby body worked on. 

But in her lawsuit against her ex, Chyna labeled it 'minor surgery' and claimed that Rob had jeopardized her sponsorship deals by revealing details about her post-baby surgery.

Nailed it! The reality star threw on an oversize graphic-print T-shirt and platform heels as she walked with her team

Pretty in pastels: Chyna channeled Kim Kardashian with her pale pink locks

Sky-high: Chyna strutted her stuff in towering platform heels

The legal documents stated: 'Accordingly, the manner in which Rob Kardashian revealed Ms White’s personal medical information jeopardized Ms White’s endorsement deals with several weight loss, fitness and diet companies – that all pay Ms White to promote their products on social media.

'Ms White underwent minor cosmetic procedures including a breast and butt reduction as well as a small amount of liposuction around her belly button.' 

The former video vixen is now dating 18-year-old rapper YBN Almighty Jay. 

Designer darling: Before facing cameras Chyna wrapped up in a black Versace robe

Ready for her close-up: Chyna kept comfortable in some furry slides before the shoot

Boots on! The former Rob & Chyna star slipped on some slouchy glittery boots

And she seems to be on better terms with Rob who she continues to co-parent Dream, one, with.

The buxom beauty wished the youngest Kardashian a happy birthday as he turned 31 earlier this month. 

Chyna is also the mother of five-year-old king Cairo, her son with ex Tyga. 

New romance: The former video vixen is now dating 18-year-old rapper YBN Almighty Jay

These boots were made for walking: The ex fiancee of Rob Kardashian was ready for action once her snazzy footwear was in place

On a budget? The star rifled through a suitcase of garments on the side of the road

item.title: 'Time to water them plants!': Ireland Baldwin showcases her curves in skimpy bathing suit as she gets soaked from garden hose
item.description: She's a saucy snap connoisseur. And Ireland Baldwin proved on trend as she posted a risque snap that left little to the imagination via Instagram on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's a saucy snap connoisseur.

And Ireland Baldwin proved on trend as she posted a risque photo that left little to the imagination via Instagram on Monday.

The 22-year-old model showcased her enviable figure in a skimpy bathing suit as she captioned the pic: 'Time to water them plants!'

Getting soaked: Ireland Baldwin, 22, posted a risque snap that left little to the imagination via Instagram on Monday

Daring to impress, the natural beauty put her ample assets on center stage as the suit proved form fitting especially around the chest.

Her pert derriere was on full display as the snug suit cut high on her hips and the snap featured a rear view of her flawless figure.

She kept her trademark blonde tresses long and swept over one shoulder as they were soaked from the garden hose. 

Highlighting her natural good looks, the California native went virtually makeup free with just a dab of berry lipstick.  

Double trouble: Ireland also posted it on her Instagram story account

Ireland has shared several racy posts to her Instagram page; she has more than 386,000 followers. 

The stunner is the daughter of Alec Baldwin, 59, and his actress ex-wife Kim Basinger, 64.

The blonde beauty is also cousins with famous model Hailey Baldwin.

Strike a pose: Ireland shared another revealing pic last week

And despite breaking into the same industry, Ireland insisted there is no rivalry with her strikingly good looking cousin, according to an interview with Hollywood Life.

'Honestly, me and Hailey have such a different brand and look,' she explained.

'We just are interested in different things, and she’s absolutely stunning. When I see her in person — she’s still my little cousin. We still rag on each other and joke around and we’re family. That’s really how it is,' Ireland added.

 In the blood:The stunner is the daughter of Alec Baldwin, 59, and his actress ex-wife Kim Basinger, 64

The 22-year-old model showcased her enviable figure in a skimpy bathing suit as shr captioned the pic: 'Time to water them plants!'

item.title: Slimmed down Kevin Federline celebrates 40th birthday with wife Victoria Prince at strip club...after asking ex Britney Spears 'to increase child support payments'
item.description: Kevin Federline celebrated his 40th birthday with his current wife at a strip club. The new 40-year-old and Victoria Prince enjoyed bottle service at their VIP section of Crazy Horse 3 Gentlemen's Club.
item.content:encoded:
Kevin Federline celebrated his 40th birthday with his current wife at a strip club.

The new 40-year-old and Victoria Prince enjoyed bottle service at their VIP section of Crazy Horse III Gentlemen's Club in Las Vegas, TMZ reported.

K-Fed, a rapper most famous for his ruptured marriage to Britney Spears, looked to have slimmed down at the event which found him at work at his own birthday party, stepping up to serve as DJ.

All class: Kevin Federline celebrated his 40th birthday with his current wife at a strip club

That evening, his outfit had the measure of the occasion - a black hoodie that read: 'COOKIES' over casual grey trousers and a pair of white sneakers.

K-Fed, who in his heavier days was cheekily dubbed K-Fat, lounged at a table stacked with fake money that featured his smiling face. 

Kevin also posed between a couple of the club's performers - a pair of blondes slid into skimpy black lingerie and matching stilettos.

Swank: The new 40-year-old and Victoria Prince enjoyed bottle service at their VIP section of Crazy Horse III Gentlemen's Club in Las Vegas, TMZ reported

At the table: K-Fed, a rapper most famous for his ruptured marriage to Britney Spears, found himself at work at his own birthday party, stepping up to serve as DJ

Half the man he used to be! K-Fed pictured in 2009 carrying a bit more weight

He reportedly made a recent request that Britney increase the child support she gives him - which is already a whopping $20,000 a month.

The erstwhile couple share two sons - Sean, 12, and Jayden, 11 - and Kevin maintains that the boys' increasing age is making them more expensive to raise.

Jamie Spears, Britney's father and conservator, was dubious about the request and failed to get either Kevin or his lawyer to specify what precisely the rapper needed the extra money for, according to sources who gossiped to TMZ.

Photogenic: K-Fed, who in heavier days was cheekily dubbed K-Fat, lounged at a table stacked with fake money that featured his smiling face 

Nor, allegedly, did they even give an exact amount they felt Kevin should be paid a month as an increase from the $20,000. 

Kevin's lawyer did apparently make a point of noting Britney's increased income from such professional triumphs as her Las Vegas residency.

Sean and Jayden are Britney's only two children, but Kevin has a further four.

Mingling: Kevin also posed between a couple of the club's performers - a pair of blondes slid into skimpy black lingerie and matching stilettos

He and Victoria have two daughters - Peyton, three, and Jordan, six - and he has another two children by his ex-girlfriend Shar Jackson.

Kevin and Shar, who were together from 2001 until 2004, have a 15-year-old daughter called Kori and a 13-year-old son called Kaleb.

After a 55-hour Las Vegas marriage to her old pal Jason Allen Alexander in 2004, Britney got hitched to Kevin later that same year and divorced him in 2007.

Fundraising: He reportedly made a recent request that Britney increase the child support she gives him - which is already a whopping $20,000 a month

One night in 2008, amid her legal battle with Kevin over their sons, she refused to hand the children over to him despite the fact he'd won temporary custody.

Britney, whom police theorized was 'under the influence of an unknown substance' that evening, brought her sons into the en suite bathroom of her house's master bedroom and holed up in there with them.

The authorities were called to the hostage crisis and retrieved the pop icon on a gurney, whereupon she was briefly hospitalized and for a time lost visitation rights - though she now shares custody with Kevin.

Up they grow: The erstwhile couple share two sons - Sean, 12, and Jayden, 11 - and Kevin maintains that the boys' increasing age is making them more expensive to raise

item.title: They're married! Dancing With The Stars pros Emma Slater and Sasha Farber wed in extravagant style
item.description: Dancing With The Stars professionals Emma Slater and Sasha Farber have tied the knot.
item.content:encoded:
Dancing With The Stars professionals Emma Slater and Sasha Farber have tied the knot.

The couple wed at the elegant banquet hall Bella Blanca in Los Angeles on Sunday, March 25. 

And the fan favorites spared no expense when it came to their big day, indulging their fantasies with an opulent ceremony. 

They're married! Dancing With The Stars pros Emma Slater and Sasha Farber have wed in extravagant style; the two are pictured together in November

The bride, 29, wore two Rivini wedding dresses, walking down the aisle in a fitted gown with sheer lace panels.

She then switched this for a sheath with a long-flowing skirt to dance the night away with her 33-year-old new spouse, with their first dance taking place to Ed Sheeran’s Perfect - with the singer recording a personal message for the pair.

The festivities were witnessed by a host of the DWTS family, including Julianne Hough and her husband Brooks Laich, Nick and Vanessa Lachey, Drew Scott, and Cheryl Burke.

Bride and groom: The two celebrated their engagement on live television in 2016

And the famous faces dined on steak, red caviar and smoked salmon, followed by five different flavors of cake, according to Us Weekly.

Guests were also treated to Greenleaf scented candles and Casamigos tequila as favors, while the bridesmaids were gifted fuchsia clutch handbags and the groomsmen leather wallets.

The pair became engaged on live television, back in October 2016, with Sasha getting down on one knee after they performed a couple's dance.

'Babe, I've wanted to do this for such a long time,' he told Emma as the audience screamed in joy. 'I love you so, so much.'

'I love you!' she replied, before telling him yes.
item.dc:abstract: Dancing With The Stars professionals Emma Slater and Sasha Farber have tied the knot. The couple wed at the elegant banquet hall Bella Blanca in Los Angeles on Sunday, March 25. And the fan favorites spared no expense when it came to their big day, indulging their fantasies with an opulent ceremony.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith

item.title: 'Last vacation as a family of three!' Ali Fedotowsky shows off her bump in a bikini during Hawaii babymoon
item.description: There are only a few weeks to go until she welcomes a new baby to her family.
item.content:encoded:
There are only a few weeks to go until she welcomes a new baby to her family.

And Ali Fedotowsky celebrated that fact as she and husband Kevin Manno took advantage of spring break to enjoy a babymoon to Hawaii.

Showing off her large bump in a bikini on the beach, the glowing mother-to-be looked happy and relaxed as she and her husband bonded.

Scroll down for video 

'Last vacation as a family of three!' Ali Fedotowsky shows off her bump in a bikini during Hawaii babymoon on Friday

Alone time: While Ali's toddler daughter Molly was also on the trip, so was Ali's mother and mother-in-law to babysit

The 33-year-old, who found fame on The Bachelor before becoming a TV host and blogger, stood looking out to the ocean, a smile on her face.

She and radio host Kevin, who married last year, then took a stroll along the sand.

The family trip includes the couple's first child, one-year-old daughter Molly, and both of the toddler's grandmothers - on hand to give the parents-to-be some couple time.

Parents to be: She and radio host Kevin, who married last year, took a stroll along the sand

Taking to her blog, Ali thanked her  mother and mother-in-law for coming along on the trip.

'I can’t believe this is our last vacation as a family of 3,' she wrote, before explaining the family dynamic.

'Well were really a family of 5 this trip because were lucky enough to have both grammies come with us.

Reality bites: The 33-year-old, found fame on The Bachelor before becoming a TV host

'They are SUCH a help with Molly. We can’t thank them enough.'

And with the grandmas on hand to babysit, Kevin and Ali found plenty of time to be together. 

Ali wrote: 'I tried to step away from my computer for a bit to soak up some time with my family. 

Pretty as a picture: The shoreline looked incredible

Like I mentioned in my last post, it rained here quite a bit during our trip. But yesterday was beautiful and we are so grateful we got such a gorgeous day to spend together. 

'We spent a lot of time by the pool and on the beach! 

'What’s so crazy is that the last time I stood on his beach, Molly was in my belly and now I’m holding her in my arms. It’s pretty crazy to think about.'
item.dc:abstract: There are only a few weeks to go until she welcomes a new baby to her family. And Ali Fedotowsky celebrated that fact as she and husband Kevin Manno took advantage of spring break to enjoy a babymoon to Hawaii. Showing off her large bump in a bikini on the beach, the glowing mother-to-be looked happy and relaxed as she and her husband bonded.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith

item.title: Top dog! Bradley Cooper dresses as a pooch as girlfriend Irina Shayk sports cat whiskers for daughter's animal themed first birthday party
item.description: Showing his playful side Bradley, 43, also wore a headband adorned with a mini balloon animal. The couple welcomed Lea De Seine on March 21 2017.
item.content:encoded:
They welcomed daughter Lea De Seine on March 21 2017.

And marking their little girl's first birthday on Saturday Bradley Cooper and Irina Shayk pulled out all the stops to celebrate with an animal-themed bash at their home in Los Angeles.

Getting in the spirit of things Bradley donned a furry dog costume while his rumored fiancee kept it low-key with cat whiskers painted on her face. 

Ruff life: Bradley Cooper dressed as a dog as he and Irina Shayk threw a first birthday party for their daughter Lea De Seine at their home in Los Angeles

Meow! The Russian model sported cat whiskers and a cat-print mini dress 

The 32-year-old Russian model flaunted her slender legs in a colorful cat-print mini dress and white sneakers and sipped on a drink while chatting with pals. 

Showing his playful side Bradley, 43, also wore a headband adorned with a mini balloon animal.

Guests joined in on the theme wearing face paint and tucked into frozen treats.

The couple have been dating since 2015 and Irina, who was born in Yemanzhelinsk, Russia, has been sporting a large emerald ring on her engagement ring for over a year.

Festive spirit: The 43-year-old actor added a headband with a balloon animal on it 

Exotic beauty: Irina shared a sultry selfie last week during an LA downpour

The duo are notoriously private and even kept their daughter's birth under wraps with news of the birth making headlines nearly a month after her arrival.

Prior to getting together, The Hangover actor was dating British model Suki Waterhouse and Irina was in a relationship with soccer star Cristiano Ronaldo. 

Meanwhile Irina sizzled in a sexy selfie last week wearing sheer white lingerie.

The busy mom is currently the face of Intimissimi's latest lingerie campaign. 

Private duo: The couple - who are rumored to be engaged - started dating in 2015 and welcomed daughter Lea De Seine on March 21. They are pictured on March 8 2016

item.title: The Script's Danny O'Donoghue, 38, looks smitten with stunning girlfriend Anne de Paula, 22... as model sizzles in VERY racy swimsuit during romantic Caribbean getaway
item.description: Danny O'Donoghue and his model girlfriend Anne de Paula still looked very much in the throes of love as they packed on the PDA while lounging on the idyllic beaches of the Caribbean on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
They found love back in 2014, when she played his gorgeous love interest in the music video for track No Good in Goodbye.

And Danny O'Donoghue and his model girlfriend Anne de Paula still looked very much in the throes of love as they packed on the PDA while lounging on the idyllic beaches of the Caribbean on Sunday.  

Anne, 22, was bound to turn heads as she soaked up the sun in a sexy, burgundy swimsuit which left little to the imagination.

Scroll down for video 

Sight for shore eyes! Danny O'Donoghue's model girlfriend Anne de Paula was bound to turn more than a few heads as the pair continued to enjoy their Caribbean getaway on Sunday

The Sports Illustrated stunner flashed her phenomenal physique in the racy one-piece, which boasted a plunging neckline as well as a thong-style fit at the rear. 

It was no surprise The Script rocker struggled to keep his hands off of her as they canoodled in the sea, with Danny wrapping his arms around her as they cooled off in the ocean together. 

The pair also looked to share a Dirty Dancing inspired moment as Danny made like Patrick Swayze and lifted the Brazilian beauty into the air during their swim. 

Smitten kitten: The Script star looked besotted as they larked around in the ocean together

Beach babe: Anne, 22, soaked up the sun in a sexy, burgundy swimsuit which left little to the imagination

When they weren't enjoying lustful moments in the water, Anne appeared in the mood for some more high-octane activity as she was snapped hopping for a ride on a jet ski, before abandoning her own vessel to share with Danny. 

After packing up their fun-filled time afternoon in the ocean, Danny and Anne locked hands and went for a stroll along the island's white sands. 

While the pair have been dating for over three years, the Hall of Fame hitmaker has remained relatively tight-lipped on his romance. 

Sizzling! The Sports Illustrated stunner flashed her phenomenal physique in the racy one-piece, which boasted a plunging neckline as well as a thong-style fit at the rear

Lucky guy! It was no surprise The Script rocker struggled to keep his hands off of her as they canoodled in the sea

Having the time of his life! The pair also looked to share a Dirty Dancing inspired moment as Danny made like Patrick Swayze and lifted the Brazilian beauty into the air during their swim

Stunner: Anna let her natural beauty shine through by going make-up free for their day at the beach

Coy: While the pair have been dating for over three years, the Hall of Fame hitmaker has remained relatively tight-lipped on his romance

In fact, the long-time lovers only made their red carpet debut back in December, when they attended the London premiere of Star Wars: The Last Jedi together.

Anne is believed to be Danny's first relationship since his split from Irish-Lithuanian model Irma Mali back in 2013.

While Anne, who hails from Rio de Janeiro, resides in New York, while Danny spends most of his time in London, when not touring the globe with his band The Script, the pair have clearly made their romance go the distance.

Play time! When they weren't enjoying lustful moments in the water, Anne appeared in the mood for some more high-octane activity on a jet-ski

No time to waste! Anne hastily hopped on to her jet ski to join boyfriend Danny on the waves

Rear view! Anna flashed a playful peace sign - and her incredibly sculpted bottom - before hopping on to the vessel

Genetically-blessed! The Brazilian beauty made for a stunning sight as she emerged from the water

Chuffed: Danny looked in his element as the couple cruised the ocean on their jet skis 

Look at her go! The model oozed cool as she rode the waves on her jet ski 

Better together! Though she eventually ditched her own in favour of a ride on the back of Danny's 

Speaking to EVOKE.ie about their relationship in November, he admitted his girlfriend is a big fan of Dublin.

He dished: ‘She’s been here loads. She has a lot of mates here as well.

‘There’s a big Brazilian contingency here in college and working, I never even realised that.

‘It’s probably one of the biggest destinations for Brazilians because the people are lovely. She loves it here.’

Head over heels! After packing up their fun-filled time afternoon in the ocean, Danny and Anne locked hands and went for a stroll along the island's white sands

It's no surprise! The Brazilian looker has modelled for the likes of Sports Illustrated and fashion house Michael Kors

Where have you been all my life? The pair playfully ran into each other's arms when Anne joined him in the ocean

Besotted: The couple looked genuinely enamored during their PDA-filled afternoon

Fuss-free: Danny kept his beach style cool in black board shorts and a white T-shirt 

Moving on: Anne is believed to be Danny's first relationship since his split from Irish-Lithuanian model Irma Mali back in 2013

Making it work: While Anne resides in New York and Danny spends most of his time in London, when not touring the globe with his band The Script, the pair have made their romance go the distance

Non-stop fun! The couple laughed incessantly during their day at the beach

Anne, 22, was bound to turn heads as she soaked up the sun in a sexy, burgundy swimsuit which left little to the imagination.

item.title: 'So proud!' Tori Spelling's daughter starts her own business... just weeks after the 90210 actress suffered breakdown from 'terrible financial issues'
item.description: Tori Spelling is one proud mama. On Sunday, the 44-year-old actress took to Instagram to share that her eldest daughter Stella McDermott has started her own business of the gooey variety.
item.content:encoded:
Tori Spelling is one proud mama.

On Sunday, the 44-year-old actress took to Instagram to share that her eldest daughter Stella McDermott has started her own business.

In the post, the mother-of-five wrote: 'My @missstellamcdermott has officially started her own #slimebiz. You can go to @stylishslimebystella.'

Proud mama! Tori Spelling took to Instagram on Sunday to share that her eldest daughter Stella has started her own slime business

The Beverly Hills, 90210 star explained that the child, aged nine, already has her eyes set on the future: 'She is starting now to save to open her own bakery after college! So proud of my #tweenpreneur #slimetween.'

The doting mother closed out: 'Follow her to see the slimes she’ll make #forkidsbykids. Link in her bio. And, yes she was #chickenbombed #mamachicken'. 

In the snap, Stella proudly showed off some tubs of her custom green sludge with a chicken posing in the background.

United front: Tori and her husband Dean McDermott have had their ups and downs, but the couple put on a front of togetherness to support their daughter's budding business

And while they have had their ups and downs, Spelling and her husband of 11 years, Dean McDermott, put on a front of togetherness as the father shared a fun video of Stella throwing her creation.

'So proud of my little mama starting her own business,' wrote the 51-year-old actor.

Earlier this month, police were called to the family home in Woodland Hills after Tori reportedly suffered a mental breakdown.

Breakdown: Police were called to the Woodland Hills family home earlier this month after reports that Tori suffered from a mental illness; the actress pictured with her family last week 

According to Entertainment Tonight, 'There are several things that led up to this, and she really couldn't take the pressure any longer,' said a source. 'Tori tries to be the best mom she can be, but with five children and terrible financial issues, her marriage has suffered tremendously.'  

The daughter of famed TV producer Aaron Spelling, Tori's financial woes weren't always the case. 

She was born into one of the richest and most famous Hollywood families and grew up in the largest mansion in Los Angeles - a 56,000 sqft house with 123 rooms dubbed 'The Manor.'

Silver spoon: The Beverly Hills 90210 star grew up in one of the richest families in Hollywood, but her mega producer father Aaron Spelling reportedly only left her $800,000 when he died

However, while the actress' father created mega hits like Charlie's Angels and Dynasty, the public was shocked to find out what his daughter was actually left in his will.  

Tori reportedly inherited just $800,000 out of the roughly $600 million her TV producing legend father Aaron Spelling is said to have left behind when he died.   

And after years of allegedly overspending, the money problems caught up to her. In 2016, ET reported that Tori and her husband owed over $250,000 in unpaid taxes.

The scandal broke soon after the starlet was sued by American Express for having an outstanding limit of nearly $38,000 but failing to  make a payment in over a year.

'Just because I'm on TV doesn't mean that I don't make financial choices that aren't good,' explained the starlet. 'They were really bad ones.' 

Money woes: Years of alleged overspending have caught up to Tori, who is dealing with 'terrible financial issues'
item.dc:abstract: Tori Spelling is one proud mama. On Sunday, the 44-year-old actress took to Instagram to share that her eldest daughter Stella McDermott has started her own business of the gooey variety. In the post, the mother-of-five wrote: 'My @missstellamcdermott has officially started her own #slimebiz. You can go to @stylishslimebystella.'

item.title: My 'hot mom' makeover! Blonde bombshell Kylie Jenner shares sultry snap while she focuses on 'getting her body back'
item.description: It seems that the 20-year-old is ready for a change after giving birth to her first child last month. The make-up mogul debuted brand-new bombshell blonde locks in a sexy Instagram on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
It seems that Kylie Jenner is ready for a change after giving birth to her first child last month.

The make-up mogul shared a seductive Instagram Monday - likely a throwback - where she also flaunted her voluptuous chest wearing just a robe.

The starlet reminisced about her blonde look at the same time it's said she's hard at work getting back her pre-pregnancy figure with an insider revealing she: 'wants to be a really hot young mom and is making sure that happens' toPeople Monday.

Heating things up! Kylie Jenner showed off a blonde look on Instagram Monday, as it's said the star is focused on getting back her old body, with a friend telling People she 'wants to be a really hot young mom and is making sure that happens'

Though the makeup mogul is already working on her body transformation, she appeared just as alluring as ever in her provocative bedroom Instagram.

In the photo the starlet let a hotel robe slip off her shoulders seductively to reveal her full chest.

She continued to tease in her caption, writing: 'I think i was meant to be blonde.'

Though Kylie's continued sex appeal is undeniable, insiders say that the beauty is 'already starting to work out,' and is 'focusing on getting her body back and also getting back to a comfortable weight aside from caring for Stormi.'

Woah mama! Though it's been less than two months since Kylie Jenner gave birth, the star (above while expecting) is 'focusing on getting her body back and also getting back to a comfortable weight aside from caring for Stormi'

Swim fan! Reminiscing about her pre-baby figure, the 20-year-old posted a flashback snap of herself in a very revealing bikini Monday on Instagram

They said the fans can look forward to the beauty 'flaunting her progress more and more' as time goes on.

The insider also admitted that the star: 'wasn't the most comfortable while pregnant.'

Even though the make-up mogul's worried about her body, there's been no shortage of sexy photos from the star since her daughter's birth February 1.

Reminiscing about her pre-baby figure, the California native posted a flashback snap of herself in a very revealing bikini Monday on Instagram.

Snapping back! Kylie Jenner is having no trouble getting back to her smoking pre-pregnancy figure, as evident by a Saturday Snapchat post

Kylie captioned the black and white image: 'summer goals #tb'. 

The day before Kylie showed off her fitness progress on Snapchat as she hiked up her sweatshirt to reveal enviably flat abs and a hint of her full bust covered in a grey sports bra. 

At the same time she's hard at working trimming down her body, the starlet is also making sure she and daughter Stormi are living in fine style.

The starlet gave Snapchat a peek inside her newly decorated living room on Monday, showing off her stylish take on interior designer.

No baby proofing here! New mom Kylie Jenner opens doors to her opulent living room featuring signed Basquiat print, $25k side table and roaring open fire

Watch out Stormi! The reality star will have to be careful to ensure her baby stays safe once she starts crawling

While the room was far from child-friendly - featuring a sharp-edged glass coffee table and an unprotected open roaring fire - it was certainly impressive.

Above the fireplace hung a signed Basquiat print of his artwork Hollywood Africans In front Of The Chinese Theater With Footprints Of Movie Stars.

Similar prints from the limited edition 1983 run of 60 are currently on sale for between $50,000 to $75,000.

To the side of the fire under a round mirror stands a gold occasional table dripping with metallic bulges

Proud mom: The makeup mogul gave birth to her firstborn, Stormi Webster, with rapper beau Travis Scott nearly two months ago 

This piece is the Melting Brass Hallway Table by Zhipeng Tan, which retails for $25,000.

The reality star has been extremely busy after giving birth to her firstborn, daughter Stormi Webster, nearly two months ago. 

On Tuesday, the 20-year-old relished some alone time with her rapper beau Travis Scott, as the pair grabbed an early morning juice in West Hollywood together. 

The couple have been dating for around 11 months, after first being romantically linked in April 2017, following a sighting at Coachella.

Proud parents: Kylie and Stormi's dad Travis Scott have been dating for around 11 months, after first being romantically linked in April 2017, following a sighting at Coachella

item.title: Consciously uncoupled Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin look every inch the modern family as they enjoy dinner with son Moses in London
item.description: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night.
item.content:encoded:
They have had one of the most amicable splits in Hollywood history. 

And, exactly four years after their 'conscious uncoupling', Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night. 

The exes - who have both found love in different relationships - still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion. 

Amicable exes: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night

Chris and Gwyneth even looked to complement their styles, with both opting for off-duty, all-black outfits for the occasion.

Goop founder Gwyneth, 45, sported combat trousers and white trainers, though wrapped up in a smart, double-breasted coat.

Fix You hitmaker Chris stayed true to his rocker roots in jeans and a leather jacket, finished with a beanie hat and the offbeat choice of walking shoes. 

On good terms: The former spouses still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion

His style was loosely mimicked by trendy youngster Moses, 11, who sported a beanie like his dad, paired with a simple tee, padded bomber jacket and jeans. 

Earlier this year Gwyneth said that Chris has become 'like a brother', adding that their cordial divorce was to ensure their children Moses and Apple, 13, remained as 'unscathed as possible'.

Appearing on The Late Show With Stephen Colbert, the host noted that she remained close with her ex-husband, prompting Gwyneth to respond: 'Very much so. He's like my brother. Very familial. It's nice. Great. 

Matching! Chris and Gwyneth even looked to complement their styles, with both opting for off-duty, all-black outfits for the occasion

Smart meets casual! Goop founder Gwyneth, 45, sported combat trousers and white trainers, though wrapped up in a double-breasted coat

Signature style: Fix You hitmaker Chris stayed true to his rocker roots in jeans and a leather jacket, finished with a beanie hat and the offbeat choice of walking shoes

Colbert quipped that it was kind of weird saying someone you had children with is like a brother.

'Which would explain the divorce,' Paltrow joked. 'Just kidding,' she added. 

Her comments came shortly after she announced her engagement to Glee co-creator Brad Falchuk in early January, just weeks after she was spotted enjoying a family holiday with her ex-husband and their children in Antigua. 

Meanwhile, Chris, 41, is in a relationship with Fifty Shades of Grey star Dakota Johnson, 28,  

Just like dad! Chris' style was loosely mimicked by trendy youngster Moses, 11, who sported a beanie like his dad, paired with a simple tee, padded bomber jacket and jeans

Parenting role models: Earlier this year Gwyneth said that Chris has become 'like a brother', adding that their amicable split was to ensure their kids remained as 'unscathed as possible'

The exes - who have both found love in different relationships - still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion.

item.title: Angelina Jolie wears all-black ensemble to Los Angeles pet store as son Knox carries away snake bedding
item.description: The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress treated her nine-year-old son Knox on Sunday to a trip to a Los Angeles pet store.
item.content:encoded:
Angelina Jolie treated her son Knox on Sunday to a trip to a Los Angeles pet store.

The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress wore an all-black ensemble for the outing.

The mother-of-six wore a knee-length black coat over a black crew neck top and black trousers. 

Pet store: Angelina Jolie wore all-black on Sunday while taking her son Knox to a pet store in Los Angeles

She completed her look with matching footwear and accessorized with sunglasses.

Angelina had her dark brown hair pulled back into a bun.

Nine-year-old Knox kept it casual in a grey Tempest Trü Freedom T-shirt, khaki green cargo pants and black Nike sneakers.

The budding herpetologist carried a bag of snake bedding from the pet store. 

Mother and son: Nine-year-old Knox kept it casual while spending time with his mother

Knox and his twin sister Vivienne were born in July 2008 in Nice, France to Angelina and estranged husband Brad Pitt, 54.

Angelina also has children Maddox, 16; Pax, 14; Zahara, 13 and 11-year-old Shiloh.

She was spotted on Tuesday in a longer black coat grocery shopping with Zahara and Knox in Los Angeles.

Busy star: Angelina also was spotted with Knox recently grocery shopping in Los Angeles

Angelina and Brad separated in September 2016 and she filed for divorce seeking physical custody of their children.

The former couple last month received court approval to extend their ongoing private divorce negotiations.

Angelina agreed to a temporary custody agreement late last year that granted Brad visitation rights. 

Happier times: Brad Pitt and Angelina are shown in November 2015 in Hollywood
item.dc:abstract: Angelina Jolie treated her son Knox on Sunday to a trip to a Los Angeles pet store. The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress wore an all-black ensemble for the outing. The mother-of-six wore a knee-length black coat over a black crew neck top and black trousers.

item.title: 'Mommy and Daddy': Khloe Kardashian shares yet another naked bump photo with Tristan Thompson... only this time he's cradling her tummy
item.description: In this snap, the beauty is having her large baby bump - she is due in early April - held by her beau Tristan Thompson of the Cleveland Cavaliers as they stand in a kitchen.
item.content:encoded:
Khloe Kardashian has been sharing several sexy images from a pregnancy photo shoot done by her friend Sasha Samsonova.

And on Monday the 33-year-old uploaded a brand-new image to her Instagram account.

In this snap, the beauty is having her large baby bump - she is due in early April - held by her beau Tristan Thompson of the Cleveland Cavaliers as they stand in a kitchen with beautiful Spanish tiles.

Sharing even more: Khloe Kardashian posted this naked bump photo with beau Tristan Thompson on Monday that was taken by her friend Sasha Samsonova

The image looks like their pregnancy announcement photo

Khloe captioned the  eye-popping photo, 'Mommy and daddy.'

Like in previous photos from the same set, Khloe has on a black lace bra and matching undies and has put her very large bump on full display.

The TV sensation looked stunning with her long blonde locks worn down in Malibu waves and her makeup done to perfection.

In her first bump shot from the set, she flashed a leg as she wore a long black coat off her shoulders.

Stunning: The 33-year-old siren shared a very glamorous baby bump shot to Instagram on Wednesday

The Revenge Body star was outside on a patio with plants everywhere.

And in the second shot she was in bed with Tristan placing a hand on her thigh. 

This new post comes just days after the looker took to Snapchat to discuss food. The siren revealed what she's been feeding that bump.

The Good American designer gave fans a look at the fried chicken and biscuits she was digging into to fulfill her cravings. 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the star wrote over the image. 'Thank you.'

Two cute: The Revenge Body star was seen with beau Thompson in bed in this image shared on Thursday

She had a large box of 24 large biscuits and a box of friend chicken placed on her dining room table.

Her hand was also seen going into a bag that contained condiments.

'I am starving! I sort of want Popeyes,' she tweeted the night before. 'I’m not sure though LOL the struggle is real.'

But then she gave in. 'Ok that fulfilled every craving I’ve been having for Popeyes over the past couple days,' the star tweeted.

'Letting the food craving build up is actually better. I’m so satisfied now. Yum yum! I feel guilty but GREAT.'

No a salad: Khloe gave her health food a break to dig into friend chicken and biscuits on Thursday

 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star wrote over the image. 'Thank you'

Khloe is due very soon so it's no wonder she's letting herself enjoy her pregnancy to the fullest before she welcomes the child.

No doubt the looker will have to be on a diet as soon as her little girl is welcomed into the world due to the pressure that comes with being a representative of the Kardashian empire. 

Last week Khloe wrote about her pregnancy on her pay site Khloewithak.com. 

'Being pregnant has always been a dream of mine. Even though 9 months feels like a lifetime while I'm awaiting the arrival of my baby girl, it's really a blink in the grand scheme of life,' she began.

'I know I'm going to miss my belly so much once she's here, I had to capture the beautiful process that is pregnancy so I can always look back at this time. Thank you Sasha Samsonova for this special photo shoot! Also, shout-out to my glam team who helped me look and feel like a goddess: Hrush, Andrew and Jill.'  

Busy mama: Last week the LA native launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American

The daughter of Kris Jenner - who has said she has not yet found a name for her baby girl - has been very active during her pregnancy.

She has not only launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American, but she has also kept up with her social media posts.   

In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party.
