item.title: Pregnant Eva Longoria puts her baby bump on display in a classic black T-shirt and leggings as she enjoys a brunch date in Miami
item.description: The actress, 43, showed off her beautiful bump as she indulged her pregnancy cravings with a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table in Miami, Florida, on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
She's expecting her first child with husband José 'Pepe' Bastón in May. 

And Eva Longoria showed off her beautiful bump as she indulged her pregnancy cravings with a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table in Miami, Florida, on Sunday.

The actress, 43, opted for a comfortable ensemble for her low-key day out, choosing a classic black T-shirt which hugged her blossoming shape.   

Bumping along: Eva Longoria showed off her beautiful bump as she indulged her pregnancy cravings with a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table in Miami, Florida, on Sunday

The former Desperate Housewives star paired her simple tee with black cropped leggings and matching sneakers.

The brunette lightened her ensemble with a chic grey cross-body bag with a coordinated baseball cap that tucked back her glossy chestnut tresses.

Eva shielded her eyes from the bright Florida sunshine in a pair of reflective aviator shades.

Off-duty beauty: The actress, 43, opted for a comfortable ensemble for her low-key day out, choosing a classic black T-shirt which hugged her blossoming shape

The Telenovela showcased her natural pregnancy glow without any hint of make-up, but did include some sparkle with diamond earrings.

With her first baby on the way in a matter of weeks, Eva doesn't appear to be slowing down any time soon as she attended the filming of her new ABC soap Grand Hotel in Miami last week. 

While the multi-talented actress is busy with her thriving career, Eva recently spilled to Entertainment Tonight she was so busy she sometimes forgot she was pregnant.

'I have been working, so sometimes I wake up and I forget I am pregnant. Like this morning, I was like, "Oh my god, I am late!" and then I was like, "Why can't I get out of bed?" and I was like, "Helppp!" 

Busy mum-to-be: While the multi-talented actress is busy with her thriving career, Eva recently said she is so busy she sometimes forgets she is pregnant

'And then I was like, "Oh yeah, this thing." ... [I said] we should go skiing next weekend and [Jose] said no. I didn't know why. 

'I was like, "Why can't we go? What is the problem?" And I was like, "Oh god, I forgot!"'

Eva and her media mogul husband confirmed her pregnancy in January after rumours began circling at the end of last year, when she posted a photo of her growing baby bump on her Instagram account.

The couple tied the knot in Mexico in May 2016. 

Expecting! Eva confirmed her pregnancy in January after rumours began circling at the end of last year, when she posted a photo of her growing baby bump on her Instagram account

item.title: A day at Disney! This Is Us star Milo Ventimiglia can't keep the smile off his face during theme park date with mystery woman
item.description: He's swoon-worthy Papa Pearson on the hit show This Is Us. But on Sunday, Milo Ventimiglia was a Disneyland fan as he enjoyed the Anaheim, Calif., amusement park with a mystery woman.
item.content:encoded:
He's swoon-worthy Papa Pearson on the hit show This Is Us. 

But on Sunday, Milo Ventimiglia was a Disneyland fan as he enjoyed the Anaheim, California, amusement park with a stunning mystery woman.

The 40-year-old actor was all smiles on his date, wearing a black hat with a 20th Century Fox logo teamed up with a blue chambray shirt underneath a black sweater.

All smiles: Milo Ventimiglia enjoys a date at Disneyland with a blonde mystery woman on Sunday 

Kids at heart: The couple were seen enjoying different rides like Big Thunder Mountain Railroad and the Haunted Mansion 

He kept his personal belongings close in a backpack with leather straps and topped his theme park attire off with beige pants and matching lace-up boots.

The Emmy nominee was ready for the picture-perfect outing, holding a camera to capture moments from the fun-filled day. 

And one of those moments came on the Radiator Springs Racers. The Gilmore Girls actor held out his phone for a selfie as he and his date raced along in the Cars-themed attraction. 

Before heading to the theme park, the star posted a pic of some of his Disney essentials on Twitter, saying: 'Cap, Mickey shirt, Camera. I'm ready. Here I come @Disneyland.'

'I'm ready': The star posted a picture to Twitter highlighting his Disney essentials - a hat, Mickey shirt, camera, and of course, his ticket

His date coordinated with his outfit, sporting a black-and-white striped shirt under an over-sized black sweater.

She teamed her monochromatic look up with dark-wash skinny jeans, black workout shoes, and brown-tinted sunglasses.

Channeling the Disney vibes, the blonde wore a pair of Minnie ears and donned a Disneyland button on her pants.  

Camera cue: While riding along on the Radiator Springs Racers, Milo snapped a fun selfie with his date

The smiling pair enjoyed a number of different rides, including Big Thunder Mountain railroad where the Anaheim-born actor ducked for cover to avoid some water.

The couple also made their way over  to the Haunted Mansion and Indiana Jones Adventure.

And it seemts that Milo is no stranger to the theme park.

'I grew up in Orange County, so I grew up going to Disneyland all the time,' said Milo on Jimmy Kimmel Live last month. 'It was one of those places where you'd go and fall in love but you also go and get in real trouble.' 

Duck for cover: The This Is Us star avoided a large splash of water during the pair's fun-filled outing 

The actor went on to detail one of the times he got in real trouble at the family-friendly park.

While riding the now-closed Sky Tram on his 12th birthday, Milo said: 'One of my friends, I don't know who it was, had the great idea to play the game called 'Spit on Someone and Try to Hit Someone.' We're spitting over the edge, like, 'Oh wow, hit a bald dude!'

But when his parents found out his 'birthday was over.' The family went home and Milo ultimately learned that there was 'no spitting at Disneyland. 

The SAG award winner recently wrapped up filming the second season of This Is Us last month.

While fans have finally found out how his character Jack Pearson dies, the time-hopping nature of the show surely means that Milo will be back to give some more fatherly advice in season three.

Back in action: The Pearson clan wrapped up filming season two of the hit show This Is Us, but Jack and the gang will get back to work soon on season three

But on Sunday, Milo Ventimiglia was a Disneyland fan as he enjoyed the Anaheim, Calif., amusement park with a stunning mystery woman. The 40-year-old actor was all smiles on his date, wearing a black baseball cap teamed up with a blue chambray shirt underneath a black sweater.

item.title: Olivia de Havilland, 101, loses Feud lawsuit as appeals court judges side with FX and First Amendment defense
item.description: The veteran Hollywood star, 101, sued the network for defamation over what she said was a damaging portrayal of her as a gossip in the mini series.
item.content:encoded:
Olivia de Havilland has lost her legal battle against FX over the Feud: Bette And Joan mini series.

The veteran Hollywood star, 101, sued the network for defamation over what she said was a damaging portrayal of her as a gossip.

The three judge panel overturned a previous court ruling that found in the actress's favor and ruled Monday that the First Amendment allowed filmmakers to embellish the historical record, Variety reported. 

Olivia de Havilland, 101, lost her legal battle against FX over the mini series Feud: Bette And Joan when an appeals court sided with the network on First Amendment grounds Monday

The Second District Court of Appeals held unanimously that portrayals of real-life people are protected by the First Amendment.

Justice Anne Egerton wrote: 'Whether a person portrayed in one of these expressive works is a world-renowned film star — ‘a living legend’ — or a person no one knows, she or he does not own history. Nor does she or he have the legal right to control, dictate, approve, disapprove, or veto the creator’s portrayal of actual people.'

Gone With The Wind star de Havilland said producers of Feud never asked her permission to portray her and did not consult her.

The drama, which starred Catherine Zeta Jones as de Havilland, had her calling her sister, the actress Joan Fontaine, a 'b***h' and also joking about Frank Sinatra's drinking. 

De Haviiland, left, had sued for defamation saying the drama gave a damaging portrayal of her as a gossip and was upset the show had her calling her sister Joan Fontaine, right, a 'b***h'

The Gone With The Wind star won the first round in court, with a judge last fall ruling in her favor. But the three judge appeals panel held that producers are entitled to creative licence and that 'no-one owns history'

Variety reports that the Motion Picture Association of America came to the network’s defense, arguing in an amicus brief that the court’s ruling would give politicians and celebrities veto power over films about their lives.

Last week, FX appealed last fall's court ruling with an attorney for the network, Kelly Klaus, arguing that creative licence may be used in docudramas.  

'Docudramas are understood not to be a literal retelling of history, that’s the role of documentaries,' Klaus said. 

De Havilland's lawyer Suzelle Smith, argued that the show wrongly portrayed the Paris-based star as a hypocrite and a gossip who used vulgar terms.

'Olivia de Havilland has built a reputation of 100 years as a celebrity and she should get compensation for that,' Smith said. 

On screen representation: Catherine Zeta Jones portrayed de Havilland on Feud and her character was used as a sort of commentator on the events being portrayed

Feud, which aired last year, focused on the rivalry between Joan Crawford and Bette Davis, with de Havilland being used as a sort of commentator on the events. 

This is not the first time a major Hollywood company has been taken on by de Havilland, who won Oscars for 1946’s To Each His Own and 1949’s The Heiress.

She won a landmark victory over Warner Bros in 1943 which effectively ended actors’ contract servitude. 

Catherine Zeta Jones, left, portrayed de Havilland on Feud opposite Susan Sarandon as Bette Davis, right, and Jessica Lange as Joan Crawford 

Feud, which aired last year, focused on the rivalry between Joan Crawford, played by Jessica Lange, left, and Bette Davis, played by Susan Sarandon, right
item.dc:alternative: Dame Olivia´s lawyers say she is entitled to compensation for damage to her reputation built over "100 years as a celebrity".

The veteran Hollywood star, 101, sued the network for defamation over what she said was a damaging portrayal of her as a gossip. The three judge panel overturned a previous court ruling that found in the actress's favor and ruled Monday that the First Amendment allowed filmmakers to embellish the historical record, Variety reported.

item.title: Joanna Krupa confirms engagement to boyfriend Douglas Nunes as she showcases diamond encrusted ring... two months after trying it on in Poland
item.description: She was previously spotted out trying on engagement rings during a recent trip to Poland and now Joanna Krupa has confirmed her engagement to Douglas Nunes.
item.content:encoded:
Joanna Krupa has confirmed her whirlwind engaged to businessman Douglas Nunes after sharing an image of a huge diamond encrusted ring on Instagram.

The Polish-born model and actress, 38 posted a picture of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with Nunes, the President and partner of property development and entertainment company 451 Media Group.

Confirming the news to MailOnline, a spokesperson said: 'Yes they are engaged - that's all for now.' 

What a sparkler! Joanna Krupa confirmed her engagement to boyfriend Douglas Nunes as she posed sporting a huge diamond ring on Sunday

She captioned the image: 'Just another weekend in the Krupa-Nunes household.' 

The caption revealed her fiancé is the hitherto unknown Nunes, who she also tagged in the photo, and comes less than a year after she finalised her divorce from Romain Zago in August 2017.

Also featured in the snap are three adorable dogs, who didn't seem to be as excited about the news as Joanna's fans while slumbering on her bed. 

 Happy lady: Joanna was previously seen trying on the ring during a trip to Poland in January 

One fan commented: 'Congratulations!! Wishing you many years of love and happiness.'

While another added: 'Oh my gosh!!! Congratulations you deserve nothing but happiness.'

One commenter was happy that Joanna had found happiness again, posting: 'Congrats you deserve the best I’m happy you found Love again and I wish you the best today and always, your ring is stunning just like you.'

Engaged! The Polish-born supermodel posted another picture of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with her rumoured boyfriend

Another added: 'So happy for you! You deserve all the love in the world!!' 

Last October, Joanna hinted that she was single when she spoke to US Weekly and admitted she was focusing on her work.

She said at the time: ‘Honestly, right now I’m trying to focus on work. I just feel like men in Hollywood are looking for a trophy wife.  

In the past: She finalised her divorce from Romain Zago in August, after four years of marriage (Pictured together in 2015)

'It’s really hard to get to know somebody. If prince charming comes along, great, but I just feel like it’s really tough in LA.’  

Despite the emotional process, Joanna proved there was no ill will between the couple, telling DailyMail.com: 'We’re on great terms and I’m very grateful Romain is supporting me right now. We are on great terms, we talk more than ever. 

'We’re best friends and not much has changed. I’m very grateful to have Romain’s support and we respect our ten years together.' 

Not so single? Last October, Joanna hinted that she was single when she spoke to US Weekly and admitted she was focusing on her work

Joanna, who has also been linked with restaurateur Nico Santucci, appeared to be in high spirits as she tried on engagement rings during a trip to Poland in January.

A source close to Joanna told MailOnline: 'Joanna and Nico are strictly friends. Joanna is in a relationship but at this stage they want to keep things private.

'Joanna is not engaged to a film producer but she will say she is super happy but not ready to make it official yet.'
item.dc:abstract: Joanna Krupa has confirmed her whirlwind engaged to businessman Douglas Nunes after sharing an image of a huge diamond encrusted ring on Instagram. The Polish-born model and actress, 38 posted a picture of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with Nunes, the President and partner of property development and entertainment company 451 Media Group. Confirming the news to MailOnline, a spokesperson said: 'Yes they are engaged - that's all for now.'

item.title: PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Lena Dunham cuddles up to mystery man as she moves on from Jack Antonoff... and makes stop at marijuana dispensary
item.description: The couple had their arms wrapped around each other as they headed to the marijuana dispensary MedMen. Lena couldn't have looked happier as she cosied up to her handsome new man.
item.content:encoded:
She called it quits with Jack Antonoff after five years together just months ago. 

And Lena Dunham is not looking back, as the actress was seen putting on a very cuddly display with a mystery man as they stopped by a marijuana dispensary in West Hollywood on Saturday night.

The 31-year-old actress looked completely smitten with her handsome new beau, who kissed the side of her head as she pulled him in close.   

Moving on! Lena Dunham is not looking back, as the actress was seen putting on a very cuddly display with a mystery man in West Hollywood on Saturday night

Packing on the PDA! The 31-year-old actress looked completely smitten with her handsome new beau, who kissed the side of her head as she pulled him in close

Lena couldn't have looked happier as she cosied up to her handsome new man, who held her hands as she wrapped her arms around his shoulders. 

The couple, who were seen together a month ago, looked to be in the throes of new love as they laughed and smiled while enjoying the night together, with a smitten Lena even leaning against her beau as they strolled through the street.

Lena kept it casual in a flowing jade green blouse that flashed her torso and white, flared trousers. 

Her beau also opted to put comfort first, wearing a blue T-shirt, jeans, and black trainers.

First thing's first: Lena appeared to be browsing through the products on a touch screen as her new love smiled inside the dispensary 

The look of love! Dunham and her new beau laughed and smiled as they enjoyed a night out together 

Packing on the PDA! Dunham leaned in close to her new man as he held her gently in his arms

Inside the dispensary, the friendly actress flashed a wide smile as she chatted with employees, who assisted her during her shopping experience. 

Lena appeared to be browsing through the products on a touch screen as her new love smiled. 

The visit comes as marijuana became legalized for recreational use in California this year. 

It comes just months after the actress and her boyfriend of five years, Jack, called it quits earlier this year.  

Checking out: The actress waited patiently alongside her beau as they appeared to purchase items 

It takes two! The pair couldn't have looked any happier 

New love: It comes just months after the actress and her boyfriend of five years, Jack, called it quits earlier this year 

On the go: The friendly star chatted with employees inside the dispensary 

The split was mutual, a source told E! Online.

'Jack and Lena were growing apart and it just made sense for them to end their relationship where it was,' said the source. 

'They want the best for each other no matter what. They are both moving on.' 

Jack was spotted on Saturday getting cozy with stunning blonde Carlotta Kohl as the couple took in a basketball game at Madison Square Garden in New York. 

Hitting their stride! The twosome were in sync as they strolled close together

All in a day's work: The couple stood outside the store beside a security guard

It's all good! The former Girls star looked delighted as she browsed about the shop

It was first revealed Jack was dating Carlotta in January when he was spotted dining with the model and artist at Gemma in New York's East Village.

At the time the 33-year-old insisted he was not seeing anyone in the wake of his split from Lena.  

Jack was also romantically linked to songstress Lorde - who he frequently collaborates with - but shot down the rumors with a tweet to deny that there's anything more than friendship between him and the New Zealand born beauty.

Having a chat: The pair appeared to be speaking with the security guard outside the dispensary 

Off they go: The twosome made their way out of a second shop together, with Lena leading the way 

They have chemistry! Sparks were flying as the couple caught each other up 

Taking to Twitter in January he wrote: 'Normally I would never address rumors but I resent having the most important friendships and working relationships in my life reduced to dumb hetero normative gossip,' he wrote. 'Those relationships are deeply important and sacred.'

He added: 'With that said, I'm not seeing anyone. lol.' 

This comes a month after an UsWeekly report that he ex Jack continues to be a source of support to Lena in the midst of her ongoing health issues.

Cuddle session: Dunham nestled against her beau as he leaned against a pole 

Close: The couple were attached at the hip during the fun night out 

In stitches: Lena giggled as she gazed lovingly at her beau, who placed his face into his palm 

'Lena and Jack are in a great place, not in a romantic way. Jack has been really supportive,' a source told the magazine.

The insider added: 'They aren’t hanging out or talking every day but he’s being supportive and they’re in constant communication and being friendly with each other.'

The Bleachers frontman publicly expressed his well wishes for the Girls creator after she recently revealed she had undergone a total hysterectomy to deal with her serious endometriosis.

Inseparable: Lena did not shy away from cuddling close to her other new other half 

Matters of the heart: The loved-up couple were previously seen together in New York City a month ago 

New flame: It was first revealed Jack was dating Carlotta Kohl in January when he was spotted dining with the model and artist at Gemma in New York's East Village (pictured March 2018 in NYC)
item.dc:abstract: She called it quits with Jack Antonoff after five years together just months ago. And Lena Dunham is not looking back, as the actress was seen putting on a very cuddly display with a mystery man as they stopped by a marijuana dispensary in West Hollywood on Saturday night. The 31-year-old actress looked completely smitten with her handsome new beau, who kissed the side of her head as she pulled him in close.

item.title: 'I don't have a body that can sit on a stool in a ladylike way': Mindy Kaling talks her post-baby figure... three months after welcoming daughter
item.description: Mindy Kaling welcomed a baby last year. And she still does not feel comfortable with her figure even though she seems to have lost the baby weight fast.
item.content:encoded:
Mindy Kaling welcomed a baby in December.

And she still does not feel comfortable with her figure even though the Ocean's Eight star seems to have lost the baby weight fast.

On Monday the 38-year-old Wrinkle In Time star shared a post to Instagram where she said she was having trouble sitting on a stool.

No holding back: Mindy Kaling got real on Instagram on Monday and explained that she doesn't always feel comfortable in her own body

While filming at an undisclosed restaurant location, the 38-year-old wrote: 'I'm ready to admit that I don't have a body that can sit on a stool in a comfortable or ladylike way.

'Also: I would rather drown than have you see me hoist myself out of a swimming pool,' she added.

But she ended the photo caption on a more positive note, setting the record straight that she's being interviewed for something fun. 

The actress did not reveal who she was being interviewed by nor for what, but she did hint that it would be released soon.

1,2,3 Action: The mother of one posed in a stool in a black mid-length dress in a restaurant setting

Mindy wore a form-fitting Roland Mouret dress while filming the unknown project, and was photographed with no shoes on. 

She managed to get her full glam on with some berry-colored lipstick and her signature soft waves fully in tact. 

The Wrinkle in Time star welcomed her first child, a baby girl named Katherine, in December. 

Quite the comedian: The Mindy Project creator made a point to goof around with the camera crew while on set

Cheers!: Following the filming, she enjoyed a drink at NYC's Hot Tin Roof at The Dutch

The new mom plays the role of the Shakespeare-quoting Mrs. Who in the Disney sci-fi film which hit theaters earlier this month. 

While visiting Good Morning America in early March, Mindy explained that the sci-fi novels growing up as 'a little shy, chubby, book-reading kid.'

 'I had such a great imagination, but largely science fiction books ignore you if you are, you know, an Indian girl,' she added. 

A dream come true: Mindy explained how she never saw girls like her portrayed in sci-fi films when she was a child
item.dc:abstract: Mindy Kaling welcomed a baby last year. And she still does not feel comfortable with her figure even though she seems to have lost the baby weight fast. On Monday the 38-year-old star shared a post to Instagram where she said she was having trouble sitting on a stool.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker

item.title: From Paris to Miami: Cara Delevingne showcases her typically daring style as she hosts Armani Exchange in Florida... days after confirming romance with model Jackson
item.description: The Paper Towns actress, 25, let her statuesque frame take centre stage on Friday, as she hosted the Armani Exchange 'New Energy, Same Spirit' bash at Miami's W South Beach hotel.
item.content:encoded:
She hit headlines last week as she appeared to confirm her romance with Michael Jackson's daughter Paris as the pair put on a steamy display.

But Cara Delevingne let her statuesque frame and striking appearance take centre stage on Friday, as she hosted the Armani Exchange 'New Energy, Same Spirit' party alongside DJ Martin Garrix at the W South Beach hotel in Miami.

The Paper Towns actress, 25, looked every inch the vixen as she flaunted her lengthy pins in a stone-coloured trench coat.

Dare to be bold! Cara Delevingne let her statuesque frame take centre stage on Friday, as she hosted the Armani Exchange 'New Energy, Same Spirit' bash at Miami's W South Beach hotel

BFA's 2012 Model Of The Year recipient teamed her scanty outerwear with a pair of thigh-high stiletto boots. 

 The Suicide Squad star gave the camera an intense smoldering gaze, which was heightened by a dramatic smokey eye and clear lipgloss.

Ensuring focus remained on her stunning looks, Cara's pixie cut was framed by sophisticated flippy edges.

Sealed with a kiss: The Paper Towns actress, 25, hit headlines last week as she appeared to confirm her romance with Michael Jackson's daughter Paris as the pair put on a steamy display

All eyes on her: BFA's 2012 Model Of The Year recipient teamed her scanty outerwear with a pair of thigh-high stiletto boots

Cara's hosting gig came after she was spotting kissing Paris during an intimate night out last week.

The pair - who were joined by Paris' godfather Macaulay Culkin and his girlfriend - were out for a low-key night in West Hollywood, visiting the district's upmarket Argentinean steakhouse Carlito's.

At the end of their meal, the two happy couples headed outside, with model-turned-actress Cara leaning down to ask a giggling Paris to dance.

Hosts: The Suicide Squad star posed with co-host DJ Martin Garrix, as she gave the camera her intense smoldering gaze

Still flushed from their two-step, the pair then shared a passionate kiss, before Paris nestled into Cara's arms on the cold evening.

The Beverly Hills-born beauty - turning 20 in a week - and the British star cuddled while watching Todd Haynes' fifties-set lesbian flick, Carol, on a laptop earlier this month.

The 2015 romantic drama - starring heterosexual actresses Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara - was critically acclaimed and amassed $40.3M at the global box office.

Industry pals: Cara stood arm-in-arm with French producer David Guetta

The Gringo actress even quoted the movie's line 'flung out of space' on Snapchat and Insta-stories with the Valérian and the City of a Thousand Planets star, whom she's called 'my favorite.' 

Cara and Paris have taken their rumored romance across the globe, visiting the cities of Los Angeles, Prague and England - where they were first spotted holding hands outside a Dalston nightclub in November.

'There's no denying there's a spark,' a source told The Sun last month.

'They really hit it off at the MTV Movie and TV Awards in Los Angeles in May [2017] and have been hanging out since...Cara is quite enamored by the fact Paris is the daughter of one of her musical heroes.'

Love interest: Cara and Paris, 20 have taken their rumored romance across the globe, visiting the cities of Los Angeles, Prague and England

The Paper Towns actress, 25, looked every inch the vixen as she flaunted her lengthy pins in a stone-coloured trench coat.

item.title: Paris Hilton flaunts her toned abs in a daring leopard print bra and green sequin skirt while Cara Delevingne wows in a chic blazer dress at swanky Armani Exchange party
item.description: The socialite flaunted her incredible figure in a eye-catching leopard print bra, which showed off her taut stomach, while Cara, 25, wowed in a chic cream blazer dress at the Armani Exchange party on Friday.
item.content:encoded:
She was reunited with her $2million engagement ring, after losing it while clubbing. 

And Paris Hilton hit the social scene again as she attended the Armani Exchange 'New Energy, Same Spirit' party, hosted by Cara Delevingne and DJ Martin Garrix at the W South Beach hotel in Miami on Friday night.

The 37-year-old socialite turned heads as she flaunted her incredible figure in a eye-catching leopard print bra, which showed off her taut stomach, while Cara, 25, wowed in a chic cream blazer dress. 

Striking Paris Hilton turned heads in a leopard print bra and sequin skirt as she attended the Armani Exchange party at the W South Beach hotel in Miami on Friday night

Paris paired the revealing top with a glittering emerald green skirt which was adorned with hundreds of over-sized sequins. 

She accentuated her leggy frame with black heeled boots and kept accessories to a minimum to draw attention to her statement outfit. 

The Hilton heiress styled her short blonde hair in Hollywood curls and amped up the glamour with a smoky eye, bronzed-swept cheeks and a slick of pink lipstick. 

Leggy: Cara also pulled out all the stops for the glitzy bash, as she showed off her model physique in a perilously short Armani Exchange cream blazer dress

Chic: The blazer dress cinched in her waist with a material belt and featured over-sized pockets and blue piping

Expensive taste: Hosts Cara and DJ Martin Garrix were clad head-to-toe in the designer for the glamorous event 

Cara also pulled out all the stops for the glitzy bash, as she showed off her model physique in a perilously short Armani Exchange cream mini dress.

The blazer dress cinched in her waist with a material belt and featured over-sized pockets and blue piping.

The Suicide Squad actress teamed the look with black suede boots which accentuated her endless pins and rocked her signature smoky eye to the event.

The beauties were joined by a host of stars, including David Guetta, Robin Schutz and Paris' fiance Chris Zylka for the bash, with took place by the hotel's pool. 

Party-time! The model rubbed shoulders with David Guetta, with the pair stopping to pose for a photo

Celebrating in style: David gave Martin a helping hand on the DJ decks as revellers partied at the swanky bash 

Relaxing: Rapper Desiigner, who looked suave in a green patterned jacket and matching shorts, took some time out from the celebrations

Paris, who has been inseparable from her beau since they met 2016, briefly lost her pricey engagement ring recently, after it fell into an ice bucket.

Since accepting her beau's marriage proposal, Paris has been busy making plans for her nuptials - and has revealed a few details on the style she plans to embrace.

'It's a lot of planning to do,' she told People.

Having fun: The musician entertained the crowd with his special DJ set 

'Right now, we are just trying to figure out a date and a location and my dress. I definitely want it to be very magical. I love Disney princess vibes.'

She added: 'He lets me plan everything. He's always there. 

'He is so supportive and so amazing, but he knows that I like to pick out everything. It's the bride's day.' 

Casually-clad: Martin cut a casual figure in an all-black ensemble, donning a shiny jacket and black jeans 

Dressed down: David opted for a low-key outfit, rocking a grey hoodie and light-wash jeans

Fashion re-launch: The event, which was attended by hundreds of party-goes, was put on to celebrate the re-launch of Armani Exchange

The 37-year-old socialite turned heads as she flaunted her incredible figure in a eye-catching leopard print bra, which showed off her taut stomach, while Cara, 25, wowed in a chic cream blazer dress.

item.title: Tom Hardy cuts a surly figure as he transforms into notorious gangster Al Capone in first photo from forthcoming biopic Fonzo
item.description: The actor unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
He has taken on the role as Al Capone in the biopic Fonzo. 

And Tom Hardy unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday.

The actor, 40, bore a striking resemblance to the American mobster in the snap, sporting a shaven head and deep-set scars. 

Surly: Tom Hardy unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday

In the moody shot, the hunk cut a surly figure as he sat in a cell in unkempt clothes with his inmate.

Holding Al Capone's signature white hat, his character looked anguished, which is no doubt in reference to the criminal's mind deteriorating during his 10-year imprisonment. 

He simply captioned the snap: 'Chasing Fonzo'.

Notorious: The actor, 40, bore a striking resemblance to the American mobster (pictured above in 1930), sporting a shaven head and deep-set scars

Once the most feared gangster in America, the Josh Trunk movie will follow Al Capone at the age of 47, as he battles dementia. 

According to production notes, the story will show how 'his past becomes present as harrowing memories of his violent and brutal origins melt into his waking life'.

The Dark Knight Rises star, who beefed up considerably to play Bane in the Batman film and MMA fight Tommy Conlon in Warrior, previously spoke about his fears for his health now he's 40.

For the project, Tom had to once again alter his appearance, however, he claimed it wouldn't be as drastic as his muscular roles.

Muscle man: The Dark Knight Rises star, who beefed up considerably to play MMA fight Tommy Conlon in Warrior, previously spoke about his fears for his health now he's 40

 The Taboo star previously told the Daily Beast: 'It's not the classic Al Capone that you necessarily envision with the silhouette. I don't want to give too much away about it, but there's definitely a transformation with that role. 

'I don't know if it's as drastic as Bane. I've probably damaged my body too much. I'm only little!

'If I keep putting on weight I'll collapse like a house of cards under too much pressure.'

 The star added that he has aches and pains in places that he shouldn't and admitted he now struggles lifting his children Louis, nine, and the two-year-old he shares with wife Charlotte Riley. 

Meanwhile, Tom has confirmed that he wants to be the next 007 - by refusing to talk about the part in fear it will get him blacklisted.

He claimed that in the industry speaking about the role could be a kiss of death and so chose his words carefully.

The star was happy to throw his support behind Inception director Christopher Nolan, however, who has revealed he would be keen take over the franchise.

Striking: For the project Fonzo, Tom had to once again alter his appearance, however, he claimed it wouldn't be as drastic as his muscular roles

item.title: Khloe Kardashian reveals she wants her baby girl to inherit Tristan Thompson's IQ... but her 'street smarts'
item.description: The 33-year-old reality star took to her premium subscription-based website to write about which traits her child she would like from either herself or Tristan Thompson.
item.content:encoded:
Khloe Kardashian has some high hopes for her soon-to-be-born baby girl.

The 33-year-old reality star took to her premium subscription-based website to write about which traits her child she would like from either herself or Tristan Thompson.

She explained that she often thinks about what her daughter with the 27-year-old basketball star will look like and what type of personality she will have.

Khloe wrote: 'She'll be the perfect mix of me and Tristan—which is such a crazy thought, LOL.'

Scroll down for video 

Tough choice: Khloe Kardashian took to her premium subscription-based website to write about which traits her child she would like from either herself or Tristan Thompson, as they are pictured together in Hollywood back in June

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star said that she hopes the bouncing baby girl will get her style and work ethic from her.

Khloe insisted that she would like their future child to have Tristan's good looks and even athleticism from the Cleveland Cavaliers power forward though she insists that they are both 'beasts'.

One thing that the youngest Kardashian sister hopes her future daughter gets from both parents is IQ.

Khloe explained: 'But I want maybe TT's [Tristan's]  IQ and my street smarts.'

Sharing even more: Earlier in the day Khloe posted this naked bump photo with beau Tristan on Monday that was taken by her friend Sasha Samsonova

This comes after Khloe uploaded yet another sexy image from  a pregnancy photo shoot done by her friend Sasha Samsonova on Instagram Monday. 

In this snap, the beauty is having her large baby bump - she is due in early April - held by her beau Tristan Thompson of the Cleveland Cavaliers as they stand in a kitchen with beautiful Spanish tiles.

The image looks like their pregnancy announcement photo

Khloe captioned the  eye-popping photo, 'Mommy and daddy.'

Like in previous photos from the same set, Khloe has on a black lace bra and matching undies and has put her very large bump on full display.

The TV sensation looked stunning with her long blonde locks worn down in Malibu waves and her makeup done to perfection.

In her first bump shot from the set, she flashed a leg as she wore a long black coat off her shoulders.

Stunning: The 33-year-old siren shared a very glamorous baby bump shot to Instagram on Wednesday

The Revenge Body star was outside on a patio with plants everywhere.

And in the second shot she was in bed with Tristan placing a hand on her thigh. 

This new post comes just days after the looker took to Snapchat to discuss food. The siren revealed what she's been feeding that bump.

The Good American designer gave fans a look at the fried chicken and biscuits she was digging into to fulfill her cravings. 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the star wrote over the image. 'Thank you.'

Two cute: The Revenge Body star was seen with beau Thompson in bed in this image shared on Thursday

She had a large box of 24 large biscuits and a box of friend chicken placed on her dining room table.

Her hand was also seen going into a bag that contained condiments.

'I am starving! I sort of want Popeyes,' she tweeted the night before. 'I’m not sure though LOL the struggle is real.'

But then she gave in. 'Ok that fulfilled every craving I’ve been having for Popeyes over the past couple days,' the star tweeted.

'Letting the food craving build up is actually better. I’m so satisfied now. Yum yum! I feel guilty but GREAT.'

No a salad: Khloe gave her health food a break to dig into friend chicken and biscuits on Thursday

 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star wrote over the image. 'Thank you'

Khloe is due very soon so it's no wonder she's letting herself enjoy her pregnancy to the fullest before she welcomes the child.

No doubt the looker will have to be on a diet as soon as her little girl is welcomed into the world due to the pressure that comes with being a representative of the Kardashian empire. 

Last week Khloe wrote about her pregnancy on her pay site Khloewithak.com. 

'Being pregnant has always been a dream of mine. Even though 9 months feels like a lifetime while I'm awaiting the arrival of my baby girl, it's really a blink in the grand scheme of life,' she began.

'I know I'm going to miss my belly so much once she's here, I had to capture the beautiful process that is pregnancy so I can always look back at this time. Thank you Sasha Samsonova for this special photo shoot! Also, shout-out to my glam team who helped me look and feel like a goddess: Hrush, Andrew and Jill.'  

Busy mama: Last week the LA native launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American

The daughter of Kris Jenner - who has said she has not yet found a name for her baby girl - has been very active during her pregnancy.

She has not only launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American, but she has also kept up with her social media posts.   

In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party.

She explained that she often thinks about what her daughter with the 27-year-old basketball star will look like and what type of personality she will have. Khloe wrote: 'She'll be the perfect mix of me and Tristan—which is such a crazy thought, LOL.'

item.title: Is Eleven morphing into Joyce? Millie Bobby Brown and Winona Ryder rock similar hairstyles at Stranger Things event in LA
item.description: Millie has grown out the shaved head look that made her famous as Eleven and wore her longer locks in loose curls, in an almost identical style to Winona who shares the same dark hair color.
item.content:encoded:
They are a generation apart on the Netflix hit Stranger Things.

But on Sunday night, Winona Ryder, 46, and Millie Bobby Brown, 14, looked like they could be mother and daughter as the young star of the sci fi series rocked a similar hairstyle and makeup to the Hollywood veteran.

Millie has grown out the shaved head look that made her famous as Eleven on the show and wore her longer locks in loose curls, in an almost identical style to Winona who shares the same dark hair color.

In the spotlight: Winona Ryder, 46, and Millie Bobby Brown, 14, looked like they could be mother and daughter as the Stranger Things co-stars rocked similar hairstyles and make up

In fact, the two were striking in their similarities as they arrived at Paleyfest in Hollywood Sunday night.

Winona plays Joyce Byers, the mother of Will Byers who in season one was abducted by the monster of Upside Down.

Millie stars as the mysterious kinetic girl Eleven who joined forces with Will's friends to try and rescue him.

Looking alike: Both actresses wore their hair with a center parting and falling to their shoulders in loose curls as well as gray shadow on their eye lids, rosy blush on cheeks and red lip color

Comeback role: Winona plays Joyce Byers, the mother of Will Byers who in season one was abducted by the monster of Upside Down

Found fame: Millie stars as the mysterious kinetic girl Eleven who joined forces with Will's friends to try and rescue him

Evolution: Millie famously shaved off her hair for her debut as Eleven, left. In season two, Eleven is growing back her hair after being freed from the experimental laboratory

While she famously shaved off her hair for her debut as Eleven, in season two of the series Eleven is seen with more hair as it grows back once she is freed from the experimental laboratory where she was kept a virtual prisoner.

Both actresses on Sunday night wore their hair with a center parting and falling to their shoulders in loose curls.

They each rocked gray dusky shadow on their eye lids along with black mascara.

Their cheeks were dusted with rosy blush and they both wore red lip color.

However, when it came to their choice of outfits, the two stars opted for very contrasting ensembles. 

In the money: The teen actress is reported to have negotiated a major pay increase for season 3 of Stranger Things, as much as $300,000-350,000 per episode

Lovely: For Sunday night's event, Millie chose to go all out in a sleeveless semi-sheer black dress decorated with lots of white stars. She added black sandal heels and a gold bracelet

Casual: Two-time Oscar nominee Winona played it low key in black skinny jeans with a tailored black jacket over a black graphic tee. She added black ankle boots and several necklaces

She's back: Her critically-acclaimed role as the mother of Will Byers, who was abducted by the monster from Upside Down, has reinvigorated her career

Two-time Oscar nominee Winona played it low key in a pair of black skinny jeans with a tailored black jacket over a black graphic tee.

She added black ankle boots and several necklaces.

Millie chose to go all out in a sleeveless semi-sheer black dress decorated with lots of white stars.

The teen wore black sandal heels and a gold bracelet.

Pals: Winona gave a warm welcome to actress Natalia Dyer, who plays Nancy in Stranger Things, as they arrived at Hollywood's Dolby Theatre

Stylish: Natalia, 21, wore a pretty dress that had a white short-sleeved bodice and green skirt with a pale pink satin band around the waist. She wore her hair in a high pony tail

Coordinated: The bodice of her dress had an asymmetrical low-cut neckline that was mirrored in the shape of her white heels

Also on hand for the event where the cast of Stranger Things talked about making the Netflix blockbuster was Natalia Dyer, who stars as Nancy.

The 21-year-old wore a pretty dress that had a white short-sleeved bodice and green skirt with a pale pink satin band around the waist.

The bodice had an asymmetrical low-cut neckline that was mirrored in the shape of Natalia's white heels.

The actress's co-star and real-life boyfriend Charlie Heaton was also there, looking sharp in a dark green two-piece suit with a black shirt and black shoes with blue laces.

On the blue carpet: Natalia's co-star and real-life boyfriend Charlie Heaton was also there, looking sharp in a dark green two-piece suit with a black shirt and black shoes with blue laces

Stalwart: David Harbour, who stars as Hawkins sheriff Jim Hopper, was casual in blue jeans with a plush black velvet jacket

Young star: Caleb McLaughlin, 16, who plays Lucas, showed off his eclectic style with a two-tone buttoned up shirt and plaid pants with black ankle boots

Breakout character: Sadie Sink, 15, who joined the Stranger Things cast for season two, opted for a two-tone dress with white short-sleeved bodice and black ankle-length skirt

David Harbour, who stars as Hawkins sheriff Jim Hopper, was casual in blue jeans with a plush black velvet jacket.

Caleb McLaughlin, 16, who plays Lucas, showed off his eclectic style with a two-tone buttoned up shirt and plaid pants with black ankle boots.

Sadie Sink, 15, who joined the Stranger Things cast for season two, opted for a two-tone dress with white short-sleeved bodice and black ankle-length skirt.

She went bare-legged in black lace up ankle boots and wore a black Alice band over her long red hair.

On hand, too, were actor Sean Astin, 47, who had a pivotal role in the second season and Shawn Levy, 49, an executive producer on the show. 

Have roles to play: On hand, too, were actor Sean Astin, 47, left, who had a pivotal role in the second season and Shawn Levy, 49, right, an executive producer on the show

Set secrets: The event served as a way for the cast to share stories from the set with fans of Stranger Things

Stranger Things has been a phenomenal success for streaming service Netflix.

And now the company is shelling out big bucks to the show's stars for a third season that starts filming next month.

Winona Ryder and David Harbour will be paid $350,000 an episode to return, The Hollywood Reporter said last week, while child actors Finn Wolfhard, 15, Gaten Matarazzo, 15, Caleb McLaughlin, 16, and Noah Schnapp, 13, are set to receive $250,000 per episode.

However, THR.com reports, mystery surrounds the deal being made with Millie Bobby Brown who stars as the mysterious Eleven, with the trade publication reporting her team have been negotiating a separate deal for her which could be worth more. 

Some sources have told THR.com that the 14-year-old is set to earn as much as Ryder and Harbour, while others suggest she's going to be paid $300,000 per episode.

If true, that would be a 1,200 percent pay increase from the previously reported $20,000+ salaries the child actors were making during seasons one and two of Stranger Things.

Other cast members Natalia Dyer, Charlie Heaton and Joe Keery will be paid $150,000 an episode under the new agreement.

In the money: The child stars of Netflix's Stranger Things are receiving whopping pay increases for the third season of the show - l-r, Gaten Matarazzo, Noah Schnapp, Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard and Caleb McLaughlin, pictured in June 2017
item.dc:abstract: They are a generation apart on the Netflix hit Stranger Things. But on Sunday night, Winona Ryder, 46, and Millie Bobby Brown, 14, looked like they could be mother and daughter as the young star of the sci fi series rocked a similar hairstyle and makeup to the Hollywood veteran. Millie has grown out the shaved head look that made her famous as Eleven on the show and wore her longer locks in loose curls, in an almost identical style to Winona who shares the same dark hair color.
item.dc:creator: Rachel McGrath
item.mi:shortTitle: Millie Bobby Brown and Winona Ryder rock similar hairstyles

item.title: Bath time fun! Ciara shares cute snaps of adorable baby Sienna Princess showing her first two teeth as she splashes around
item.description: The 11-month-old curly haired cutie was obviously enjoying the warm water as she couldn't stop smiling at her mother, 32, who took the snap. The singer shares the tot with husband Russell Wilson.
item.content:encoded:
Ciara is one very proud mother.  

On Sunday, the singer posted two of the cutest snaps of her smiling 11-month-old daughter Sienna Princess splashing around in the bath.

In one, the happy tot showed off her first two pearly white teeth as she looked up at her mom.

Curly haired cutie: Ciara's 11-month-old daughter Sienna showed off her first two pearly white teeth as she splashed in the bath in this snap the hitmaker shared on Sunday

The 32-year-old hitmaker captioned it: 'Sienna Says Happy Sunday Everybody! Smile!'

 In the second, Sienna, who will turn one on April 28, gave a wide gummy grin.

Ciara shares her little treasure with her pro-football husband Russell Wilson, 29.

Completely irresistible: The 32-year-old hitmaker captioned both the snaps,  'Sienna Says Happy Sunday Everybody! Smile!'

So elegant: Ciara, seen at a Pandora Jewelry event in New York on March 14, shares her little girl with her Seattle Seahawks quarterback husband Russell Wilson, 29 

The hitmaker, whose full name is Ciara Princess Harris, married the Seattle Seahawks quarterback on July 6, 2016, in a romantic ceremony at Peckforton Castle in Cheshire, England.

Ciara also shares a three-year-old son, Future Zahir, with her ex-beau, rapper Future.

Meanwhile, Ciara and Russell's family grew even more this month.

Wrong sport: Russell, Ciara, Sienna and Future all donned New York Yankees hats and pulled fierce facesfor this selfie

The couple have just adopted a Great Dane, which Russell shared a snap of last week, captioned: 'New Pup Alert!!! Welcome to the Wilson Family!'

Ciara chimed in: 'We welcomed our New Puppy Hero To The Crew This Month! Now We Have 6 kids including our Pups! #NationalPuppyDay.' 

The couple already have two more Great Danes and a cute little poodle mix.

'New pup alert': Russell shared this sweet selfie as he hugged the black Great Dane, saying, 'Welcome to the Wilson Family!'

National Puppy Day: Ciara chimed in: 'We welcomed our New Puppy Hero To The Crew This Month! Now We Have 6 kids including our Pups!'

On Sunday, Ciara posted two of the cutest snaps of her smiling 11-month-old daughter Sienna splashing around in the bath. In one, the happy tot showed off her first two pearly white teeth as she looked up at her mom.

item.title: Superhero session! Brie Larson shows off impressive arm muscles while training for her role as Captain Marvel
item.description: She is the first woman to have a solo lead in a Marvel film. Brie Larson has been training for 'nine months' to get her body in tip-top shape for her role as Captain Marvel.
item.content:encoded:
She is the first woman to have a solo lead in a Marvel film. 

On Monday, Brie Larson took to Instagram to show off her muscles while in the gym doing pull-ups.

The 28-year-old has been training for 'nine months' to get her body in tip-top shape for her role as Captain Marvel. 

Scroll down for video  

Bulk up! She is the first woman to have a solo lead in a Marvel film. On Monday, Brie Larson took to Instagram to show off her muscles while in the gym doing pull-ups

Tough broad! The 28-year-old has been training for 'nine months' to get her body in tip-top shape for her role as Captain Marvel

Production of the action-packed film kicked off just recently. 

And fans were treated to a behind the scenes sneak peek as photos were released of Brie in her emerald green suit for the first time. 

The crew will shoot in and around Los Angeles, Baton Rouge, and New Orleans. 

 Light, camera, action! Production of the sci-fi film kicked off just recently. The crew will shoot in and around Los Angeles, Baton Rouge, and New Orleans

Leading lady! While the plot line has yet to be elaborated upon, the film will follow Carol Danvers—an air force pilot who develops superhuman powers. Larson's co-stars include Jude Law and Samuel L. Jackson

The best: Brie took to Instagram and shared a snap of herself with Brigadier General Jeanie Leavitt during a recent visit to Nellis Air Force Base in Nevada as she prepared for the role

'She is perfect in every way for the part,' President of Marvel Studios Kevin Feige told ET in an interview. 'She really has the range that is really required for our textured and flawed and deep and real Carol Danvers.' 

While the plot line has yet to be elaborated upon, the film will follow Carol Danvers—an air force pilot who develops superhuman powers. 

Larson's co-stars include Jude Law and Samuel L. Jackson.

'She is perfect in every way for the part,' President of Marvel Studios Kevin Feige told ET in an interview. 'She really has the range that is really required for our textured and flawed and deep and real Carol Danvers'

The King Kong actress didn't accept her Marvel role right away.

'It took me a really long time,' she told Vanity Fair. 'Ultimately, I couldn't deny the fact that this movie is everything I care about, everything that's progressive and important and meaningful, and a symbol I wished I would've had growing up. 

'I really, really feel like it's worth it if it can bring understanding and confidence to young women—I'll do it.' 

Captain Marvel is set to premiere in March 2019. 

Worth the wait! Captain Marvel is set to premiere in March 2019

item.title: Stephen Belafonte can't keep his hands off gorgeous girlfriend Jessica Rich as she wows in sparkly jumpsuit for dinner date... after defending her beau's 'messy divorce' from Mel B
item.description: She jumped to his defence last week, and on Sunday Stephen Belafonte couldn't have looked happier to be on a date night with his new girlfriend Jessica Rich.
item.content:encoded:
She jumped to his defence last week, and on Sunday Stephen Belafonte couldn't have looked happier to be on a date night with his new girlfriend Jessica Rich.

Mel B's ex husband beamed as he left The Crustacean Restaurant in Beverly Hills hand in hand with gorgeous TV host Jessica.

Stephen could barely keep his hands off his date, laughing as they shared an embrace on their way home. 

The look of love: Mel B's ex husband Stephen Belafonte beamed as he left The Crustacean Restaurant in Beverly Hills hand in hand with his gorgeous girlfriend Jessica Rich on Sunday

Jessica, 31, dressed to impress for her romantic night out, showing off her curves in a skin-tight sparkly catsuit.

She teamed the figure-flashing bronze number with strappy heels and a chic shoulder bag.

Stephen meanwhile kept things casual in black, adding a pop of colour with his quirky purple suede boots. 

Their date came a day after Stephen's ex Mel attended the Kids' Choice Awards in Inglewood, California with her three daughters, including Madison, six, who she shares with Belfonte, and her ex's daughter Giselle, 13.

Stephen and his new girlfriend have been dating for a number of weeks, and Jessica leaped to the defence of her beau's reputation in the wake of his acrimonious divorce battle with the Spice Girl in an interview with The Mirror earlier this month.

I got you babe! Stephen could barely keep his hands off his date, who works as a designer and TV host, laughing as they shared an embrace on their way home

The fashion designer/TV host offered her take on the situation, telling the publication: 'Whenever you go through a messy divorce a lot of things are going to be said.'

The couple's headline-grabbing divorce battle lasted seven-months and included lurid tales of kinky sex, drug and alcohol abuse and allegations of domestic violence.

Rich — who appeared on VH1's 2008 dating series Real Chance of Love — said she didn't have any ill will towards the Wannabe singer, adding: 'I wish her the best of luck. I respect her 100% and I hope everything works out.

The duo's divorce was finalised last December, granting Belafonte joint custody of their six-year-old daughter Madison.

Ex: Their date came a day after Stephen's ex Mel attended the Kids' Choice Awards in Inglewood, California with her three daughters, including Madison, six, (centre) who she shares with Belfonte, and her ex's daughter Giselle, 13 (second from right)

Stephen is still at odds with Mel over custody of her daughter Angel, who she had with Eddie Murphy. Belafonte is asking for step-parent visitation.

Jessica also offered some insight into her relationship with the restaurateur/film producer, telling The Mirror that they're taking things slowly.

'He’s only just come out of a marriage and we don’t want to force a title so we are taking things slow,' Rich said. 'I have a good feeling when I’m with him. We have the same mindset.'

The designer said she wasn't worried about public opinions, saying: 'I am getting a lot of bad press dating him but I’m like "as far as I know, he’s an amazing person."'

During the chat Jessica also revealed the she and Stephen first met six years ago while he and Mel were still married, but sparked a relationship upon reconnecting several months ago at his restaurant. 

Messy split: The duo's divorce was finalised last December, granting Belafonte joint custody of their six-year-old daughter Madison

item.title: Love is in the air! Charlotte McKinney cuddles up to tattoo artist Nathan Kostechko in West Hollywood
item.description: The 24-year-old blonde bombshell was seen snuggling up to her heavily tattooed beau at a gas station in West Hollywood on Sunday evening.
item.content:encoded:
They were first spotted together in December.

And it appears that things are moving along swimmingly between Charlotte McKinney, 24, and her new boyfriend, now identified as artist Nathan Kostechko, 38. 

The blonde bombshell was seen snuggling up with her heavily tattooed beau at a gas station in West Hollywood on Sunday evening.

Going strong: Charlotte McKinney was spotted looking cuddly with tattoo artist Nathan Kostechko on Sunday evening in West Hollywood

The couple embraced in the doorway of a store with the Baywatch star leaning her head against her man's chest. 

Waiting for Nathan's vintage ride to be refueled Charlotte grabbed some snacks from a gas station.

Charlotte, who first shot to fame as the busty blonde in Carl's Jr's Super Bowl ad in 2015, looked great in tight red jeans with rips on the knees and a black scoop neck bodysuit.

She wore patent black heels and wore her blonde locks loose, later pinning them up in a pretty bun.   

Charlotte, 24, looked great in tight red jeans and a scoop neck bodysuit

Smitten: Nathan, 38, doted over the leggy blonde as they grabbed some supplies from a gas station

Charlotte split from Blade actor Stephen Dorff, 44, in July 2016 after a year of dating.

By September that year she was spotted canoodling with hunk Scott Eastwood, 32.

But by January 2017 Charlotte declared she was 'so single it's crazy'. 

'Starting this year off, I've been really focused on work. But I'm really open. I'm here, call me!' she told E! News.

Going swimmingly: The duo were first seen together in December when they hung out at Ollo restaurant in Malibu

Blonde bombshell: Charlotte enjoyed a tropical vacation recently and shared this sexy snap by the beach last week

item.description: The 43-year-old is currently producing ABC's Grand Hotel in Miami.
item.content:encoded:
Her baby is due to arrive sometime in May.

On Monday, Eva Longoria, 43, accentuated her large baby bump in a white dress that she layered with collared shirt. 

The mom-to-be is currently producing ABC's Grand Hotel in Miami. 

Scroll down for video 

Bumping around! On Monday, Eva Longoria , 43, accentuated her large baby bump in a white dress that she layered with collared shirt

Hard at work! The mom-to-be is currently producing ABC's Grand Hotel in Miami

This is Eva's first child, but her husband Jose Baston's fourth.

He shares daughter Natalia, 22, and 14-year-old twins Mariana and Jose with ex-wife Natalia Esperón. 

The Mexican-American talked briefly about her pregnancy with Access on the Golden Globes red carpet.

'I'm feeling great,' she said as she held her belly protectively. 

The Mexican-American talked briefly about her pregnancy with Access on the Golden Globes red carpet. 'I'm feeling great,' she said as she held her belly protectively

Growing family! This is Eva's first child but her husband Jose Baston's fourth

Fun in the sun! Shoe-less on the beach, Longoria was spotted having a laugh with one of her actors. Despite being seven-months pregnant, Eva is still hard at work in the director's chair

Shoe-less on the beach, Longoria was spotted having a laugh with one of her actors.

The Texas native was spotted wearing a baseball cap adorned with the shape of her home state and hanging from her collar were a pair of aviators.

Despite being seven-months pregnant, Eva is still hard at work in the director's chair. 

She has been working on shows including Blackish and The Mick as of late. 

Represent! The Texas native was spotted wearing a baseball cap adorned with the shape of her home state and hanging from her collar were a pair of aviators

New gig: Grand Hotel is set to air during pilot season. The soap-opera-esque show will follow the staff of a family-run Miami Beach hotel. It is loosely based on the Spanish series Gran Hotel

On Sunday, Eva spent a relaxing day in South Beach. 

She met up with friend and model Lili Estefan for a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table. 

The two chowed down on chicken and waffles, cornbread, and a spread of desserts. 

Girl time! On Sunday, Eva spent a relaxing day in South Beach. She met up with  friend and model Lili Estefan for a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table where they chowed down on chicken and waffles and cornbread

item.title: Love Island's Georgia Harrison shows off her envy-inducing figure in chic bardot bikini as she tops up her tan in Cape Verde
item.description: The 22-year-old displayed her impressively toned stomach and tiny waist in her chic off-shoulder swimwear as she took a phone call during a stroll on the beach.
item.content:encoded:
She is known for her killer body, having confidently showed it off during her stint in Majorca for ITV2 series Love Island.

And Georgia Harrison set pulses racing once again on Monday, as she stripped to another two-piece to top up her tan in Cape Verde. 

The 22-year-old displayed her impressively toned stomach and tiny waist in her chic off-shoulder swimwear as she took a phone call during a stroll on the beach. 

Bikini babe: Love Island's Georgia Harrison set pulses racing on Monday, as she stripped to a skimpy two-piece to top up her tan in Cape Verde

Catching up: The 22-year-old displayed her impressively toned stomach and tiny waist in her chic off-shoulder swimwear as she took a phone call during a stroll on the beach

The blonde certainly commanded attention as she hit the beach in her trendy bikini, which pulled into a bardot crop top and barely-there briefs.

The bralet, patterned with a monochrome zig zag print, pulled straight across the chest while the bottoms rose to high at her hip, to draw attention to her impossibly petite waist and rippling abs.

Only making the look saucier, the briefs then cut into a thong at her rear, to give a flash her peachy derriere to all as she relaxed in the sunshine. 

Chic: The blonde certainly commanded attention as she hit the beach in her trendy bikini, which pulled into a bardot crop top and barely-there briefs

Simply chic: The bralet, patterned with a monochrome zig zag print, pulled straight across the chest while the bottoms rose to high at her hip, to draw attention to her impossibly petite waist

Abs-olutely fabulous: Sporting nothing but the bikini, Georgia's rippling abs took centre stage as she basked in the sunshine

Despite her low-key day the beach, Georgia still styled her hair into loose, tousled waves and sported a contoured make-up look and pale pink lip, in a typically glamorous touch. 

Tying her look together with oversized, cat-eye shades, the reality star was every inch the beach babe as she paddled in the sea, while chatting to a friend on the phone. 

Georgia is no stranger to showing off her figure in a bikini, having risen to prominence on ITV2's Love Island in June. 

Life's peachy: Only making the look saucier, the briefs then cut into a thong at her rear, to give a flash her peachy derriere to all as she relaxed in the sunshine

Glam: Despite her low-key day the beach, Georgia still styled her hair into loose, tousled waves

Dolled up: She also marinated her usual Essex glamour with a contoured make-up look and pale pink lip, despite the blazing heat

The blonde caused chaos when she entered the villa by choosing to couple up with Kem Cetinay - who had just asked Amber Davies to be his girlfriend. 

Yet she soon became a favourite on the show after the drama died down thanks to her cheeky fling with Sam Gowland, who she split from in August. 

However in February, she candidly shed light on the darker side of the dating sphere as she recalled a harrowing abusive relationship she had at the tender age of 18.

Finishing touches: Tying her look together with oversized, cat-eye shades, the reality star was every inch the beach babe as she paddled in the sea

Relaxed: The star was seen cooling off in the water and running her hands through her hair, as well as chatting to a friend on the phone

Confidence is key: Georgia is no stranger to showing off her figure in a bikini, having risen to prominence on ITV2's Love Island in June

The reality beauty penned in a Women's Fitness article that she feared for her life every day as her now-ex spat in her face, taunted her and smashed up her phone. 

Reflecting on her past abusive relationship, Georgia wrote: 'I remember being in constant fear throughout the day of what would set him off.

'Would he take my phone again and lock me out so that he can obsessively scroll through it until he finds an innocent message from a friend and smashes it up for the 3rd time?

'Would he taunt me and criticise my appearance to the point where I can’t even look at myself? Would he take me to dinner and then spit in my face because I "looked at the waiter in a provocative way"? Each day was just a huge contrast of love and fear.' 

Back in the day: Georgia embarked on a fling with Sam Gowland (L) in the Majorca villa, but the pair broke up only two months later
item.dc:abstract: She is known for her killer body, having confidently showed it off during her stint in Majorca for ITV2 series Love Island. And Georgia Harrison set pulses racing once again on Monday, as she stripped to another two-piece to top up her tan in Cape Verde. The 22-year-old displayed her impressively toned stomach and tiny waist in her chic off-shoulder swimwear as she took a phone call during a stroll on the beach.

item.title: Birthday boy! Rachel Zoe's son Skyler turns seven as his mom throws him a fun outdoor play party with family and pals in the park
item.description: The little lad actually turned seven on Thursday but his 46-year-old fashionista mother waited until Sunday to celebrate with a bash held at Palisades Park in Los Angeles.
item.content:encoded:
He turned seven on Thursday.

But mom Rachel Zoe waited until Sunday to throw son Skyler Berman a birthday bash for family and friends.

Given that he, his little brother, Kaius, four, plus their young pals have plenty of energy, the fashionista wisely decided to hold the party at Palisades Park in Los Angeles.

Family fun: Rachel Zoe and husband Rodger Berman, holding their son, Kaius, held a huge seventh birthday bash for Skyler, center, at Palisades Park in Los Angeles on Sunday

That gave the boys plenty of room to run about.

And she and husband Rodger Berman, both 46, laid on lots of toys from Little Tikes for the lads to lark about on.

They included a Fun Zone Tumblin' Tower Climber that had a slide attached and a trampoline that the brothers happily bounced on.

Zoe was her usual glam self in an ankle-length denim dress with a drawstring waist that she wore under a faux fur jacket.

Having a blast: Rachel laid on toys from Little Tikes including this Fun Zone Tumblin' Tower Climber and slide that Skyler looked happy playing on

Devoted brothers: Skyler hugged Kaius, four, as Rachel, 46, looked on

Jumping with joy: The two youngsters bounced on a trampoline

Her make-up emphasized her porcelain complexion and she sported her usual red lipstick pout,

The blonde's long tresses cascaded over her shoulders as she protected her eyes from the bright sunshine with a pair of gold-rimmed shades.

Birthday boy Skyler wore a grey and white zip-up bomber jacket over a black T-shirt and jeans turned up at the ankles while Kaius looked cute in a brown leather jacket and jeans.

Fun mom: The fashionista watched Skyler, left, and Kaius play in a blow-up pool full of balls

Striking a pose: The youngsters cuddled up for a snap in the pool, which would likely have water in it in warmer weather 

Sitting down on the job: Skyler took a break on a chair that he and Kaius built using giant snap together bricks

The family party was joined by  celebrity friends including Barely There actress Sara Foster, 37, who shares Valentina, seven and Josephine, two, with her tennis pro husband Tommy Haas, 39.

The Carrie Diaries actress Molly Sims, 44, was also there with her children, sons Brooks, five, and Grey, one, plus Scarlet, who turned three on Sunday.

She is married to producer Scott Stuber.

Little cutie: Kaius looked adorable in a leather jacket with his brown curly hair tumbling on his shoulders

This looks complicated: Kaius didn't seem to know what to do with this toy

Baby duty: The Carrie Diaries actress Molly Sims, 44, was also there with her children, Brooks, five, Scarlet, who turned three on Sunday, and one-year-old  Grey strapped to her chest

Proud mom: Rachel and her boys stood in front of a table filled with gifts for guests
item.dc:abstract: He turned seven on Thursday. But mom Rachel Zoe waited until Sunday to throw son Skyler Berman a birthday bash for family and friends. Given that he, his little brother, Kaius, four, plus their young pals have plenty of energy, the fashionista wisely decided to hold the party at Palisades Park in Los Angeles.

item.title: 'Make it official!' Fans continue to speculate over Hailee Steinfeld's developing friendship with Niall Horan as she poses in One Direction star's tour T-shirt
item.description: The Pitch Perfect star, 21, sent her keen Twitter followers wild with relationship questions as she shared a typically stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening.
item.content:encoded:
They recently sparked romance rumours after they put on a cosy display during a concert in Las Vegas just a few weeks ago.

And Hailee Steinfeld sent her keen Twitter followers wild as she shared a typically stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening.  

The Pitch Perfect star, 21, gave the camera a smoldering gaze as she showcased her support for the One Director star, 24.

A blossoming romance? Hailee Steinfeld sent her keen Twitter followers wild with relationship questions as she shared a stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening

The Love Myself hitmaker teamed the promotional tee with edgy ripped jeans, tied in with a pair of on-trend brogues.

As her brunette tresses cascaded down one side of her face, the Term Life actress gave a slight peek at her glamorous makeup, which included a smokey eye look.

Flooding Hailee's page with assumptions on her relationship with Niall, one fan wrote: 'I love a supportive girlfriend.'

Close pals: The Pitch Perfect star, 21, recently sparked romance rumours after she put on a cosy display with the former One Director star during a concert in Las Vegas last month

Another insisted that the stars should confirm their status: 'Make it official already!'

Gushing in admiration over Hailee's appearance, a follower wrote: 'Hailee in a Naill t-shirt? I've never seen a more perfect sight!' 

Focusing on their musical talents instead of their personal connection, one penned: 'Where's the collab we all want?' while another keen fan shared a hilarious meme of Ed Sheeran holding a dictionary definition of collaboration.  

'I love a supportive girlfriend': Eager fans flooded the actress' page with assumptions on their relationship

MailOnline has contacted Niall and Hailee's representatives for comment.

These tweets come after the pair enjoyed a lively Backstreet Boys gig last month.

The singers proved to be close as they attended the concert together - chatting and laughing together as they sipped on drinks in the VIP area. 

In video footage posted to Twitter, Hailee and Niall were seen singing and dancing to the band's big hits - I Want It That Way and Everybody - before they erupted into laughter when Niall was approached by a group of fans for selfies. 

The Slow Hands hitmaker had already set the rumour mill whirring in December last year, when he shared a sweet birthday tribute to the award-winning actress on Instagram.

Niall wrote: 'Happy birthday to the loveliest person on the planet and one of my best friends @haileesteinfeld. Have no idea what the hell is going on in this photo. Love ya hails.'

The Los Angeles native gave a glimpse of her relationship with Niall in an interview with Us Weekly: 'I feel so lucky that [my fans] care enough about me to know what I’m doing every second of every day, but I think that sometimes it’s hard for people in general to realise that there are boundaries to a person’s life and personal life.'

Sweet: The Slow Hands hitmaker had already set the rumour mill whirring in December last year, when he shared a birthday tribute to the award-winning actress on Instagram

Before adding: 'I do love that I have the opportunity to share with them what I’m comfortable with and they’re there to listen and support me.' 

She also admitted she has a 'guard up' when it comes to dating, in an interview with Marie Claire.

She said: 'I’m trying to protect myself and have a bit of a guard up, but I also want to fall in love and know why love hurts.'  

The Irish belter confirmed he was single back in October, when he last discussed his love life in public.

Appearing on KIIS FM Breakfast in Australia, he said: 'I'm a very single man. You know, I'm 24 and travelling the world and that's the way it is.'

'I'm trying to protect myself!' The award-winning star recently admitted she has a 'guard up' when it comes to dating, in an interview with Marie Claire

And Hailee Steinfeld sent her keen Twitter followers wild as she shared a typically stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening. The Pitch Perfect star, 21, gave the camera a smoldering gaze as she showcased her support for the One Director star.
