item.title: Michael Buble's model wife Luisana confirms she is pregnant with couple's third child as she showcases her baby bump at red carpet event
item.description: There's been plenty of speculation that whether they have another baby on the way.
item.content:encoded:
Michael Buble and his model wife Luisana Lopilato have confirmed they are expecting their third child together. 

The couple addressed weeks of speculation as they appeared at the Juno Awards in Vancouver, Canada, on Saturday night, with Luisana, 30, debuting her baby bump as she hit the red carpet with the singer, 42. 

Buble reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child. 

Three is the magic number: Michael Buble and his model wife Luisana Lopilato have confirmed they are expecting their third child together 

'Oops you did it again... my wife and I are pregnant with our number three!' Buble said as the audience cheered the revelation. 

It was reported last week that the couple are expecting a baby girl in around four months time, but the Canadian crooner didn't reveal the gender of the tot. 

The new baby will  be a third child for the singer and his wife, who also have four-year-old Noah and two-year-old Elias.

Their parenthood journey hasn't been easy, with the couple devastated when Noah was diagnosed with liver cancer back in 2016, but luckily the youngster was confirmed to be making a recovery towards the end of last year.

Happy news: The couple addressed weeks of speculation as they appeared at the Juno Awards in Vancouver, Canada, on Saturday night 

Bumping along: Luisana, 30, debuted her baby bump in a stunning plunging black gown as she hit the red carpet with the singer, 42

And now Michael - who took home the award for Adult Contemporary Album of the Year at the 2018 Juno Awards - said he will start enjoying life more.

He told Entertainment Tonight Canada: 'Emotionally, it's a roller coaster. I think life sort of teaches you these hard lessons sometimes.

'Part of that lesson is that it allowed me to really have perspective, and to really enjoy more than I ever have in my life.

'I enjoy the small things.' 

Oh baby: The couple looked delighted as they hit the red carpet at the music event, with Luisana placing a protective hand on her beautiful bump

Doting dad: Buble reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child

Big brood: The new baby will be a third child for the 42-year-old singer and his wife, who also have four-year-old Noah and two-year-old Elias 

Noah was diagnosed with cancer in 2016 but the Haven't Met You Yet hitmaker has previously confirmed he has been 'progressing well' following his treatment.

Speaking previously, he said: 'We are so grateful to report that our son Noah has been progressing well during his treatment and the doctors are very optimistic about the future for our little boy.

'He has been brave throughout and we continue to be inspired by his courage. We thank God for the strength he has given all of us.' 

Proud parents: The new baby is thought to be a girl
item.dc:abstract: There's been plenty of speculation that whether they have another baby on the way. And Michael Buble confirmed that his actress wife Luisana Lopilato is indeed expecting, as he took to the stage at the Juno Awards on Saturday. The singer reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child.

item.title: Chilling out! Selena Gomez dons all-white tracksuit to take her pal's young son ice skating in Los Angeles
item.description: The star took her friend's son for a day of ice skating. Despite being a skating aficionado, her on/off boyfriend Justin Bieber was not present, as the couple are currently 'off' mode.
item.content:encoded:
Selena Gomez was spotted on the arm of a handsome young man on Monday.

The 25-year-old was in Los Angeles to take her friend's son ice-skating.

The singer rocked an all-white tracksuit for her date, pairing the loose fitting hoodie and sweat pants with white socks and trainers.

Date: Selena Gomez was spotted on the arm of a handsome young man on Monday

With silver hoops in her ears, her only other accessory was a solitary silver crucifix pendant, which she wore on the outside.

Not wanting to besmirch her sweater, she wore her skating admission sticker on her thigh.

Besides her phone, the Bad Liar hitmaker also carried an enormous hard copy of The Bible to read. 

Smooth: The 25-year-old was in Los Angeles to take her friend's son ice-skating

Chill: The singer rocked an all-white tracksuit for her date, pairing the loose fitting hoodie and sweat pants with white socks and trainers

Despite being a skating aficionado, her on/off boyfriend Justin Bieber was not present, as the couple are currently 'off' mode.

Reports surfaced earlier this month that Selena and Justin had ended their relationship once again.

The pair - who dated on and off from 2011 to 2015 - got back together in November and were inseparable until March.

Christian: With silver hoops in her ears, her only other accessory was a solitary silver crucifix pendant, which she wore on the outside

Light reading: Besides her phone, the Bad Liar hitmaker also carried an enormous hard copy of The Bible to read

It has been claimed the Hands To Myself hitmaker is 'taking time to herself' away from the spotlight in a bid to come to terms with the split and reconcile her relationship with her mother, who was blamed for the break-up.

'She is taking time to herself,' a source told ET. 'This is not the first time she has done this.' 

Justin meanwhile has been since romantically linked to Abby Champion's little sister, Baskin. 

Absent: Despite being a skating aficionado, her on/off boyfriend Justin Bieber was not present, as the couple are currently 'off' mode

item.title: 'I need to figure out what the purpose is': Anna Faris reveals she isn't sure if she still believes in marriage after Chris Pratt split
item.description: Anna Faris isn't sure whether she still believes in marriage. The 41-year-old actress has already tied the knot two times, to actors Ben Indra and Chris Pratt.
item.content:encoded:
Anna Faris isn't sure whether she still believes in marriage.

The 41-year-old actress has already tied the knot two times, to actors Ben Indra and Chris Pratt, and she's admitted she isn't certain if she still believes in the institution.

Anna has son Jack, five, with her estranged husband Chris.

No wedding bells?: Actress Anna Faris, pictured hand-in-hand with boyfriend Michael Barret admitted that she's unsure if she still believes in marriage

 She is currently dating cinematographer Michael Barrett.

'I need to figure out what the purpose is,' Faris, 41, said on Monday's episode of Dax Shepard's Armchair Expert podcast.

'Is it safety for your children? Is it convention? Is it so other people respect your relationship more?' she questioned.

Happier times: The 'Scary Movie' actress and ex-husband Chris Pratt have a 5-year-old son together, Jack.

'For me, I'm just not quite sure where it fits, especially when it feels so easy to get married, and then the untangling — when the state gets involved,' the actress added.

'There is the importance of how other people then treat you as a married man than as a man with a girlfriend,' she conceded of marriage.

'I do think it is important how other people respect a relationship… I'm not saying it's a good reason, but it is a small benefit of having that label of being married.'

Young and in love: The 41-year-old actress and her first husband, Ben Indra, seemed smitten in 2006

 'I am a romantic. I believe in a partnership, I believe in companionship. I just don't know if I believe in a ceremony of a wedding.'

Faris was married to Indra from 2004 to 2007. Anna and Chris, 38, were together from 2009 to August last year. 

The House Bunny star has been seeing her current boyfriend, Michael, since October of last year.

Mommy duties: Anna cradled her son Jack, 5, who she has from her second marriage to ex-husband Chris Pratt

item.title: Can we REALLY be viewing a Ewing? Former Dallas star Patrick Duffy still has a twinkle in his eye despite his thick black hair being replaced by a slicked back grey pony tail
item.description: The American actor, who's known for playing Bobby Erwing in the CBS drama Dallas, appeared on a German TV show alongside David Hasselhoff this weekend.
item.content:encoded:
With his thick black hair and tanned skin, he was the heartthrob of the Eighties.

But Patrick Duffy, now 69, looked significantly different to his pin-up days this weekend.

The American actor, who's known for playing Bobby Ewing in the CBS drama Dallas, appeared on a German TV show alongside David Hasselhoff this weekend.

Patrick Duffy's once thick black hair has has been replaced by a slicked back grey pony tail. Pictured left, as Bobby Ewing in Dallas and right, this weekend

His once thick black hair has been replaced by a slicked back grey pony tail, while his skin appeared wrinkled.

The father of two played the youngest son of Miss Ellie and the nicest brother of J.R. Ewing in Dallas, which followed the life of a wealthy and feuding Texas family, the Ewings, between 1978 and 1985.

Despite its success worldwide, Duffy, a practicing Buddhist, decided to leave the series in 1985, with his character being killed off on screen.

But his character proved so crucial to the ratings, that he reprised his role a year later.

The American actor appeared on a German TV show alongside David Hasselhoff (pictured with Duffy) this weekend

Duffy then remained with the series - directing several episodes - until its cancellation in 1991.

Duffy, who is also a singer, said last month he was unemployed for years when starting out as an actor.

He said: 'From high school on I wanted to act, that was all I wanted to do. I wasn't employed for years but I have been very fortunate and successful.' 

Duffy has been married to wife Carlyn Rosser, a professional ballet dancer 10 years his senior, for 41 years.

They have two grown up sons and four grandchildren.
item.dc:abstract: With his thick black hair and tanned skin, he was the heartthrob of the Eighties. But Patrick Duffy, now 69, looked significantly different to his pin-up days this weekend. The American actor, who's known for playing Bobby Erwing in the CBS drama Dallas, appeared on a German TV show alongside David Hasselhoff this weekend. His once thick black hair has been replaced by a slicked back grey pony tail, while his skin appeared wrinkled.

item.title: She's Charmed alright! Rose McGowan looks content as she walks arm-in-arm with mystery guy in New York
item.description: Stepping out on Monday McGowan, 44, was dressed casually in a beige hoodie and rolled up jeans with long melon colored coat over the top.
item.content:encoded:
She's not been romantically linked with anyone for quite some time.

But Rose McGowan sparked rumors of a new romance on Monday as she was seen looking affectionate with a mystery man in New York. 

The 44-year-old actress looked content as she strolled arm-in-arm with the her handsome companion. 

PDA: Rose McGowan was spotted out in New York on Monday with her arm around a mystery man

McGowan was dressed casually in a beige hoodie and rolled up jeans with long melon colored coat over the top.

She added blue-framed sunglasses and silver hoop earrings to complete the look.

Her pal sported some colorful patterned pants and a leather biker jacket with coordinating black and orange baseball cap.  

Meanwhile McGowan recorded a creepy birthday message for disgraced movie producer Harvey Weinstein last week.

'Happy birthday Harvey Weinstein. I told you we'd be coming,' she said in the chilling video, which she shot herself on her camera phone.

Casually clad: The 44-year-old actress wore a melon hued coat over a beige hoodie and rolled up jeans

'I told you 20 years ago if I heard you doing this to another girl or women, we would come for you. I would come for you. Happy f***ing birthday. From all of us.'

McGowan then blew a kiss at the camera and winked before adding: 'We win.'

It came just days after McGowan said in an interview that she believes Weinstein would like to see her dead.

'I’m sure he would prefer it if I were dead. He’s a sociopath. I am not afraid - but I should be. The people I find worse than him are his lawyers. The way they are acting has been disgusting,' McGowan told Sunday People. 

So close: The Charmed star cuddled up to the handsome gent who was dressed in snazzy colorful pants and a biker jacket

'The people around him, that have supported him in his attempt to dominate and abuse women, are monsters, just as much as he is.'

She then added: 'There is no rehabilitation for that type of soul. They just need to fall off the planet. He doesn’t believe he has done anything wrong.'  

In October McGowan accused Weinstein of raping her in a hotel room during the 1997 Sundance Film Festival and numerous accusations from other women emerged in the months following. 

Hearing: McGowan is pictured in Virginia last week for her felony cocaine possession case but the hearing was postponed
item.dc:abstract: She's not been romantically linked with anyone for a while. But Rose McGowan sparked rumors of a new romance on Monday as she was seen looking affectionate with a mystery man in New York. The 44-year-old actress looked content as she strolled arm-in-arm with the her handsome companion.

item.title: Him and I! Halsey and G-Eazy can't keep their hands off each other during a sexy performance at Miami nightclub
item.description: She's an award-winning singer breaking ground for her pop hits and quirky style. But on Saturday night, Halsey shared the stage with her rapper beau G-Eazy for a live performance in Miami.
item.content:encoded:
She's an award-winning singer breaking ground for her electro-pop hits and quirky style.

But on Saturday night, Halsey shared the stage with her rapper beau G-Eazy for a live performance at E11EVEN nightclub in Miami. 

The Him & I hitmakers were unable to keep their hands off of each other as they performed their single, which has previously reached the coveted No. 1 spot on Billboard's Top 40 chart.

Steamy on stage: Halsey and G-Eazy can't keep their hands off of each other during a live performance at a Miami nightclub on Saturday night

'Him & I': The hitmakers embraced in a passionate kiss in front of the Florida crowd

At one point, the pair - who reportedly started dating back in August - embraced in a passionate kiss in front of their fans.  

The blonde beauty showed off her sensational figure in a skin-tight white jumpsuit with lace detailing and a halter back. 

Ready to command the stage, her platinum tresses were pulled  back in a tight high bun, which she paired with dramatic eye makeup and silver hoop earrings.

Feeling the music: The 23-year-old singer showed off her sensational figure in a skin-tight bodysuit with white lace detailing 

The bombshell flashed at least eight tattoos as she belted out some of her hit songs for the Florida crowd. 

Surprising guests at the club, G-Eazy joined his lady love on the stage covered in one dollar bills.

Clad in a cotton white shirt and skinny pants, the rapper kept his arms around his girlfriend during their set. 

Can't keep his hands to himself: G-Eazy surprised club guests by joining his lady love on the stage covered in one dollar bills

Two is not a crowd: Halsey danced for her fans and kept her blonde locks tied back in a tight high bun

Supportive beau: G-Eazy - whose real name is Gerald Gillum - was ready for the stage in a white cotton shirt and tight pants 

G-Eazy - whose real name is Gerald Gillum - topped his look off with a pair of old-school Vans sneakers and a gold watch.

Outside, he added a pop of color to his all-white outfit with a red denim jacket and a trio of silver and gold chains around his neck. 

Earlier in the day, Halsey attended the March For Our Lives in Washington D.C. alongside other celebs including Demi Lovato, Miley Cyrus, and Ariana Grande. 

Ready for action: The couple arrived at E11EVEN nightclub in Miami wearing their performance-ready attire

'Today I saw the future': Earlier in the day, Halsey attended the March For Our Lives in Washington D.C. and shared a series of photos to her Instagram 

The singer shared a series of photos on her Instagram with students - including several Parkland shooting survivors.

She captioned the post: 'Today I saw the future with my own two eyes.'

She finished by including the captions '#marchforourlives' and '#neveragain.'

'#neveragain': The songwriter posed with Parkland shooting survivor Emma Gonzalez at the event attended by other celebrities including Demi Lovato, Miley Cyrus, and Ariana Grande

item.title: Couple goals! Christina Milian and boyfriend Matt Pokora playfully flirt at a charity soccer game in Glendale
item.description: Christina Milian and Matt Pokora have been dating for roughly eight months. And the couple, who were spotted on Sunday playfully flirting at a charity soccer game in Glendale, seem to be going strong.
item.content:encoded:
Christina Milian, 36, and Matt Pokora, 32, have been dating for roughly eight months. 

And the couple, who were spotted on Sunday playfully flirting at a charity soccer game for Viva Con Agua in Glendale, seem to be going strong. 

Milian's daughter Violet, eight, and mom Carmen were also present for the afternoon outing. 

Scroll down for video 

Game on! Christina Milian and boyfriend Matt Pokora were spotted on Sunday playfully flirting at a charity soccer game for Viva Con Agua in Glendale

Opposites attract! Christina donned a white jersey while Matt ran with the brown squad

The soccer match took place at the Glendale Sports Complex—a field surrounded by mountains and drenched in sunlight. 

The game was put on to benefit the organization's commitment to providing clean drinking water globally. 

Christina donned a white jersey while Matt ran with the brown squad. 

Going strong! Milian and the French crooner have been dating for roughly eight months 

Family affair! Milian's daughter Violet, eight, and mom Carmen were also present for the afternoon outing 

The Bring It On actress looked beyond smitten on the field with her new beau and it seems that her daughter and mom are just as taken with the French crooner. 

At one point Matt was seen carrying Violet across the field.

The Voice Kids France coach does not have any children of his own.  

Say cheese: The three generations of Milian women stopped to snap a photo 

Mom-daughter love: Violet also donned a brown jersey as she spent some time kicking the ball around on Sunday at the Glendale Sports Complex 

Co-parenting: Christina shares her daughter with ex-husband and producer The Dream 

Finding the one: Over the years, Christina has been linked to slew of men including Lil Wayne, Nick Cannon, and Jamie Foxx

Pokora and the Dip It Low singer were first linked back in August when they were spotted canoodling together in Saint-Tropez.  

The actress divorced The Dream in 2011 after a two-year marriage and the exes share custody of their daughter Violet.

Over the years, Christina has been linked to slew of men including Lil Wayne, Nick Cannon, and Jamie Foxx. 

New beau: Pokora and the Dip It Low singer were first linked back in August when they were spotted canoodling together in Saint-Tropez

item.title: Hailey Baldwin dons tie-dye mini dress while cradling baby on outing with Justin Bieber's pastor Chad Veach... after being seen hugging John Mayer
item.description: She has gorgeous gams and she isn't afraid to show them. On Sunday, Hailey Baldwin stepped out in an extremely short tie-dye dress to meet with Justin Bieber's pastor Chad Veach in LA.
item.content:encoded:
She has gorgeous gams and she isn't afraid to show them.

On Sunday, Hailey Baldwin stepped out in an extremely short tie-dye dress to meet with Justin Bieber's pastor Chad Veach in Los Angeles. 

The 21-year-old beauty topped her eclectic look off with an over-sized olive green coat and a pair of Louis Vuitton desert boots that retail online for $1300. 

Leggy look: Hailey Baldwin stepped out in a short tie-dye dress on Sunday to meet with her pastor in Los Angeles 

Across her body, the Drop The Mic host donned a bright red Supreme bag that kept her personal belongings close.

Stephen Baldwin's daughter went au naturel for the outing and kept her shoulder-length blonde hair straight down.

In one picture, Hailey was even seen carrying a baby clad in a white onesie as she walked with celebrity-favorite preacher Chad Veach.

Chad, who has been a mentor to young Hollywood stars including Justin Bieber and Ashley Benson - was dressed in all black for his meeting with the supermodel.  

Doting duo: The model was seen carrying a baby as she wore $1200 Louis Vuitton boots, an olive green jacket, and a red Supreme bag

Celeb-fave: The 21-year-old beauty met with Pastor Chad Veach, who has been a mentor to young Hollywood stars including Justin Bieber and Ashley Benson 

Her pastor pal contrasted her colorful look, pairing a black denim jacket over skinny jeans and a pair of suede boots. 

Later that day, the New York native was seen heading out with another male friend to get a healthy treat.

The blonde stunner was all smiles as she made her way to Go Greek Yogurt in Los Angeles. 

Sweet treat: Later in the day, Hailey headed out with another male friend to go to Go Greek Yogurt in Los Angeles 

Swapping out her eccentric attire for a more laid back look, Hailey paired a black-and-white striped turtleneck sweater with blue jeans that frayed at the hems.

The fashionista added some bright pops of color as she donned retro red sunglasses and kept on her red Supreme bag from earlier in the day.

Keeping on trend with her dressed down look, the Vogue cover girl sported a pair of white Balenciaga Triple S sneakers.  

Just days prior, Hailey sparked romance rumors as she was seen closely embracing singer John Mayer outside of Firefly in Studio City on Friday.

Warm embrace: Days earlier, Hailey was spotted giving singer John Mayer a close hug as the two left Boy Meet World star Danielle Fishel's engagement party in Los Angeles

The two were inside the popular Los Angeles restaurant celebrating Boy Meets World star Danielle Fishel's engagement to writer Jensen Karp, before heading outside with a group of friends.

But when John's car arrived ahead of the model's, they went in for a long hug before saying their goodbyes.

The interaction might be a bit of a dream come true for the 20-year-old model. In 2016, she told ES magazine: 'I am obsessed with John Mayer.'

She added: 'I love him. I just think he's so talented. I have his documentary in my iTunes. I watch it all the time. I know Continuum start to finish, every word.' 

Dream come true: In 2016, the Vogue cover girl told ES magazine that she is 'obsessed with John Mayer'

On Sunday, Hailey Baldwin stepped out in an extremely short tie-dye dress to meet with Justin Bieber's pastor Chad Veach in Los Angeles. The 21-year-old beauty topped her eclectic look off with an over-sized olive green coat and a pair of Louis Vuitton desert boots that retail online for $1300.

item.title: Twice as nice! Rosie Huntington-Whiteley turns heads in leopard print and bold tartan as she rocks two bold looks in NYC
item.description: The supermodel, 30, used the street as her very own runway as she stepped out in two stylish outfits in New York City on Sunday and Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's one of the world's top-earning catwalk queens.

And Rosie Huntington-Whiteley used the street as her very own runway as she stepped out in two stylish outfits in New York City on Sunday and Monday.

The supermodel, 30, turned heads in bold leopard print, before switching things up in a kooky cobalt blue oversized blazer the following day.   

Twice as nice: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley used the street as her very own runway as she stepped out in two stylish outfits in New York City on Sunday and Monday 

On Sunday, the former Victoria's Secret model teamed her fur coat with a chic black and gold buckled belt tied around the waist.

Rosie completed her ensemble with blue jeans, a pair of black heeled ankle boots and vintage-looking cat eye sunglasses. 

The Mad Max actress appeared to be on an important looking phone call as she made her way across the city with her hand tucked in her pocket, showing off her impressive diamond engagement ring from actor fiance Jason Statham, 50.

On Monday, the mother-of-one chose a completely different style as she showed off her enviable frame in a structured blue tartan blazer with a white ribbed top.

Wild thing: On Sunday, the former Victoria's Secret model, 30, teamed her fur coat with a chic black and gold buckled belt tied around the waist 

Bling: Rosie completed her ensemble with blue jeans, a pair of black heeled ankle boots and vintage-looking cat eye sunglasses

New York state of mind: Rosie sent her fans wild after she shared a stunning selfie of her animal print outfit to her 7.7 million Instagram followers

Kicking off her week in style, Rosie completed her businesslike look with navy blue silk tapered trousers.

The beauty styled her blonde tresses into a sleek pulled back do, while she completed the ensemble with a pair of black heeled sock boots.

Rosie, who welcomed her first child Jack Oscar Statham in June, showed signs of a hectic schedule as she carried two handbags with her - one as a side bum bag while the other a much larger bucket shaped tote.

Model business: On Monday, the mother-of-one chose a completely different style as she showed off her enviable frame in a structured blue tartan blazer with a white ribbed top

Checkmate: Kicking off her week in style, Rosie completed her businesslike look with navy blue silk tapered trousers

Rosie has shown no sign of slowing down since welcoming baby Jack and landed in fifth place on Forbes' annual list of the world's best-paid supermodels in November - with earnings of a staggering $9.5 million in just 12 months.

The supermodel attended Paris Fashion Week in February, and was spotted on the front row of several high-profile catwalk shows earlier this year.

 Rosie welcomed her first child, a son called Jack, with her fiancé Jason in June 2017.

The Marks & Spencer lingerie model has been dating the action star for almost eight years.

The pair are yet to tie the knot, despite announcing their engagement in January 2016.

Chic: The beauty styled her blonde tresses into a sleek pulled back do, while she completed the ensemble with a pair of black heeled sock boots 

Busy: The Mad Max actress appeared to be taking an important looking phone call as she made her way across New York City
item.dc:abstract: She's one of the world's top-earning catwalk queens. And Rosie Huntington-Whiteley used the street as her very own runway as she stepped out in two stylish outfits in New York City on Sunday and Monday. The supermodel, 30, turned heads in bold leopard print, before switching things up in a kooky cobalt blue oversized blazer the following day.
item.dc:creator: Louise Saunders

item.title: 'This b**** just bit Beyonce!' Tiffany Haddish reveals what really happened on the night she met the Queen Bee
item.description: After Tiffany Haddish dished on partying with Beyonce, she got called out by the pop icon.
item.content:encoded:
After Tiffany Haddish dished on partying with Beyonce, she got called out by the pop icon.

But far from silencing the Girl's Trip star, the mention on DJ Khaled's new song Top Off seems to have done the opposite.

The irrepressible 38-year-old opened up further about her night with Beyonce in a new GQ interview - revealing that a drugged up actress actually bit Queen Bee on the night in question.

'This b**** just bit Beyonce!' Tiffany Hadish reveals what really happened on the night she met the Queen Bee in a new interview with GQ

Tiffany explained: 'There was this actress there that's just, like, doing the mostest. She bit Beyonce in the face.'

As might be imagined, Beyonce wasn't happy about this. 

Continued Tiffany: 'So Beyonce stormed away, went up to Jay-Z, and was like, "Jay! Come here! This b****..." and snatched him. They went to the back of the room. I was like, "What just happened?" And Beyoncé's friend walked up and was like, "Can you believe this b**** just bit Beyonce?"'

Tiffany says that the mystery actress then crossed her path - telling her to stop dancing, despite the gathering being an afterparty at one of Jay Z's gigs.

Warning! Tiffany Haddish was previously called out by Beyonce in new song Top Off after the comedian spilled party drama; the two are seen in a selfie that night

In DJ Khaled's new song Top Off, Queen Bey seemed to address her interaction with Haddish when she rapped, 'If they’re tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure'; she is pictured with Jay Z at the bash

Tiffany then approached Beyonce, who she had only met for the first time that evening. 

She said she told her: 'I'm going to beat somebody ass at your party. I just want to let you know that.' 

Beyonce told her not to, and said of the actress: 'That b**** is on drugs. She not even drunk. The b**** is on drugs. She not like that all the time. Just chill.'

The interview updates a previous mention Tiffany gave in an interview about the superstar, in which she went into less detail. 

In response in DJ Khaled's new song Top Off, Queen Bey said the actresses name and rapped, 'If they’re tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure.' 

Opening up: Tiffany's interview appears in the new edition of GQ, out now

In her first interview Tiffany said she had witnessed the singer act possessively when the unidentified actress placed her hand on Jay Z's chest.

But the Girls Trip star doesn't seem to be too worried that she has burned the friendship bridge with her idol. 

'Everything she said rang so real to me,' she said in a tweet after the song was released. 'Just know I will sign an NDA any day for Beyoncé. But also know this I will fight for Beyoncé. I love that woman she is a gift from God,'
item.dc:abstract: After Tiffany Haddish dished on partying with Beyonce, she got called out by the pop icon. But far from silencing the Girl's Trip star, the mention on DJ Khaled's new song Top Off seems to have done the opposite. The irrepressible 38-year-old opened up further about her night with Beyonce in a new GQ interview - revealing that a drugged up actress actually bit Queen Bee on the night in question.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Tiffany Haddish reveals what really happened when she met Beyonce

item.title: 'I worry she'll reject my version of Mary Poppins': Emily Blunt admits she's nervous her daughter Hazel, four, won't enjoy remake
item.description: She's admitted to being nervous about how her children - Hazel, four, and 21-month-old Violet - will react when they watch her performance.
item.content:encoded:
Tough critic: Emily Blunt with her daughter Hazel last year

Emily Blunt worries her daughters won't enjoy her portrayal of Mary Poppins.

The London-born actress is playing the iconic English nanny in an upcoming Disney film, but she's admitted to being nervous about how her children - Hazel, four, and 21-month-old Violet - will react when they watch her performance.

Emily - who is married to American actor John Krasinski - shared: 'Hazel loves Julie [Andrews] so much that I worry she's just gonna reject my version of Mary Poppins. 

'I think it's strange for the kids of actors to see their parents in stuff... I think it's weird for Hazel 'cause she's also young - they're really young, my kids, and so it's disconcerting for them to see you as someone else behaving in a way that's not natural.'

The upcoming 'Mary Poppins Returns' also features an appearance from Academy Award-winning actress Meryl Streep.

The duo both previously starred alongside each other in 2006's 'The Devil Wears Prada', and Emily has joked that the acclaimed actress is now stalking her.

Teasing Meryl's role in the new film, Emily told Entertainment Tonight: 'We have really set a tone that we never play characters that like each other very much. And so we are continuing with that tradition in this.

Remake: Emily Blunt stars as the magical nanny in the upcoming Mary Poppins returns

'I don't know if we could ever play like best pals in something. It's just not what works for Meryl and I.'

'The Devil Wears Prada' remains one of the highlights of Emily's career.

But the 35-year-old beauty has revealed she's never really spoken about the film - which also features Anne Hathaway - with her co-stars, even though fans have been calling for a sequel for more than a decade.

She said: 'It's so funny because, you know, we don't tend to talk about work that much. You know, actors don't end up talking about work that much.'

Original: Julie Andrews with  Dick Van Dyke, Karen Dotrice and Matthew Garber
item.dc:abstract: Emily Blunt worries her daughters won't enjoy her portrayal of Mary Poppins. The London-born actress is playing the iconic English nanny in an upcoming Disney film, but she's admitted to being nervous about how her children - Hazel, four, and 21-month-old Violet - will react when they watch her performance. Emily - who is married to American actor John Krasinski - shared: 'Hazel loves Julie [Andrews] so much that I worry she's just gonna reject my version of Mary Poppins.
item.dc:creator: Natalie Trombetta
item.mi:shortTitle: Emily Blunt is nervous daughter Hazel won't enjoy Mary Poppins remake

item.title: Gorgeous in gym gear! Karlie Kloss looks flawless in clinging leggings and coat as she struts her stuff down the street in New York
item.description: Karlie Kloss is an international supermodel that gets to wear stunning clothes from world-renowned designers. But the 25-year-old cover girl can even make gym clothes look fashionable.
item.content:encoded:
Karlie Kloss is an international supermodel that gets to wear some of the most stunning clothes from world-renowned designers.

But the 25-year-old cover girl can even make regular gym clothes look fashionable.

The blonde beauty looked like she could have been on a runway Monday as she made her way down a New York City street in her chic workout attire.

Runway ready: Karlie Kloss made her gym clothes look fashionable as she walked down an NYC street on Monday 

The Victoria's Secret model looked flawless in a black puffer jacket with blue lining over a light grey sweatshirt.

The natural beauty flaunted her toned legs in charcoal grey workout leggings and sported a pair of printed lace-up sneakers.

She had her hands full as she held on to an empty cup, a bottled drink, a small black Yves Saint Laurent clutch and her phone.

Flawless: The supermodel tied her hair back in a St. Louis Cardinals baseball cap and kept a pair of dark aviator sunglasses over her eyes

Keeping her look undercover chic, the international model topped her ensemble off with dark aviator sunglasses.

The Kode With Klossy founder tied her blonde locks back in a black St. Louis Cardinals baseball cap, but later let her shoulder-length tresses down. 

Karlie - who often works out at celebrity favorite gym, Dogpound - isn't shy about showing off her intense workouts.

Fitness fiend: The Vogue cover girl teamed up a black puffer jacket with a grey hoodie and leggings that showed off her toned assets 

Letting it go: The entrepreneur untied her shoulder-length blonde tresses and combed her fingers through her hair 

No excuses: Karlie shared a series of workout videos to her Instagram that showed off her intense workouts 

Proving she earns her sensational figure, the model posted a series of videos to her Instagram on Friday that showed just what she does during her training sessions.

In one video, the entrepreneur was seen toning her back as she pulled a weighted cable. The post read: 'Best way to get your heart rate up.'

In another, Karlie showed how she gets her washboard abs as she thrust her feet into the air.

Celebrity favorite: Karlie often works out at Dogpound, which is loved by a number of A-list stars

Earning her tacos: The supermodel is known for her sensational figure, but even she has to work to earn her favorite treats

Showing off her humorous side, Karlie completed a rope exercise in another video and wrote: 'When you know there are tacos in your future.' 

On Saturday, the supermodel skipped the gym to attend the March For Our Lives in Washington D.C.

The stunner attended the event with her boyfriend Joshua Kushner - who is Trump son-in-law Jared Kushner's younger brother.

Making a statement: On Saturday, the blonde beauty attended the March For Our Lives with her boyfriend of nearly six years, Joshua Kushner - who is Jared Kushner's younger brother 

The model made a statement in a bright blue hoodie that displayed the words March For Our Lives' across the chest. 

She also wore an orange ribbon that stood for remembrance and a white button proudly by her shoulder. 

The private couple have been dating for nearly six years. 

Remembrance: The Victoria's Secret model wore a blue hoodie with the words 'March For Our Lives' displayed across the chest
item.dc:abstract: Karlie Kloss is an international supermodel that gets to wear some of the most stunning clothes from world-renowned designers. But the 25-year-old cover girl can even make regular gym clothes look fashionable. The blonde beauty looked like she could have been on a runway as she made her way down a New York City street in her chic workout attire on Monday.
item.dc:creator: Justin Enriquez

item.title: Afternoon delight! Lady Gaga rocks studded leather jacket on coffee run in Malibu with fiance Christian Carino
item.description: The 31-year-old singing sensation kept warm in a black leather jacket as she followed her fiance Christian Carino out of the coffeehouse near the western end of the upscale beach community.
item.content:encoded:
She's been on the mend since canceling her last string of concerts for her Joanne World Tour due to 'severe pain'.

But Lady Gaga seemed to be in good spirits as she was spotted leaving a Starbucks in Malibu on Sunday afternoon.

The 31-year-old singing sensation kept warm in a black leather jacket as she followed her fiance Christian Carino out of the coffeehouse near the western end of the upscale beach community. 

Scroll down for video 

Out and about! Lady Gaga seemed to be in good spirits as she was spotted leaving a Starbucks in Malibu on Sunday afternoon

Her ornate leather coat featured a splattering of silver studs across her shoulders, with leopard print sleeves beginning below her biceps.

Gaga - whose real name is Stefani Germanotta - kept with the dark theme as she sported a pair of tight black trousers and matching booties.

She tied up half of her platinum blonde hair, with tendrils cascading down her face as she peered out from behind dark cat-eye sunglasses.

Lovers in LA: The 31-year-old singing sensation kept warm in a black leather jacket as she followed her fiance Christian Carino out of the coffeehouse near the western end of the upscale beach community

Style: Her ornate leather coat featured a splattering of silver studs across her shoulders, with leopard print sleeves beginning below her biceps

The Edge of Glory songstress carried a large coffee cup in one hand as she showed off her massive diamond engagement ring.

She followed closely behind her talent agent beau Christian, who kept one hand in the pocket of his grey jeans.

Carino rolled up the sleeves of his black sweater for their quick coffee run, and kept his salt-and-pepper-colored hair covered with a woven fedora. 

Caffeine: Gaga - whose real name is Stefani Germanotta - kept with the dark theme as she sported a pair of tight black trousers and matching booties

Cute: She tied up half of her platinum blonde hair, with tendrils cascading down her face as she peered out from behind dark cat-eye sunglasses

Sparkling: The Edge of Glory songstress carried a large coffee cup in one hand as she showed off her massive diamond engagement ring

While Gaga reportedly became engaged over the summer, she did not want to make an announcement as she was battling fibromyalgia, the chronic condition that resulted in her cancelling the final dates of the European leg of her Joanne World Tour in February.

A statement released by Live Nation following the cancelation claimed the singer was 'suffering from severe pain that has materially impacted her ability to perform live.

'As a result, Live Nation and Lady Gaga are announcing the cancellation of the final 10 dates of the European leg of her Joanne World Tour.  

'Last night, with strong support from her medical team, Lady Gaga made the tough decision to immediately come off the road. She is extremely sorry and deeply saddened that she cannot perform for her European fans, who have waited so patiently.

'​She is in the care of expert medical professionals who are working closely with her so she can continue to perform for her fans for years to come.' 

Whisked away: Carino rolled up the sleeves of his black sweater for their quick coffee run, and kept his salt-and-pepper-colored hair covered with a woven fedora

But Lady Gaga seemed to be in good spirits as she was spotted leaving a Starbucks in Malibu on Sunday afternoon. The 31-year-old singing sensation kept warm in a black leather jacket as she followed her fiance Christian Carino out of the coffeehouse near the western end of the upscale beach community.

item.title: Jenna Dewan's sweet daughter Everly, four, enjoys her first Kids' Choice Awards as she watches dad Channing Tatum be pelted with snowballs during fun ceremony
item.description: With the multi-talented Jenna Dewan and Channing Tatum as parents, little Everly Tatum was bound to make her awards show debut at some point.
item.content:encoded:
With the multi-talented Jenna Dewan and Channing Tatum as parents, little Everly Tatum was bound to make her awards show debut at some point.

And Everly, four, certainly chose a fun event at which to spend her Saturday, hitting the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards at The Forum in Inglewood, California.

Jenna held hands with her adorable mini-me as they took their seats at the star-studded ceremony, where Channing was presenting an award.

Family day out! Jenna Dewan was joined by her daughter Everly, four, at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards at The Forum in Inglewood, California on Saturday

Everly matched the colourful event with her outfit, looking sweet in a purple and green number.

Her mum meanwhile showed off her dancer figure in a AO.LA by alice + olivia tight denim jumpsuit paired with gold jewellery.

Channing was also at the event, teaming up with Zendya and Black-ish actress Yara Shahidi for some fun and games.

Taking aim!Everly's dad Channing was also at the event, taking to the stage for a mass snowball fight at the notoriously messy awards do

The trio were showered in fake snowfall and pummeled with snowballs as they came out to give a lengthy description of their new animated feature Smallfoot.    

Jenna and Channing, both 37, met on the set of their film Step Up in 2006. They began dating shortly after filming for the movie wrapped and became engaged in Maui September 2008.

They got married on July 11, 2009, at Church Estates Vineyards in Malibu, California and Dewan gave birth to daughter Everly a few years later in London during May 2013. 

Target: The actor was showered in fake snowfall and pummeled with snowballs as he came out to give a lengthy description of new animated feature Smallfoot

Talented trio: Channing teamed up with his Smallfoot co-stars Black-ish actress Yara Shahidi and Zendya

Defence mode! The athletic star defended himself from snowballs while also rocketing several cold ones into the crowd

Speaking to People, Jenna explained it's a finely tuned juggling act balancing motherhood with work and her life with Channing. 

'I think it's important to be conscious about giving everyone equal attention,' she said.

'I'll think, "Okay, I've been with my daughter a lot, so Channing and I need a date night".' 

She added, 'Some days I am better at it than others, but I just try to figure it out. Like everyone else! But I do think it's important to consciously think about it.'

Cheeky! Channing shared a sweet Insta shot last week, showing the aftermath of artistic Everly's face painting session
item.dc:abstract: With the multi-talented Jenna Dewan and Channing Tatum as parents, little Everly Tatum was bound to make her awards show debut at some point. And Everly, four, certainly chose a fun event at which to spend her Saturday, hitting the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards at The Forum in Inglewood, California.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Crawley

item.title: Newly-single Alessandra Ambrosio flashes plenty of sideboob in dazzling velvet gown as she attends amfAR charity gala in Hong Kong
item.description: The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps.
item.content:encoded:
She recently confirmed her split with fiance Jamie Mazur after 10 years together.

Following the news, Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios. 

The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps.

Scroll down for video 

Head-turning: Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios

The fashion star's velvet gown perilously plunged down her back in dramatic style, highlighting her incredible figure and narrow torso.

Proudly flaunting her gym-honed figure, the former VS Angel paired her head-turning look with a pair of statement drop diamond earrings and dazzling diamond rings.

She kept to her glamorous display by working her long brunette locks into a sleek style slicked back of her face while sporting a vibrant red lip to tie the formal attire together. 

Eye-popping: The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps

Mane attraction: She kept to her glamorous display by working her long brunette locks into a sleek style slicked back of her face while sporting a vibrant red lip to tie the formal attire together

Her dazzling red carpet arrival comes after news broke earlier this month that the catwalk queen split with her fiance of 10 years, Jamie Mazur.

The shocking split has yet to be confirmed by the Brazilian beauty who shares two children - daughter Anja, nine, and son Noah, five - with the businessman.

'They [have] been trying to keep their split on the down low,' an insider told Us Weekly.

Striking: The fashion star's velvet gown perilously plunged down her back in dramatic style, highlighting her incredible figure and narrow torso

Model behaviour: Proudly flaunting her gym-honed figure, the former VS Angel paired her head-turning look with a pair of statement drop diamond earrings and dazzling diamond rings alongside fellow model Shanina Shaik

'But Alessandra has been out and about ready to mingle and hasn't been taking Jamie to anything.'

Alessandra retired from walking the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show catwalk in 2017 after nearly two decades on the famous runway.

She explained to Entertainment Tonight why she was ending her nearly 20-year career with the lingerie powerhouse, saying: 'Victoria’s Secret is my family, but you know it’s time to move on. Momma is tired.'

Moving on: Her dazzling red carpet arrival comes after news broke earlier this month that the catwalk queen split with her fiance of 10 years, Jamie Mazur
item.dc:abstract: She recently confirmed her split with fiance Jamie Mazur after 10 years together. Following the news, Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios.

item.title: 'You sound awful!': Bella Thorne was 'devastated' when her boyfriend said he 'hated' her song
item.description: The 20-year-old singer-and-actress learned never to date someone who wouldn't 'motivate or encourage' her after having her music trashed by a guy she was romantically involved with.
item.content:encoded:
Bella Thorne was devastated when her boyfriend told her he 'hated' one of her songs.

The 20-year-old singer-and-actress learned never to date someone who wouldn't 'motivate or encourage' her after having her music trashed by a guy she was romantically involved with, because his cruel comments left her feeling 'like s**t'. 

She recalled: 'If you're dating someone that's not going to motivate you or encourage you, don't date them. 

'I dated somebody and sent him a song that I recorded and he was like, "This is honestly not very good at all. I'm sorry. I kind of hate this song. You sound awful."

'You sound awful!': Bella Thorne was 'devastated' when her boyfriend said he 'hated' her song; she is seen in 2012 performing as a singer 

'I was like, 'That feels like s**t. That hurts on the inside, man.

'It's the worst thing when you're dating somebody who is just like, "You're s**t."'

The Midnight Sun actress - who is now dating rapper Mod Sun - recalled her first crush was on a guy she used to do modelling assignments with.

She told Us Weekly magazine: 'There was this boy that I worked with a bunch in modelling. I kept working with this boy and I thought he was so cute at the time.'

Moved on: The Midnight Sun actress is now dating rapper Mod Sun, who she said was much more supportive than his unnamed ex; they are seen last week

Bella recently admitted her current relationship has changed her outlook on life because Mod Sun is such a positive person.

She said: 'Meeting someone that's just so happy, you know that's kind of his whole thing, and for me [as] someone who's a little bit glass half empty, it really is nice for me to have someone on my back that's like, 'No, it's good, it's good, it's good,' even when it's bad.

'You're always your harshest critic.

'[But now] when I see me going toward the negative I'm like, "Bella, go toward the positive."'

Learnt her lesson: Bella says she now seeks out more positive people; she is seen in 2012
item.dc:abstract: Bella Thorne was devastated when her boyfriend told her he 'hated' one of her songs. The 20-year-old singer-and-actress learned never to date someone who wouldn't 'motivate or encourage' her after having her music trashed by a guy she was romantically involved with, because his cruel comments left her feeling 'like s**t'. She recalled: 'If you're dating someone that's not going to motivate you or encourage you, don't date them. You should straight up just be out of the relationship right then and there.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Bella Thorne was devastated when boyfriend said he 'hated' her song

item.title: She's all heart! Mila Kunis sports love-themed sweater and skinny jeans as she runs errands in LA
item.description: The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears.
item.content:encoded:
Mila Kunis showed off her slender figure Monday as she ran errands in Los Angeles.

The actress and mom-of-two paired a dark blue sweater decorated with pink hearts with skinny blue jeans.

Keeping it casual, she went sock-less in a pair of white trainers.

On the go: Mila Kunis showed off her slender figure Monday as she ran errands in Los Angeles

The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears.

She was made up with foundation and blush and sported black mascara on her lashes.

She completed her look with dark pink lip color. 

Looking good: The actress and mom-of-two paired a dark blue sweater decorated with pink hearts with skinny blue jeans

Running errands: She was made up with foundation and blush and sported black mascara on her lashes. She completed her look with dark pink lip color

 Working mom: Keeping it casual, Mila went sock-less in a pair of white trainers

Busy day: The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears

The 34-year-old is a doting mother to daughter Wyatt, three, and son Dimitri, one.

But, she revealed during a recent appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, the pair are very different.  

'My boy’s like a sloth. He’s wonderful, and I love him — ’cause one day he’ll probably watch this and be like, 'Why did you say that?' - but the truth is, women are smarter than men,' she said.  'And I have this evidence from my two different humans that I created.'

Mila explained: 'Girls are just like, on it and boys are like, dum dum dum. They’re just like a little bit more like little linebackers going through life and like Neanderthal-ish.'

Mila and Ashton have been married for nearly three years after tying the knot in July 2015.

The actor, 40, was previously married for eight years to actress Demi Moore. 

Sharing news: Mila Kunis, left, dished about the differences between her one-year-old son Dimitri and daughter Wyatt, three, on The Ellen DeGeneres Show last week, pictured with Kate McKinnon
item.dc:abstract: Mila Kunis showed off her slender figure Monday as she ran errands in Los Angeles. The actress and mom-of-two paired a dark blue sweater decorated with pink hearts with skinny blue jeans. Keeping it casual, she went sock-less in a pair of white trainers.

item.title: 'You're a TV movie': Steven Spielberg claims Netflix films shouldn't qualify for Oscar nominations and warns it poses 'clear danger to cinema-goers'
item.description: The directing legend said that films released by the video-streaming service are essentially just 'TV movies' and aren't worthy of Academy Awards.
item.content:encoded:
Steven Spielberg has said Netflix movies should not qualify for Oscar nominations.

The directing legend said that films released by the video-streaming service are essentially just 'TV movies', adding that studios would rather make tent-pole movies than take a chance on smaller productions, thus potentially threatening the future of theatrical movie-making.

Viewing Netflix, as well as other streaming services such as Hulu and Amazon, as television platforms, he told ITV: 'Once you commit to a television format, you’re a TV movie. If it’s a good show, you deserve an Emmy. But not an Oscar.' 

Not impressed! Steven Spielberg has said Netflix movies should not qualify for Oscar nominations and added they 'pose a clear danger to film-goers'

He added: 'A lot of studios would rather just make branded, tent-pole, guaranteed box office hits from their inventory of branded successful movies than take chances on smaller films. 

'Those smaller films that studios used to make routinely are now going to Amazon and Netflix.' 

The Ready Player One director did praise TV as being the 'best it's ever been', enthusing: 'There's better writing, better directing, better performance, better stories. 

Ouch! The directing legend said that films released by the video-streaming service are essentially just 'TV movies'

'Television is really thriving with quality and heart but it's posed as a clear, present danger to film-goers.'

The directing legend went on to warn: 'I'm just saying that fewer and fewer filmmakers are going to struggle to raise money or to compete at Sundance or possibly get one of the specialty labels to release their films theatrically, publicly.

'More of them are going to let the SVOD [Streaming or Subscription Video on demand] businesses finance their films, maybe with the promise of a slight one-week theatrical window to qualify them for awards as a movie.'

Oscars success: This year's Oscars ceremony saw Netflix's Mudbound nominated for three awards, including Best Supporting Actress and Best Cinematography

He continued: 'I don’t believe that films that are given token qualifications, in a couple of theaters for less than a week, should qualify for Academy Award nominations.'

This year's Oscars ceremony saw Netflix's Mudbound nominated for three awards, including Best Supporting Actress and Best Cinematography, the same year Spielberg's The Post was up for Best Picture and Best Actress. 

Despite its Academy Awards success, Mudbound was only released for a week in cinemas located in New York and Los Angeles.

New flick: Steven was speaking ahead of the release of his latest movie Ready Player One
item.dc:abstract: Steven Spielberg has said Netflix movies should not qualify for Oscar nominations. The directing legend said that films released by the video-streaming service are essentially just 'TV movies', adding that studios would rather make tent-pole movies than take a chance on smaller productions, thus potentially threatening the future of theatrical movie-making. Viewing Netflix, as well as other streaming services such as Hulu and Amazon, as television platforms, he told ITV: 'Once you commit to a television format, you’re a TV movie. If it’s a good show, you deserve an Emmy. But not an Oscar.'

item.title: Beyonce bite drama: Sara Foster and actress Sanaa Lathan hit back at the beehive and deny speculation they are the culprits
item.description: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her relevation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party.
item.content:encoded:
Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her revelation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party.

And Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan and model Sara Foster, ex step-sister of Bella and Gigi Hadid, to deny rumours that they are the culprits.

Girls' Trip actress Tiffany started the drama when she told the April edition of GQ that music icon Beyonce was bit by a fellow reveller at a private afterparty following Jay Z's performance at The Forum in Los Angeles in December.

Detective work: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her revelation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party, prompting her fans to accuse two actresses

Tiffany has refused to name the culprit, meaning Bey's loyal fanbase have turned detective. 

Fans found the guest list from the event and concluded that it could have been The Best Man actress Sanaa, 46, commenting with bumblebee emojis on Lathan's social media.

Sanna broke her silence on Monday night, tweeting: 'Y'all are funny. Under no circumstances did I bite Beyoncé and if I did it would've been a love bite.'

Accused: Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan to deny rumours she is the culprit

Not me! Sanna broke her silence on Monday night, tweeting: 'Y'all are funny. Under no circumstances did I bite Beyoncé and if I did it would've been a love bite.'

Not convinced: The declaration of love for Beyonce only prompting still-suspicious fans to respond with a string of hilarious memes

The declaration of love for Beyonce only prompted still-suspicious fans to respond with a string of hilarious memes, including OJ Simpson gifs from those who took note of Sanaa's 'if I did it' line.

Model and 90210 actress Sara Foster also denied she played any part in the incident on Instagram, writing:

'Flattering that anyone thinks I could get this close to Beyoncé,' alongside a screen shot of an email she had received from a journalist. 

Under suspicion: Model and 90210 actress Sara Foster also denied she played any part in the incident after fans found out she was on the party guestlist 

Denial: 'Flattering that anyone thinks I could get this close to Beyoncé,' alongside a screen shot of an email she had received from a journalist

While Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman who bit Beyonce, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity.

Chrissy Teigen was one of the first, tweeting: 'I cannot leave this planet without knowing who bit Beyonce in the face.'

She then followed this up with: 'I can only think of one person who would do this. but I cannot say. but she....is the worst.'

Who bit Beyonce's face? Online frenzy followed Tiffany Haddish's shock revelation... as Chrissy Teigen tweeted 'You'd NEVER guess who it is!'

However after finding out who the actress with vampire-like tendencies actually was, Chrissy expressed her shock.

'My initial guess was wrong. The real person? I *never* would have guessed. I'VE SAID TOO MUCH.'

But while Chrissy wasn't able to name the alleged biter, Twitter wasn't so reticent, with fans all jumping to name actresses they thought could be to blame.

Warning! Tiffany was previously called out by Beyonce in new song Top Off after the comedian spilled party drama; the two are seen in a selfie that night

The debate was started when Tiffany opened up to GQ about the memorable December party, saying the actress appeared high on drugs.

Tiffany explained: 'There was this actress there that's just, like, doing the mostest. She bit Beyonce in the face.'

As might be imagined, Beyonce wasn't happy about this. 

Continued Tiffany: 'So Beyonce stormed away, went up to Jay-Z, and was like, 'Jay! Come here! This b****...' and snatched him. They went to the back of the room. I was like, 'What just happened?' And Beyoncé's friend walked up and was like, 'Can you believe this b**** just bit Beyonce?''

Tiffany says that the mystery actress then crossed her path - telling her to stop dancing.

Tiffany then approached Beyonce, who she had met for the first time that evening.

The irrepressible 38-year-old said she told her: 'I'm going to beat somebody a** at your party. I just want to let you know that.'

Beyonce told her not to, and said of the actress: 'That b**** is on drugs. She not even drunk. The b**** is on drugs. She not like that all the time. Just chill.'

The interview updates Tiffany's previous description of meeting the superstar, in which she went into less detail.

In it Tiffany said she had witnessed the singer act possessively when the unidentified actress placed her hand on Jay Z's chest. 

In response on DJ Khaled's recent song Top Off, Queen Bey called out Tiffany, saying her name and rapping, 'If they're tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure.' 

But the Girls Trip star doesn't seem to be too worried that she has burned the friendship bridge with her idol. 

'Everything she said rang so real to me,' she said in a tweet after the song was released. 'Just know I will sign an NDA any day for Beyoncé. But also know this I will fight for Beyoncé. I love that woman she is a gift from God,'

Opening up: Tiffany's interview appears in the new edition of GQ, out now
item.dc:abstract: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her relevation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party. And Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan and Sara Foster, the sister of top models Bella and Gigi, to deny rumours that they were the culprits. Girls' Trip actress Tiffany started the drama when she told the April edition of GQ that music icon Beyonce was bit by a fellow reveller at a private afterparty following Jay Z's performance at The Forum in Los Angeles in December.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Crawley
item.mi:shortTitle: Beyonce bite drama: Sara Foster and Sanaa Lathan both deny accusations

item.title: No sweat! Newly single Gigi Hadid keeps things casual in grey hoodie and matching joggers while jetting out of LAX
item.description: She's newly single. So the statuesque stunner, 22, wasn't worried about flying solo from LAX Monday, where she kept a low profile as she made her way through the busy airport.
item.content:encoded:
She's newly single since splitting with singer Zayn Malik.

So Gigi Hadid wasn't worried about flying solo from LAX Monday, where she kept a low profile as she made her way through the busy airport.

The statuesque stunner, 22, covered up in a denim jacket teamed with a subdued sweatsuit while through the terminal and on to her flight.

Flying under the radar! Gigi Hadid kept a low profile while flying out of LAX Monday, where she sported a comfortable sweatsuit and denim jacket

Adding a bit of polish, the IMG repped model put pointy eggshell-hued boots on foot.

The star, who split from beau Zayn earlier this month, masked her beautiful blue-green eyes behind trendy sci-fi shades and carried a chic black envelope clutch under on arm.

The star kept her face at a makeup-free glow with well-groomed eyebrows and a tidy bun.

It seemed like Gigi, given name Jelena, was preparing for a trip abroad, as she kept her passport in hand.  

She's a natural! The IMG model kept her face at a makeup-free glow with well-groomed eyebrows and a tidy bun

Walking on eggshells! Adding a bit of polish, the 22-year-old beauy pointy eggshell-hued boots on foot

Gigi appeared focused on work, just weeks after confirming her split with boyfriend-of-two-years Zayn Malik.

On March 13, Zayn confirmed their shock split in a statement on Twitter which read: 'Gigi and I had an incredibly meaningful, loving and fun relationship and I have a huge amount of respect and adoration for Gigi as a woman and a friend. She has such an incredible soul.

'I'm grateful to all of our fans for respecting this difficult decision and our privacy at this time, we wish this news could have come from us first. We love you all. xZ.'

Gigi released her own statement on the micro-blogging site, writing: 'Breakup statements often seem impersonal because there is really no way to put into words what two people experience together over a few years.. not only in the relationship, but in life in general. 

Keeping herself busy: Gigi appeared focused on work, just weeks after confirming her split with boyfriend-of-two-years Zayn Malik on March 12

Fake news! Days after the split, the star posted a searing statement addressing rumors swirling around the break-up, writing: 'Can’t believe that in 2018 the press can still make up & print false stories... but more sad that people still continue to believe that trash

'I'm forever grateful for the love, time, and life lessons that Z and I shared. I want nothing but the best for him and will continue to support him as a friend that I have immense respect and love for. As for the future, whatever's meant to be will always be. xG.'

Days after the split, the star posted a searing statement addressing rumors swirling around the break-up, writing: 'Can’t believe that in 2018 the press can still make up & print false stories ... but more sad that people still continue to believe that trash.

'Click-bait & headlines are made to create drama where there is none when outlets have nothing else to write about..that’s not jounralism 

Since then the starlet's kept her social media offerings on the professional side, last sharing a picture of her watch collection with designer Tommy Hilfiger.

Watch out! Since her split with beau Zayn, the starlet's kept her social media offerings on the professional side, last sharing a picture of her watch collection with designer Tommy Hilfiger

So Gigi Hadid wasn't worried about flying solo from LAX Monday, where she kept a low profile as she made her way through the busy airport. The statuesque stunner, 22, covered up in a denim jacket teamed with a subdued sweatsuit while through the terminal and on to her flight.

item.title: Plenty to Kroes about! Model Doutzen showcases her natural beauty as she sports chic tan coat for new L'Oreal shoot in Paris
item.description: The catwalk queen, 33, proved to maintain her impressive modelling talent as she filmed an upcoming L'Oreal commercial in Paris' Broken Arm Cafe on Monday afternoon.
item.content:encoded:
She's made a name for herself as one of the world's leading fashion models.

And Doutzen Kroes proved to maintain her impressive talent as she filmed an upcoming L'Oreal commercial in Paris' Broken Arm Cafe on Monday afternoon.

The catwalk queen, 33, cut a sophisticated figure during the shoot, as she donned a chic suede mac coat, teamed with a comfy pair of trainers.

All eyes on her: Doutzen Kroes proved to maintain her impressive modelling talent as she filmed an upcoming L'Oreal commercial in Paris' Broken Arm Cafe on Monday afternoon

As she headed to the set, the Dutch star covered herself in a cobalt blue towel to wrap up against the French city's chilly climes.

The mother-of-two flaunted her naturally striking beauty for the shoot, adding a pop of colour to her look with a slash of dark purple lipstick.

In order to reveal her radiant appearance, Doutzen's hair was styled into a slick ponytail.

Working it! The catwalk queen, 33, cut a sophisticated figure during the shoot, as she donned a chic suede mac coat, teamed with a comfy pair of trainers

On her way: As she headed to the set, the Dutch star covered herself in a cobalt blue towel to wrap up against the French city's chilly climes 

While working her magic on set, the L'Oréal Paris ambassador struck a series of poses, which included taking a selfie on a mobile phone, as well as blowing a kiss for the cameras.  

The fitness enthusiast was joined by models Duckie Thot, Luma Grothe and Alexina Graham. 

Doutzen hung up her prestigious Victoria's Secret wings back in 2015 to focus on her family. 

In an interview with Vogue UK in 2016, the leggy star shared the details of her career move: 'Victoria’s Secret gave me a lot, but I had to move on and do different things.' 

Stunning: The mother-of-two flaunted her naturally striking features for the shoot as she styled into a slick ponytail - giving the floor to her radiant beauty

Working her angles:  The L'Oréal Paris ambassador struck a series of poses, which included taking a selfie on a mobile phone, as well as blowing a kiss for the cameras

Speaking on her bond with her catwalk pals, she gushed: 'Adriana (Lima), Candice (Swanepoel), Karlie (Kloss), Joan (Smalls) – I don’t want to leave anyone out! We built amazing relationships.' 

'What’s so great is that there is always someone in the world that I know. Every fashion country I go to, there is someone there that I can spend time with.'  

The blonde beauty unveiled the secret behind her sensational appearance in a recent discussion with Pop Sugar.

'Balance is my secret. I simply take the time to recharge. Healthy food, sport and wellbeing have always been fundamental in my life. They are my motto.'

Star-studded: The fitness enthusiast was joined by models Duckie Thot, Luma Grothe and Alexina Graham

Auburn beauty: Alexina accentuated her slender frame in a ribbed burgundy jumper and a striped skater skirt, embellished with a dipped hem

item.title: 'I hear crazy things!' Khloe Kardashian reveals she's 'nervous' about breastfeeding as her April due date looms ever-closer
item.description: After one fan commented about the not-so-sexy reality of breastfeeding under a steamy Instagram of her and beau Tristan Thompson, Khlo said: 'Oh my gosh lol I'm nervous... I hear crazy things.'
item.content:encoded:
She's excited for the arrival of her first daughter in April.

But Khloe Kardashian explained that there's one upcoming pregnancy task she's 'nervous' about: breastfeeding.

After one fan commented about the not-so-sexy reality of breastfeeding under a steamy Instagram of her with beau Tristan Thompson, Khlo responded, saying: 'Oh my gosh lol I'm nervous... I hear crazy things but I'll fight through it and love it.'

Anxious about that! Khloe Kardashian explained she's 'nervous' about breastfeeding while having a conversation with one of her Instagram followers in the comments section of a sexy photo, above

As Khloe happily flaunted her full chest in an alluring set of lingerie, one Instagram follower told the starlet to be thankful for her current breasts.

'When you start breastfeeding [it's] going to be major leakage and then [you're] not going to want to see those boobs anymore,' wrote the fan.

'Breastfeeding is no joke but it is a beautiful thing and a great bonding experience with your baby.'

The Good American Jeans took things in stride, but admitted: 'Oh my gosh lol I'm nervous about breastfeeding. I hear crazy things but I'll fight through it and love it.'

Flaunt 'em while you got 'em! As Khloe showed off her full chest in an alluring set of lingerie, one Instagram follower told the starlet to be thankful for her current breasts, explaining 'When you start breastfeeding... [you're] not going to want to see those boobs anymore'

Nervous, but ready: The Good American Jeans co-founder (above in an Instagram last week) took things in stride, but admitted: 'Oh my gosh lol I'm nervous about breastfeeding. I hear crazy things but I'll fight through it and love it'

Earlier in the day the Revenge Body hostess mused about what her little girl was going to be like on her premium subscription-based website, saying: 'She'll be the perfect mix of me and Tristan—which is such a crazy thought, LOL.'

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star said that she hoped the bouncing baby girl will get her style and work ethic from her.

Khloe insisted that she would like their future child to have Tristan's good looks and even athleticism from the Cleveland Cavaliers power forward though she insists that they are both 'beasts'.

One thing that the youngest Kardashian sister hopes her future daughter gets from both parents is IQ. 

Busy bee! The daughter of Kris Jenner, above at her baby shower co-hosted by Amazon, has been very active during her pregnancy, launching her Good Mama maternity line and keeping everyone up-to-date on social media

Khloe explained: 'But I want maybe TT's [Tristan's]  IQ and my street smarts.'

The daughter of Kris Jenner - who has said she has not yet found a name for her baby girl - has been very active during her pregnancy.

She has not only launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American, but she has also kept up with her social media posts.   

In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party.

Mom on the go! In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party, above

I hear crazy things but I'll fight through it and love it.'

item.title: Oh baby! Robin Thicke's girlfriend April Love Geary shares first glimpse of their precious newborn daughter Mia Love while breastfeeding
item.description: She gave birth to Mia Love Thicke nearly one month ago on February 22. But on Sunday, April Love Geary shared a first glimpse of her newborn daughter with singer Robin Thicke.
item.content:encoded:
She gave birth to Mia Love Thicke nearly one month ago on February 22.

But on Sunday, April Love Geary shared a first glimpse of her newborn daughter with singer Robin Thicke on Instagram and also shared an image of the newborn breastfeeding.

In one picture, the 23-year-old supermodel is holding the almost one-month-old in her arms as she smiled for the camera. 

'My little love': Robin Thicke's girlfriend April Love Geary shares first glimpse of their newborn daughter Mia on Instagram on Sunday 

Nurturing: The model also shared a snap of her daughter breastfeeding to Instagram

The first-time mother wrote in her post: 'My little love.'

Mia is being held in a baby pink blanket and is snuggled up close to her mother's chest in a grey-and-white striped onesie. 

April was absolutely glowing in her snap, clad in a pale pink sweatshirt with the words 'Baby Girl' displayed across the chest.

'Baby girl': The supermodel was glowing in her series of photos, clad in a pale pink hoodie and sweatpants

She wore some comfortable Sunday attire, matching her jacket with a pair of pink sweatpants.

The brunette beauty showed off her natural looks with barely-there makeup and kept her ombre tresses down for the photo op.

In another snap, April took a selfie in front of a mirror with an unmade bed decked out in white sheets in the background.  

'Flowers for sister': Robin Thicke's older son - who he shares with ex-wife Paula Patton - seems excited to be a big brother as he gives his little sister some flowers 

 The Californian beauty started dating her musician partner Robin Thicke when she was just 19 years old.

The singer shares one son, seven-year-old Julian, with his ex-wife Paula Patton. 

And it seems that little Julian is excited to be a big brother. In a snap shared on Saturday, April showed the new big brother giving his little sister yellow flowers.

The model wrote: 'Flowers for sister.' 

Family matters: The singer previously shared his adventures with his family in Bali 

Meanwhile on Sunday, Robin Thicke was busy on daddy duty with his son as the two were spotted having a fun-filled day at Disneyland. 

At one point, Julian enjoyed a frozen lemonade as the Blurred Lines singer sipped on a hot coffee. 

The father-son team also rode some of the amusement park's attractions - including Big Thunder Mountain Railroad.
item.dc:abstract: She gave birth to Mia Love Thicke nearly one month ago on February 22. But on Sunday, April Love Geary shared a first glimpse of her newborn daughter with singer Robin Thicke on Instagram and also shared an image of the newborn breastfeeding. In one picture, the 23-year-old supermodel is holding the almost one-month-old in her arms as she smiled for the camera.
