item.title: Look no hands! Kourtney Kardashian shares video of toyboy Younes Bendjima steering SUV with his legs on Easter road trip
item.description: Kourtney shared video to Instagram Monday showing Younes with his arms folded and looking at her as the vehicle whizzes along the highway. 'Keeping me safe.'
item.content:encoded:
Kourtney Kardashian and her younger lover Younes Bendjima have headed off on a road trip for spring break.

The reality star and mom-of-three, 38, didn't seem fazed, however, when the 24-year-old Algerian model decided to drive their SUV with his knees instead of his hands.

Kourtney shared video to Instagram Monday showing Younes with his arms folded and looking at her as the vehicle whizzes along the highway.

And as he sits in the driver's seat with his shoe-less feet up on the dash, the Keeping Up With The Kardashian's star added the caption: 'Keeping me safe.'

Scroll down for video 

Road trip: Kourtney Kardashian shared Instagram video Monday showing her toyboy Younes Bendjima sitting with his hands off the wheel while driving their SUV on the highway

'Keeping me safe': Mother-of-three Kourtne, 38, seemed unfazed by the 24-year-old Algerian model's laid back attitude as he placed his shoe-less feet on the dash

The pair look to be taking time away from Kourtney's Calabasas home as the video also showed images of a silver Airstream trailer.

It's not known where they are heading.

The couple, who started dating in December 2016 after meeting in Paris, unfollowed each other on Instagram earlier this month sparking rumors of a split.

But the romance seems to be going stronger than ever. 

Getaway: The couple, who started dating in December 2016 after meeting in Paris, are headed off on a spring break road trip together

Road trip: The video also showed a silver Airstream trailer under the blue California sky

Snacking: On Sunday, Kourtney had shared a picture of herself in a racy black ensemble eating pizza

Not to be outdone by his ex, Scott Disick, 34, also left town Monday with his teen girlfriend Sofia Richie. 

Sofia, 19, shared a snap to Instagram showing them hugging on the steps of a private jet with the pilot in the cockpit. 

She also shared a photo of her new mottled Dachshund puppy gifted to her by Scott along with the caption: 'First time flyer.'

The two have been an item since May last year. 

They'r eoff: Not to be outdone by his ex, Scott Disick, 34, also left town Monday with his teen girlfriend Sofia Richie. Sofia, 19, shared a snap to Instagram showing them hugging on the steps of a private jet with the pilot in the cockpit

She also shared a photo of her new mottled Dachshund puppy gifted to her by Scott along with the caption: 'First time flyer'

Scott and Kourtney share three young children together - Mason, eight, Penelope, five, and Reign, three.

The kids have been introduced to their parents' new partners.

The reality TV exes split in July 2015 after Kourtney grew tired of Scott's partying and cheating.

They had been together since 2006.

Exes: Scott and Kourtney, who split in July 2015, share three young children together - Mason, eight, Penelope, five, and Reign, three.  They're pictured in Las Vegas in May 2015

The reality star and mom-of-three, 38, didn't seem fazed, however, when the 24-year-old Algerian model decided to drive their SUV with his knees instead of his hands. Kourtney shared video to Instagram Monday showing Younes with his arms folded and looking at her as the vehicle whizzes along the highway. And as he sits in the driver's seat with his shoe-less feet up on the dash, the Keeping Up With The Kardashian's star added the caption: 'Keeping me safe.'

item.title: 'It started as a joke, but it worked!' Alicia Vikander reveals she threw a dinner party on SKYPE
item.description: With friends spread all over the world, get togethers can be few and far between.
item.content:encoded:
With friends spread all over the world, get togethers can be few and far between.

But Alicia Vikander found the ultimate solution, when she hosted a dinner party on Skype.

'One time, I had a Skype dinner party with my friends,' she explained. 'We decided to each buy a drink, cook something for ourselves, then sit down at a table and Skype each other.

'It started as a joke, but it actually worked. We had such a good time, we wanted to go out afterwards but, of course, we were in different parts of the world. It was a great night anyway.'

'I spend hours!' Alicia Vikander reveals her secret to the perfect dinner party... a good table plan and plenty of games; she is seen earlier this month in London

The Tomb Raider actress - who is married to Michael Fassbender - likes introducing different groups of pals to one another through fun games and spends 'hours' agonizing over seating plans to make sure everyone has a good time.

She told Britain's ELLE magazine: 'I love to get guests playing games. It's like stepping on new ground for the first five minutes and then people really, really enjoy it.

'Normally, you kind of just fall into patterns of how dinner parties should be - you should be polite and you should say these things. But I like to shake the box a bit.

'I really enjoy hosting, throwing dinner parties or surprise parties for people and I can spend weeks planning them.

'I come up with games that introduce new people to one another. I spend hours with seating plans, even for a small dinner. It really makes such a difference.

'And I always try to put people next to someone they haven't met before.'

Married couple: With her husband, Michael Fassbender, in October last year

When it comes to socialising, the 28-year-old star 'loves' drinking alcohol - but insists she rarely gets drunk.

She said: 'I do love a drink. More and more, I love wine but I like vodka Martinis or straight-up tequilas.

'I've taken to drinking straight, but I only ever have one or two and I never really get drunk.'

The Danish Girl star and her spouse live in Lisbon, Portugal, and she loves the pace of the city - and eating fish there.

She said: 'I've fallen in love with the city and the fact it's just on the waterfront, close to nature, and I like the warm weather a lot.

'It's a place that is just constantly alive. And they're known for their sardines. I do love sardines.'
item.dc:abstract: With friends spread all over the world, get togethers can be few and far between. But Alicia Vikander found the ultimate solution, when she hosted a dinner party on Skype. 'One time, I had a Skype dinner party with my friends,' she explained. 'We decided to each buy a drink, cook something for ourselves, then sit down at a table and Skype each other.

item.title: Rosamund Pike wrote to filmmaker Rob Marshall to ask to play Mary Poppins... but he gave the role to Emily Blunt
item.description: The 39-year-old actress felt it was worth reaching out to the filmmaker.
item.content:encoded:
Rosamund Pike wrote to Rob Marshall to ask to play Mary Poppins.

The 39-year-old actress felt it was worth reaching out to the filmmaker to let him know she was interested in playing the magical nanny in long-awaited sequel 'Mary Poppins Returns', but the role went to Emily Blunt.

The mother-of-two recalled to Total Film magazine: '[I wrote] 'Just so you know, I would really love to be Mary Poppins.

'It's worth putting your hat in the ring for things sometimes.' 

Taking a chance: Rosamund Pike says she wrote to filmmaker Rob Marshall to ask to play Mary Poppins... but he still gave the role to Emily Blunt; she is seen last month 

When it comes to choosing her roles, Rosamund - who can next be seen playing a German terrorist in Jose Padilha's 'Entebbe' - wants to work with directors who are passionate about the project.

She explained: 'I really want to know the director has to make the film. It's not just a job.

'I felt that very strongly with Jose for 'Entebbe.

'You want to know, "Does this person have a strong take? Is it in their blood?"'

Winning role: Emily Blunt was cast as the British nanny

Meanwhile, the British actress admitted she found it very 'traumatic' working on 'Hostiles', in which she played a mother who lost her family in a violent attack.

She said: 'I've had to live in a very, very dark place for a while.

'It was really traumatic. It felt very real.

'When I re-watch that, I feel it was something I lived, rather than something I acted in.'

Playing favorites: Rob Marshall with his leading lady Emily Blunt

But Rosamund - who has sons Solo five, and Atom, three, with partner Robie Uniacke - is thankful directors have given her opportunities to push herself with her performances.

She said: 'I think it's to do with being free to experiment. I think directors see that I'm prepared to get my hands dirty.

'You test your limits of your comfort zone. It seems unnatural and yet you feel surprisingly comfortable... it's a chance to do something that potentially could fail. It's a risk, right?'
item.dc:abstract: Rosamund Pike wrote to Rob Marshall to ask to play Mary Poppins. The 39-year-old actress felt it was worth reaching out to the filmmaker to let him know she was interested in playing the magical nanny in long-awaited sequel 'Mary Poppins Returns', but the role went to Emily Blunt. The mother-of-two recalled to Total Film magazine: '[I wrote] 'Just so you know, I would really love to be Mary Poppins.

item.title: Kevin Dillon's estranged wife claims they were 'intimate' for more than EIGHT YEARS after the Entourage actor says they split in legal docs
item.description: Stuart said that while she moved out of a home she once shared with the Entourage actor in 2008, she continued with actions comparable to a significant other, according to the outlet.
item.content:encoded:
Kevin Dillon's estranged wife Jane Stuart says he misstated their date of separation in court docs - by eight years.

The New York native, 52, is currently in divorce proceedings with Stuart, the mother of his 11-year-old daughter Ava.

Stuart said that her separation from the actor - best known for playing Johnny Drama on the HBO hit Entourage and in the 2015 motion picture - took place May 29, 2016, according to TMZ - and not the October 10, 2008 he put in court papers.

Scroll below for video 

Out and about: Actor Kevin Dillon, 52, was snapped at the Dirt premiere in Hollywood earlier this month. He's in a divorce battle with his estranged wife Jane Stuart

Stuart said that while she moved out of a home she once shared with the TripTank actor in 2008, she continued with actions comparable to a significant other, according to the outlet. 

Those included intimate relations, cooking and attending public premieres and dinners, she said in court docs, adding that there were no financial changes following her departure from the home with Ava.

Stuart said that she and Kevin, the younger brother of Hollywood stalwart Matt Dillon, parted a decade back due to needing space, according to the outlet, but were discussing expanding their family as recent as three years ago.

The discrepancy in separation dates might play a factor in finances moving forward, according to the outlet.

Out and about: The veteran actor was snapped with daughter Amy and estranged wife Jane Stuart in Malibu in 2010

Tinseltown: The couple was snapped at the Emmys in LA in 2008, the year Kevin claims they separated, though Jane says that came eight years later  

In the driver's seat: Dillon starred on the HBO hit Entourage with (L-R) Kevin Connolly, Jerry Ferrara and Adrian Grenier

The finances were at the heart of a dispute between Dillon and Stuart last October, the outlet reported, as the actor said that he was depleted of funds to provide for private schooling for his daughter, amid monthly payments of $3,174 a month for child support and $7,214 for spousal support.

Dillon said that his daughter, who was attending a school in Calabasas, would have been fine served going to a highly-rated school in Malibu. 

Stuart said that the school was at the center of allegations linked to drugs, as well as cancer-causing agents on the campus, according to the outlet.

The New York native, 52, is currently in divorce proceedings with Stuart, the mother of his 11-year-old daughter Ava. item.title: Pregnant Kirsten Dunst drapes baby bump in plaid shirt as she lunches with fiancé Jesse Plemons in LA
item.description: Kirsten, 35, who's expecting her first child, made sure to keep hydrated as she exited the eatery carrying a bottle of water.
item.content:encoded:
She's expecting her first child with her fiance Jesse Plemons. 

And on Monday, pregnant Kirsten Dunst, 35, was positively blooming as she stepped out with her beau.

The couple, who met on the set of the FX series Fargo, were spotted enjoying lunch together in the Toluca Lake neighborhood of LA.

Baby on board: Pregnant Kirsten Dunst, 35, was positively blooming as she stepped out in the Toluca Lake neighborhood of Los Angeles on Monday

Kirsten made sure to keep hydrated as she exited the eatery carrying a bottle of water.

She wore skintight black leggings and black flip flops and draped her baby bump in a loose-fitting plaid shirt.

The actress added a black cardigan and a pair of gold-rimmed sunglasses and carried a white shoulder purse.

Growing belly: The actress, who is expecting her first child, draped her baby bump in a loose-fitting plaid shirt

Low key: She and fiance Jesse Plemons, whom she met on the set of the FX series Fargo, enjoyed a casual lunch out at a local eatery

Dressed for comfort: Kirsten wore skintight black leggings and black flip flops and sported a pair of gold-rimmed sunglasses

Jesse, 29, who has appeared in TV shows Friday Night Lights and Breaking Bad, sported a polka dot shirt and blue jeans with white trainers.

He wore a baseball cap and sunglasses and carried a bottle of water and a beverage in a cup with a straw.   

Kirsten, whose credits include the movies Bring It On, Spider-Man, Hidden Figures and The Beguiled, revealed last year that she was finally ready to be a mother. 

'I wasn’t one of those 'I need a baby!"' people until my goddaughter was born,' she explained in an interview for the July 2017 issue of Marie Claire UK.

'I love her so much. That love is just like… you can’t experience that unless you have a kid,' she said. 'I put her to bed last night and she woke up this morning and said to her mom, 'Where’s Kiki?' I just love that love. That’s what I want.'

Laid back style: Jesse, 29, who has appeared in TV shows Friday Night Lights and Breaking Bad, sported a polka dot shirt and blue jeans with white trainers and a baseball cap

First time mom: The Spider-Man and Hidden Figures star made sure to stay hydrated, carrying a bottle of water with her

Parenthood: Kirsten revealed last year that she was ready to be a mother, after doting on her young goddaughter

item.title: Chrissy Teigen shares adorable snap of John Legend and daughter Luna on stage of his upcoming Jesus Christ Superstar Live!
item.description: The 39-year-old singer shared a cute snap on Instagram of himself kissing his 23-month-old child Luna on the forehead on stage of his upcoming musical on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
No doubt John Legend is excited to star in Jesus Christ Superstar Live!

But no doubt the biggest thrill of all on set came when he got a visit from his bouncing baby daughter.

The 39-year-old singer shared a cute snap on Instagram of himself kissing his 23-month-old child Luna on the forehead on stage of his upcoming musical on Monday.

Scroll down for video 

Awwdorable: John Legend shared a cute snap on Instagram of himself kissing his 23-month-old child Luna on the forehead on stage of his upcoming musical on Monday

No doubt the cute snap was taken by his model wife Chrissy Teigen who shared a different photo of the father-daughter duo.

John definitely seemed to be very happy about the visit as he tagged the snap: 'Luna's on set! #JesusChristSuperstar.'

Meanwhile Chrissy, 32, was also on Instagram as she shared a video of her hairdo featuring a mini pompadour on the front. 

Bonding: No doubt the cute snap was taken by his model wife Chrissy Teigen who shared a different photo of the father-daughter duo

She said: 'I'm bringing  back that little school poof. Here's a how-to: bobby pin, done.'

This comes after Chrissy defended her husband who is playing the title role in Jesus Christ Superstar.

She did not take any  criticism of the singer lightly, clapping back at an online critic on Instagram who called the casting of the Ordinary People hitmaker 'a mockery to our lord Jesus Christ'.

Hilarious: Meanwhile Chrissy, 32, was also on Instagram as she shared a video of her hairdo featuring a mini pompadour on the front

Stunning: The make-up free beauty share the short video with fans on social media

Easy: She said: 'I'm bringing back that little school poof. Here's a how-to: bobby pin, done'

'You’re so right. You’re always right. You aren’t crazy at all. You’re a totally normal human and not at all a f**king loser,' wrote the model. 

The original comment read, in full: 'Sad to see ur hubby in Jesus Christ Super Star. That is a mockery to our lord Jesus Christ.'

'The one who gave ya'll all [sic] ur fame n glory. That's a shame. SMH. Sad!'

Which then prompted the brutally sarcastic takedown by the La La Land actor's Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue model wife. 

Defending her man: Chrissy didn't take any criticism of her husband lightly, clapping back at a person who called the casting of John, 39, 'a mockery to our lord Jesus Christ'

Back and forth: Above is the exchange between Chrissy and the online commenter

Jesus Christ Superstar debuts on April 1. 

Apart from Legend, the other stars in the live production include Sara Bareilles as Mary Magdalene, Brandon Victor Dixon as Judas and Alice Cooper as King Herod.

It will be directed by theater great David Leveaux, and will be performed at the Marcy Armory in Brooklyn, N.Y.

The original version of Jesus Christ Superstar his Broadway back in 1971 and quickly garnered five Tony nominations and a Drama Desk win for creator Andrew Lloyd Webber. 

Look who's back: Jesus Christ Superstar debuts on April 1

The 39-year-old singer shared a cute snap on Instagram of himself kissing his 23-month-old child Luna on the forehead on stage of his upcoming musical on Monday. No doubt the cute snap was taken by his model wife Chrissy Teigen who shared a different photo of the father-daughter duo.

item.title: Eenie, meenie, minie...Lambo! Justin Bieber cruises the streets in his bright blue Lamborghini... days after crashing his G-Wagon
item.description: He escaped injury as his Mercedes G-Wagon was rear-ended on Friday. But Justin Bieber didn't let the accident keep him from driving luxury automobiles as he was spotted in his Lamborghini on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
He escaped injury as his Mercedes G-Wagon was rear-ended on Friday.

But Justin Bieber didn't let the accident keep him from his love of driving luxury automobiles as he was spotted out with his Lamborghini on Monday.

The 24-year-old rocked a casual ensemble of a black Zoe hoodie and neon green joggers as he emerged from the bright blue Italian sports racer.

Back at it: Justin Bieber was spotted in his Lamborghini on Monday

Daring to impress, the Upside Down Hearts singer rocked the hoodie with a orange, pink, and white loge on the chest.

His muscular gams were swathed in the green track pants as they cascaded over a pair of white high tops.

He kept his trademark sandy blonde tresses in a signature styled mess camp as she bounded down the suburban street.

It all comes after Justin's precious Mercedes-Benz G-Wagon was rear-ended by a white Range Rover on a mid-evening drive. 

Impressive: He rocked a casual ensemble of a black Zoe hoodie and neon green joggers as he emerged from the bright blue Italian sports racer

The aftermath was captured on social media by Twitter user Maisey Mcginnis. 

Shortly after the collision police were seen on the scene to make sure everything was going smoothly between the two involved parties.

According to TMZ late Friday night, Bieber was on Sunset Boulevard just before 9 p.m. in West Hollywood when he was rear-ended.

Legs for days! His muscular gams were swathed in the green track pants as they cascaded over a pair of white high tops

Their sources say that an OnStar system for one of the two SUVs alerted law enforcement to the crash. 

The publication claims that the officers stayed around as Bieber and the other party exchanged information but the police did not file a report.

TMZ's insiders report that there were no injuries from the collision. 

Hair story: He kept his trademark sandy blonde tresses in a signature styled mess camp as she bounded down the suburban street

The 24-year-old rocked a casual ensemble of a black Zoe hoodie and neon green joggers as he emerged from his bright blue Italian sports racer.

item.title: Happy it's spring! Dakota Fanning models rose-tinted sunglasses and floral minidress as she carries an iced coffee in NYC
item.description: The first day of spring came last week. And Dakota Fanning is clearly ready for the new season as she stepped out in New York City on Monday morning in a floral mini dress.
item.content:encoded:
The first day of spring came last week.

And Dakota Fanning is clearly ready for the new season as headed to the Today show in New York City on Monday morning in a floral mini dress with rose-tinted glasses and cute purple platform heels.

The blonde, 24, was also wearing a bright smile, probably because her new TV series, The Alienist, is a hit.

Leggy look: Dakota Fanning exited the Today show set in New York City on Monday

The Twilight star wore a plunging printed dress, despite the fact that it's still cold on the East Coast.

She matched the print with a pair of electric purple platform heels and a leather trench coat with a fur pink collar.

The Hollywood it-girl made her exit in a fun pair of accessories including round frames with pastel pink lenses.

Waving hello: The Twilight star said a quick hello to spectators and fans who waited outside the taping

Colors on colors: The street style star didn't hold back when it came to playing with color on her ensemble

All smiles: The American actress looked extra cheery while strutting down the NYC streets this morning

She paired the vibrant look with a pink, blue and green Chanel PVC shoulder bag to hold her belongings.

The glasses and trench were also seen on the former child star later in the day as she made a cross-city trek in a much cozier look.

Her outfit for this afternoon was much more weather appropriate for the frigid New York City temperatures.

Some freebies? She also carried a small white bag from fashion publicity firm Autumn PR

A pick me up: And she held onto a small iced coffee from Starbucks

She traded in her heels for a pair of white sneakers and covered her legs in a pair of floral print leggings. Dakota also wore a hoodie to add an extra layer of warmth. 

The sister of Elle Fannning also made sure to let her skin breathe as she stripped herself from her makeup that she wore for the 'Today' Show taping.

Dakota recently made her directional debut for Italian fashion house, Miu Miu. 

She was asked to create her own short film which followed Ava DuVernay as she moved into her first loft in Brooklyn. 

When speaking to Vanity Fair on what it's like working behind the camera, rather than in front of it Dakota said: 'The post-production and the magic that happens in the editing room with color timing and sound mixing and talking with the composer and the music supervisor—that’s where it all kind of comes together.' 

Strut like you mean it: The former child starlet walked among a busy crowd by herself in the city

All layered up: The fashionista swapped her sky-high heels for a pair of comfortable sneakers
item.dc:abstract: The first day of spring came last week. And Dakota Fanning is clearly ready for the new season as she stepped out in New York City on Monday morning in a floral mini dress with rose-tinted glasses and cute purple platform heels. The blonde, 24, was also wearing a bright smile, probably because her new TV series, The Alienist, is a hit.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker

item.title: Amber Turner shows ex Dan Edgar what he's missing in sizzling bikini snaps from Dubai getaway... following showdown with new girl and love rival Clelia Theodorou on TOWIE
item.description: The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip in Dubai.
item.content:encoded:
She was seen confronting new girl Clelia Theodorou on Sunday night's TOWIE, after discovering Dan Edgar had been dating them at the same time. 

And Amber Turner certainly showed the lothario what he was missing on Monday, as shared a number of sizzling bikini snaps from her holiday in Dubai. 

The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip.

Bikini babe: Amber Turner showed her ex Dan Edgar what he was missing on Monday, as shared a number of sizzling bikini snaps from her holiday in Dubai

The blonde first displayed her enviably slim and toned figure in a skimpy blue two-piece, as she posed with her feet in the pool at Nikki Beach.

With the swimwear rising high at her waist and pulling into a gold body chain across her stomach, Amber let her impressive physique take centre stage as she sultrily looked over her shoulder in the snap.

Not stopping there, the reality star then slipped into an equally saucy white bikini as she posed at the wheel of a yacht for another snap. 

Here she is: She first posed sultrily at Nikki Beach Dubai, before she slipped into an equally saucy white bikini to pose at the wheel of a yacht

The TOWIE beauty gave a glimpse of her womanly curves in the swimwear, which plunged into a deep V neckline at the chest to tease at her cleavage.

Styling her hair into loose waves and sporting a heavy, contoured make-up look despite Dubai's thirty degree heat, Amber looked as glamorous as ever as she posed for the snap, captioned: 'Just Call Me Captain!' 

Amber's sizzling snaps followed TOWIE's return on Sunday, which saw her become embroiled in a showdown with new girl Clelia Theodorou - who is dating her ex Dan Edgar. 

Not happy: Amber's sizzling snaps followed TOWIE's return on Sunday, which saw her become embroiled in a showdown with new girl Clelia Theodorou (R)

Drama: Amber discovered Dan Edgar (above) had been dating the girls at the same time, and immediately called Clelia to let her know before the cast trip to Barcelona

However, Amber discovered the hunk had been two-timing them both, and immediately informed his new squeeze.

After confronting Dan during a workout, Clelia rang Amber to settling the matter, stating: 'I spoke to him and he told me he did see you a couple of days ago and that he did lie to you about the fact that he has been seeing me.

'And he did tell me that you guys did sleep with each other a month ago which was obviously when I've been seeing him.'

Furious: Amber said: 'The other day we spoke for two hours and he said there's only been three girls that have ever affected him, his first girlfriend, his ex and me'

Opposite: Only making matters worse, Clelia replied: 'What he said to me was completely different, he said you guys had been on and off and that he didn't want to be with you'

Not happy, Amber replied: 'When I was with him a few days ago, he did lie and denied numerous times over the past few months that anything's gone on with you. He's denied it, denied it and said 'I've not even kissed her'.

'The other day we spoke for two hours and he said there's only been three girls that have ever affected him, his first girlfriend, his ex and me.'

Only making matters worse however, Clelia then revealed: 'What he said to me was completely different, he said you guys had been on and off for a while and that he didn't want to be with you.' 

Girl power: Amber branded Dan a coward, while the newbie declared she was not going to 'wait around' for him to decide what he wants

Amber branded Dan a coward, while the newbie declared she was not going to 'wait around' for him to decide what he wants. 

Despite parting ways with the TOWIE lothario, Amber recently admitted she still had feelings for Dan during a recent interview on This Morning.

Speaking ahead of the new series' debut, she said: 'It's been over a year with us but I'm not going to say there aren't feelings there, but I can't do it anymore.'  

Struggling: Despite parting ways with the TOWIE lothario, Amber recently admitted she still had feelings for Dan during a recent interview on This Morning

Tension between the pair became so heated that she even threw a drink in his face while filming the ITVBe show in Barcelona earlier this year.  

When asked about an alleged row between them at popular Essex haunt Sugar Hute, she said: 'I was having a conversation with one of the new girls and he came into the conversation and it just didn't go down well. 

'Things have just got so toxic between us and I'm just so done with the situation,' before joking: 'A cup fell out of my hand and it may have had liquid in it.

'You think a lot of it is played for dramatics but everything I've talked about is real life.' 

At war: Speaking of her ex (pictured together in September), she said: 'Things have just got so toxic between us and I'm just so done with the situation'
item.dc:abstract: She was seen confronting new girl Clelia Theodorou on Sunday night's TOWIE, after discovering Dan Edgar had been dating them at the same time. And Amber Turner certainly showed the lothario what he was missing on Monday, as shared a number of sizzling bikini snaps from her holiday in Dubai. The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and even enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip.

item.title: 'Now I check everything a million times!': Ruth Langsford recalls her horror after accidentally sharing THAT explicit photo on Mother's Day last year
item.description: Speaking on the show, the 58-year-old admitted she now checks her social media posts 'a million times' to avoid further mishap - but assured fans the photo had nothing to do with her husband.
item.content:encoded:
She left her followers in stitches last year when she accidentally shared a very explicit penis photo beside her Mother's Day tribute on Twitter.

But a giggly Ruth Langsford revealed she was left 'horrified' by the hilarious incident on Monday's Loose Women.

Speaking on the ITV show, the 58-year-old admitted she now checks her social media posts 'a million times' to avoid further mishap - but assured fans the saucy photo had nothing to do with her husband Eamonn Holmes. 

Looking back: Ruth Langsford revealed she was 'horrified' after sharing a very explicit photo to Twitter by accident last year

Ruth had been paying tribute to her mum Joan and sister Julia in the Twitter post last year, when the unfortunate incident occurred.

She shared a heartwarming family photo of the three of them beside the caption: 'My wonderful Mum & big Sis. Thinking of those who no longer have their Mum's..... you'll always have memories x' 

Unfortunately, the presenter failed to crop out her photo stream underneath - meaning a few extra snaps appeared below the image, including one very explicit meme of a woman with a man's genitalia. 

Oops: Ruth had been paying tribute to her mum Joan and sister Julia on Mother's Day (above) when the unfortunate incident occurred

Saucy: Ruth failed to crop out her photo roll underneath - meaning a few extra snaps appeared below the image, including one very explicit meme of a woman with a man's genitalia

Looking back on the blunder, Ruth explained that she did not realise her error until a friend told her she had hit headlines the following day.

She recalled: 'Someone had sent me a cheeky photo of a man’s appendage in a shoe, but it wasn’t immediately noticeable. So I took a photo of me and my mum and didn’t realise that the photo gallery was below...

'I remember coming in and someone saying 'You’re the front page!' and I reacted in horror!'

However, as the studio audience laughed and teased her, she was quick to affirm the content of the saucy photos had not belonged to her on and off-screen husband. 

Horror: An embarrassed Ruth explained that she did not realise her error until a friend told her she had hit headlines

Nightmare: She said: 'I remember coming in and someone saying 'You’re the front page!' and I reacted in horror!'

Awkward: She said a friend had sent her the racy photo but she did not realised it automatically saved into the photo stream on her phone

She said: 'Oh it wasn’t Eamonn,' before adding with a laugh: 'Now I immediately check everything a million times!' 

The mishap sent fans wild at the time - who responded on Twitter with a selection of memes to express their hilarity at Ruth's racy photos. 

Speaking soon after, the Strictly star explained she had been sent the funny snap on a group chat, but did not realise photos from WhatsApp automatically saved to her camera roll. 

She said last year: 'Eamonn was worried that people would think its him. I thought my son would be embarrassed but apparently I'm on a very trendy cool website now, that ladbible!' 

'Oh it wasn't Eamonn!': However, as the studio audience laughed and teased her, she was quick to affirm the content of the saucy photos had not belonged to her on and off-screen husband
item.dc:abstract: She left her followers in stitches last year when she accidentally shared a very explicit penis photo beside her Mother's Day tribute on Twitter. But a giggly Ruth Langsford revealed she was left 'horrified' by the hilarious incident on Monday's Loose Women. Speaking on the show, the 58-year-old admitted she now checks her social media posts 'a million times' to avoid further mishap - but assured fans the saucy photo had nothing to do with her husband Eamonn Holmes.

item.title: Youthful Elizabeth Hurley, 52, dazzles in sequin embellished sari as she attends elephant charity gala in India
item.description: Elizabeth Hurley looked in brighter spirits as she attended the Help The Hathi gala in aid of conservation charity Elephant Family in India on Saturday.
item.content:encoded:
She has been by her nephew Miles' side in hospital as he recovers from a horrific stabbing, with the 21-year-old now said to be on the mend.

And Elizabeth Hurley looked in brighter spirits as she attended  the Help The Hathi gala in aid of conservation charity Elephant Family in India on Saturday.

The Austin Powers actress, 52, dazzled as she donned a cream sari embellished with sequins while posing in front of an ornately decorated elephant statue.

Glamour: Elizabeth Hurley dazzled as she attended the Help The Hathi gala in aid of conservation charity Elephant Family in India on Saturday

The star wore her brunette tresses in flowing waves while her sparkling peepers were enhanced with smoky eyeshadow and liner, paired with a frosted pink glossy lip and a metallic bindi.

She accessorised with sparkling chandelier earrings and carried a red leather clutch bag.        

The charitable star captioned the snap: 'Balmy Bombay Night #india #elephantfamily.'

The statues are part of the Elephant Parade comprised of 101 artistic elephant statues which will be auctioned off for the charity.

Elegant: The Austin Powers actress, 52, dazzled as she donned a cream sari embellished with sequins while posing in front of an ornately decorated elephant statue

The event is organised to raise fund to build and secure 101 crucial Indian elephant corridors, which allow the animals to get from one forest feeding ground to the next.      

The photo comes after her nephew was seen for the first time since he was stabbed multiple times in a gruesome attack on the streets of south-west London last week.   

In a post shared on Instagram on Monday, Miles was seen wearing a white dressing gown as he posed alongside his pal, a rising rapper known as Romz who is believed to have been attacked with the model.

Tanned: The star shared this sunkissed snap from her hotel room in Mumbai

Captioning the snapshot, which appeared to have been taken in a warmly-lit living room, their pal simply wrote: 'MY SURVIVORS. Grateful.'

Miles is reportedly recuperating at his famous aunt's palatial mansion in Herefordshire, after being discharged from a London hospital. 

Elizabeth rushed back to the UK to be by her beloved nephew's bedside after he was stabbed by a gang in an apparent road rage attack on Thursday.  

Miles was set upon by thugs and knifed in the back multiple times after overtaking their car moments earlier, leading to a minor collision, police said. 

One wound narrowly missed severing Miles' spine. Police have said the victims’ injuries are ‘not life-threatening or life-changing’.

Pictured: Her sighting comes after her nephew Miles Hurley was seen for the first time since he was stabbed multiple times in a gruesome attack on the streets of south-west London last week. He is pictured with rapper pal Romz

Elizabeth flew back from a promotional tour in the US to be by his side. In an emotional Instagram post on Saturday, the actress branded his attackers ‘animals’.  

‘My 21 year old nephew @mileshurley1 was brutally attacked by four men in London on Thursday night,’ she said. ‘He was repeatedly stabbed and lost more than four pints of blood.

‘The deepest wound just missed severing his spine. By some miracle no vital organs were damaged. We are praying that these animals are caught before they maim, or even kill, someone else.’ 

Miles, who is the son of Elizabeth's older sister Kate Curran, is very close to his aunt.   

The Metropolitan Police confirmed on Monday that road rage was a line of inquiry.

A spokesman said the stabbing occurred after the victims ‘became involved in a verbal altercation with the occupants of another car following a minor collision’.

Elizabeth shares one son Damian, 15, with American businessman and film producer Steve Bing. 

Close bond: Elizabeth shares one son Damian, 15, with American businessman and film producer Steve Bing
item.dc:abstract: Elizabeth Hurley looked in brighter spirits as she attended the Help The Hathi gala in aid of conservation charity Elephant Family in India on Saturday. The Austin Powers actress, 52, dazzled as she donned a cream sari embellished with sequins while posing in front of an ornately decorated elephant statue.

item.title: 'She's a hero': Wilmer Valderrama praises his ex girlfriend Demi Lovato for turning her life around
item.description: The NCIS showed his support for his 25-year-old ex after she performed her song Skyscraper at a March For Our Lives rally in Washington DC over the weekend.
item.content:encoded:
Wilmer Valderrama has praised his former girlfriend Demi Lovato as a 'hero'.

The NCIS showed his support for his 25-year-old ex after she performed her song Skyscraper at a March For Our Lives rally in Washington DC over the weekend.

He told Entertainment Tonight: 'She's a hero. She's a hero to young men and women out there. I think that she's literally the image of recovery and getting their life together, so I'm excited that she's there and for this historic moment for young people too.'

On stage: Demi Lovato performed her song Skyscraper at a March For Our Lives rally in Washington DC over the weekend

And Wilmer, 38, praised his fellow Hollywood stars for getting involved in the student-led demonstrations, which were set up after 17 deaths in a school shooting in Parkland, Florida, last month.

He said: 'They used to tell us when we were young and entering the industry, 'Oh you're an actor, don't get involved in politics.'

Support: Wilmer Valderrama has praised his former girlfriend as a 'hero'. The on-again off-again pair are pictured here in 2016

'But then you see that politics affect policy and policy affects humankind. It's really interesting as citizens, as people in general, that you actually get involved. So I think that's why it's exciting to see that so many people are lending their voices, but most importantly, their platform for other people's voices, because we gotta just be amplifying the people's word and the people's spirit.'

And Wilmer, who was involved with the marches, revealed he grew up with gun violence in his native Venezuela.

He said: 'I grew up in Venezuela and you grow up with a reality - [on] the six o'clock news, you're talking about machine guns and you're talking about hits. It's a rude awakening when you wake up to that reality, specifically, you're nine, 10, 11 years old in Venezuela knowing that this is normal to you.

'And coming to the United States, a land that has allowed us to have the freedom to become anything we can be...We shouldn't have to worry about that while we're dreaming out loud.'
item.dc:abstract: Wilmer Valderrama has praised his former girlfriend Demi Lovato as a 'hero'. The NCIS showed his support for his 25-year-old ex after she performed her song Skyscraper at a March For Our Lives rally in Washington DC over the weekend. He told Entertainment Tonight: 'She's a hero. She's a hero to young men and women out there. I think that she's literally the image of recovery and getting their life together, so I'm excited that she's there and for this historic moment for young people too.'
item.dc:creator: Natalie Trombetta
item.mi:shortTitle: Wilmer Valderrama calls his ex girlfriend Demi Lovato a 'hero'

item.title: Lana Del Rey claims plagiarism lawsuit filed by Radiohead is finished...despite the band denying they ever sued her
item.description: Lana Del Rey has announced the end of the lawsuit she claimed Radiohead filed against her over her 2017 song Get Free. She did so onstage in Sao Paulo, Brazil this Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
Lana Del Rey has announced the end of the lawsuit she claimed Radiohead filed against her over her 2017 song Get Free.

'I mean now that my lawsuit’s over, I guess I can sing that song any time I want, right?' Lana, 32, said onstage Sunday, JustJared reports.

She was playing Sao Paolo's Interlagos racetrack for Lollapalooza Sao Paulo 2018. 

Bookend: Onstage in Sao Paulo this Sunday, Lana Del Rey announced the end of the lawsuit she claimed Radiohead filed against her over her 2017 song Get Free

Radiohead, who formed in 1985, apparently felt that Get Free is unduly similar to their own 1993 single Creep.

Lana tweeted this January: 'It’s true about the lawsuit. Although I know my song wasn’t inspired by Creep, Radiohead feel it was and want 100% of the publishing - I offered up to 40 over the last few months but they will only accept 100. Their lawyers have been relentless, so we will deal with it in court.'

However, a spokesman for Warner/Chappell, the publishers of Radiohead's music, disputed this version of events in a statement quoted by the New York Times.

On the mic: 'I mean now that my lawsuit’s over, I guess I can sing that song any time I want, right?' Lana, 32, said onstage Sunday, JustJared reports

Where or when: She was playing the Interlagos racetrack for Lollapalooza Sao Paulo 2018

He began: 'As Radiohead’s music publisher, it’s true that we’ve been in discussions since August of last year with Lana Del Rey’s representatives.

'It’s clear that the verses of Get Free use musical elements found in the verses of Creep and we’ve requested that this be acknowledged in favor of all writers of Creep.

Yet he countered: 'To set the record straight, no lawsuit has been issued and Radiohead have not said they "will only accept 100%" of the publishing of Get Free.'

As seen in 2012: Radiohead, who formed in 1985, apparently felt that Get Free is unduly similar to their own 1993 single Creep

As Rolling Stone pointed out, Creep itself was so much like The Hollies 1974 record The Air That I Breathe that Radiohead were sued by the latter's songwriters.

Mike Hazlewood and Albert Hammond, the writers in question, themselves got part of the publishing when the matter was settled out of court.

Get Free is a cut off Lana's fifth and latest studio album Lust For Life, whereas Creep appeared on Radiohead's inaugural album Pablo Honey.

Getting the story straight: However, a spokesman for the band's music publisher gave a statement insisting no lawsuit has been issued
item.dc:abstract: Lana Del Rey has announced the end of the lawsuit she claimed Radiohead filed against her over her 2017 song Get Free. 'I mean now that my lawsuit’s over, I guess I can sing that song any time I want, right?' Lana, 32, said onstage Sunday, JustJared reports. She was playing Sao Paolo's Interlagos racetrack for Lollapalooza Sao Paulo 2018.
item.dc:creator: Shyam Dodge
item.mi:shortTitle: Lana Del Rey announces end of claimed Radiohead lawsuit

item.title: Feeling a bit nippy? Braless Sinitta leaves little to the imagination as she attends Ready Player One screening in form-fitting green dress
item.description: The X Factor star, 54, showed off slightly more than she bargained for as she went braless at the film screening for Ready Player One at London's Charlotte Street Hotel on Monday evening.
item.content:encoded:
She regularly parades her age-defying looks at high-profile events.

But Sinitta showed off slightly more than she bargained for as she went braless at the film screening for Steven Speilburg's Ready Player One at London's Charlotte Street Hotel on Monday evening.

The X Factor star, 54, showcased her youthful appearance in a green figure-hugging ensemble, adorned with a brown belt that cinched in her tiny waist.

A bit nippy? Sinitta showed off more than she bargained for as she went braless at the film screening for Ready Player One at London's Charlotte Street Hotel on Monday evening

The So Macho hitmaker teamed her number with a pair of nude brown heels and accessorised with a flashy crucifix necklace.

Living up to her show-stopping ways, the Toy Boy belter styled her tresses into voluminous curls and wore glamorous make-up.

Sinitta was joined by her mother and soul singer Miquel Brown, 69, as well her son Zac, 12, and aesthetics doctor Dr. Vincent Wong. 

Svelte: The X Factor star, 54, showcased her youthful appearance in her green figure-hugging ensemble, adorned with a brown belt that cinched in her tiny waist

High spirits: Sinitta was joined by her mother and soul singer Miquel Brown, as well her son Zac, 12, and aesthetics doctor Dr. Vincent Wong

Sharing a glimpse into her fun-filled trip with her Instagram followers, the TV personality posted a snap of the group in electric shutter shades.

The I'm A Celebrity star captioned the image: 'Family Night with @DrVWong Miquel Mama Brown and @zacRoman #ReadyPlayerOne great #VirtualReality #StevenSpielberg #Movie.'

The new sci-fi film from iconic director Steven Spielberg is set in a future Dystopian earth, where humanity spends its time in an interconnected virtual space known as the OASIS, to escape the desolation of Earth's cities.

'Family night': Sharing a glimpse into her fun-filled trip with her Instagram followers, the TV personality posted a snap of the group in electric shutter shades

The founder dies and offers ownership of the space and $500bn to the first person who can find a hidden treasure within the space, by problem-solving and playing games, with a battle ensuing between a young man and his friends and a corrupt megacorporation. 

The movie - based on the novel Ernest Cline - stars Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Simon Pegg, and Lena Waithe, set for a US release date of March 29.  

Although the premiere at SXSW in Texas suffered technical difficulties when the theatre's sound system went down during a crucial scene - leading it to be replayed- it won acclaim from critics and fans alike.

The X Factor star, 54, showcased her youthful appearance in a green figure-hugging ensemble, adorned with a brown belt that cinched in her tiny waist.

item.title: Shanina Shaik sparkles in a silver dramatically plunging gown and shows off her incredible pins as she attends the amFAR Gala in Hong Kong
item.description: Shanina Shaik continued to glow as she attended the 2018 American Foundation for AIDS Research [amFAR] gala at Shaw Studios in Hong Kong on Monday night.
item.content:encoded:
She recently shared images of her stunning bridal shower, ahead of her wedding to fiancé DJ Ruckus.

And model Shanina Shaik continued to glow as she attended the 2018 American Foundation for AIDS Research [amFAR] gala at Shaw Studios in Hong Kong on Monday night.

The Australian beauty, 27, wore a drastically plunging gown, cut down to her navel and teasing her bust, which she off-set with an aquamarine necklace of stones which cascaded between her assets.

Star quality: Shanina Shaik sparkles in a silver dramatically plunging gown and shows off her incredible pins as she attends the amFAR Gala in Hong Kong 

Te gown was adorned at the front with a giant mauve bow, the rest of the outfit silver and sparkling.

While the back of the gown cascaded to the floor behind her, the front featured a high-cut, slanted hem, which showed off her toned pins.

She wore black strap heels to the look and offset the silver dress with a hot pink clutch.

The model teamed her necklace with earrings of the same jewels, and wore her chestnut tresses up, allowing two strands to fall playfully around her features.

Sweeping statement: While the back of the gown cascaded to the floor behind her, the front featured a high-cut, slanted hem, which showed off her toned pins

She smouldered for the cameras with a caramel sweep of foundation and a pop of clay pink to her lips. 

Shanina had previously gushed over her phenomenal bridal shower when she posted a heartfelt thank you to her close girl pals on Instagram following the extravagant soiree.

Accompanied with the note, the model documented her gorgeous look for the swanky soiree as she donned a pretty floral dress.

Fans were given a further glimpse at her very plush party, which was complete with an impressive flower wall as well as a dessert bar and floral ice cubes.

Blossoming beginnings: Shanina Shaik gushed over her lavish bridal shower complete with signature cocktails and Tom Ford gifts

Must be love: The stunning model, 27, is going to be heading down the aisle to marry her fiancé DJ Ruckus

The bride-to-be thanked her close girl pals for making her wedding send-off 'so beautiful and special'.

Shanina penned on social media: 'Thank you to everyone who made my Bridal Shower so beautiful and special! #SoonToBeMrsAndrews.' (sic) 

The  statuesque brunette documented her soiree, via Instagram, complete with Tom Ford gifts, signature cocktails, flower ice cubes and pink choc-dipped strawberries. 

Before the bridal party had even commenced, the Victoria's Secret model posted a number of presents she had been gifted by American fashion designer Tom Ford.

Blooming lovely: Fans were given a further glimpse at her very plush party, which was complete with an impressive flower wall as well as a dessert bar and floral ice cubes

Ice hot: The bride-to-be thanked her close girl pals for making her wedding send-off 'so beautiful and special'

A-list guest list: Shanina penned on social media 'Thank you to everyone who made my Bridal Shower so beautiful and special! #SoonToBeMrsAndrews' (sic)

item.title: Off-duty chic! Duckie Thot cuts a casual figure as she teams up with musician Flume for new Bonds campaign after calling for more diversity in modelling
item.description: She statuesque beauty, known for her seemingly endless legs and enviable propotions.
item.content:encoded:
She statuesque beauty, known for her seemingly endless legs and enviable propotions.

And model Duckie Thot proved she's just as hot off the runway, while starring in a new Bonds Originals campaign.

The 22-year-old Sudanese-born Aussie star, born Nyadak, teamed up with musician Flume this week to model Bonds' new sweats range.

Red hot! Duckie Thot teamed up with musician Flume this week to model Bonds' new sweats range

The former Australia’s Next Top Model contestant sports a bright red ensemble paired with black sneakers.

DJ Flume, born Harley Edward Streten, rocks a light blue hoodie and matching sweats while posing alongside the striking brunette.

It comes after Duckie called for more cultural diversity Down Under after launching a highly successful career abroad.

Stunning: The statuesque beauty proved she's just as hot off the runway, while sporting red sweats and black sneakers

The New York-based star told The Sunday Telegraph that while there is some variety, there is still a long way to go.

'I want to see more different faces. I want to see more different races and different people and different things I haven't seen before,' she said.

'It is across the board globally and it is in every single market.

She continued: 'It is a push that needs to happen and it is being done. Even with the last few (fashion) seasons, we are seeing a massive turnaround across the board. It is lovely to see.'

Calling for change: It comes after Duckie called for more cultural diversity Down Under after launching a highly successful career abroad

More variety: 'I want to see more different faces. I want to see more different races and different people and different things I haven't seen before,' she said

Earlier this year, the statuesque beauty revealed she takes her own makeup on shoots because makeup artists struggle to find the right shade for her 'really dark' complexion.

The stunning Aussie, who counts Karl Lagerfeld and Rihanna as friends, said she had been forced to order makeup from abroad because she struggled to find cosmetics that matched her skin tone.

She previously told ES magazine: 'I take my own make-up to shoots every time. I'll give the make-up artist the space and we'll shoot. 

'If it doesn't look good, then we'll change to what I know works. If you're doing make-up on my skin, no one knows my face more than me.' 

'I found it difficult': Earlier this year, the statuesque beauty revealed she takes her own makeup on shoots because stylists struggle to find the right shade for her 'really dark' complexion

The star, who shot to fame after starring in the Pirelli calendar last year, added: 'Growing up, make-up was ordered online, shipped from America or London.

'I found it difficult — I'm really, really dark: sometimes even the MAC shades weren't dark enough.'

Thot first tasted the spotlight when she was a contestant on Australia's Next Top Model in 2013 but said moving to America gave her career a boost.

She said of her home country: 'No one wants to go out there because they don't want to sit on a plane for 24 hours. So I had to do the opposite and put myself where everyone wanted to be.'

Fashion fame: Thot first tasted the spotlight when she was a contestant on Australia's Next Top Model in 2013 but said moving to America gave her career a boost

Duckie (with L-R Lottie Moss, Rita Ora, Jeremy Scott and Emily Blackwell) shot to fame after starring in the Pirelli calendar last year and has since walked the runway for Rihanna

Friends in high places: Duckie with legendary Chanel designer Karl Lagerfeld at a New York fashion party in October 2017

The catwalk queen now counts Rihanna among her friends, and said the singer has 'become a mentor to me, and also a great confidante'.

'She tells me not to take things personally because the business is just that: a business,' she said.

The full interview appears in this week's fashion edition of ES magazine, out Thursday February 15.
item.dc:alternative: Duckie´s modelling career was boosted when she moved from Australia to the US.

item.title: Madison Beer puts on an eye-popping performance in a ripped corset dress and racy thigh-high boots as her As She Pleases tour hits London
item.description: The pop princess, 19, made sure to turn heads for all the right reasons as she brought her As She Pleases tour to London's O2 Academy Islington on Sunday night.
item.content:encoded:
She knows how to put on an eye-catching performance. 

And Madison Beer made sure to turn heads for all the right reasons as she brought her As She Pleases tour to London's O2 Academy Islington on Sunday night.

The pop princess, 19, had all eyes on her as she worked her magic on stage in a ripped corset dress and racy thigh-high boots.

Strutting her stuff: Madison Beer made sure to turn heads for all the right reasons as she brought her As She Pleases tour to London's O2 Academy Islington on Sunday night 

The Say It To My Face hitmaker showed off her enviable figure in her fitted white dress, teamed with a black bomber jacket draped over her elbows.

Madison completed her sassy stage look with a pair of black thigh-high boots.

The singer styled her long brunette hair into a sleek high ponytail with a pair of gold hoops to finish off her outfit.

The starlet accentuated her pretty features with natural make-up as she enjoyed her moment in the spotlight.    

Work it: The pop princess, 19, had all eyes on her as she worked her magic on stage in a ripped corset dress and racy thigh-high boots 

Chic: The Say It To My Face hitmaker showed off her enviable figure in her fitted white dress, teamed with a black bomber jacket draped over her elbows

Talented: Madison completed her sassy stage look with a pair of black thigh-high boots

Girls just wanna have fun: The singer styled her long brunette hair into a sleek high ponytail with a pair of gold hoops to finish off her outfit

Madison is currently touring across the UK, Europe and USA in a mini-tour to promote her new music. 

The songstress, who was discovered by Justin Bieber on YouTube when she was just 13, released her seven-track EP, As She Pleases, in just February this year. 

As well as her exciting music career, Madison is currently in a new romance with beau Zack Bia.

Belt it out: Madison made sure all eyes were on her as she performed tracks from her new EP 

Lights, camera, action: The talented teenager looked like a true professional as she took to the stage in front of a delighted crowd 

Talented: The songstress, who was discovered by Justin Bieber on YouTube when she was just 13, released her seven-track EP, As She Pleases, in just February this year

The couple have been inseparable since going public with their romance in December, enjoying several dates around West Hollywood.

It's not known how long they've been dating, but Zack posted a loved-up snap of the pair on his Instagram on November 24.

Madison was previously linked to Brooklyn Beckham, after they were reported to have been seeing each other after they were spotted kissing during a shopping trip to Barney's in Beverly Hills in July.

But the singer revealed she couldn't continue their romance after Victoria and David Beckham's eldest son relocated to New York City, where he's studying photography.

Loved-up: Madison is currently in a new romance with beau Zack Bia

Ex in the city: The singing sensation was previously linked to Brooklyn Beckham but split when he relocated to New York City to study

item.title: 'It just happened': Roseanne Barr reveals it took only three weeks to get a deal for her rebooted sitcom... after her controversial remarks in support of President Trump
item.description: The 90s comedy standout wore her brown locks wavy and parted, alternating between diamond earrings on the GMA appearance and hoop earrings at the Paley Center New York.
item.content:encoded:
With just a day left before the premiere, Roseanne Barr and the gang are promoting the Roseanne reboot everywhere.

They were in New York City on Monday to promote the revived sitcom - which is returning after a 20-year absence from TV - on Good Morning America, followed by a panel at the Paley Center New York.

The actress, 65, wore an olive green floral shirt over a lacy cream top with a matching scarf, dark blue jeans and a pearl necklace to the set of the ABC morning show, in which she was seated on the program's trademark plaid couch with a quilted cover alongside co-stars John Goodman and Laurie Metcalf.

Scroll below for video 

Happy day: Roseanne, 65, was flanked by co-stars Laurie Metcalf, 62, and John Goodman, 65, on Good Morning America Monday to promote the rebooted show, with Lecy Goranson, 43, and Sarah Chalke, 41, in the background 

At the Paley Center New York, she was clad in black dress with a black shawl and black gloves with grey sneakers.

In both appearances, the 90s comedy standout wore her brown locks wavy and parted, alternating between diamond earrings on the GMA appearance and hoop earrings at the Paley Center New York.

Co-stars Sara Gilbert, Michael Fishman, Lecy Goranson and Sarah Chalke were present for both appearances in the Big Apple to promote the rebooted program, which originally ran from 1989 thru 1997.

On the morning show Monday, Barr said that the reboot 'just happened' organically after Goodman appeared on Gilbert's The Talk last year.

Ready to go: The 90s superstar looked relaxed as she sat on the show's trademark couch that was brought to the GMA set

Playing games! The cast had some fun on the breakfast TV show

Together again: The cast posed with the show's Michael Strahan on Monday

Consistent: Metcalf has been busy with The Big Bang Theory since 2007

'Sara and John were on Sara's talk show and they did a little sketch,' Roseanne said. 'It got a lot of attention. Sara called me and said, "Would you want to do a reunion show?" and I said, "Yeah, definitely."

'I said, "What about John?" She goes, "Oh, John's in." I said, "Well of course then I'm in." Everybody was in, and so then it went from a special to a series and we had a deal in three weeks.'

The slate of appearances came days after Roseanne made headlines with a strong show of support for President Donald Trump as she appeared on the Thursday show of one of Trump's peskiest detractors, Jimmy Kimmel.

Leading lady: Roseanne wore a dark ensemble as she stood on the red carpet in NYC 

Say cheese: (L-R) Goranson, Fishman, Roseanne, Goodman and Chalke posed for a group shot on the red carpet

Kimmel told Roseanne he was 'shocked' over Roseanne's previously-stated support of the commander-in-chief, as he knew her as 'a very socially liberal person in general.'

Roseanne, who appeared alongside Goodman on the late night program, said that it wasn't her that changed, but the Democratic party and its supporters who'd gone off the deep end.

'I’m still the same: You all moved! You all went so f*****g far out you lost everybody! I mean, seriously,' she said. 'A lot of us, no matter who we voted for, we don’t want to see our president fail.'

She asked Kimmel if he would prefer if Trump's Vice President Mike Pence - controversial for many of his own views and actions - were to sit in the big chair. She said: 'We don’t want [Mike] Pence! Are you f*****g kidding me? You want Pence? You want Pence for the freaking president? Well then, zip that f*****g lip!'

Roseanne returns to the air Tuesday at 8/7c on ABC. 

Back from the dead: While Goodman's character Dan was killed off in the show's 1997 finale, he's brought back to life with a clever twist of writing in the reboot 

Together again: Zach Braff and Chalke had a bit of a Scrubs reunion on the red carpet of the Paley event in NYC

They were in New York City on Monday to promote the revived sitcom - which is returning after a 20-year absence from TV - on Good Morning America followed by a panel at the Paley Center New York. The actress, 65, wore an olive green floral shirt over a lacy cream top with a matching scarf and dark blue jeans to the set of the ABC morning show, in which she was seated on the program's trademark plaid couch with a quilted cover alongside co-stars John Goodman and Laurie Metcalf.

item.title: Makeup-free Dua Lipa keeps her head down as she leaves a dentist office in Australia... nearly two weeks after getting her wisdom teeth pulled
item.description: Singer Dua Lipa, 22, was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable and relaxed.
item.content:encoded:
Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable.

The singer wore a green button-down top styled as a crop top, khaki army pants and a pair of colorful 'dad' sneakers—a huge trend among stars at the moment.

The 22-year-old New Rules hit-maker recently revealed she underwent a wisdom teeth removal that had caused her to cancel scheduled performances.

Healing just fine: Singer Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Australia on Sunday afternoon

The singer had been down under for the month of March as the opening act for the Australian and New Zealand leg of Bruno Mars' 24K Magic World Tour. 

On March 14 she announced on Twitter that she had to cancel some of her shows due to emergency oral surgery and awful pain in her wisdom teeth. 

She dropped out of two Brisbane shows that were originally scheduled for March 14 and 15. 

Back on the road: The singer wears army pants and the dad sneaker trend while checking up on her healing teeth

'Im so sorry to have to cancel some of my support shows with @brunomars. I’ve been performing with an awful pain due to my wisdom teeth and as advised by my dentist and oral surgeon I have had to have them imminently removed," she tweeted. 

'I have been enjoying this tour so much and i’m so upset that life has gotten in the way but hopefully i’ll have a speedy recovery and make it back as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding xx,' she added. 

Dua quickly reemerged and performed in Melbourne the following Monday post-surgery, despite being in the early stages of recovery. 

Global success: Her hit single New Rules continues to break records despite being released last summer

Her biggest single to date, New Rules, just garnered over 1.1 billion views on YouTube over the weekend. 

It is the seventh video released in 2017 to achieve this record of success on the video streaming network. 

She will be among the list of performers at some of this summer's biggest music festivals including Bonnaroo, Lollapalooza and Panorama NYC. 

Looking good: The brunette beauty was wearing red when she hit Jimmy Kimmel in this performance that aired on Valentine's Day
item.dc:abstract: She seems to be healing just fine and getting back to her day-to-day activities. Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable and relaxed. She wore a green button-down top styled as a crop top, khaki army pants and a pair of colorful 'dad' sneakers—a huge trend among stars at the moment. The 22-year-old 'New Rules' hit-maker recently revealed she underwent a wisdom teeth removal that had caused her to cancel scheduled performances.

item.title: 'I have amazing Karma!': Paris Hilton shares her relief after recovering $2M engagement ring she LOST at Miami nightclub
item.description: The incident took place early on Friday at RC Cola Plant at Mana Wynwood, a Miami nightclub that spans nearly 50,000 sq. feet.
item.content:encoded:
Paris Hilton is breathing a $2 million sigh of relief.

The 37-year-old socialite revealed via social media that she had lost her 20-carat engagement ring her boyfriend Chris Zylka proposed to her with earlier this year, but the actor later found it.

'I have amazing Karma!' the Stars Are Blind singer tweeted Monday, before explaining the course of events that led to the seven-figure fiasco.

Scroll below for video 

Lovebirds: Paris Hilton, 37, and fiance Chris Zylka, 32, were snapped in Miami on Saturday after she briefly lost her $2 million engagement ring, which was later found in an ice bucket 

'The ring was just so heavy and big that while I was dancing it literally flew off my finger into an ice bucket a couple of tables over,' Hilton explained. 'Thank God by some miracle my fiancé found it before someone else did and most likely would not have returned it.'

The 5ft8 fashionista added, 'I am so lucky!'

The incident took place early on Friday at RC Cola Plant at Mana Wynwood, a Miami nightclub that spans nearly 50,000 sq. feet. After Paris realized the jewelry was missing, Zylka led the charge of security guards combing through the club's VIP section.

'Paris was dancing with her hands in the air, and the next minute her giant ring had flown off,' an insider told Page Six. 'She was really panicked as the venue was packed and very dark, it was the early hours of the morning and it was crazy in there.'

Exuberant: Paris was thrilled as she took to Twitter Monday to explain what had happened 

Bling! The multi-million dollar ring was designed by Los Angeles jeweler Michael Greene 

The eyewitness told the outlet that 'security started an exhaustive search of the VIP area with torches, led by Chris and with the help of other patrons' and that 'there was a frantic scramble with everyone looking for it, people were crawling on the floor, under tables, under other people’s feet, and under seats.'

Eventually, the ring was located in the aforementioned ice bucket.

The eyewitness told the outlet that 'it was amazing that they managed to even see that huge diamond in an ice bucket,' and that 'Paris cried with relief when it was safely back on her finger.'

Zylka, a 32-year-old model/actor who's been seen on The Leftovers and The Amazing Spider-Man, had the multi-million dollar ring designed by Los Angeles jeweler Michael Greene, basing it off of a design of a ring Paris was partial to from the collection of her mother, Kathy Hilton.

'The ring was so gorgeous and sparkling,' the Nothing in This World songstress told People earlier this year. 'I was shaking as I put it on. It is the most beautiful ring that I have ever seen!'

'I have amazing Karma!' the Stars Are Blind singer tweeted Monday, before explaining the course of events that led to the seven-figure fiasco.

item.title: 'I still want a relationship with her!' Desperate Stephen Belafonte exhibits his 'A' tattoo in dedication to ex Mel B's daughter Angel, 10 ... as he continues to pursue step-parent visitation rights
item.description: Stephen Belafonte, 42, has spoken lovingly about his step-daughter Angel, 10, as he continues to pursue visitation rights with her and has also showed off an 'A' tattoo in dedication to her.
item.content:encoded:
Stephen Belafonte has spoken lovingly about his step-daughter Angel, 10, as he continues to pursue visitation rights with her.

The producer, 42 - who finalised his divorce from Mel B in December - despairingly admitted to TMZ that while he didn't want to be 'disrespectful' of anyone, he was still fighting to see the youngster 'through the courts' - following reports that her biological dad Eddie Murphy is 'not interested in seeing her.'

To further prove his point Stephen showed cameras an 'A' tattoo on his wrist in dedication to Angel and admitted that he wanted the same relationship with her as he did while he was in a marriage with the former Spice Girl. 

'I'm fighting to see her!' Stephen Belafonte, 42, has spoken about his step-daughter Angel, 10, as he continues to pursue visitation rights with her and has also showed off an 'A' tattoo in dedication to her

Stephen and Mel divorced in December after a bitter, seven-month battle in which lurid tales of kinky sex, drug and alcohol abuse and allegations of domestic violence made headlines. 

And while Belafonte was granted joint custody of their six-year-old daughter Madison, he is now hoping for step-parent visitation rights with step-daughter Angel. 

On Monday, Stephen truly detailed his love for Angel as he showed off the letter tattoo: 'You see this A? This is for Angel', before going on to address his legal battle to see her.

'I'm going to do it through the courts. I don't want to be disrespectful to anyone but I'm fighting to see my daughter. 

Determined: The producer - who finalised his divorce from Mel B in December - despairingly admitted to TMZ that while he didn't want to be 'disrespectful' of anyone, he was still fighting to see the youngster 'through the courts' 

Dad role: He admitted that he wanted the same relationship with Angel (pictured together in happier times in 2009) as he did while he was in a marriage with the former Spice Girl

'I don't get money to see my daughter. There is no upside. I actually spend money to see my daughter... my stepdaughter, I guess. It's a touchy subject.'

He also addressed Eddie Murphy's reportedly strained relationship with Angel.   

'I don't know that relationship. I was with my wife for ten years. I have nothing against Eddie or anyone else. I still want to have that relationship I had for ten years.'

This comes after reports of Eddie ‘not being interested’ in seeing his 10-year-old daughter Angel, according to a Los Angeles court.

Meanwhile, Stephen - who helped raise Angel during his 10-year marriage to Mel - is trying to persuade a judge to grant him step-parent visitation with the child, whom, he says, ‘has called me dad since she started to talk.’

Mel is vehemently opposing his efforts, refusing to let him see her daughter.

Not in the picture: This comes following reports that Angel's biological dad Eddie Murphy is 'not interested in seeing her'

'It's a touchy subject': Stephen - who helped raise Angel during his 10-year marriage to Mel - is trying to persuade a judge to grant him step-parent visitation with the child, whom, he says, ‘has called me dad since she started to talk’

But Belafonte’s lawyer, Grace Jamra, said that she had been trying to reach Murphy, Angel’s biological dad, to discuss Belafonte’s step-parent request but to no avail.   

Jamra said she was told by his lawyers that Murphy is simply ‘not interested.’

‘Mr Murphy has had no contact with the child,’ she told the court.

Jamra added that she had tried to serve Murphy with legal papers, but ‘Mr. Murphy is avoiding service.’

As part of their divorce settlement, Mel - real name Melanie Brown - and Belafonte were to split the proceeds of their former marital home in LA, worth an estimated $6-7 million.

He was given joint-custody of his daughter with Mel, six-year-old Madison, and he went back to court to try to win step-parent rights to visit Angel.

Speaking of Angel (Far L), Stephen continued: 'I don't get money to see my daughter. There is no upside. I actually spend money to see my daughter... my stepdaughter, I guess. It's a touchy subject'

Bitter: Stephen and Mel divorced in December after a bitter, seven-month battle in which tales of kinky sex, drug and alcohol abuse and allegations of domestic violence made headlines

But Mel has consistently blocked his efforts to spend time with Angel, calling him in court papers a ‘bad man’ and accusing him of being violent and abusive during their 10-year marriage.  

The couple’s marriage fell apart in March last year when Brown filed for divorce, citing irreconcilable differences, and she took out a domestic violence restraining order against Belafonte, accusing him of years of abuse against her, embezzling $10 million of her money and keeping her drugged during much of their marriage.

She also took out a civil harassment restraining order against the couple’s beautiful blonde nanny Lorraine Gilles whom she branded a ‘home wrecker’ and ‘prostitute’ she claimed had an affair with Belafonte and conspired with him against her by threatening to release embarrassing sex videos of Mel.

Explosive: The couple’s marriage fell apart in March last year when Brown filed for divorce, citing irreconcilable differences, and she took out a domestic violence restraining order against Belafonte

Dramatic: Belafonte who accused his estranged wife of being addicted to cocaine and alcohol during their marriage repeatedly denied Mel's charges

Over the following seven months intimate details were revealed about the couple’s sex life during their marriage, including three-ways with German-born Gilles who claimed to have had a seven-year sexual relationship with the British singer.

Belafonte who accused his estranged wife of being addicted to cocaine and alcohol during their marriage - and Gilles, 26 - repeatedly denied Mel's charges against them and fought the restraining orders through 20-plus court hearings till, at last, the case was set to go to trial in November 2017. 

It was halted at the last minute after the former couple came to a private settlement.

The divorce became final last December 15 with Mel agreeing to pay Belafonte $15,000 a month in spousal support until December 2020. 

Settlement: The divorce became final last December 15 with Mel agreeing to pay Belafonte $15,000 a month in spousal support until December 2020

To further prove his point Stephen showed cameras an 'A' tattoo on his wrist in dedication to Angel and admitted that he wanted the same relationship with her as he did while he was in a marriage with the former Spice Girl.
