item.title: So much to do! Makeup-free Malin Akerman appears stressed-out in Beverly Hills as she chats on phone then rushes to a meeting
item.description: Malin Akerman, 39, was spotted looking chic in Beverly Hills on Friday heading to a meeting in a head-to-toe black ensemble. She seemed to wear almost no makeup and her hair was a frizzy.
item.content:encoded:
She has several films coming out in the near future.

So that would explain why Malin Akerman looked so frantic when she stepped out in Beverly Hills on Friday afternoon. 

The 39-year-old actress appeared to be in a rush as she talked on her cell phone while seeen outside The Hatchery, a workspace for writers.   

Style statement: Actress Malin Akerman was spotted in Beverly Hills on Friday heading to a meeting

To stay warm in L.A.'s recent chillier temperatures, the star covered up with a plaid and studded over-sized blanket scarf. 

She paired the cozy piece with black distressed and ripped skinny jeans that were cropped right above the ankle. 

As for her shoes, she added the perfect pair of bucked black booties with silver western style accents on the sides. 

Busy, busy gal: She made sure to take some calls along the way to her meeting 

Stressed out: The Billions actress looked frantic as she chatted on the phone on her way to a meeting

Every California girl loves her accessories, and Malin didn't disappoint with her own.

The Rock Of Ages actress kept her belongings in a medium-sized black crossbody bag and hid from the sun in large dark brown sunglasses.

Malin also wore a dainty gold necklace underneath her giant blanket scarf.

Blonde beauty: Malin gets business done as she prepares for her film 'Rampage' to hit theaters next month

Casual Friday: Malin wore the perfect outfit for running errands while still managing to look stylish

The Billions actress will star in the film Rampage alongside Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson, hitting theaters April 13. 

Rampage tells the story about an extremely intelligent gorilla that goes mad in an experiment gone wrong. 

This will be Malin's first time playing a villain in a film as her character Claire Wyden seeks to create a powerful weapon that she can sell for money. 

The film also stars Naomi Harris and Joe Manganiello. 

Going strong: The 39-year-old shared a season three poster from her show Billions which premiered on Sunday
item.dc:abstract: She has several films coming out in the near future. So that would explain why Malin Akerman looked so frantic when she stepped out in Beverly Hills on Friday afternoon. The 39-year-old actress appeared to be in a rush as she talked on her cell phone while seeen outside The Hatchery, a workspace for writers.

item.title: Bikini-clad Lilly Becker flaunts her incredibly svelte figure and flashes a glimpse of underboob during Miami getaway with son Amadeus
item.description: The Dutch model looked sensational as she flaunted her enviable figure in black scalloped bikini which accentuated her underboob while she frolicked in the idyllic sea.
item.content:encoded:
It has been a tense few months for her family after her husband Boris Becker was declared bankrupt in June.

Despite her personal woes, Lilly Becker, 41, took a well-deserved break away and soaked up the sun alongside her eight-year-old son Amadeus in Miami, Florida on Sunday.

The Dutch model looked sensational as she flaunted her enviable figure in black scalloped bikini which accentuated her underboob while she frolicked in the idyllic sea.

Seas the day: Lilly Becker, 41, took a well-deserved break away and soaked up the sun in Miami, Florida on Sunday

The fashion star highlighted her incredibly taut stomach and narrow midriff while she walked along the sand inbetween her cooling dips in the ocean.

Continuing her figure-flaunting display, Lilly's matching bikini bottoms showcased her slender pins and hugged her pert derriere with aplomb.

The European beauty donned a pair of oversized reflective shades while she styled her dark locks into waist-length braids.

Taking a break from the sunshine, she later covered her svelte figure in a fringe semi-sheer kaftan while she kissed her little boy Amadeus as he played along the shore.  

Vitamin sea: The Dutch model looked sensational as she flaunted her enviable figure in black scalloped bikini which accentuated her underboob while she frolicked in the idyllic sea

Mum knows best: Taking a break from the sunshine, she later covered her svelte figure in a fringe semi-sheer kaftan 

Bond: She kissed her little boy Amadeus as he played along the shore 

Looking adorable, Lilly's boy sported a pair of red goggles with his swim shorts as they splashed around in the sea. 

Her outing comes nine months after her husband Boris' financial woes hit the headlines in June when it was reported that he never paid back an undisclosed debt to a private bank.

In October, the 50-year-old insisted that his bankruptcy was a 'misunderstanding', explaining that he is 'in a position' to settle the bill.

Speaking to The Times, the former Tennis pro claimed that the situation arose because of a dispute over the interest he owes.

Fighting fit: She raced into the water with a pal

Abs-olutely: The fashion star highlighted her incredibly taut stomach and narrow midriff while she walked along the sand inbetween her cooling dips in the ocean

Water about that: Continuing her figure-flaunting display, Lilly's matching bikini bottoms showcased her slender pins and hugged her pert derriere with aplomb

Golden: The European beauty donned a pair of oversized reflective shades

Mane attraction: She styled her dark locks into waist-length braids

He said: 'I am in a position to settle to an amount that I owe. It's a bit like if you go to a restaurant and order a chicken sandwich and a cola and the bill is £10,000.

'I'd like to go over the bill with the restaurant owner and that chance hasn't been given to me. That's why I call this a big misunderstanding. I'm not running away. I live in the middle of London. I'm not hiding.'

There is a possibility Boris' bankruptcy could be annulled should he settle his dispute in the coming months.

In light of his woes, the German star has set his sights on reaching a resolution, which he deemed as 'important' to him.

Flaunt it: She proudly showcased her incredible figure

Cheeky: Lilly highlighted her peachy derriere as she frolicked through the water

Fix up: Lilly readjusted her swimwear as she cooled down in the water 

Bikini babe: She flashed her intricate inking on her wrist while fixing her bikini top 

Working it out: She beamed as she splashed around the water

Having fun: Lilly leaned in to hug her son

He said: 'I would like to have an annulment. It's important to me. I could sit it out and say, "My doctor is telling me I need a holiday; my wife hasn't seen me much." Theoretically I could do that, but that is the last thing I want to do. To clarify, I want to settle the bill and move on with my life.'

And the former Wimbledon champion explained that he takes 'full responsibility' for his financial situation but had the bank played theoretical tennis 'doubles' with him, he would have avoided his bankruptcy.

His frank interview comes after the sportsman reportedly earned in the region of £100million throughout his career, but was declared bankrupt in June over a £3.3million debt.

Speaking in an interview with Swiss newspaper, Neue Zürcher Zeitung, Mr Becker said: 'It's crazy to think I'm broke'.

Splish splash: The pair cuddled in the water 

Cooling down: She enjoyed a swim in the sea

Stepping out: Lilly looked utterly relaxed as she let the sunshine wash over her

Natural: She showcased her natural beauty while out for the day

Chilled: Her outing comes nine months after her husband Boris' financial woes hit the headlines in June when it was reported that he never paid back an undisclosed debt to a private bank

'Position': In October, the 50-year-old insisted that his bankruptcy was a 'misunderstanding', explaining that he is 'in a position' to settle the bill

'I have enough national and international deals to earn an income that will allow me to pay my staff on time and carry on my life as normal. It's true that I have been in bankruptcy since June 21, but it's wrong that I am broke.' 

Boris married his first wife Barbara in December 1993, with the couple going on to have Noah and Elias.

However in the summer of 1999, while Barbara was seven months pregnant with Elias, Boris fathered his daughter Anna during a one-night-stand with Russian model Angela Ermakova at Nobu in London.

When Barbara found out about the one night stand she moved to Florida and filed for divorce.

Situation: Speaking to The Times, the former Tennis pro claimed that the situation arose because of a dispute over the interest he owes

Relaxed: Lilly looked relaxed as she stood by the shore with her son

She fought their pre-nuptial agreement and managed to win more than £14million and the custody of both sons in a divorce court.

Although Boris disputed paternity, a DNA test in February 2001 proved that he was the father and he agreed to support Anna, now a budding model, and obtained joint custody in November 2007.

After moving to Switzerland and enjoying a few years out of in the media spotlight, Becker remarried in 12 June 2009 in St Moritz, Switzerland to the Dutch model. 

Responsibility: And the former Wimbledon champion explained that he takes 'full responsibility' for his financial situation but had the bank played theoretical tennis 'doubles' with him, he would have avoided his bankruptcy
item.dc:abstract: It has been a tense few months for her family after her husband Boris Becker was declared bankrupt in June. Despite her personal woes, Lilly Becker, 41, took a well-deserved break away and soaked up the sun alongside her eight-year-old son Amadeus in Miami, Florida on Sunday.

item.title: Liev Schreiber steps out in camel coat and red beanie to walk dog in NYC and gives fond farewell to mystery woman
item.description: The 50-year-old actor stepped out in his favored camel coat on Monday in New York City.
item.content:encoded:
Liev Schreiber stepped out in his favored camel coat on Monday in New York City.

The 50-year-old actor sported the long overcoat over a black sweatshirt and sweatpants while running errands in Manhattan.

He was hard to miss in a bright red beanie and completed his outfit with white sneakers.

Red beanie: Liev Schreiber stood out in a red beanie on Monday while out and about in New York City

The Ray Donovan star wore the same coat and beanie while also walking his dog.

He wore faded blue jeans while taking his cute little pooch Woody for a stroll. 

Ray and Woody stopped in front of The Bowery Hotel as the actor chatted with a mystery brunette.

They gave each other a side kiss good-bye as the actor made his way home. 

Fond farewell: The 50-year-old actor gave a side kiss good-bye to a mystery brunette

Cute pooch: The Isle Of Dogs star took his cute pooch Woodrow for a stroll

Sidewalk conversation: Ray walked and talked while on the sidewalk with his dog

Ray has been romantically linked since late last year to former Miss South Dakota Taylor Nielsen, 26.

Liev and former partner Naomi Watts, 49, announced their split in September 2016 after 11 years together.

They have sons Sasha, 10, and nine-year-old Kai together. 

Going strong: Taylor Nielsen is shown in January with Liev and his boys Sasha and Kai in NYC

Liev and his boys participated in the March For Our Lives rally on Saturday in New York City.

The actor also has been promoting his latest film Isle Of Dogs.

The Wes Anderson stop-motion animated film opened on Friday in the US. 

Former couple: Liev and former partner Naomi Watts are shown in September 2016 in Italy shortly before announcing their split

item.title: She's ripped! Anne Hathaway demonstrates her strength while lifting weights in Einstein tank top and sporty leggings at the gym
item.description: The Oceans Eight star, 35, gave it her all while lifting weights during a strenuous workout at her local West Hollywood gym.
item.content:encoded:
Anne Hathaway made it clear that she has brains, brawn and beauty while getting her sweat on this Monday.

The Oceans Eight star, 35, gave it her all while lifting weights during a strenuous workout at her local West Hollywood gym.  

There, the Academy Award winning actress acknowledged her intellectual side with black Albert Einstein tank but kept things sporty with Adidas sneakers while pumping iron and displaying her toned arms at the exercise establishment.

Stronger than she looks! Anne Hathaway gave it her all while lifting weights at her local West Hollywood gym Monday, where she teamed an Albert Einstein tank top with sporty layers

Anne — who is an alum of both Vassar College and New York University — was ready for whatever as she laid back on the bench wearing basic black athletic-wear.

The Brokeback Mountain actress kept her dark tresses out of her face with the aid of a black Nike ballcap. 

A muscular male trainer egged the starlet on while she gave 100% to her workout.

After lifting, the Princess Diaries darling cooled down with a bit of stretching.

Her cheerleader! The Brokeback Mountain actress kept her dark tresses out of her face with the aid of a black Nike ballcap while a muscular male trainer kept her focused as she bench-pressed

Lean into it! After lifting, the Princess Diaries darling cooled down with a bit of stretching

The Les Miserables actress bent her body at the waist and reached to the ground to ease her arms and legs.

After getting in a rigorous workout, the star got picked up by hubby Adam Shulman.

The American Dream actor gave Anne a smooch before hopping into the passenger seat of their white SUV and driving off with his love.

It looked like the couple's two-year-old son Jonathan Rosebanks Shulman stayed at home during the quick trip to the gym. 

Getting the gal! After getting in a rigorous workout, the star got picked up by hubby Adam Shulman, who kissed his wife of five years before hopping into the passenger seat

Missing one? It looked like the couple's two-year-old son Jonathan Rosebanks Shulman stayed at home during the quick trip to the gym. The duo are seen at the 2015 Met Gala above

The Hollywood star is gearing up for her next big film release, Ocean's Eight, which is the female-centered spin-off of the Ocean's Trilogy directed by Gary Ross.

Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Mindy Kaling, Rihanna, Helena Bonham Carter, Sarah Paulson, Awkwafina, Damian Lewis and Richard Armitage are among the cast.

Anne excitedly shared a photo of the movie's poster late last year with a caption that read: 'Boom #Oceans8 in theatres June 2018.'

Oceans Eight is set to steal the hearts of movie-goers upon its June 8 2018 release. 

Coming soon! The Hollywood star is gearing up for her next big film release, Ocean's Eight, which is the female-centered spin-off of the Ocean's Trilogy and is set for release June 8 2018

item.title: Date with dad! Anne Hathaway keeps it casual in flowing sweatshirt and white trousers as she shops at farmers' market with father
item.description: On Sunday, Anne Hathaway dressed for comfort and went au naturel as she picked up fresh produce and healthy food at a Studio City farmers' market with her dad.
item.content:encoded:
She was regal in Princess Diaries and learned to be ultra chic in The Devil Wears Prada.

But on Sunday, Anne Hathaway dressed for comfort as she shopped at a Studio City farmers' market with her dad, Gerald Hathaway. 

The 35-year-old Oscar winner went au naturel as she picked up some fresh produce and healthy food. 

Scroll down for video 

Sunday shopping: Anne Hathaway picked up some fresh produce with her father at a Studio City farmers' market 

Dressed in all white, the mother-of-one supported her co-star Rihanna in an over-sized Fenty sweatshirt and tight pants that cut off at the ankle.

She teamed her outfit up with white slip-on shoes featuring black panels at the sides and kept her brown tresses down in a relaxed style.

Prepped for the Southern California sun, the starlet kept some large cat-eye sunglasses over her eyes.

Wholesome in white: The Academy Award winner dressed down for the outing in an over-sized Fenty by Rihanna sweatshirt

Father-daughter time: The brunette beauty was joined by her father, Gerald Hathaway, for the quick outing 

Anne toted along a large wicker purse with dark leather detailing, as well as a white reusable bag that she filled with fresh cilantro and other greens.

The brunette beauty was joined by her father, who was clad in a black Philadelphia Eagles hoodie and a white baseball cap.

He sported red lace-up sneakers and held on to a beige reusable bag for the quick shopping trip. 

Health conscious: Anne stopped by some stands that sold fresh cauliflower and strawberries on the sunny Los Angeles day 

Eco-friendly: Both the actress and her father carried reusable shopping bags that they filled up with cilantro and other greens 

At one point, the Dark Knight Rises star stopped by some stands selling fresh cauliflower and strawberries.

She looked relaxed and happy as she handed over cash to the vendor on the sunny Los Angeles day. 

Not seen with the 35-year-old was her husband, Adam Shulman, or her 2-year-old son Jonathan. 

Anne recently took to social media to reflect on her 2013 Oscars win.

Bargain shopper: The Dark Knight Rises star kept a pair of black cat-eye sunglasses over her eyes as she paid for her groceries 

The on-screen beauty took home the statue for Best Supporting Actress for her role in  Les Misérables, but criticism quickly grew online.

Five years after the fact, Anne wrote in an Instagram post: 'A bunch of corny haters were getting lots of attention from the media for being haters but you know what? It was still the best.'

On her night at the awards show, the actress added: 'I had to change my dress last minute and so it looked like my nipples were hard, I had full blown laryngitis and had to sing.' 

On the hunt: The actress went au naturel for her day of shopping and kept her brown tresses down in a relaxed style

In a 2016 interview with The Guardian, Anne had a different take on the whole ceremony.

'I had to stand up in front of people and feel something I don’t feel, which is uncomplicated happiness,' said the actress. 'It’s an obvious thing, you win an Oscar and you’re supposed to be happy. I didn’t feel that way.'

She continued: 'I tried to pretend that I was happy and I got called out on it, big time.'

Reflection: The Oscar winner recently took to social media to talk about her experience from her 2013 Academy Awards win 

The Hollywood star is gearing up for her next big film release, Ocean's Eight, which is the female-centered spin-off of the Ocean's Trilogy.  

Ocean's Eight is directed by Gary Ross and scheduled for release this summer.

Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Mindy Kaling, Rihanna, Helena Bonham Carter, Sarah Paulson, Awkwafina, Damian Lewis and Richard Armitage are among the cast.

Anne excitedly shared a photo of the movie's poster late last year with a caption that read: 'Boom #Oceans8 in theatres June 2018.'

Coming to theatres: The on-screen beauty is gearing up for the release of her latest film, Ocean's 8 , which is the female-centered spin-off of the Ocean's trilogy

But on Sunday, Anne Hathaway dressed for comfort as she shopped at a Studio City farmers' market with her dad, Gerald Hathaway. The 35-year-old Oscar winner went au naturel as she picked up some fresh produce and healthy food.

item.title: 'It's a dream come true': TOWIE's Gemma Collins and James Argent say marriage and babies are ALREADY on the cards in first shoot as an 'official' couple
item.description: Speaking to OK! , the 36-year-old gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her after weeks of indecision, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since making things official.
item.content:encoded:
They finally revealed they were a couple on Sunday night's TOWIE, after months of to and fro.

And Gemma Collins has now admitted her romance with on/off beau and long-term pal James 'Arg' Argent is a 'dream come true', and says marriage and babies are already on the cards after seven years of being off and on.

Speaking to OK!, the reality star, 36, gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her after weeks of indecision, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since taking their relationship to the next level.

'I feel so secure with him': Gemma Collins admitted her new romance with on/off beau and long-term pal James 'Arg' Argent is a 'dream come true', during their joint photo shoot for OK! 

Posing in a red side-split gown, Gemma looked typically glamorous but happier than ever as she clasped tightly onto James' hand, for their first joint shoot as a couple.

With Arg beaming with glee behind her, the bubbly blonde revealed to the magazine he was a 'changed man' because of their romance, and that they are fully committed to making life work as a couple. 

After enduring weeks of unrequited love, Gemma gushed: 'To hear that he was ready to commit was a dream come true after so many years of not knowing where we both stand.’

‘James is like a different man since we made things official. I can tell he’s completely committed to me now.' 

Strong: The 36-year-old gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since making it official (pictured in November)

Read more: Read the full story in this week's OK! - out on Monday

Clearly more besotted than ever, Gemma also admitted the pair are inseparable, and have barely spent time apart since declaring their love.

She added: 'Every morning he puts on a love song for me and before we go to bed he cuddles me and tells me how beautiful I am. I feel so secure with him.

‘We haven’t spent a night apart since we made things official – James has basically moved into my flat.’ 

And it won't be long before the besotted pair take their romance to the next level by the sounds of things. 

Gemma said of marriage and babies: 'It’s something we really want in the future. 

'We’ve seen some beautiful places we’d like to get married in Spain and Essex, but we’re trying not to get ahead of ourselves. 

'I’ve made no secret of the fact I really want kids so I don’t think we’ll wait too long before trying for a family.' 

New chapter: Gemma and Arg confirmed their relationship on Sunday night's TOWIE - revealing they had bought a house together in Spain

Meanwhile Arg explained Gemma had been an incredible support to him, ever sinve he returned from his ten-week stint in a Thai rehabilitation centre last year.

Discussing his newfound healthy lifestyle after beating his 'demons', he explained: 'I can never get too complacent, it’s something I’ll always have to be careful of, but I’m a much stronger person now.

'Gemma knows the warning signs too – if I’m not being myself she’ll sit me down. Gemma been a constant source of strength for me. She’s never once judged me or turned her back on me.’

Gemma and Arg confirmed their relationship on Sunday night's TOWIE - revealing they had bought a house together in Spain and were already thinking of having children.

'Love': The reality stars left The Only Way Is Essex viewers stunned by the unexpected baby news on the season 22 premiere when they visited a financial adviser and exchanged 'I love you' to each other

The reality stars left The Only Way Is Essex viewers stunned by the unexpected baby news on the season 22 premiere when they visited a financial adviser and exchanged 'I love you' to each other.

Visiting the financial advisor to discuss opening a joint bank account, the pair looked happier than ever as they joked about Gemma having 'more staff than Mariah Carey'.  

Gemma said: 'We got matching watches and we've bought a holiday home in Spain and now we're setting up a joint bank account.  

'We've known each other for so long, we know other so well...I love you so much, I'll give you anything I've got. Every week we want to put a thousand into the account...  

'What it is, I'm a big roller, I earn well, I spend well. If Arg is watching the football, I'll have a massage girl come round.'

Sealed with a kiss: Visiting the financial advisor to discuss opening a joint bank account, the pair looked happier than ever as they joked about Gemma having 'more staff than Mariah Carey'

Making bank: Gemma said: 'We got matching watches and we've bought a holiday home in Spain and now we're setting up a joint bank account'

Arg then interrupted: 'She has more staff than Mariah Carey. She has a cleaner come round five times a week to clean her two bedroom apartment.'  

In the midst of the banter, the Meme Queen, 37, then dropped the bombshell that their new property was in part to 'relax her body for a baby' when the adviser asked if they would consider setting up an account for their future offsprings - a question which had 30-year-old James nervously laughing.

She confessed: 'Part of going to Spain is to relax my body to prepare for a baby.' 

Future: The pair chatted to a financial adviser during the show

'Big roller': She added: 'We've known each other for so long, we know other so well...I love you so much, I'll give you anything I've got. Every week we want to put a thousand into the account... What it is, I'm a big roller, I earn well, I spend well. If Arg is watching the football, I'll have a massage girl come round'

Diva: Arg then interrupted: 'She has more staff than Mariah Carey. She has a cleaner come round five times a week to clean her two bedroom apartment'

Children: In the midst of the banter, the Meme Queen, 37, then dropped the bombshell that their new property was in part to 'relax her body for a baby' when the advisor asked if they would consider setting up an account for their future offsprings

Nervous: The question which had 30-year-old James nervously laughing

'Baby': She confessed: 'Part of going to Spain is to relax my body to prepare for a baby'

Later in the episode, Gemma opened up to best friend Chloe Sims and discussed how serious their relationship was getting, although they're not officially together. 

She said: 'I can't think about nothing but James morning, noon and night. Thank you the big man up there for finally giving me James.

'It's not about the candy any more; when he wakes up he holds me and embraces me and says 'I'm just so in love with you'.I don't even call him Arg any more, I call him James.

Adding: 'He's finally the man I always want him to be. We've bought a place in Spain, we're going to get a joint bank account, like husband and wife would do.' 

Open: Later in the episode, Gemma opened up to best friend Chloe Sims and discussed how serious their relationship was getting, although they're not officially together

On her mind: She said: 'I can't think about nothing but James morning, noon and night. Thank you the big man up there for finally giving me James'

Serious: Chloe was taken aback about how serious they were

'I'm potentially setting up a life in Spain, any day now, he's going to ask me [to be his girlfriend].' 

The bombshell announcement left fans in a frenzy online as they revelled in the pair getting back together. 

A fan echoed many's sentiments with: 'Arg needs to put a ring on it #TOWIE'.

'Just want arg & the gc to get married n have babies n live happily ever after honestly (sic.),' another shared. 'Just hope arg gives Gemma the happiness she deserves'.

Frenzy: The bombshell announcement left fans in a frenzy online as they revelled in the pair getting back together

Another viewer wrote: 'Omg, the GC and Arg n the L word hope it last longer this time around. They look cute together doe' (sic). 

'Well who would of thought @missgemcollins & @RealJamesArgent together .. b***dy love it'. 

While many marvelled in their romance, other's worried for Gemma getting so serious despite not being official with the Essex crooner and other's were left confused that they were an item again.

 

Support: While many marvelled in their romance, other's worried for Gemma getting so serious despite not being official with the Essex crooner and other's were left confused that they were an item again

A concerned fan shared: 'Hold on, Gemma and Arg are not even officially together and the girl is talking about a joint bank account?? I just can’t'. 

'Gem babes, you’ve bought a house in Spain, but he’s not your boyfriend,' a viewer wrote online. 'How are arg and Gemma getting a joint bank account and have bought a property in Spain, but still aren’t officially a couple?'

Before another echoed: 'Wait. What. They’ve bought a house abroad, and have a joint bank account but aren’t even a couple ohhhhhh Gemma'.

Joyous: TOWIE viewers are thrilled over the latest developments

And Gemma Collins has now admitted her romance with on/off beau and long-term pal James 'Arg' Argent is a 'dream come true', and says marriage and babies are already on the cards after seven years of being off and on. Speaking to OK!, the 36-year-old gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her after weeks of indecision, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since taking their relationship to the next level.

item.title: Hung up on you! Giggling Kelly Brook gives Jeremy Parisi a smooch as she tries to get her hunky boyfriend's attention during phone call
item.description: They've been dating for three years, but Kelly Brook is clearly still besotted with her handsome beau Jeremy Parisi.
item.content:encoded:
They've been dating for three years, but Kelly Brook is clearly still besotted with her handsome beau Jeremy Parisi.

As the couple enjoyed a stroll in North London on Monday, Jeremy stopped to take a phone call, prompting smitten Kelly to try and win his attention.

Dressed casually for the low-key walk, Kelly couldn't stop giggling as she cosied up her Italian boyfriend. 

Smitten: They've been dating for three years, but Kelly Brook is clearly still besotted with her handsome beau Jeremy Parisi

Kelly, 38, looked effortlessly chic in a camel-coloured jacket teamed with black skinny jeans and sneakers.

She added an elegant black and gold shoulder bag, while keeping her makeup minimal and her hair swept back.

Kelly looked in great spirits despite Jeremy's somewhat surly demeanor, giving her man kisses and loving looks while she waited for him to finish his call.   

Kiss me quick: As the couple enjoyed a stroll in North London on Monday, Jeremy stopped to take a phone call, prompting smitten Kelly to try and win his attention

Laugh a minute: Dressed casually for the low-key walk, Kelly couldn't stop giggling as she cosied up her Italian boyfriend

The model and TV star recently admitted that despite her independence, she still enjoys playing the doting housewife to boyfriend Jeremy, confessing to 'mollycoddling' him so she can run her house the way she likes.

She said: 'I've had partners in the past where they come to my house and they go, ''I'm going to make you dinner,'' and I see them in my kitchen making a mess, using everything.

'It is my kitchen - I bought it. I do all the cooking, I do all the cleaning.'

Smart casual: Kelly, 38, looked effortlessly chic in a camel-coloured jacket teamed with black skinny jeans and sneakers

Effortless: She added an elegant black and gold shoulder bag, while keeping her makeup minimal and her hair swept back

Smile! Kelly looked in great spirits despite Jeremy's somewhat surly demeanor

But it seemed that Kelly still enjoys the finer parts of her hunky Italian beau, as she also admitted to making him take off his shirt for an impromptu photo shoot.

'We were out walking and I said, ''Oh, I could an Abercrombie & Fitch kind of picture here, take your shirt off,''' she said laughing.

'I made him stand there for about 10 minutes. I had a great time - lovely afternoon.'

Long term love: Kelly and her Italian beau have been dating for three years, but the model has explained they have no immediate plans to marry

Keeping close: The TV star kept an arm around her beau as the waited for him to finish his call

It's all about you! The model and TV star recently admitted that despite her independence, she still enjoys playing the doting housewife to boyfriend Jeremy

The couple have been dating since early 2015, but Kelly has previously been outspoken in her views that marriage and children aren't the 'be all and end all'.

Speaking on Loose Women last week, she said of tying the knot with her long-term love: 'I think it would be nice, but it’s not the be all and end all.

'We joke about it, I've asked him, he asks me. I don't have the romantic vision of walking down the aisle. I'm not going to be the virgin bride.' 

Domestic skills: The keen chef has confessed  to 'mollycoddling' him so she can run her house the way she likes

Happily ever after: The couple have been dating since early 2015, but Kelly has previously been outspoken in her views that marriage and children aren't the 'be all and end all'

No plans: 'We joke about it, I've asked him, he asks me. I don't have the romantic vision of walking down the aisle. I'm not going to be the virgin bride,' Kelly has quipped

item.title: Spring fever! Sofia Vergara stuns in floral midi dress as she stares adoringly at Joe Manganiello at Ready Player One premiere in LA
item.description: The 45-year-old actress and hunky 41-year-old actor could not keep their eyes off of one another at the Ready Player One premiere in Los Angeles on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
They have been married for two years.

But Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello still look to be in the honeymoon phase.

The 45-year-old actress and hunky 41-year-old actor could not keep their eyes off of one another at the Ready Player One premiere in Los Angeles on Monday. 

Scroll down for video 

Just the two of us: Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello attended the Ready Player One premiere in Los Angeles on Monday

Aww: The 45-year-old actress and hunky 41-year-old actor could not keep their eyes off of one another at the gala

The two put on quite the display as they stared adoringly at one another on the purple carpet of the gala held at the famous Dolby Theatre in Hollywood. 

Sofia looked spring chic in a strapless midi dress featuring a floral pattern.

She teamed the fashionable dress with a pair of beige heels while accessorizing with a blinged out clutch and matching bracelet.

Loved up: The two put on quite the display as they stared adoringly at one another on the purple carpet of the gala held at the famous Dolby Theatre in Hollywood

Cool guy: Joe posed with a point 

Flower power: Sofia looked spring chic in the midi dress

Look of love: The two put on quite the adorable display

Handsome couple: They looked fantastic as always

Her brunette tresses were worn down flowing over her shoulder as she accentuated her natural looks with complimentary make-up.

 Joe looked handsome in a navy blue suit over a light blue dress shirt with several of the top buttons undone to show off his muscular chest.

He also sported black dress shoes as his dark locks were disheveled and sported a salt and pepper goatee.

Sheer daring: They were not the only stars at the gala as they were joined by Jaime King

Pretty: She looked gorgeous in a flowy sheer powder blue dress

Showy display: The 38-year-old actress looked quite proud of her look as she shook the long billowy skirt around to show it off even more on the red carpet

Just the two of us: Jaime and husband Kyle Newman posed for snaps on the purple carpet 

They were not the only stars at the gala as they were joined by Jaime King who looked gorgeous in a flowy sheer powder blue dress.

The 38-year-old actress looked quite proud of her look as she shook the long billowy skirt around to show it off even more on the red carpet.

Leading man in the flick Tye Sheridan ' looked dapper in a navy blue suit over a striped dress shirt and argyle patterned black and blue tie.

Handsome:Leading man in the flick Tye Sheridan ' looked dapper in a navy blue suit over a striped dress shirt and argyle patterned black and blue tie

Gorgeous: Olivia Cooke is the top billed actress in the sci-fi adventure film as she looked ravishing in a red leather number featuring a very intricate tie-up design near the top

Starlet: The 24-year-old British actress teamed the interesting piece of couture with matching strappy stilettos

Talented: Lena Waithe looked cool in white cement Air Jordan III sneakers

Tremendous trio: Tye, Olvia, and Lena looked great at the gala

 Olivia Cooke is the top billed actress in the sci-fi adventure film as she looked ravishing in a red leather number featuring a very intricate tie-up design near the top.

The 24-year-old British actress teamed the interesting piece of couture with matching strappy stilettos.

Her brunette tresses were put up in an elegant updo as she accentuated her natural looks with complimentary make-up topped off with pink lip. 

Legend: Director Steven Spielberg looked cool as always

Tremendous trio: The 71-year-old actor was joined by his two leading stars

Back in black: Hannah John-Kamen stunned in a sheer black look with jumpsuit

Intelligent: Author Ernest Cline rocked a navy suit with white dress shirt

Dapper dudes: Simon Pegg (left) and Ben Mendelsohn (right) looked handsome

No doubt many are excited about the new Steven Spielberg film as it has received generally positive reviews.

According to a press release, 'the film is set in 2045, with the real world on the brink of chaos and collapse. But people have found salvation in the OASIS, an immersive virtual universe where you can go anywhere, do anything, be anyone.'

The creator of OASIS, James Halliday, dies, leaving behind his fortune and a contest to find keys that will lead to the winner taking control of the virtual world.

Stunning: Kat Graham looked good in a red leather blazer

Stylish: Aisha Tyler looked fashionable in black leather pants

Just us: Seth Green and wife Clare Grant Mandatory looked happy on the purple carpet

Family affair: Christopher Lloyd brought his son to the gala

Wade manages to find the first key, but immediately becomes a target for nefarious forces bent on claiming OASIS and Halliday's immense fortune for themselves.

The unlikely young hero then joins forces with a group of friends who call themselves the High Five to save OASIS and defeat the forces of evil threatening it.

The High Five is composed of Sheridan, along with characters played by Olivia Cooke, Lena Waithe, Philip Zhao and Win Morisaki. 

Ready Player One is based off the fantastically popular novel of the same name by Ernest Cline, and was written by Cline and Zak Penn. 

The Steven Spielberg directed flick hits cinemas around the world on Thursday,

Support: The director's wife Kate Capshaw was front and center

Family affair: She was accompanied by their daughter, Jessica

Great Scott! There was a DeLorean at the gala which was made famous by Eighties adventure film franchise Back To The Future

Highly-anticipated: The Steven Spielberg directed flick hits cinemas around the world on Thursday

The two put on quite the display as they stared adoringly at one another on the purple carpet of the gala held at the famous Dolby Theatre in Hollywood.

item.title: Fueling up! Chloe Grace Moretz flashes a hint of chest in flirty star-spotted wrap dress while making a pit stop at the gas station
item.description: Her stellar style made her a fixture front row at Paris Fashion Week earlier this month. So it was no surprise the stylish star, 19, looked effortlessly cool while out and about in Los Angeles on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
Her stellar style made her a fixture front row at Paris Fashion Week earlier this month.

So it was no surprise star Chloe Grace Moretz, 19, looked effortlessly cool while out and about in Los Angeles on Monday, where she was spotted during a stop by the gas station.

While out, the Atlanta, Georgia native jumped from her Range Rover donning a star-dotted wrap dress which was equal parts understated and alluring.

Stylish starlet: Chloe Grace Moretz looked effortlessly cool in a a star-dotted wrap dress while getting gas in LA on Monday

Chloe's navy dress wrapped across her front to offer up just a hint of flirty cleavage framed by a ruffled edge.

The star — who's been in an on-off relationship with celeb-spawn Brooklyn Beckham for several years — drew extra attention to her alluring chest with a few necklaces while letting her thin stems poke out from the frock's flounced hemline.

She wore white sneakers on bottom while keeping her eyes safe from the sun with amber-colored shades.

Moretz's hair looked perfectly messy, as it was tousled into textured waves that were an excellent match for her fresh, glowing face.

Ruffling collars! The Kickass actress's dress wrapped across her front to offer up just a hint of flirty cleavage framed by a ruffled edge

You glow girl! Moretz's hair looked perfectly messy, tousled into textured waves that were an excellent match for her fresh, glowing face

The Miseducation of Cameron Post actress carried a bottle of Fiji water in her hand, which was manicured with blue polish to match her dress. 

Chloe remained coy about her purchase, keeping whatever she picked up hidden behind her back as she headed to her car.

Later on Instagram the If I Stay star gave followers a close look at her accessories, where she showed off a hand-hammered gold circle with the symbol for the astrological sign Aquarius as well as an enamel-inlaid yin-yang sign with gemstone dots inside.

She made sure to tag the designer, The Last Line, while also showing her approval with several heart emojis. 

Leveling up her look: Later on Instagram the star gave followers an up-close look at her upscale accessories

Well balanced design! The actress showed off a hand-hammered gold circle besides an enamel-inlaid yin-yang sign with gemstone dots inside with her followers

Chloe was seen back on the West Coast after spending time with beau Brooklyn Beckham in New York City, where he is currently studying at university.

The star was in town to celebrate the eldest son of David and Victoria Beckham's 19th birthday, which was March 4.

Chloe and Brooklyn first met in 2014, and they went on to date in summer 2016 before the distance proved too much - with the actress based in LA.

However, the duo rekindled their romance in September 2017, when Brooklyn moved to the Big Apple to study photography at Parsons School of Design. 

Reunited! Chloe and Brooklyn (above November 2017) first met in 2014, and they went on to date in summer 2016 before agreeing to part ways over their distance. They rekindled things when Brooklyn moved to the states to study at NY's Parsons School Of Design last fall

item.title: Wayne Rooney party girl Laura Simpson turns up the heat in a flirty bandeau bikini as she soaks up the sun in Tenerife
item.description: The office worker, 29, set pulses racing once again as she soaked up the sunshine on her Tenerife getaway on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She burst into the spotlight partying up a storm with Wayne Rooney on a boozy night out.

And Laura Simpson ensured all eyes were on her once again as she soaked up the sunshine during a Tenerife getaway on Monday.

The office worker and mother-of-one, 29, put on a sizzling display in a crisp white bandeau bikini top that was barely able to contain her ample cleavage.

Fun in the sun: Wayne Rooney party girl Laura Simpson ensured all eyes were on her once again as she soaked up the sunshine during a Tenerife getaway on Monday 

Laura flaunted her rippling abs in the cropped top, while flirty palm tree bikini bottoms sat high on her hips.

The party girl made the most out of her sun-drenched beach trip, going barefoot as she soaked up the rays on her stroll.

Laura's glowing tanned skin complemented her two-piece to perfection, while she kept out the sun's glare with chic circular shades. 

Beach babe: The office worker and mother-of-one, 29, put on a sizzling display in a crisp white bandeau bikini top that was barely able to contain her ample cleavage

Sizzling style: Laura flaunted her rippling abs in the cropped top, while flirty palm tree bikini bottoms sat high on her hips

Taking a break: The party girl made the most out of her sun-drenched beach trip, going barefoot as she soaked up the rays on her stroll 

Laura's glossy chestnut tresses fell past her shoulders in a natural straight style.

Leaving her glamorous accessories at home, Laura simply polished off her look with layered gold charm necklaces and a nude make-up palette. 

Looking very relaxed during her beach vacation, Laura perched on a rock to check her phone and to readjust her saucy two-piece.   

Her outing comes after the party-goer reportedly enjoyed a passionate one-night stand with former Celebrity Big Brother star Jeremy McConnell after a boozy evening out in Manchester.

And relax: Every inch the beach babe, Laura's glossy chestnut tresses fell past her shoulders in a natural straight style

Grabbing attention: Laura made sure all eyes were on her as she confidently strolled along the sand during her break in the Canary Islands 

In one steamy snap, the former Celebrity Big Brother star, 28, could be seen snuggling up to Laura, 29, in bed.

A source told The Sun: 'Jeremy and Laura were both single when they met and they hit it off straight away. 

'One thing led to another and they spent the night together after partying with their mates.

Time away: Laura stepped out solo for her beach trip, which no doubt proved a welcome change from her home town of Manchester 

Party girl: Laura was at the centre of a sea of speculation in September when she reportedly 'kissed' Wayne on a night out, leading to his estrangement from then pregnant wife Coleen

'It's certainly not going to lead to a relationship but it's a night of passion neither of them are going to forget in a hurry.' 

Laura was at the centre of a sea of speculation in September when she reportedly 'kissed' Wayne on a night out, leading to his estrangement from then-pregnant wife Coleen.

The couple eventually reconciled, but in a lengthy statement Coleen described the situation as 's**t.' 

Paradise: The bombshell courted attention once again but this time when she hit the beach in the Tenerife for a spot of winter sun

On the rise: It was reported that the flame-haired wannabe star is apparently setting up her own online business, which is similar to American infidelity site Ashley Madison

In November, Laura seemed to slam the mother-of-four's decision, writing in a now-deleted tweet: 'What a load of attention seeking b******s'.

She later added: 'Very very attention seeking if you ask me.'

While more recently, it was reported that the flame-haired wannabe star is apparently setting up her own online business, which is similar to American infidelity site Ashley Madison.

Eye-catching: The party-goer clearly enjoyed her sun-drenched moment as she took a casual stroll through the sand

Keeping in touch: Laura was never far away from her phone during the beach trip

A source told the Sunday Mirror: 'Laura knows her involvement with Wayne is the kind of thing other women would aspire to. 

'Women find it exciting to have illicit affairs with married men and lots of successful, rich men are happy to meet them.'

'She knows she will come under criticism and be called a home-wrecker but these men are going to cheat whether you give them a website to do it on or not. 

'This is just making sure women know they are married or in a relationship.'

Beach beauty: Making the beach her catwalk, Laura through he sultry pout towards the camera

item.title: Move over Chris! Daredevil Elsa Pataky executes incredible 10 metre freefall plunge from a diving platform for Australian-made Netflix series Tidelands
item.description: Her husband Chris Hemsworth may play one of the world's most famous superheros. But this week his wife Elsa Pataky proved she is quite the daredevil too.
item.content:encoded:
Her husband Chris Hemsworth may play one of the world's most famous superheros. 

But this week his wife Elsa Pataky proved she is quite the daredevil too.

The Spanish actress, 41, shared a video of herself executing a 10 metre freefall plunge from a diving platform into a swimming pool on Monday, as she undergoes aquatic training for her upcoming supernatural TV series Tidelands.

'Training for an amazing project coming soon! 10 meters jump,' the mother-of-three wrote alongside the exhilarating video.

In the clip the Fast and the Furious star is seen slightly trembling on the diving platform before she launches into a forward-facing dive.

As the Byron Bay resident free falls through the air with her arms crossed against her chest, she nervously performs an egg-beater kick with her lean legs. 

Move over Chris! Daredevil Elsa Pataky executes incredible 10 metre freefall plunge from a diving platform for Australian-made Netflix series Tidelands 

Take the plunge! The clip ends with the Spanish beauty successfully completing the dive by entering the swimming pool feet-first

The clip ends with the Spanish beauty successfully completing the dive by entering the swimming pool feet-first.  

On Tuesday Elsa shared more details about her Tidelands training session.

The stunner took to Instagram to share a snap of her Netflix series cast members, Aaron Jakubenko, Charlotte Best and Mattias Inwood.

'Water training with a great team': Elsa lined-up alongside her Netflix series cast members, Aaron Jakubenko, Charlotte Best and Mattias Inwood

In the snap, the Tidelands stars flaunted their namesake t-shirts as they lined-up in front of the aquatic centre's swimming pool.

'Water training with a great team,' Elsa wrote alongside the comical snap.  

Earlier this week the blonde beauty gushed about her starring role in the first-ever Netflix drama series to be produced in Australia. 

'It came at the perfect moment': Elsa Pataky is set to star in Netflix's upcoming series Tidelands, the first drama from the streaming service to be produced in Australia

'It came at the perfect moment,' Elsa revealed during an interview with The Daily Telegraph on Monday. 

Elsa will play the role of Adrielle Cuthbert in the ten-part series, which centres around a group of dangerous half-humans half-water sirens. 

The series begins filming this week, which is serendipitous timing for the star.

Working parents: Elsa and her husband Chris Hemsworth will juggle parenting duties as Elsa commences work on her new series

'My kids have started school and I'm ready to get back to work. I'm excited to be working in this market and to be able to work in what I now call home,' she further told The Telegraph. 

Whilst shooting the series it's believed Elsa will juggle parenting duties with her husband Chris Hemsworth.

The couple reside in Byron Bay and share three children, five-year-old daughter India, and three-year-old twin sons, Tristan and Sasha.

item.title: 'She needs to rest her voice': Kylie Minogue CANCELS all upcoming interviews in Australia after Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his bizarre chat with the pop icon
item.description: The Daily Telegraph reported on Tuesday that Kylie Minogue has pulled out of all promotional interviews during her trip home to Australia this week.
item.content:encoded:
Kylie Minogue has cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia.

The London-based pop sensation, 49, is set to arrive in the country this week to perform songs from her highly-anticipated new album, Golden.

But the songstress has opted out of all accompanying promotional interviews, citing illness as the cause for the last-minute cancellation.

Scroll down for video 

Cancelled: The Daily Telegraph reported on Tuesday that Kylie Minogue has pulled out of all promotional interviews during her trip home to Australia this week

On Thursday, Kylie is set to take the stage in Sydney for an invitation-only Nova Red Room concert.

A spokesperson told The Daily Telegraph on Tuesday: 'She (Kylie) has a throat infection and needs to rest her voice ahead of the performance'. 

The publication says 'all other commitments are believed to have been spiked until further notice'.

Awkward: The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes

The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes. 

Viewers branded the Channel Nine star's chat a 'trainwreck' and called for someone more 'professional' to take the helm.

During the chat Karl made Kylie visibly uncomfortable by describing her as 'hot 50-year-old' and asked if she could stop dating 'incredibly good-looking d**kheads'. 

Oh dear: Karl was slammed after he called a 'hot 50-year-old' and told her to stop dating 'd**kheads' in a bizarre interview

Viewers flocked to Twitter to blast the 'rubbish' interview and claimed Karl was using the chat to 'creep' on Kylie.

The Channel Nine personality concluded the interview by bringing out a birthday cake for Kylie and singing to her, in a nod to her 50th in May.

Coming up from behind her, the grinning host gestured at the camera crew and publicists to join in as he serenaded a squirming Kylie.

It's not believed that the poorly-received chat is related to the pop queen's decision to pull the pin on further interviews with Australian journalists.

Backlash: Viewers were less than impressed with Karl's onscreen antics, blasting the 'trainwreck' interview and calling for someone more 'professional' to take the helm
item.dc:abstract: Kylie Minogue has cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia. The London-based pop sensation, 49, is set to arrive in the country this week to perform songs from her highly-anticipated new album, Golden. But the songstress has opted out of all accompanying promotional interviews, citing illness as the cause for the last-minute cancellation.

item.title: Age-defying Melanie Sykes, 47, exhibits her gym-honed physique in VERY skimpy lingerie for sizzling photoshoot
item.description: Melanie Sykes, 47, showcased her assets and toned stomach in the dream-coloured two-piece for a sizzling photoshoot.
item.content:encoded:
Her love life has been in the spotlight as of late, thanks to reported flings with singer Olly Murs and golfer, Martin Kaymer.

But Melanie Sykes diverted attention back to her envy-inducing physique as she sizzled for a lingerie-clad photoshoot. 

 The 47-year-old presenter looked far younger than her years as she showcased her assets and toned stomach in the dream-coloured two-piece. 

Smokin' hot: Melanie Sykes, 47, showcased her assets and toned stomach in the dream-coloured two-piece for a sizzling photoshoot

Primped and preened to perfection, with a coat of glamorous make-up and a glossy blowdry, Melanie oozed body confidence as she posed for the snap.

Snuggled up against a plethora of pillows on a bed, the gym bunny showcased the fruits of her labour in the plunging balcony bra and matching suspender style briefs. 

A pair of nude-coloured stocking and red nail varnish added to the pin-up feel as she flashed a huge smile.     

Fitness fanatic: The presenter diverted has honed her envy-inducing physique at the gym 

Meanwhile, sources recently told MailOnline the presenter has been enjoying a long-term romance with German golfer Martin Kaymer, 33 - and they're said to have been going to great lengths to keep things under wraps.

This comes after Olly Murs confirmed that he had enjoyed a brief fling with Mel after months of relentless speculation.

However, while the pair have made no mention of each other on their social media accounts, for more than three years they've popped up at the same places at the same time, jetting off to a variety of sun-kissed locations around the globe. 

Just last month, when Martin competed in the Abu Dhabi HSBC Championship, former Let's Do Lunch presenter Melanie teased her Instagram followers with a plethora of shots of herself lounging on the Emirates' golden shores.

Just pals: Olly Murs recently confirmed that he had enjoyed a brief fling with Mel after months of relentless speculation

And that's just one of many travel coincidences that have occurred as far as back as at least January 2015, when Martin participated in the Omega Dubai Desert Classic - at the same time that the Lancashire lass just so happened to be holidaying there.

And in June of that year, Martin and Melanie uploaded snaps a day apart as they basked in the sunshine on the Balearic island of Mallorca. While Martin shared a shot of his luxury hotel accommodation, Mel opted to pose with a female pal.

Their coincidental travels also took them to Florida, from which mother-of-two Melanie revealed that she was enjoying a 'cheeky little stop off' as she showed off her sensational physique in a white bikini under sheer patterned sundress.

When contacted by MailOnline, a representative for Melanie declined to comment. 

Sources recently told MailOnline: The presenter has been enjoying a long-term romance with German golfer Martin Kaymer, 33 - and they're said to have been going to great lengths to keep things under wraps
item.dc:abstract: Her love life has been in the spotlight as of late, thanks to reported flings with singer Olly Murs and golfer, Martin Kaymer. But Melanie Sykes diverted attention back to her envy-inducing physique as she sizzled for a lingerie-clad photoshoot. The 47-year-old presenter looked far younger than her years as she showcased her assets and toned stomach in the dream-coloured two-piece.
item.dc:creator: Jabeen Waheed
item.mi:shortTitle: Melanie Sykes, 47, exhibits her gym-honed physique in skimpy lingerie

item.title: Louis Tomlinson celebrates the eighth anniversary of his life-changing X Factor audition with boyish throwback snap... as he pays tribute to late mother Johannah Deakin
item.description: The One Direction star, 26, celebrated his eight-year anniversary from his first X Factor audition with a flashback snap on Instagram on Monday - highlighting the difference in his appearance.
item.content:encoded:
He first came on the scene as a fresh-faced X Factor hopeful in 2010, looking for his gateway to stardom.

And Louis Tomlinson celebrated his eight-year anniversary from his first audition on the show with a flashback picture on Instagram on Monday, which highlighted the stark difference in his appearance.

The One Direction star, 26, later took to Twitter with a heartfelt tribute to his late mother Johannah Deakin, who was credited for encouraging the singer to share his talent.

Then and now: Louis Tomlinson celebrated his eight-year anniversary from his first audition on the show with a flashback picture on Instagram on Monday

Donning his signature side swept hair and geeky clothing, the Miss You hitmaker looked worlds away from his current self.

The Doncaster native chuckled over his appearance as a teen, captioning the image: '8 years ago today. The skinny tie and shirt combo was a must back then.'

His fans were quick to pick up on the vast contrast, with some writing: 'Aww baby Louis...Glow up for sure!'

Vast difference: Donning his signature side swept hair and geeky clothing, the Miss You hitmaker looked worlds away from his current self in the throwback image from 2010 (pictured January 2017)

Others poked fun at Louis' former style: 'Why u wearing my school uniform? (sic)'

'The cardigan and the tie that didn't make it to ur belly button (sic)' 

A few fans took the time to appreciate the belter's iconic journey: 'There you didn't know that you were going to become a legend.' 

'Seems just like yesterday, how is it 8 years ago?' 

Funny: Keen fans were quick to pick up on the stark contrast

The father-of-one rose to fame during his talent show stint, which saw him join boyband One Direction with Zayn Malik, Niall Horan, Harry Styles and Liam Payne.

The group announced their decision to go on an indefinite hiatus in July 2015, a few months after Zayn decided to leave the band.      

Louis took to Twitter later that day to share a gushing tribute about his mother, who tragically passed away in December 2016 to leukemia: '8 years today I went for my first audition on the X factor. Thanks you to my beautiful mum for talking me into going! Thank you to each and every person who’s ever supported.'

In the past: The father-of-one rose to fame during his talent show stint, which saw him join boyband One Direction with Zayn Malik, Niall Horan, Harry Styles and Liam Payne (pictured August 2013)

Touching: Louis took to Twitter later that day to share a gushing tribute about his mother, who tragically passed away in December 2016 to leukemia

Midwife Johannah left Louis and six other children, Lottie, 18, Felicite, 16, twins Daisy and Phoebe, both 12, and twins Ernest and Doris, three.

Shortly after the devastating loss, a statement announcing her death read: 'It is with immeasurable sadness that Johannah Deakin's family said goodbye to Johannah in the early hours of Wednesday 7th December 2016.'

'Earlier this year Johannah was diagnosed with a very aggressive form of leukaemia that required immediate and continuous treatment. We respectfully request that the family are given time and space to grieve in private.' 

Tragic: Midwife Johannah left Louis and six other children, Lottie, 19, Felicite, 17, twins Daisy and Phoebe, both 13, and twins Ernest and Doris, three (pictured August 2015)

Speaking about his mother's death in an interview with SiriusXM Radio last year, he said: 'It’s not something that I feel 100 per cent comfortable talking too much about but just quickly, when I first found out the news I kind of did want to throw the towel in. 

'But it was my mum who said to me that I’ve just got to keep going, telling me very sternly that she wanted me to. So I’m not doing it for her but…'

The singer appeared on X Factor just days after his mother's death, to perform his song Just Hold On.

Referring to the performance, he said: 'It was tough, but I felt like it was nice for me to almost have a little send off for her.'
item.dc:abstract:
He first came on the scene as a fresh-faced X Factor hopeful in 2010, looking for his gateway to stardom.
And Louis Tomlinson celebrated his eight-year anniversary from his first audition on the show with a flashback picture on Instagram on Monday, which highlighted the stark difference in his appearance. The One Direction star, 26, later took to Twitter with a heartfelt tribute to his late mother Johannah Deakin, who was credited for encouraging the singer to share his talent.
item.dc:creator: Jason Chester
item.mi:shortTitle: Louis Tomlinson marks his eight-year X Factor anniversary

item.title: Gladiator battle wound! Russell Crowe reveals he still has a scar on his forearm from sword fight 19 years after Maximus role
item.description: The 53-year-old actor won an Academy Award for his starring role in the Ridley Scott-directed drama.
item.content:encoded:
Battle scar: Russell Crowe has revealed he still has a scar on his right forearm from sword fighting in Gladiator

Russell Crowe has revealed he still has a scar on his right forearm from sword fighting in Gladiator.

The 53-year-old actor won an Academy Award for his starring role in the Ridley Scott-directed drama, and it's just as well as he has been left with a lifetime reminder of his deadly arena battle as Maximus against Commodus (Joaquin Phoenix).

Alongside a photo of the white scar on his hairy arm, Crowe wrote: 'Strange little scars #2 Sword strike from Gladiator. Right forearm.

'Didn't notice it at the time, was a busy day with lots to get done, but there it is , 19 years after we made the film ... [sic]'

The 'Robin Hood' star recently announced he's set to auction off over 200 personal items in a new lot entitled 'The Art of Divorce'.

The lot will include dinosaur skulls and a chariot from 'Gladiator'.

Crowe is determined to 'move forward into fresh air' following his split from estranged wife Danielle Spencer in 2012, and has announced he will be hosting the auction of 227 personal artefacts in order to help him put their nine-year marriage behind him.

Crowe - who has sons Tennyson and Charles with Danielle - said in a statement released through auction house Sotheby's Australia: 'Divorce has its way of making you really examine the things that are essential in life - and the things that are not. Through the process I had a look around and realised I had a lot of stuff. Career stuff, stuff I've collected, and stuff in general. Boxes and boxes of stuff ... so in the spirit of moving forward into fresh air, here's a portion of that collection of stuff.'

Ouch: The actor with a lifetime reminder of his arena battles

 Occupational hazard: The 53-year-old actor won an Academy Award for his starring role in the Ridley Scott-directed drama

Crowe - who married Danielle in 2003 - will also be including diamond rings, watches, guitars, movie memorabilia, and fine art into the lot, as well as two motorcycles and a 2001 Mercedes which has been valued between $15,000 and $25,000.

The auction is set to take place in Sydney, Australia, on April 7, on what would have been Crowe and Spencer's 15th wedding anniversary.

As of the time of writing, it is unknown whether or not Crowe intends to give the proceeds of his auction to charity.
item.dc:abstract: Russell Crowe has revealed he still has a scar on his right forearm from sword fighting in Gladiator. The 53-year-old actor won an Academy Award for his starring role in the Ridley Scott-directed drama, and it's just as well as he has been left with a lifetime reminder of his deadly arena battle as Maximus against Commodus (Joaquin Phoenix). Alongside a photo of the white scar on his hairy arm, Crowe wrote: 'Strange little scars #2 Sword strike from Gladiator. Right forearm.
item.dc:creator: Natalie Trombetta
item.mi:shortTitle: Russell Crowe still has a scar on arm from Gladiator battle

item.title: Off duty style! Cindy Crawford cuts effortlessly chic figure in flowing dress... before spending quality time with family
item.description: Cindy Crawford enjoyed a reprieve from her modeling duties on Saturday. The 52-year-old Illinois native was spotted grabbing lunch at Nobu in Malibu. She later met up with husband Rande Gerber.
item.content:encoded:
Cindy Crawford enjoyed a reprieve from her modeling duties on Saturday.

The 52-year-old Illinois native was spotted looking spring chic in a floral maxi-dress as she grabbed lunch at Nobu in Malibu.

She later met up with husband Rande Gerber, 55, daughter Kaia, 16, and son Presley, 18, for a Spotify event in downtown Los Angeles. 

Model off duty! Cindy Crawford enjoyed a reprieve from her daily  duties on Saturday. The 52-year-old Illinois native was spotted looking spring chic in a floral maxi-dress as she grabbed lunch at Nobu in Malibu 

The leggy supermodel battled the California winds in an off-white leather jacket that was cropped just above her waist. 

She teamed her ensemble with a pair of grey booties, layered bracelets, and a pink cross-body purse. 

Cindy left the restaurant with what seemed to be a large gift in a pink bag. 

Looking good! The leggy supermodel teamed her ensemble with a pair of grey booties, layered bracelets, and a pink cross-body purse

Windy city! She battled the chilly weather by the beach in an off-white leather jacket 

Later that night she and her family trekked down to the Resident—a 'funky industrial venue' in downtown LA. 

Cindy and Rande were there to support Kaia's good friend Charlotte Lawrence who was performing her new single Louder Together. 

Other celebrities in attendance included Kristen Stewart, Cody Simpson, and Sarah Chalke. 

Family affair! Cindy later met up with husband Rande Gerber, 55, and daughter Kaia, 16, for a Spotify event in downtown Los Angeles

Sibling love! Kaia and brother Presley posed for a photo together at the Spotify event that took place at Resident—a 'funky industrial venue' in downtown LA

The mom-of-two went the relatable route and donned the same outfit she was seen in earlier in the day. 

Kaia, who attended the March For Our Lives rally, did the same.

Crawford's mini-me was casually clad in a pair of  jean shorts, a cropped sweater, combat boots, and a black leather jacket.  

Model status: Crawford's mini-me was casually clad in a pair of jean shorts, a cropped sweater, combat boots, and a black leather jacket

Like father, like son: Presley and his dad Rande were both casually clad in black bomber jackets for the music event 

Full heart: After a night out with her family, Cindy posted a sweet photo of her loved ones on Instagram Sunday morning

item.title: Pamela Anderson shows off her bombshell curves in a glamorous LBD as she joins son Brandon for dinner amid Tommy Lee drama
item.description: The Baywatch star, 50, oozed old Hollywood glamour in a black bodycon dress as she headed for dinner with her son Brandon in Los Angeles on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She has stood by her son Brandon after he punched her ex Tommy Lee during a furious family brawl.

And Pamela Anderson and the 21-year-old put on a united display as they headed for dinner at celeb hotspot Craig's in Los Angeles on Monday.

The Baywatch star, 50, oozed old Hollywood glamour as she slipped her curves into a black bodycon dress.

Sticking together: Pamela Anderson and her son Brandon put on a united display as they headed for dinner at celeb hotspot Craig's in Los Angeles on Monday

Pamela drew attention to her ample assets with the dress' sweetheart neckline, while showcasing her lithe limbs.

The screen siren complemented the all-black ensemble with a pair of elegant gloves and added a boost to her 5ft 5ins frame with patent court shoes. 

She styled her platinum blonde hair in a sleek straight look and accentuated her striking features with fluttery eyelashes, bronzed cheeks and a slick of mauve lipstick.

Striking: The Baywatch star, 50, oozed old Hollywood glamour as she slipped her curves into a black bodycon dress

Dapper: Brandon showed off his sartorial flair in a silky red shirt, which he left partially undone to display his chest inkings and donned a pair of black jeans and baseball cap

Killer curves: Pamela drew attention to her ample assets with its sweetheart neckline, while showcasing her lithe limbs in the thigh-grazing dress

Meanwhile, Brandon showed off his sartorial flair in a silky red shirt, which he left partially undone to display his chest inkings and donned a pair of black jeans and baseball cap. 

The pair appeared in high spirits as they left the eatery, with Pamela linking arms with her eldest son.

Their outing comes after Brandon's fight with his father Tommy Lee earlier this month, which left the Motley Crue drummer with a busted, bloody lip.

Hollywood glamour: The screen siren complemented the all-black ensemble with a pair of elegant gloves and added a boost to her 5ft 5ins frame with patent court shoes

Sweet: The pair appeared in high spirits as they left the eatery, with Pamela linking arms with her eldest son

Family brawl: Their outing comes after Brandon's fight with his father Tommy Lee earlier this month, which left the Motley Crue drummer sharing a selfie of a busted, bloody lip

The Motley Crue drummer took to social media to tell his fans his son had left him 'unconscious' amid an argument spurred by a social media post in which he spoke out against the Hollywood pin-up.

 'My heart is broken,' wrote Lee.

'You can give your kids everything they could ever want in their entire lives and they can still turn against you. Good job Brandon! Great son!'

Punched: The Motley Crue drummer told fans his son had left him 'unconscious' amid an argument spurred by a social media post in which he spoke out against the Hollywood pin-up

Brandon went on to claim that he gave a drunken Lee the fat lip in self-defense, telling People, 'I'm devastated at the events of the last several days that have been a result of my father's alcoholism.'

Pamela posted a blog on her website in which she said that her son hit Lee 'in the nose for all of us who he has hurt.' 

In the post titled 'Alcoholism is the devil', she wrote: 'He [Brandon] punched him in the nose for all of us who he has hurt. Now Tommy feels humiliated - and is attempting to destroy his own son. This is the Devil - This is the disease of alcoholism.' 

Hitting back: Brandon went on to claim that he gave a drunken Lee the fat lip in self-defense

She added that the Dr. Feelgood drummer positions himself 'consistently [as] the center of sadness, drama and confusion,' has been 'jealous of his [sons'] talent and beauty from the day they were born,' and is the walking 'definition of narcissist/sociopath.'  

Tommy, who is also father to Dylan Jagger Lee, 20, said that he would follow through with authorities to prosecute his son over the assault, according to TMZ.

A source close to Lee told the publication: 'You encourage what you tolerate, and he's not going to tolerate what Brandon did and that's why he wants the criminal case to keep moving along ... at least for now.'

Family squabble: Lee took to social media to show off his wounds after his run-in with his son Brandon
item.dc:abstract: She has stood by her son Brandon after he punched her ex Tommy Lee during a furious family brawl. And Pamela Anderson and the 21-year-old put on a united display as they headed for dinner at celeb hotspot Craig's in Los Angeles on Monday. The Baywatch star, 50, oozed old Hollywood glamour as she slipped her curves into a black bodycon dress.
