item.title: Dad-to-be Declan Donnelly flashes a huge smile as his pregnant wife Ali Astall shows a hint of bump in first outing since confirming they are expecting a baby
item.description: Declan Donnelly's wife Ali Astal was seen on Monday morning near her Chiswick home, hours after the couple confirmed they're expecting their first baby.
item.content:encoded:
Declan Donnelly's wife Ali Astal was seen on Monday morning near her Chiswick home, hours after the couple confirmed they're expecting their first baby. 

The morning after her husband, 42, responded to pregnancy reports, Ali, 40, was seen at her local train station while a short time later a beaming Dec was spotted leaving the couple's house.

Dressed in a pale pink coat over a smart navy sweater and shirt, Ali showed a hint of bump as she waited for her train.

Expecting: Declan Donnelly's wife Ali Astal was seen on Monday morning near her Chiswick home, hours after the couple confirmed they're expecting their first baby

Ali kept comfortable in white trainers and added skinny jeans to her ensemble as she kept busy on her phone.

It's been reported she is keen to wind down her work commitments in the coming weeks to 'look after herself' and to enjoy an 'easy' pregnancy.

Dec's wife, who works as her husband and Ant's talent manager, looked in good spirits as she chatted to a friend on her walk to the station.

Dad-to-be! A short time later a beaming Dec was spotted leaving the couple's house

Mum-to-be: Dressed in a pale pink coat over a smart navy sweater and shirt, Ali showed a hint of bump as she waited for her train

Exciting time: Dec's wife looked in good spirits as she happily chatted to a friend on her walk to the station for her Monday morning commute

Commuting: Ali added comfy white trainers and skinny fit jeans to her Monday morning look

Working: Ali, who works as her husband's talent manager, was busy checking her phone as she arrived at her local station

The ITV star couldn't contain his joy as he grinned at photographers while leaving his house a short time after his wife.

After what has been the most turbulent week of Dec's career, the star was smiling again as he headed off to work, prepping for the final two shows of his hit show Saturday Night Takeaway, which he'll present solo following Ant's return to rehab. 

The proud dad-to-be confirmed the baby news in a brief statement published on social media platform Instagram on Sunday evening.

Beaming: The Saturday Night Takeaway star couldn't contain his joy as he beamed at photographers while leaving his house a short time after his wife

Happier news: Dec looked on cloud nine after what has been the most turbulent week of his career, following his best friend and presenting partner's arrest a week ago 

Family man: It's been reported the couple have been trying for some time to start a family

Off to work: The star was dressed smartly in a blazer as he jumped in his car to head to work, prepping for the final episodes of hit show Saturday Night Takeaway which he'll present solo

Sharing a black and white image from his 2015 wedding to Ali, 40, he wrote: 'Just wanted to say thank you for all the lovely messages. 

'The news has sneaked out a little earlier than we had hoped but Ali and I are delighted to be expecting our first child. Thanks for all the love, we really appreciate it.' 

Earlier that day Declan was seen out and about in London, hours after it was reported that Ali is pregnant. 

Support: Dec has spent the last few days in talks with Ant and ITV, before confirming last week that this series of Saturday Night Takeaway will end with the planned US finale 

Busy man: Dec will jet to Orlando for the April 7 final before heading home to work on his other hit show Britain's Got Talent

So happy: Dec confirmed  that he is expecting his first child with wife Ali in a post shared with Instagram followers on Sunday evening

Reports of their growing family comes hot on the heels of Dec preparing to host Saturday Night Takeaway solo next weekend, in light of presenting partner Ant McPartlin heading to rehab following his recent drink-drive arrest.  

Just hours before the confirmation The Sun reported that the couple, who wed in 2015, are 'delighted to be expecting - especially since they have been trying for some time.'

It is alleged that the couple first learnt they were pregnant soon after Dec left the Australian jungle after the last series of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Oh Here! finished in December. 

'They have been keeping the pregnancy a closely guarded secret, but now that Ali is safely over 12 weeks, they are starting to let people know,' it is claimed of the happy news, with the source quickly adding that they have told 'key people at ITV'.

Exciting news: Earlier that day Declan was seen out and about in London, hours after it was reported that Ali is pregnant 

What a week: The TV star was seen returning to his West London home, dressed casually in jeans and a baseball cap during what has been the most turbulent weeks of his career

Rollercoaster few days: Dec, 42 , failed to raise a smile on Sunday as he headed to the house he shares with Ali

Ali has reportedly told her close colleagues and will be stepping away from work commitments to 'look after herself' and to enjoy an 'easy' pregnancy.

'They have both always wanted a family but worried that it might not happen for them.'

A representative for Dec and Ali refused to comment on the claims when approached by MailOnline.

'They are delighted': Dec Donnelly, 42, and his wife Ali Astall are reportedly expecting their first child 

Growing family: According to The Sun, the pair, who wed in 2015, are 'delighted to be expecting - especially since they have been trying for some time'

Woes: Reports of their growing family comes hot on the heels of Dec preparing to host Saturday Night Takeaway himself, in light of Ant McPartlin heading to rehab following his recent drink-drive arrest

It has also been inevitable to ignore the fact that his happy news comes hot on the heels of his best friend Ant's woes. 

'This has come at a difficult time for them both, given everything that Ant is now going through and the pressure that has put on Dec in the past week,' it was said, before adding that 'their priority now is their baby and an experience that they see as the best of their lives.' 

Dec and Ali - who has acted as the presenting duo's manager for over a decade - married in Elswick, Tyne and Wear in August 2015 after two years of dating.

Happy news: It is alleged that the couple first learnt they were pregnant soon after the last series of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Oh Here! finished in December

It is claimed of their delight: 'They have been keeping the pregnancy a closely guarded secret, but now that Ali is safely over 12 weeks, they are starting to let people know'

In an interview with Fabulous magazine in February last year, Ant and Dec both said that the focus in their lives has always been on their families as they bared all about marriage and hopefully having children in the near future.

Ant - who had previously spoken about his struggles with having children and of course has since split from his wife - revealed he would be 'over the moon' to become a dad, while Dec echoed similar wishes.

Dec said: 'Absolutely at some point, when the time is right! We’ll have to put some time in the diary. Things are pretty busy!' 

In April of last year, while recording the finale of the 2017 season of Saturday Night Takeaway at Walt Disney World in Florida, both men admitted that being there made them feel a little ‘broody’.

Mum to be: Ali has reportedly told her close colleagues and will be stepping away from work commitments to 'look after herself' and to enjoy an 'easy' pregnancy

As reported in OK!, Dec said: ‘It is almost like a prescription – everyone should come and spend a couple of days in Disney once in their life. Would we come back with a little Ant and Dec? Oh, definitely! 

'We saw it on the show, what it means for young ones to come out here. It would be one of those things to do with children, definitely.’ 

This comes after Ant - who split from wife Lisa Armstrong earlier this year after 11 years of marriage - was arrested for a drink drive incident over the weekend and has since made the quick decision to return to rehab earlier this week. 

One onlooker, Jake Spencer, said the Britain's Got Talent star was argumentative towards cops when they tried to put him in a police car after he failed a breath test.

A source added: 'They have both always wanted a family but worried that it might not happen for them'

Love: Dec and Ali - who has acted as the presenting duo's manager for over a decade - married in Elswick, Tyne and Wear in August 2015 after two years of dating

'This has come at a difficult time for them both': It has also been inevitable to ignore the fact that his happy news comes hot on the heels of his best friend Ant's woes

He told The Sun newspaper: 'Ant looked in a right state and was acting argumentatively toward a policewoman. I couldn't believe it when I saw who it was.

'The woman was trying to arrest him and get him in the police car but he clearly wasn't having it. He was not making it easy for her and he seemed to be trying to wriggle out of her clutches. He was not in a good way.

'Eventually she got him in the police car. There were about six or seven police cars in total.'

Candid: In an interview last year, Ant and Dec both said that the focus in their lives has always been on their families and hopefully having children in the near future

'It's tougher than you think': Ant has previously spoken about his struggles with having children

Marital breakdown: Ant split from his wife of 11 years, Lisa Armstrong, earlier this year 

It is thought Ant veered into the wrong lane after coming round a sharp bend, hitting a green Mini before crashing into a BMW X5. A three-year-old girl was taken to hospital to be checked over as a precautionary measure. 

In 2013, Ant also discussed he and his estranged make-up artist wife were finding it difficult to conceive.

At the time he confessed to Radio Times: 'Lisa and I would love to have kids. We’re trying. It’s tougher than you think when you get a bit older.'

Explaining the issue in terms of his friendship with Dec, Ant revealed: 'There’s a rumour that we do everything together and I’m holding off having kids till Dec finds himself Mrs Right. I love that idea, but I’m afraid it’s not true.' 

Troubles: This comes after Ant was arrested for a drink drive incident over the weekend and has since made the quick decision to return to rehab earlier this week

item.title: Amy Adams in talks to star in big screen adaptation of The True American
item.description: The Arrival actress is said to be in talks over a role in the big screen adaptation of Anand Giridharadas' non-fiction book of the same name, set in Texas in the days after the 9/11 terror attacks.
item.content:encoded:
Amy Adams is in talks to star in upcoming drama The True American.

The Arrival actress is said to be in talks with Annapurna Pictures over a role in the big screen adaptation of Anand Giridharadas' non-fiction book of the same name, set in Texas in the days after the 9/11 terror attacks.

According to Variety, the 'American Hustle' star is in negotiations to appear in the film, which will be produced by Annapurna, although it is thought Amazon Studios could be taking over the financing and distribution of the project.

Amy Adams is talks to star in upcoming drama The True American

As reported by the publication, the deal has not yet been confirmed as Adams is said to be trying to work her schedule around HBO series 'Sharp Objects', which she is producing as well as starring in.

The film will be a big screen adaptation of Anand Giridharadas' non-fiction book of the same name, set in Texas in the days after the 9/11 terror attacks 

'Jackie' filmmaker Pablo Larrain is set to direct 'The True American', while it's said Mark Ruffalo and Kumail Nanjiani are in talks to join the cast.

The film will tell the story of Muslim immigrant and Bangladesh Air Force veteran Rais Bhuiyan, who survived a killing spree in the aftermath of 9/11 which took the lives of two other immigrants.

Bhuiyan worked at a convenience store in Dallas to establish himself in the US, and wanted his attacker Mark Stroman - who called himself the 'Arab slayer' - to be spared from execution.

It comes after it was revealed Adams is 'really excited' to return as Princess Giselle in the upcoming sequel to Disney's 'Enchanted'.

Director Adam Shankman recently told Collider: 'We're turning in a script really soon, and everybody feels really good and gung-ho. I've been in touch with Amy [Adams] and the cast, and everybody is really into it.

'We all love the story about everybody wondering what exactly defines happily ever after. It's just a very exciting project that we all hope happens. Right now, we're in a good place.'
item.dc:abstract: Amy Adams is set to star in upcoming drama 'The True American'. The Arrival actress is said to be in talks with Annapurna Pictures over a role in the big screen adaptation of Anand Giridharadas' non-fiction book of the same name, set in Texas in the days after the 9/11 terror attacks. According to Variety, the 'American Hustle' star is in negotiations to appear in the film, which will be produced by Annapurna, although it is thought Amazon Studios could be taking over the financing and distribution of the project.
item.dc:creator: Natalie Trombetta
item.mi:shortTitle: Amy Adams in talks to star The True American

item.title: 'TOWIE is so fake!' Fans are left in stitches after Clelia Theodorou fails to hit dial during phone call with Amber Turner in epic gaffe
item.description: The newcomer left fans in stitches after she failed to hit the dial button when calling love rival Amber Turner to confront her about Dan Edgar on Sunday's episode of TOWIE.
item.content:encoded:
She made an explosive debut on TOWIE on Sunday night.  

But Clelia Theodorou left fans in stitches after she failed to hit the dial button when calling love rival Amber Turner when confronting her about Dan Edgar.

Eagle-eyed viewers took to Twitter to mock the 23-year-old reality star over her phone skills, claiming the phone conversation was staged.

Scroll down for video  

Woops: Clelia Theodorou left fans in stitches after she failed to hit the dial button when calling love rival Amber Turner to confront her about Dan Edgar

In the scenes, Clelia picked up her iPhone to quiz Amber about Dan, but as the camera panned to her face, the massive blunder was revealed.

Fans were quick to call out the 'fake' conversation, with one writing: 'Did that clelia really just put her phone to her ear on the dial pad and then she's on the phone to Amber hahahahahaha towie is so fake,' while another added: 'Clelia babes, I don't think you're calling anyone'. 

One viewer typed: 'Someone tell Clelia to actually press the dial button-it's the green one that shows the phone signal,' while another quipped: 'Clelia hun you need to press the green button to start the call'. 

'Fake': Eagle-eyed viewers took to Twitter to mock the 23-year-old reality star over her phone skills, claiming the phone conversation was staged

Awkward: In the scenes, Clelia picked up her iPhone to quiz Amber about Dan, but as the camera panned to her face, the massive blunder was revealed

Getting to the bottom of whether Dan had been seeing both of them, Clelia said: 'I spoke to him and he told me he did see you a couple of days ago and that he did lie to you about the fact that he has been seeing me.

'And he did tell me that you guys did sleep with each other a month ago which was obviously when I've been seeing him.' 

Not holding back Amber replied: 'When I was with him a few days ago, he did lie and denied numerous times over the past few months that anything's gone on with you. 

Ouch: Clelia said: 'I spoke to him and he told me he did see you a couple of days ago and that he did lie to you about the fact that he has been seeing me'

Sticking together: Amber branded Dan a coward, while the newbie declared she was not going to 'wait around' for him to decide what he wants 

'He's denied it, denied it denied it and said 'I've not even kissed her'. 

'The other day we spoke for two hours and he said there's only been three girls that have ever affected him, his first girlfriend, his ex and me.'

Visibly shocked, the brunette beauty responded: 'What he said to me was completely different, he said you guys had been on and off for a while and that he didn't want to be with you and all this kind of stuff.' 

Embarrassing: Fans couldn't resist poking fun at the brunette beauty on Twitter after the scene aired

Amber branded Dan a coward, while the newbie declared she was not going to 'wait around' for him to decide what he wants.

Despite parting ways with the TOWIE lothario, Amber recently admitted she still had feelings for Dan during a recent interview on This Morning.

Speaking ahead of the new series' debut, she said: 'It's been over a year with us but I'm not going to say there aren't feelings there, but I can't do it anymore.' 

Distressing: The two women have been left shocked after finding out the lothario has been seeing both of them at the same time 

Tension between the pair became so heated that she even threw a drink in his face while filming the ITVBe show in Barcelona earlier this year.

When asked about an alleged row between them at popular Essex haunt Sugar Hute, she said: 'I was having a conversation with one of the new girls and he came into the conversation and it just didn't go down well.

'Things have just got so toxic between us and I'm just so done with the situation,' before joking: 'A cup fell out of my hand and it may have had liquid in it.

'You think a lot of it is played for dramatics but everything I've talked about is real life.' 

Meanwhile, Dan and Clelia were seen heading on a double date with Pete Wicks and his new girlfriend Shelby Tribble last week.  

Unacquainted love: Despite parting ways with Dan, Amber recently admitted she still had feelings for Dan during a recent interview on This Morning
item.dc:abstract: She made an explosive debut on TOWIE on Sunday night. But Clelia Theodorou left fans in stitches after she failed to hit the dial button when calling love rival Amber Turner when confronting her about Dan Edgar. Eagle-eyed viewers took to Twitter to mock the 23-year-old reality star over her phone skills, claiming the phone conversation was staged.
item.dc:creator: Connie Rusk
item.mi:shortTitle: Clelia Theodorou fails to hit dial during phone call with Amber Turner

item.title: Kylie Minogue, 49, stuns in a red thigh-high split dress as she belts her classics at amFAR Hong Kong... after CANCELLING all upcoming interviews in Australia to 'rest her voice'
item.description: Kylie Minogue, 49, was seen belting her popular tunes while performing at the amfAR Gala Shaw Studios, Hong Kong on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She made the decision to cancel all her interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia to 'rest her voice.'

Yet Kylie Minogue was seen belting her popular tunes while performing at the amfAR Gala Shaw Studios, Hong Kong on Monday. 

The pop singer, 49, looked in her element on stage as she wowed in a bold red plunging dress with a sexy side split. 

Wow: Kylie Minogue, 49, was seen belting her popular tunes while performing at the amfAR Gala Shaw Studios, Hong Kong on Monday

All eyes were on Kylie as she took to the mic in the figure-skimming scarlet number. 

The number boasted a flirty red lace neckline before cinching in her tiny waist with belted detailing. 

The racy thigh-high split added a further dimension to the look as she strutted around on stage and performed some dance moves. 

Kylie completed the look with a slick of pink gloss on her pout and wore her blonde locks in effortless waves. 

Saucy: The pop singer looked in her element on stage as she wowed in a bold red plunging dress with a sexy side split

Red hot: All eyes were on Kylie as she took to the mic in the figure-skimming scarlet number

Babe: The number boasted a flirty red lace neckline before cinching in her tiny waist with belted detailing

Her striking performances comes after  cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia.

The London-based pop sensation is set to arrive in the country this week to perform songs from her highly-anticipated new album, Golden.

But the songstress has opted out of all accompanying promotional interviews, citing illness as the cause for the last-minute cancellation.

Mane attraction: Kylie completed the look with a slick of pink gloss on her pout and wore her blonde locks in effortless waves

Happy: Kylie looked in her element as she strutted around on stage and performed some dance moves.

On Thursday, Kylie is set to take the stage in Sydney for an invitation-only Nova Red Room concert.

A spokesperson told The Daily Telegraph on Tuesday: 'She (Kylie) has a throat infection and needs to rest her voice ahead of the performance'. 

The publication says 'all other commitments are believed to have been spiked until further notice'.

Cancelled: The Daily Telegraph reported on Tuesday that Kylie has pulled out of all promotional interviews during her trip home to Australia this week

Awkward: The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes

The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes. 

Viewers branded the Channel Nine star's chat a 'trainwreck' and called for someone more 'professional' to take the helm.

During the chat Karl made Kylie visibly uncomfortable by describing her as 'hot 50-year-old' and asked if she could stop dating 'incredibly good-looking d**kheads'. 

Oh dear: Karl was slammed after he called a 'hot 50-year-old' and told her to stop dating 'd**kheads' in a bizarre interview

Viewers flocked to Twitter to blast the 'rubbish' interview and claimed Karl was using the chat to 'creep' on Kylie.

The Channel Nine personality concluded the interview by bringing out a birthday cake for Kylie and singing to her, in a nod to her 50th in May.

Coming up from behind her, the grinning host gestured at the camera crew and publicists to join in as he serenaded a squirming Kylie.

It's not believed that the poorly-received chat is related to the pop queen's decision to pull the pin on further interviews with Australian journalists.

Backlash: Viewers were less than impressed with Karl's onscreen antics, blasting the 'trainwreck' interview and calling for someone more 'professional' to take the helm
item.dc:abstract: She made the decision to cancel all her interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia to 'rest her voice.' Yet Kylie Minogue was seen belting her popular tunes while performing at the amfAR Gala Shaw Studios, Hong Kong on Monday. The pop singer, 49, looked in her element on stage as she wowed in a bold red plunging dress with a sexy side split.

item.title: Girl's Trip star Tiffany Haddish, 38, on her long road to fame... from growing up in foster care to living in her car
item.description: She was a jobbing actress when she burst onto the acting scene following a stand-out role in last year's Girl's Trip.
item.content:encoded:
She was a jobbing actress when she burst onto the acting scene following a stand-out role in last year's Girl's Trip.

Since then Tiffany Haddish has partied with Beyonce, delighted on SNL and monopolized the stage at the Oscars, leaving the audience in stitches as she presented an award with Maya Rudolph.

But while she's now a bona fide star at 38, Tiffany's road to fame was long and difficult - starting at the age of eight when she was left to take charge of her siblings when a car crash left her mother with a traumatic brain injury.

Girl's Trip star Tiffany Haddish, 38, on her long road to fame... from growing up in foster care to living in her car

Stepping out: Tiffany at an event this weekend

After three months in hospital, Tiffany says her mother underwent a complete personality change - returning home volatile and abusive.

Tiffany told GQ, in whose latest issue she appears: 'I swore she had a demon in her. It's so scary.'

Abandoned by her own father as a toddler, Tiffany was left to care for her younger half-siblings. By the time she was 13 they were all in foster care, where she spent the next two years, until her grandmother won custody.

Breaking down barriers: With Taylor Swift on SNL in November; Tiffany was the first black female comic to host the show

As a young adult Tiffany was homeless on three separate occasions, forced to live out of her car.

Today, as one of the comic world's new stars, she is using her newfound wealth to take care of her mother and grandmother.

She tells GQ: 'I just got my mom out the mental institution... Literally all my money goes into my grandmother and my mother. 

'I got a two-bedroom apartment and moved my sister in so she could be monitoring [our mom]. I got nurses for my mom. My grandma bumped her head and had to have her brain drained, and she's dealing with Alzheimer's. I've got meal services coming to the house for her and for my mom.' 

Unforgettable: Monopolizing the Oscars stage with Maya Rudolph earlier this month

Made it: With Regina Hall, Jada Pinkett Smith and Queen Latifah in last year's Girl's Trip

She talks about finding specialists to help her mother - by talking to the doctors of Tracy Morgan, her co-star in The Last O.G. 

And Tiffany dismisses fellow actress Monique's call for a boycott of Netflix, after she found the streaming service had paid her considerably less than other comics.

Explains Tiffany: 'I don't have that husband of hers. I'm looking at how [Netflix has] opened up so many opportunities for black females and comedy... I'm not gonna protest because somebody got offered not the amount of money they wanted to get offered.'
item.dc:abstract: She was a jobbing actress when she burst onto the acting scene following a stand-out role in last year's Girl's Trip. Since then Tiffany Haddish has partied with Beyonce, delighted on SNL and monopolized the stage at the Oscars, leaving the audience in stitches as she presented an award with Maya Rudolph. But while she's now a bona fide star at 38, Tiffany's road to fame was long and difficult - starting at the age of eight when she was left to take charge of her siblings when a car crash left her mother with a traumatic brain injury.

item.title: Into the wild! Taraji P. Henson wows in a tiger-print top and skirt as she promotes new movie Acrimony in NYC
item.description: Taraji P. Henson is not afraid to rock some fierce fashion. On Monday, the 47-year-old actress was clad in a tiger print top and skirt as she promoted her new movie Acrimony on The Today Show in NYC.
item.content:encoded:
Taraji P. Henson is not afraid to rock some fierce fashion.

On Monday, the 47-year-old actress was clad in a knitted, tiger-print top and skirt as she promoted her new movie Acrimony on The Today Show in NYC alongside co-star Lyriq Bent.

The Empire star wore the wild two-piece ensemble under a knee-length denim jacket embellished with gold buttons.

Scroll down for video  

Wild thing! Taraji P. Henson commanded attention on Monday in a knitted two-piece tiger print top and skirt as she appeared on The Today Show

The Howard University grad kept her raven-colored locks in a low tight ponytail and accessorized with black sunglasses and silver stud earrings.

Staying comfortable, the mother-of-one wore black Ugg boots, which she later swapped out for chic black stilettos. 

The Washington D.C. native held on closely to a male bodyguard with one hand, and clasped her phone in the other.  

Daring denim: The actress topped her look off with a knee-length jean jacket embellished with gold buttons

Interview ready: The Empire star looked fierce as she completed her outfit with chic black stilettos and a black-and-gold purse

Taraji topped her outfit off with a black and gold printed purse hanging from her shoulder by a gold chain. 

She was joined by Lyriq as they talked up their thriller Acrimony, directed by Tyler Perry.

The film is centered around a faithful wife played by Taraji who is tired of standing by her devious husband and becomes enraged when she is betrayed. 

Coming to theaters: Taraji and her co-star Lyriq Bent stopped by the show to promote their upcoming thriller, Acrimony 

Fashion forward: Lyriq, 38, looked like the epitome of cool in a black leather jacket over a white button-up shirt and black pants 

Lyriq, 38, looked like the epitome of cool on Monday in a black leather jacket over a white button-up shirt and dark pants. 

He added some pops of color with a burgundy belt and shoes, as he sipped on a hot Starbucks coffee.  

During their interview, the two stars spilled to Hoda Kotb and Kathie Lee Gifford that the entire movie was filmed in a little over a week.

Dream Team: Acrimony is the third movie Taraji has worked on with director Tyler Perry, having already starred in The Family That Preys in 2008, and I Can Do Bad All By Myself in 2009

A force to be reckoned with: Taraji (pictured in Acrimony) plays a faithful wife who is tired of standing by her devious husband and becomes enraged when she is betrayed

'It won't be the last': Lyriq gushed about his first time working with Taraji saying he hopes to co-star alongside her again in the future 

'We had to have that schedule because I was still on Empire,' said Taraji. 'We shot our portion in five days. The whole movie was done in eight.'

And the award-winning actress is a force to be reckoned with. Her co-star gushed about working with her for the first time, saying, 'It won't be the last.' 

The upcoming movie will be Taraji's third time working with director Tyler Perry, having previously starred in The Family That Preys in 2008, and I Can Do Bad All By Myself in 2009.

Easy change: Taraji swapped her skirt for a pair of classy black pants for her interview on SiriusXM the same day

If it ain't broke: She and three-time collaborator Perry chatted together about their latest project 

'I love working with Tyler and Tyler doesn't just call out of the blue if he doesn't have anything that you're going to say "Yes" to,' said the Hidden Figures actress.

Meanwhile Taraji swapped her skirt for classy black pants when she turned up for an interview on SiriusXM the same day 

Acrimony hits theaters on March 30.  

Quick change: The actress later ditched the animal print entirely

New Look: She rocked a red Adeam top, Gucci coat and Brian Atwood shoes as she stepped out the Upper West Side

On Monday, the 47-year-old actress was clad in a knitted tiger print top and skirt as she promoted her new movie Acrimony on The Today Show in NYC alongside co-star Lyriq Bent. The Empire star wore the wild two-piece ensemble under a knee-length denim jacket embellished with gold buttons.

item.title: 'Who DOESN'T hate him?' Constance Zimmer chats about UnREAL character Quinn's 'fun' relationship with show host Graham... and reveals that she is actually NICE to him in season four
item.description: Constance Zimmer has teased that her character Quinn King actually cuts character Graham some slack in the yet-to-be-aired fourth season of UnREAL.
item.content:encoded:
Constance Zimmer has teased that her character Quinn King actually cuts character Graham some slack in the yet-to-be-aired fourth season of UnREAL.

'The season we just shot I actually have one line that I say to him that’s really nice. It’s the first time I’ve ever been nice to him and it was so hard to do!' The actress, 47, said, during a recent press interview.

'I mean, who doesn’t hate Graham,' she added of the character [played by Brennan Elliott]. 'It’s so fun, that relationship. I don’t think that was ever meant to be such a big deal until we started realising how much people loved how mean I was to him.'

Scroll down for video 

'Who DOESN'T hate him?' Constance Zimmer has spoken about UnREAL character Quinn's 'fun' relationship with show host Graham... and reveals that she is actually NICE to him in season four

Elaborating, she went on: 'I don’t think she hates him. I think he symbolises everything about the show that she hates and because he is her employee she’s allowed to really dig into him and be like, "I can’t believe this moron".'

House Of Cards star Constance also hinted at a potential return for the mysteriously vanished character Dr Wagerstein [played by Amy Hill].

She was part of seasons one and two but hasn't been featured in season three.

'I don’t know,' Constance said. 'She’s not dead, I’ll tell you that much. Maybe she wasn’t available because she was on various other television shows.'

Going easy on him: Constance has teased that her character Quinn actually cuts Graham [C] some slack in the yet-to-be-aired fourth season of UnREAL

House Of Cards star Constance also hinted at a potential return for the mysteriously vanished character Dr Wagerstein played by Amy Hill [R]

Of Quinn's relationship with Rachel [Shiri Appleby], she said: 'Playing Quinn, I have to always believe that she always has Rachel’s best intentions at heart...

'Quinn knows what’s best for Rachel and everything she does for her is to make her better and to make her capable to move on. But we’re just learning... I don’t know if she will ever be able to let her to move on.

'It doesn’t mean she won’t be happy. It’s complicated that relationship.'

Stars: Constance has appeared in the likes of Entourage, The Newsroom and Agents of SHIELD in addition to House Of Cards and UnREAL - and has earned herself an Emmy nomination [pictured L-R with co-stars Jeffrey Bowyer-Chapman, Shiri Appleby and B J Britt in 2016]

Constance has appeared in the likes of Entourage, The Newsroom and Agents of SHIELD in addition to House Of Cards and UnREAL - and has earned herself an Emmy nomination.

The show premiered on Lifetime on 1 June, 2015, based on a short film by Sarah Gertrude Shapiro [award-winning independent movie Sequin Raze].

The second season premiered on 6 June, 2016 and the third debuted on 27 February 2018 – two years later.

The fourth season completed production in January 2018 before the third season had aired.

Success: The show premiered on Lifetime on 1 June, 2015, based on a short film by Sarah Gertrude Shapiro [award-winning independent movie Sequin Raze]
item.dc:abstract: 'The season we just shot I actually have one line that I say to him that’s really nice. It’s the first time I’ve ever been nice to him and it was so hard to do!' The actress, 47, said, during a recent press interview.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Bullock
item.mi:shortTitle: Constance Zimmer reveals she is NICE to Graham in UnREAL in season 4

item.title: Ready for the worst! Kate Bosworth and Jenna Dewan slip into Hunter rain jackets at sun-filled Ultimate Family Festival in Pasadena
item.description: On Sunday, actresses Kate Bosworth and Jenna Dewan showed off their wet weather style in rain jackets at the Hunter For Target Ultimate Family Festival in Pasadena, California.
item.content:encoded:
She's one of Hollywood's most fashionable stars.

And on Sunday, Kate Bosworth showed off her wet weather style in a rain jacket at the Target Ultimate Family Festival in Pasadena, California.

The Superman Returns actress was joined by Jenna Dewan at the promotional event for Target's new Hunter range of outdoor wear.  

Storm warning: On Sunday, Kate Bosworth and Jenna Dewan showed arrived at the Target Ultimate Family Festival in Pasadena, California

The Blue Crush actress slipped the tan wet weather garment over a white T-shirt and a black skirt that showed off plenty of the 35-year-old's toned pins.

Bosworth wore high top black sneakers on her feet and covered her distinctive hazel and blue eyes with a pair of shades.

Her straight blonde tresses were worn untied and with a center part. 

Rains forecast: The Blue Crush actress slipped the tan wet weather garment over a white T-shirt and a black skirt that showed off plenty of the 35-year-old's toned pins

Boot scootin': Bosworth wore high top black sneakers on her feet

Tosser: Her straight blonde tresses were worn untied and with a center part

Jenna Dewan, meanwhile, wore a transparent gray rain coat over an Onia bodysuit and vibrant orange sweatpants.

The 37-year-old wife of Channing Tatum completed the look with white, open toe strappy heels. 

The Step Up actress' wavy brunette tresses were worn loose and with a center part for the day.  

Well-heeled: The 37-year-old wife of Channing Tatum completed the look with white, open toe strappy heels

Great hair day: The Step Up actress' wavy brunette tresses were worn loose and with a center part for the day

Also at the star-studded event were Hailee Steinfeld, Anna Kendrick and Tiffany Haddish.

The breakout star of Girls Trip wore three quarter length sweatpants with an olive green bomber jacket and brown and black leather boots.

Pitch Perfect 2 star Steinfeld, meanwhile, went with a green theme, pairing a green and white jacket with green velvet pants. 

Tiffany Haddish, 38, wore three quarter length sweatpants with an olive green bomber jacket and brown and black leather boots

That's so raven: The breakout star of Girls Trip wore her raven tresses untied

Green with envy: Pitch Perfect 2 star Steinfeld, meanwhile, went with a green theme, pairing a green and white jacket with green velvet pants

The eyes have it: The True Grit starlet went with a smokey eye look for the day

Hello sunshine! Anna Kendrick rocked a yellow rain jacket for the day

Good will Hunter-ing: The Up In The Air actress kept warm in a long Hunter sweatshirt dress

And on Sunday, Kate Bosworth showed off her wet weather style in a rain jacket at the Target Ultimate Family Festival in Pasadena, California. The Superman Returns actress was joined by Jenna Dewan at the promotional event for Target's new Hunter range of outdoor wear.

item.title: Peter Andre as you've never seen him before! Squeaky clean star sports track marks as he transforms into tattooed and pierced heroin addict for gritty movie role
item.description: Peter Andre has proven his rising acting prowess by transforming into a heroin addict for his new short independent film, The Inheritance.
item.content:encoded:
He is known for his squeaky clean image, having soared to global prominence with his catchy pop hit, Mysterious Girl, in 1996. 

But Peter Andre has proven his rising acting prowess by transforming into a heroin addict for his new short independent film, The Inheritance.

Heavily tattooed with a slew of piercings and track marks on his arms, the singer, 45, proves to be a far cry from his usual look in intense new stills from the set in Los Angeles.  

Is that you, Peter? Andre, 45, has proven his rising acting prowess by transforming into a heroin addict for his new short independent film, The Inheritance

Clearly his new passion project, Peter seems to have given the role his all as he shocks in the new stills. 

Dressed in a grey vest and blue jeans, the British born-Australia raised star sports a series of dramatic inkings, as well as ear and lip piercings. 

Peter is also seen with spiky locks, which shows off the tattoo on the side of his face, and also has track marks on his arm.

Playing the troubled character of Harry, a suicidal heroin act, in other stills the father-of-four cuts a distressed figure while a bottle of whiskey is propped on the floor next to him.

Transformation: He is known for his squeaky clean image, (R) having soared to global prominence with his catchy pop hit, Mysterious Girl, in 1996

Unrecognisable: Heavily tattooed with a slew of piercings and track marks on his arms, the singer proves to be a far cry from his usual look in intense new stills from the set in Los Angeles

Looks the part: Dressed in a grey vest and blue jeans, the British born-Australia raised star sports a series of dramatic inkings, as well as ear and lip piercings

A romance in the new flick is also teased as Peter is joined by a stunning red-headed actress.

Speaking about the exciting new venture in his New! magazine column recently, Peter revealed: I had a great time filming in Los Angeles.

'I've got the acting bug. Although it can be full-on, I can honestly say shooting was an incredible experience. It was intense and very dark. I can't wait to see the edit.

'Becoming the character took months of preparing and thankfully it paid off. I'll be going back later in the year to film more.

'In fact, it looks like I'm going to be spending a lot more time in America, this year, so I'm lucky to have such, trusting wife and family,' he concluded. 

Role: Playing the troubled character of Harry, a suicidal heroin act, in other stills he can be seen cutting a distressed figure while a bottle of whiskey is propped on the floor next to him

Tat's cool: Peter is also seen with spiky locks, which shows off the tattoo on the side of his face

It has also been reported by The Sun that Hollyoaks and EastEnders star Jamie Lomas has been 'secretly tutoring him for the past six months.' 

'Pete hasn't been able to reveal too much about the movie script but the character is absolutely nothing like him.'

Peter is also lending his acting talents to a new flick The Underdog which has commenced production this month. 

Meanwhile, Peter's stunning other half Emily McDonagh has been looking after their children Millie and Theo back in England. 

Helping hand: It has also been reported that Hollyoaks and EastEnders star Jamie Lomas has been 'secretly tutoring him for the past six months'

Taking to her OK! column, she confessed: 'I only get a set number of annual leave days, so would rather use those when we can go away with the kids or spend quality time together.

'He's working 16-hour days out there, so we wouldn't get to spend any time together.'  

Meanwhile, it was recently revealed that Emily no longer approaches Peter in the bedroom, after discovering he was broody. 

Saucy: A romance in the new flick is also teased as Peter is joined by a stunning red-headed actress

'Becoming the character took months of preparing': Peter also spoke about the exciting new venture in his New! magazine column 

Speaking to OK!, the TV personality said of his desire for a fifth child: 'I don't need to say it now, she just knows. That's why she doesn't go anywhere near me in bed. She's like: "Stay over there".' 

Peter added: 'It's kind of weird, isn't it? Especially as I was like so "never again" as I was having seven espressos a day and still struggling!' 

Peter and Emily first met when her doctor father Ruaraidh treated the singer for kidney stones back in 2010, but they did not embark on romance until 2012.

Three years later, the lovebirds exchanged vows in a romantic ceremony at Mamhead House, in Exeter in July 2015.

The happy couple have since welcomed two children together - daughter Amelia, four, and son Theodore, one. 

'I only get a set number of annual leave': Meanwhile, Peter's stunning other half Emily McDonagh has been looking after their children Millie and Theo back in England
item.dc:abstract: He is known for his squeaky clean image, having soared to global prominence with his catching pop hit, Mysterious Girl, in 1996. But Peter Andre has proven his rising acting prowess by transforming into a heroin addict for his new short independent film, The Inheritance. Heavily tattooed with a slew of piercings and track marks on his arms, the singer, 45, proves to be a far cry from his usual look in intense new stills from the set in Los Angeles.
item.dc:creator: Jabeen Waheed
item.mi:shortTitle: Peter Andre transforms into tattooed heroin addict for movie

item.title: Greta Gerwig goes bra-less under tailored jacket as Amber Tamblyn busts out of very low-cut dress at fundraising gala in New York
item.description: Gerwig and Tamblyn were among the celebrities who turned out to celebrate honoree Laurie Metcalfe at the annual MCC Theater's Miscast Gala Monday night.
item.content:encoded:
Greta Gerwig went bra-less under a black jacket as she arrived for the annual MCC Theater's Miscast Gala in New York Monday night.

The Lady Bird director flashed a little cleavage in the number that was paired with matching tailored trousers.

Meanwhile, fellow guest Amber Tamblyn fairly busted out of a very low-cut yellow and blue floral-themed frock.  

Flaunting it: Greta Gerwig, left, and Amber Tamblyn, right, both put their cleavage front and center as they attended the annual MCC Theater's Miscast Gala in New York Monday night

Gerwig and Tamblyn were among the celebrities who turned out to celebrate the event's honoree Laurie Metcalfe.

The gala raises money for Off-Broadway productions and to support the MCC Theater's Youth Company and in-school partnerships.

Gerwig, 34, wore her blonde hair with an off-center parting and swept to one side across her forehead.

Her eyes were lined with kohl and mascara and she added a tough of blush and red lip color.

The actress and filmmaker completed her ensemble with black heels with bows on the toes and carried a shiny silver clutch purse. 

Blonde beauty: Gerwig went bra-less under a black jacket that was paired with matching tailored trousers and wore her hair with an off-center parting and swept across her forehead

Stylish: The Lady Bird director completed her ensemble with black heels with bows on the toes and carried a shiny silver clutch purse

Funky: Tamblyn, 34, fairly busted out of a very low-cut yellow and blue floral-themed frock which she paired with a cropped black leather jacket

Tamblyn, 34, paired her revealing dress with a cropped black leather jacket.

She also went bare-legged in black leather ankle boots, showing off some of her tattoos.

Her lashes were plumped up with black mascara and her cheeks and lips were colored a rosy red.

In the spotlight: Laurie Metcalfe, 62, was the gala's honoree. The Roseanne star paired a strapless top with tailored pants and a matching tailored jacket along with peep-toe heels

Came to honor his pal: Terry Kinney, 64, who with Metcalfe helped establish Chicago's Steppenwolf Theatre Company, posed on the red carpet with Tamblyn

Metcalfe, who is reprising her role of Jackie in the Roseanne reboot, also opted for an all-black ensemble.

The actress, 62, a founding member of Chicago's Steppenwolf Theatre Company, paired a strapless top with tailored pants and a matching tailored jacket.

She added black peep-toe heels and wore her short brown hair tucked behind her ears.   

Amber also posed for photos with Terry Kinney, 64, another Steppenwolf co-founder.

Couple goals: Joshua Leonard, 42, was dapper in a navy suit and white open-neck shirt, while Alison Pill, 32, wore a pretty patterned frock and black heels

Joshua Leonard and Alison Pill made a date night out of the event.

The couple, who married in 2015, made for a very stylish pair.

Leonard, 42, was dapper in a  navy suit and white open-neck shirt, while Pill, 32, best known for HBO's The Newsroom, wore a pretty patterned frock.

The blonde actress wore her short hair in loose curls and wore red lip color.

Singer and actress Sara Bareilles, 38, was accompanied by her actor boyfriend Joe Tippett.

She wore a striking black and gold striped dress and black shoes, and left her long brunette locks loose around her shoulders. 

Date night: Singer and actress Sara Bareilles, 38, was accompanied by her actor boyfriend Joe Tippett

Gala night: Bareilles wore a striking black and gold striped dress and black shoes, and left her long brunette locks loose around her shoulders

The Lady Bird director flashed a little cleavage in the number that was paired with matching tailored trousers. Meanwhile, fellow guest Amber Tamblyn fairly busted out of a very low-cut yellow and blue floral-themed frock.

item.title: Lottie Moss nails casual chic in a flirty crop top and denim jacket as she enjoys a night out with BFF Valentine Sozbilir in LA
item.description: The model, 20, continued to make the rounds at Los Angeles' hottest celebrity haunts as she dined with friends at swanky eatery Delilah on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
She's been busy sunning herself in California for the last few weeks.

And Lottie Moss continued to do the rounds of Los Angeles' hottest celebrity haunts as she dined with best pal Valentine Sozbilir at Delilah on Sunday.

The model, 20, looked effortlessly chic in her low-key ensemble as she rocked a bustier-inspired white crop-top with a flirty clasped feature.

Model beauty: Lottie Moss nailed casual chic in a flirty crop-top and denim jacket as she enjoyed a night out with pal Valentine Sozbilir at Delilah in Los Angeles on Sunday

Lottie teamed her saucy top with an on-trend denim jacket as she stuck close to her friend while heading to the restaurant.

The catwalk queen slipped her statuesque pins to a pair of high-waisted black slacks and ramped up the edgy style in fishnet black boots. 

Lottie toted a chic leather handbag, while her glossy blonde tresses were left in a sleek pin straight style. 

The London-based beauty left the glittering accessories at home, instead opting for a dainty silver charm necklace and minimalist make-up.

Fun night: The model, 20, teamed her saucy top with an on-trend denim jacket as she stuck close to her friend Valentine while heading to the restaurant

Lottie has been enjoying some time in the States with fellow fashion star Sofia Richie, and the pair were last spotted enjoying a spot of retail therapy in Los Angeles on Monday. 

Her latest appearance comes after she went completely naked in a revealing selfie shared while she took a bath during her current stay at The London West Hollywood.

With strategically placed foam and two playful star emojis protecting her modesty, the young model was an engaging sight in two snaps shared with her Instagram followers. 

Flirty style: The catwalk queen slipped her statuesque pins to a pair of high-waisted black slacks and ramped up the edgy style in fishnet black boots

Captioning the images with an accompanying link to a luxury beauty treatment brand, she wrote: ‘Saturday nights have changed. Had lots of questions about my skin recently so wanted to let you all in on one of my many skin secrets!’

Lottie recently launched her own clothing line Moss x PacSun collection, a capsule range inspired by Brigitte Bardot comprising festival pieces such as sun dresses, play suits, vests and skimpy hot pants.

The model is following in the star-studded footsteps of her supermodel half-sister Kate as she worked on her own eponymous range for Topshop since 2007. 

Bold: Lottie's latest appearance comes after she went completely naked in a revealing selfie shared while she took a bath during her current stay at The London West Hollywood

And Lottie Moss continued to do the rounds of Los Angeles' hottest celebrity haunts as she dined with best pal Valentine Sozbilir at Delilah on Sunday. The model, 20, looked effortlessly chic in her low-key ensemble as she rocked a bustier-inspired white crop-top with a flirty clasped feature.

item.title: Scrubs up well! Liam Hemsworth is a far cry from his recent rain-soaked surfing excursion as he smoulders at the amFAR gala in a smart tuxedo
item.description: Liam Hemsworth attended the 2018 American Foundation for AIDS Research [amFAR] gala at Shaw Studios in Hong Kong on Monday night.
item.content:encoded:
He was out at the end of last week on the soaking wet beaches of Malibu, catching some waves with his brother Luke.

But Liam Hemsworth looked a lot dryer on Monday evening as he attended the 2018 American Foundation for AIDS Research [amFAR] gala at Shaw Studios in Hong Kong.

The actor, 28, looked preened in the slick black number, under which he wore a crisp white shirt.

Scrubs up well! Liam Hemsworth was a far cry from his recent rain-soaked surfing excursion as he smouldered at the amFAR gala in a smart tuxedo on Monday

Liam added a bow tie and shiny loafers to the get-up, and styled his dark mane in a sweeping style.

Rocking his beard and adding a red pin to his lapel to support the occassion, Liam looked every inch the gent at the glitzy event.

The appearance comes in stark contrast to his beach trip - which he and brother Luke did without their other actor sibling Chris. 

The duo were drenched before they got into the water, however, as they arrived for their surfing session in a torrential down-pouring.

Looking sharp: Rocking his beard and adding a red pin to his lapel to support the occassion, Liam looked every inch the gent at the glitzy event

Slew of credits: Liam has also starred in the Hunger Games franchise, Independence Day: Resurgence and The Dressmaker

But the boys appeared not to be bothered by the rain as they parked by the beach and unloaded their surfboards.

Donning wetsuits, Liam was seen walking down to the beach, surfboard under one arm. But the rain didn't dampen his spirits or stop the Hunger Games star hitting the waves.

The Hemsworth brothers make frequent reference of their close bond, catching up frequently in between acting projects. 

Liam is currently in a relationship with Miley Cyrus, with rumours the couple may have secretly tied the knot during their Byron Bay holiday over Christmas and New Year.

The young couple stayed in the celebrity hotspot at the home of Chris and his wife Elsa Pataky.
item.dc:abstract: The actor, 28, looked preened in the slick black number, under which he wore a crisp white shirt. Liam added a bow tie and shiny loafers to the get-up, and styled his dark mane in a sweeping style.

item.title: 'You've got very nice boobs!': Christine McGuinness turns the heads of her co-stars as she makes glam debut on Real Housewives of Cheshire... following marital drama with husband Paddy
item.description: The 30-year-old, who makes her debut on the show on Monday night, was seen meeting co-star Ester for the first time in the clip - and immediately catches her attention with her breasts.
item.content:encoded:
She is thought to have resolved her marital woes with husband Paddy, after he was spotted arm-in-arm with Nicole Appleton during a night out in Soho. 

And Christine McGuinness certainly seemed back to her confident best on Monday, in the trailer for the new series of Real Housewives of Cheshire.

The 30-year-old, who makes her debut on the show this season, was seen meeting co-star Ester Dohnalová for the first time in the clip - and immediately catches her attention with her glamorous appearance.

New girl in town: Christine McGuinness seemed back to her confident best on Monday as the trailer for her first appearance in The Real Housewives of Cheshire was released

'You've got very nice boobs!': The 30-year-old was seen meeting co-star Ester (R) for the first time in the clip - and immediately catches her attention with her glamorous appearance

Christine looks happier than ever in the teaser, as she arrives at a clothing store to greet pal Tanya Bardsley and her friend Ester.

Having been spotted crying at the wheel of her car last month, following her marital woes with Paddy, the blonde was back to her glamorous best on the show - clad in a faux-fur gilet, and carrying a designer handbag on her arm.  

However, Ester's head was immediately turned by Christine's top of choice, which featured a daring caged cut-out across the chest, to tease at her cleavage.

Arrival: Christine looks happier than ever in the teaser, as she arrives at a clothing store to greet pal Tanya Bardsley (R) and her friend Ester

Playful: However, Ester's head was immediately turned by Christine's top, which featured a daring caged cut-out across the chest

As the pair hugged in greeting, Ester, known for her bold and often controversial nature, declared: 'You've got very nice boobs!'

Slightly taken aback, Christine then erupted into giggles and replied: 'You too!', as she playfully clutched her chest. 

While she only makes a fleeting appearance in the trailer, the mother-of-three will no doubt join the Housewives at their typically raucous - and often dramatic - parties throughout the new season.

They're back: While she only makes a fleeting appearance in the trailer, the mother-of-three will no doubt join the Housewives at their typically raucous parties throughout the series

Leading ladies: The seventh series of the reality show, which also features a cast trip to Marrakech, kicks off on Monday night at 10pm, on ITVBe

The seventh series of the reality show, which also features a cast trip to Marrakech, kicks off on Monday night at 10pm, on ITVBe.

The show marks Christine's first foray into reality television, amid rumours she is also set to appear on the new series of I'm A Celebrity, Get Me Out Of Here! 

Sources told the Mirror that ITV execs were keen to get the 30-year-old onboard as they believe what she has to say about her relationship with the Take Me Out Host, 44, would be a ratings goldmine. 

In demand: The show marks Christine's first foray into reality TV, amid rumours she is also set to appear on the new series of I'm A Celebrity in order to spill on her marital woes with Paddy

Last month Christine's marriage to the comedian was rocked when he was spotted on a cosy night out with singer Nicole Appleton, 43, in Soho.

However, Christine's friend and Real Housewives co-star Dawn Ward claimed the pair had resolved their issues at the TRIC Awards in London earlier this month. 

She said: 'She's an amazing person and a great mum. She's been through a lot recently. I know Paddy and Christine really, really well and now she's in a good place.

'She looks amazingly happy so that's all that matters. Her and Paddy are really strong, have a great marriage and beautiful children.'

Trouble: Last month Christine's marriage to the comedian was rocked when he was spotted on a cosy night out with singer Nicole Appleton, 43, in Soho (pictured together in October)

Sources also recently claimed that she and Paddy were happy and living under the same roof once again, after he managed to 'win back her trust'.

An insider told The Sun: 'Things were really not good between the couple up until early last week and friends were left fearing for their marriage. 

'They have had some very heated and emotional arguments over the last couple of weeks and Paddy obviously had a lot of explaining to do to Christine.

'Christine now believes her husband when he says that nothing romantic happened with Nicole and he has managed to win back her trust.' 

Paddy and Christine raise three children together; twins Leo and Penelope, five, and daughter Felicity, 18 months.
item.dc:abstract: She is thought to have resolved her marital woes with husband Paddy, after he was spotted arm-in-arm with Nicole Appleton during a night out in Soho. And Christine McGuinness certainly seemed back to her confident best in the trailer for the new series of Real Housewives of Cheshire. The 30-year-old, who makes her debut on the show this season, was seen meeting co-star Ester Dohnalová for the first time in the clip - and immediately catches her attention with her glamorous appearance.

item.title: Chris Evans makes Broadway debut with support from stars including Annette Bening and Luann de Lesseps
item.description: The actor, 36, trod the boards at the Hayes Theater in a production of Kenneth Lonergan's play Lobby Hero.
item.content:encoded:
Avengers star Chris Evans made his Broadway debut on Monday night.

The actor, 36, trod the boards at the Hayes Theater in a production of Kenneth Lonergan's play Lobby Hero.

He stars opposite Arrested Development's Michael Cena, Atlanta star Brian Tyree Henry and English actress Bel Powley in the Second Stage production.

Curtain call: Avengers star Chris Evans , 36, made his Broadway debut on Monday night. He trod the boards at the Hayes Theater in a production of Kenneth Lonergan's play Lobby Hero

Evans drew a star-studded crown to support his debut on the Great White Way.

Aubrey Plaza, 33, arrived wearing a lovely sleeveless frock with spaghetti straps.

The calf-length black number was dotted with tiny blue flowers and had lace detailing along the neckline.

The Parks And Recreation and Legion star added black tights and black heels and wore her shoulder-length hair loose with a center parting. 

On hand, too, was Hollywood star Annette Bening who looked incredibly stylish in an ankle-length buttoned-up double-breasted black coat  and black ankle boots.

Theatre fan: Among those who showed up to support the actor was Parks And Recreation and Legion star Aubrey Plaza, 33

Pretty look: She wore a lovely sleeveless frock with spaghetti straps. The calf-length black number was dotted with tiny blue flowers and had lace detailing along the neckline

Supportive: On hand, too, was Hollywood star Annette Bening, 59, who looked incredibly stylish in an ankle-length buttoned-up double-breasted black coat and black ankle boots

Manhattan socialite and reality star Luann de Lesseps posed it up on the red carpet in a backless monochrome patterned slip dress.

The Real Housewives of New York star added a black fur jacket and white stiletto-heeled ankle boots.

She accessorized with statement diamond chandelier earrings.

Veteran actress Mercedes Ruehl, 70, wore a long padded jacket over a black dress with a patterned linen scarf wrapped a couple of times around her neck.

Blinged: The Real Housewives of New York star Luann de Lesseps posed on the red carpet in a monochrome patterned slip dress and dripped diamonds from her ears

Playing for the cameras: The Manhattan socialite, 52, paired her backless dress with a fur jacket and went bare-legged in stiletto-heeled white ankle boots

In the audience: Veteran actress Mercedes Ruehl, 70, wore a long padded jacket over a black dress with a patterned linen scarf wrapped a couple of times around her neck

Oscar winner Sam Rockwell was in the audience to show support for Evans. 

The Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri star, 49, paired a dark red checked two-piece suit with a black shirt.

The chiseled actor added a black coat and shiny black shoes.

Evans's Avengers co-star Sebastian Stan, 35, made an entrance in a light blue sweater with skinny black trousers, black shoes and a black coat.  

Sharp: Oscar winner Sam Rockwell, 49, paired a dark red checked two-piece suit with a black shirt. The chiseled actor added a black coat and shiny black shoes

Dapper: Evans's Avengers co-star Sebastian Stan, 35, made an entrance in a light blue sweater with skinny black trousers, black shoes and a black coat

Big night: Evans, pictured with co-star Michael Cera, left, and playwright Kenneth Lonergan, right, took a bow at the end of the performance

He stars opposite Arrested Development's Michael Cena, Atlanta star Brian Tyree Henry and English actress Bel Powley in the Second Stage production.

item.title: Make-up free Geri Horner looks cheery as she heads out on a stroll with son Monty... amid reports the Spice Girls will 'reunite for animated adventure'
item.description: The singer, 45, had plenty to smile about as she enjoyed a casual stroll with son Monty, 14 months, in leafy Hampstead, north London, on Monday morning.
item.content:encoded:
She's rumoured to be lending her voice to a new animated adventure alongside her Spice Girls bandmates. 

And Geri Horner had plenty to smile about as she enjoyed a casual stroll with son Monty, 14 months, in leafy Hampstead, north London, on Monday morning.

The singer, 45, looked cheery as she soaked up the spring sunshine in a chic grey coat and charcoal scarf.

Mummy and me: Geri Horner had plenty to smile about as she enjoyed a casual stroll with son Monty, 14 months, in leafy Hampstead, north London, on Monday morning 

The mother-of-two kept things comfortable for her leisurely walk, donning a pair of sophisticated chestnut boots.

Flashing a wide smile, the It's Raining Men hitmaker cooed over her little boy while shielding her eyes in classic aviators.

Geri's copper locks were swept back off her face and tucked into her scarf as her natural glow radiated as she went make-up free.

Stylish mum: The singer, 45, looked cheery as she soaked up the spring sunshine in a chic grey coat and charcoal scarf

On the stroll: The mother-of-two kept things comfortable for her leisurely walk, donning a pair of sophisticated chestnut boots

Later in the day, the TV personality shared an adorable snap of Monty getting to grips with a felt football at a park, while the mum-of-two looked on. 

Geri's outing comes after Variety reported that Geri will reunite with her Spice Girls bandmates for an animated adventure with characters based on the band, known as Posh, Scary, Baby, Ginger and Sporty.

Sources told the publication that the characters will be voiced by the singers, better known now by their real names; Victoria Beckham, Melanie Brown, Emma Bunton and Melanie Chisholm.

Smiles: Geri's copper locks were swept back off her face and tucked into her scarf as her natural glow radiated as she went make-up free

Day out: Flashing a wide smile, the It's Raining Men hitmaker cooed over her little boy while shielding her eyes in classic aviators

The insider explained: ‘They are fired up about the idea. It’s perfect for them because it won’t involve too much of their time.

'They can record voice-overs while working on their solo projects – and the animated versions of the girls can look years younger without everyone wondering if they’ve had surgery.’ 

The group hopes it will be the first of many animated superhero feature films that will spawn lucrative hit soundtrack albums. 

‘They’re thinking big in terms of a franchise on a global scale,’ said the source. 

New adventure: The star's outing comes amid new claims Geri will reunite with her Spice Girls bandmates for an animated adventure with characters based on the band

On the up: Geri took the time to look around the neighbourhood as a friend pointed out something of interest

Creative Artists Agency, which represents the group, is pitching the project to major Hollywood studios.

Earlier this year, Geri admitted she often gets 'anxious' she doesn't spend enough time with her children. 

Speaking to OK! Magazine, she confessed: 'I want to feel connected, I feel my daughter as she's got older, needs me more to be there to talk things through,' she said of daughter Bluebell.  

'My mum guilt kicks in when Monty wakes me up at 5.20am. I do the school run, I'm with him all day and then have to get everyone to bed. So going to work the next day feels quite easy.' 

Casual: Geri looked ultra casual for their trip out, making sure to keep a pair of trainers with her

Sunny stroll: Geri made the most of the sunshine as she walked with son Monty in a sophisticated stroller

She added: 'I prioritise being a mother and my family … But of course I feel guilty.' 

The singer married Red Bull's Formula One team principle Christian Horner, 44, in an intimate ceremony in Bedfordshire in May 2016.

The couple announced their baby news in October 2016, before welcoming little Montague in January 2017.

Geri is also a mother to daughter Bluebell, 11, with screenwriter former flame Sacha Gervasi, 51.

Christian has daughter Olivia, four, with his ex-wife Beverley Allen.  

'At the park!' Later in the day, the TV personality shared an adorable snap of Monty getting to grips with a felt football at a park, while the mum-of-two looked on
item.dc:abstract: She's rumoured to be lending her voice to a new animated adventure alongside her Spice Girls bandmates. And Geri Horner had plenty to smile about as she enjoyed a casual stroll with son Monty, 14 months, in leafy Hampstead, north London, on Monday morning. The singer, 45, looked cheery as she soaked up the spring sunshine in a chic grey coat and charcoal scarf.
